D hab ep kaij, “Si o hig woho pi apꞌe ch mehk ab amjed g Jiosh hegam mat pi ab hu wo ni‑hiwgam k hoꞌip nei g s‑hasig haꞌichu. Heg ant ab wo waꞌi ha chehgi mant am oidk hab wo ni‑juh hegai kelibad Jiosh haꞌichu i tashogiddam mash d Jonah.” Bad cheꞌiok k am ha dagito k gam hu hih.
Kuchd am gahi ep i shul wahlko ch ed k ga hu aigo dada k s‑mai machdki pi haꞌi uꞌuk g sismito.
D am waꞌi hekaj mad hab kaij g Jesus ab t‑wui, “Si g wo s‑e nenꞌoidk mat pi wo em‑cheawogi g ha‑jewajidakud hegam Palasi ch Sajusi.”
Kuchd am si aꞌaga ihda k hab kaij, “Heg oki hekaj hab kaij mattki pi haꞌi uꞌuk g sismito.”
Kudki s‑t‑amichud g Jesus ch hab kaij, “Pi amki koi amichud mani heꞌes edgid g gewkdag ch hekaj am aꞌaga mach pi ha sismitoga.
Am am wa chum neid mant al hetasp sismitokaj ha gegos g hetasp mihl chechoj ch muꞌi ehp. Ms huꞌi pi chegito mamt heꞌekia i hoha an i ui g wihpiꞌidaj.
Kum am wa chum neid mant al wewaꞌak sismitokaj ha gegos g giꞌik mihl chechoj ch muꞌi ehp. Ms huꞌi pi chegito mamt heꞌekia i hoha an i ui g wihpiꞌidaj.
Pegih, mt wo chum s‑mahchk mani pi wabsh g haꞌichu hugi hab ahg ch hab kaij mamt wo s‑e nenꞌoidad ab amjed g Palasi ch Sajusi ha‑jewajidakud.”
Kuchd am hahawa i s‑amich moki pi heg hab ahg jewajidakud mo hekaj e pahnt ch oki heg hab ahg Palasi ch Sajusi ha‑mashchamadag.
Kuchd gam hu hahawa hihim k am i miabi g Cesaria Philippi kihhim. D g Jesus ab t‑kakke ch hab kaij, “Am g wo ni‑ahgid Dohꞌo ni‑elid g hemajkam?”
Kuchd hab kaij, “Haꞌijj o hab m‑elid map d hegai Johnbad mo wa chum t‑pahl wapkonahim ch haꞌijj hab kaij map d Elijabad o Jeremiabad o hema i ep kekelibad Jiosh haꞌichu i tashogiddam.”
D ab hahawa ep t‑kakke, “M ahpim hig hedai ni‑elid?”
D ihda Simon mamt hab hahawa chehch Peter hab kaij, “Dap Jiosh alidag ch d si Kehshaj g Jiosh,”
D hab kaij g Jesus, “Simon, Jiosh at si s‑m‑hoꞌigeꞌid k am m‑chehgi mani d si Kehshaj. Pi at wabsh g hemajkam am m‑chehgi.
Kupt ab i s‑wohoch g Jiosh k ab si ni‑hiwig. Nt heg hekaj hab wo m‑chehch Peter (Hodai). Neh, id ab waw ant am wo i kei g ni‑cheopiga. Bani ahgch hab kaij mat wehsijj hegam mat hab waꞌap ab wo si ni‑hiwgad at d wo ni‑hemajkamgak. Kut pi hedai wo shaꞌi e nako mas wo ha keshwua, chum hems g jijawul.
Kunt ab wo m‑mah g gewkdag mapt wo s‑mahch k ah g Jiosh haꞌichu ahga k hab wo yahwitpiꞌo g apꞌedag am ha wehhejed hegam mat ab wo s‑wohoch. Ab ant wo m‑mah g gewkdag mapt hab wo ah mo haschu shohbidas ch haschu hiwgidas am ha wehhejed hegam mat ab wo ni‑hiwgad.”
Neh, bad kaij g Jesus ch ab hahawa si t‑chehani matt pi hedai wo ahgi mo heg d Jiosh si Kehsha.
D am i amjed am hahawa si tasho t‑ahgi g Jesus k hab kaij, “Hemho wa ant am wo hih Jerusalem wui. Kut muꞌi wo ni‑shoꞌigch g geꞌeged ch uꞌugchu papal ch chehanig ha mashchamdam k am wo i ni‑dagito mant wo ni‑muhkid. T wabshaba am wo him k d wo i waik tashk amjed. Nt ab wo uhpam i wuhsh muhkig amjed.” Neh, bo kaij g Jesus.
D g Peter im hu goꞌolko i be k ab si s‑gewkam neok wui hab kaijch, “Pi at woho wo shaꞌi hiwigi g Jiosh mamt hab wo m‑juh.”
D hab kaij g Jesus ab wui, “Pi g shaꞌi ni‑shohbid. Do wabsh hejel hab m‑elida ihda. Kup ab wui kehk g Jiosh hab elida hab masma mo g ge Jiawul.”
D hab hahawa ep kaij ab wehsijj t‑wui, “Mamtp am wo s‑oidam g niꞌhimdag k hemho wa gam hu wo dagito g hejel e‑tatchui k ahni ni‑tatchui hab wo junihid ni‑wehhejed e shoꞌigchudch. Heg at wo wa wepok mam ab mohto g kots ch ab ab wo e muhkid.
Pi amt wo heki wua g e‑doakag mamtp wo hekaj am ni‑wehhejed am ahgachugch g Jiosh haꞌichu ahga. Heg at wo heki wua g e‑doakag matp hedai wo chum s‑daꞌad.
Pi at haꞌichu wehhejed wo s‑kehgajk matp g oꞌodham wehs wo bei mo haschu i tatchua id dahm jewed k wabshaba pi wo e doꞌibia. Pi o an hu haꞌichug id dahm jewed mas heg hekaj wo e doꞌibia g oꞌodham.
Jiosh at ab uhpam wo ni‑mah g si geꞌe gewkdag an e‑kihdag ed. Kunt heg hekaj si s‑tondam wo tondad ch ia ep wo jiwia jewed dahm. T muꞌi anghil wo i ni‑wehmajk. Kunt wehs wo ha namkid g hemajkam heg hekaj mo haschu hab i junihim.
Nt wo si shel em‑ahgi mamt haꞌijj an d wabsh wo kia dodakamk ch wo nei mant s‑gewkam am wo chehgi g ni‑kownaltalig em‑shahgid.”
D am d i chuhdp tash amjed. D g Jesus ab i ha wai g Peter ch James ch John. D am wehmaj ab i chehchsh hema uhgk doꞌag t ab k atsh gan hu dada doꞌag dahm.
Kutsh g Jesus am hahawa gawul e juh. Sh g wuhioshaj hab waꞌi masma tonod mo g tash ch g wehschugaj hab masma s‑tohta mo g tonlig.
Kutsh ab haha wabsh i e chehgi g Mosesbad ch Elijabad k am wehmaj neneok g Jesus.
Sh g Peter hab kaij ab wui g Jesus, “T‑kownalig, s‑apꞌe oki mach ia haꞌichug. Kutt ia waik wo ha chuhcha g al chechopi matt hekaj ab wo si has em‑el ahpi ch Mosesbad ch Elijabad maptp wo tatchuad.”
Neh, sh am wabsh kia neok g Peter. Kutsh g si s‑mahs chewagi ab i wuhshani k ab ehka ha dahm. Tsh g Jiosh neꞌoki ab kaida chewagi t amjed k hab kaij, “Jesus o d si ni‑tatchuidch ni‑alidag. Heg amt ab wo si kaihamad.”
Kutsh si s‑ehbeni hegam Peter am i kahk g neꞌoki k am wabsh si kupal shul jewedo.
Tsh am hahawa jiwia g Jesus k an ha tahtam k hab kaij, “Gegokiwuio. Pi g wo shaꞌi e todsid.”
Tsh am hahawa i chum nenhog. Kush heg waꞌi Jesus hejel am kehk. Sh pi am hu haꞌichug hegam gohk.
Sh ab hahawa i huhudkhim doꞌag t amjed. Sh ab si ha chehani g Jesus ch hab kaij, “Pi g am hedai wo shaꞌi ahgid mamt haschu nei, nt hoꞌip kia uhpam i wuhsh ab muhkig amjed ahni Jiosh si Kehsha.”
Kush hab kaij idam ab wui g Jesus, “Neh, bo chechꞌe hegam chehanig t‑mashchamdam matsh ia wehpeg wo e maskogi g Elijabad. Tsh g Jiosh si Kehsha ia haha wo e maskogi. Pegih, t haschu ahgk pi ia wehpeg m‑baꞌich e maskogi hegai Elijabad?”
Sh hab kaij g Jesus, “Hema at woho wehpeg wo e maskogid k hab wo masmak mash wa g Elijabad ch wehs haꞌichu wo i apꞌech.
Kunt wo em‑ahgi mat wa woho heki hu jiwia. K Wabshaba muꞌijj pi mahch mo hedai wud ch ab wui hab wabsh juh g pi ap e‑tatchui. Pegih, k e aihim mat hab waꞌap wo ni‑juh k wo ni‑shoꞌigch ahni Jiosh si Kehsha.”
Kutsh am hahawa i amich idam moki heg hab ahg John mat wa am i shonwuich g pahl wakona.
D eda muꞌi hemajkam am haꞌichug amai machd am wih. Kud am uhpam dada hegam Jesus. D ab hema i tonwua Jesus wui
k hab kaij, “Ab g si i s‑hoꞌigeꞌid g ni‑sulijga. Si o pi ap mumku ch hebai am wabsh s‑e chuchkagid ch muꞌikko am gegshe nahda ch ed o am shuhdagi ch ed.
Kunt ia chum uꞌapa ha wui idam m‑chuhchai. T pi e nako mas wo doaj.”
D hab kaij g Jesus ab t‑wui, “Shoꞌo waꞌi pi geꞌej g em‑wohochudadag. M im hu hab wabsh i si e Juhkch ab ni‑amjed. Shahag wepo mant tash ia wo em‑wehmajkad ch wo em‑nakogad mat haha wo i geꞌeda.” Bad kaij g Jesus ch hab hahawa ahg hegai oꞌodham, “Ab g i bekaꞌi g e‑alidag.”
D ab hahawa i bei wui. D g Jesus am si s‑gewkam chehani g jiawul mat gam hu hab wo i e juh. Kud wa woho hab e juh. D am ha hekaj wabsh i doa g ali.
Kuchd ab hahawa hejelko kakke g Jesus machs haschu ahgk ahchim pi t‑nako matt gam hu hab wo i juh g jiawul.
D hab kaij g Jesus, “Heg amt hekaj pi e nako mam pi ab hu wohochud mat hab wo e juh. Nt wo si shel em‑ahgi mamt wo e nakog k wabsh chum haschu hab wo juh mamt hab wo chei s‑wohochudch mat hab wo e juh. Chum at hems g geꞌe doꞌag gan hu hab wo i kekiwua mamt wabsh wo ahgi s‑wohochudch mat hab wo e juh. [
T wabshaba ihda hab mahs haꞌichu hab waꞌi masma gm hu hab wo i juh mamt wo si e hoꞌigeꞌidahunad Jiosh wui pi haꞌichu koꞌadch.]”
Am achd wabsh kia oiopo Galilee chekshani ch ed. D hab kaij g Jesus ab t‑wui, “E o aihim mat wo ni‑bei hegam mo s‑ni‑kehꞌid k ab wo ni‑dagito
mant wo ni‑muhkid. T wabshaba am wo him k d wo i waik tashk amjed. Nt ab wo uhpam i wuhsh muhkig amjed.” Neh, kuchd wehsijj si pi ap t‑taht am i kaiok ihda.
Kuchd ged hu dada Capernaum t am. D am hema jiwia Peter wui hegam mo an hemapad g cheopi kowlanta k ab kakke ch hab kaij, “No ha namkid g cheopi kowlanta g em‑mashchamdam?”
D hab kaij g Peter, “Hemho wa,” K amjed ged hu i wah kih ch ed. D g Jesus ab ha hekaj kakke ch hab kaij, “Simon Peter, nap hab elid mat g kokownal ab wo haꞌichu ha kowlant hegam mo d ha wehm kihkam?”
D hab kaij g Peter, “Piaꞌa.” D hab ep kaij g Jesus, “Pegih, t heg hekaj pi haꞌichu wo ni‑kowlant g Jiosh.
Ch wabshaba pi tatchua machs wo ha kudu idam hemajkam. Kupt heg hekaj am wo hih shuhdagi wui k am wo wua g waptopi hukshpakud. Kut g si wehpeg watopi mapt wo huksh g lial ab wo kamshchid mat wo ai hegai cheopi kowlanta an ni‑wehhejed ch ep m‑wehhejed. Pt am wo be k hekaj wo ha namkid.”
Kuchd ab kakke g Jesus ch hab kaij, “Doht d wo si s‑has haꞌichuk am Jiosh kownaltalig ed?”
D eda an hema kehk g al chum ali. D g Jesus am i waid k ab t‑baꞌich i kehsh
k hab kaij, “Nt wo shel em‑ahgi mamt hab waꞌi masma am wo i wahp Jiosh kownaltalig ed mamt am gawul wo juh g e‑chegitoidag k ab wabsh wo i pi e haꞌichuchud k hab wo masmak mo ihda al chum ali.
Hegai mat hab wo juh ihda at d wo s‑has haꞌichuk am Jiosh kownaltalig ed.
T hedai i s‑ap ab wo i ha nei g aꞌal am ni‑wehhejed o heg wa wepo mat ahni s‑ap ab ni‑nei.
“S‑toꞌo ehbidam hab mahs am wehhejed hegai mat hema am wo i ha wanchkwua pi apꞌekam wui idam al aꞌal mo ab al ni‑hiwig. Baꞌich at wo i s‑apꞌek wehhejed matp hems wo e wachumchud k wo e muhkid mat koi hab wo juh ihda chuꞌijig.
Chum o hekid an hab e wua g pi apꞌekam jewed dahm. K hegam mo hab wua am haꞌi ep ha wanchshulig pi apꞌekam wui. T g Jiosh hemho wo wa ha namkid.
“Pi at hedai wo e nako mas ab uhpam wo i wuhsh Jiawul kih amjed. Kut pi hekid wo huhug g ha‑shoꞌigchuda amai. Heg at wo wa wepok mat am mei ch ed wo e shoꞌigchudad. Mt heg hekaj am wo i e nako mamt pi am hu wo gei heg eda. Baꞌich at wo i s‑apꞌek mamt chum hems wo heb hu wua g e‑nowi o g e‑tad o g e‑wuhi matp hema idam hab wo em‑juh mamt am wo gei Jiawul kih ed k pi wo bei hegai pi ha huhugedam doakag mo g Jiosh ab em‑makiog.
<range>
“Am g wo s‑nenꞌoidk mamt pi wo s‑ha kehꞌidad idam al chuꞌuchumchu. Jiosh o ab si has ha elid ch am ha nuhkudachud g anghil. [
Ia ant jiwia jewed dahm mant wo ha doꞌibia g heb hu hihimkam.]
“Neh, am g wo i oidahim ihda. Mamtp hems hema ahpim siant wo kahwaligak. Kut hema wo heb hu hih. Namt hig pi woho am wo s‑apko ha dagito hegam humukto gamai humukt k am wo hih doꞌag oidk k am wo i gahghi g heb hu himkam e‑shoiga.
Kut woho d wo s‑hehgigk mamtp wo cheh.
Bo wa masma pi shaꞌi tatchua g em‑ohg Jiosh mat hema wo heb hu hih idam al chuꞌuchum aꞌal.
“Mt heg waꞌi hejel wo ahgi e‑wehm wohochuddam matp pi ap wo chuꞌi ab em‑wui. Kutp hems ab s‑ap wo em‑kaiha. Kut ab hahawa ep wo i e hemakoch g em‑chegitoidag,
Tp wabshaba pi ab hu wo em‑kaiha, kumt hemako o gohk am ha wehm wo him k am wo ah g chuꞌijigaj. Kut hab masma gohk o waik wo s‑mahchk g chuꞌijigaj mo id hab masma an oꞌohanas Jiosh oꞌohana ed.
Kutp eda wa sha pi ab hu wo em‑kaiha, kumt am wo ha ahgi wehsijj hegam mam am ha wehm e mihshmad. Kutp pi ab hu wo ha kaiha idam, kumt haha wo dagito hab masma mo pi d em‑wehm wohochuddam.
“Nt wo si shel em‑ahgi mant ab wo em‑mah g gewkdag mamt hab wo ah mo haschu shohbidas ch haschu hiwgidas am ha wehhejed g ni‑hemajkamga.
Jiosh at am hab wo em‑juni mamt haschu ab wo tahnid e wepo hab elidch.
Kunt am wo haꞌichugk em‑shahgid mamt hebai am wo i e hemapai, chum ams d wo waꞌi gohkk o waikk.”
D g Peter ab kakke g Jesus ch hab kaij, “Ni‑kownalig, nant wewaꞌakko ab wabsh wo i s‑hoꞌigeꞌel g ni‑wehm wohochuddam matp haꞌakkio hab wo juh g pi apꞌekam ab ni‑wui?”
D hab kaij g Jesus, “Pi amt wabsh wewaꞌakko ab wo i s‑hoꞌigeꞌel. Matp heꞌekkio hab wo i juh g pi apꞌekam, mt haꞌakkio wo s‑hoꞌigeꞌel.
Bo wa e wua g em‑kownalig Jiosh ch em‑tatchuid mamt am hab waꞌap wo e junihid. “Id ant am wo em‑tashogi em‑ahgidch matp hems hema d wo kownalk ch am wo i ha hoa g e‑pionag ha‑wulshpadag,
Kumt am hema uꞌapa g piongaj, K id ab ab e wulshch g muꞌi mi‑yohn pihsh.
Kuki ihda pi am hu hugkam edgid g lial mat wo namkid g e‑wulshpadag. T hekaj g ahmoj am ha cheha mamt wo gagda k g wehmaj kihkam ch aꞌaligaj ch haꞌichu enigaj ep wo ha gagda. T d wabsh wo neneholk.
“Kut ihda ha‑pionag ab i gei e‑ahmo wui k ab i tahni mat ab wabsh wo i s‑hoꞌigeꞌel. Kut wo wa wehs ha namkid.
T am i s‑hoꞌigeꞌel g ahmoj k im hu hab i juh g wulshpadaj k dagito.
Kut am hih ihda oꞌodham. “K eda hema g wehmaj pion al heꞌekia pihsh ab ab e wulshch hegai mamt ab i s‑hoꞌigeꞌel. Kut heg nam k g baꞌichuj be k hab si ah mat wo namkid.
“Kut ihda wehmaj pion ab i gei wecho k ab i e shoꞌigchud wui mat ab wabsh wo i nenida. Kut wo wa uhpam namkid.
“Kut wabshaba pi ab hu kaiham k wabsh ha chehani mamt ged hu wo si kuh am hugkam mat hekid wo i namkid.
“Neh, t haꞌi ehp g pion si pi ap e taht neidok mat has e juh k am hihim k am ahgid g e‑ahmo wehs haꞌichu.
“T g ha‑ahmo ab i wai ihda e‑pionag k hab kaij ab wui, ‘Ahpi si pi amkam ni‑pionag, ab ant i si s‑m‑hoꞌigeꞌid k im hu hab i juh wehs hegai m‑wulshpadag heg waꞌi hekaj map ab si ni‑tahni.
Kupt hab wa masma wo chum s‑hoꞌigeꞌel g e‑wehm pion mant has i masma s‑m‑hoꞌigeꞌel.’
Neh, bo kaij ch si bagat k ged hu si kuh am hugkam mat hekid wehs wo i namkid.
“Pegih, t hab wa masma am hab wo em‑juh g ni‑ohg Jiosh mamtp pi hab hu e‑ihbdag amjed wo i s‑ha hoꞌigeꞌel hegam mat ab em‑wui pi ap wo chuꞌi.”
Am ad i haꞌasa ha mashcha g Jesus k am i dagito g Galilee chekshani. Kuchd gam hu aigo hihi Jordan akimel haꞌabjed k am hihim k am dada Judea chekshani ch ed.
D muꞌi hemajkam an oidahim g Jesus. Kud ha doajid.
D am haꞌi dada g Palasi hab chum ahgk mat ab wo haꞌichu kakke k hekaj wo heki himch. K g ha‑kakkei hab chuꞌig, “No hiwgidas an t‑chehanig ed mat g oꞌodham wo s‑ohhod g e‑hohnig?”
D hab kaij g Jesus, “An o hab chuꞌig Jiosh oꞌohana ed: Ga hu i wehpeg at am ha nahto g Jiosh g cheoj ch uwi mat d wo e wehhejedkamk
k hab kaij: Iꞌajed at g oꞌodham wo ha dagito g e‑ohg ch e‑jeꞌe k ab wo i wehmt g e‑wehm kihkam. T idam d haha wo hemakok.
Neh, bo kaij g Jiosh. K pi hab chum mahs mas g oꞌodham ab aꞌai wo i ha gawulkai hegam mat g Jiosh ab i ha hemakoch.”
D hab kaij g Palasi ab wui, “K wabshaba an oꞌohanas t‑chehanig ed matsh g oꞌodham wo mah g e‑hohnig g ohhoda tapial k wo s‑ohhod.”
D hab kaij g Jesus, “Heuꞌu, bo chuꞌig mamt wo ha mah g ohhoda tapial mamtp pi ab hu wo kaihamad g Jiosh ch pi wo pihk e elidad ha hekaj. K wa eda chum pi hab masma ga hu i wehpeg mat in ha nahto g Jiosh g hemajkam.
Kunt id hab wo em‑ahgi mat d wo pi apꞌekamk mamt wo s‑ohhod g e‑wehm kihkam k hema ep wo hohnt, heg hi wa mamt wo s‑mai am i chum hohntk matki heki hu ha wehm woꞌiwua.”
Kuchd hab kaij ab wui, “Kuki heg hekaj baꞌich i chum s‑apꞌe mat g oꞌodham pi wo ha hohnt.”
D hab kaij g Jesus, “Pi at wehsijj wo e nako hab masma, heg hi wa mat g Jiosh am wo i ha wehmt.
Haꞌijj at pi wo hohont no pi hab masma d mahsikam mo pi tatchua g hohnig ch haꞌijj d hegam mamt hab wabsh ha juh mat pi ap wo hohont. Haꞌijj o ep pi hohont heg hekaj mo g Jiosh kownaltalig baꞌich hab i elid. Kumt id am hab wo juh mamtp wo e nako.”
Kud haꞌi am ha uꞌapa g e‑aꞌaliga mat ab wo ha taht g Jesus k wo e hoꞌigeꞌidahu ha wehhejed. Kuchd chum s‑ha kehꞌid mo hab e wua.
D hab kaij g Jesus, “Ab g wabsh wo i ha hiwgid g aꞌal mat ab wo i hihi ni‑wui k pi an hu wo shaꞌi ha shohbi. Am at wabsh s‑moimam wo i wahp Jiosh kownaltalig ed ab ni‑hiwigch. Kumt hab waꞌi masma am wo i wahp.”
Neh, bad kaij ch ab hahawa ha tahtam k amjed gam hu hih.
D am hu hebai am hema jiwia g wechij oꞌodham Jesus wui k hab kaij, “Ha mashchamdam, shahchu ant am hab wo juh g s‑apꞌekam mant ab wo bei g pi ha huhugedam doakag?”
K hab kaij g Jesus, “Ab ap ni‑kakke ab amjed g s‑apꞌekam. K eda heg waꞌi Jiosh d s‑apꞌekam. Am g hab junihid g Jiosh chehanig maptp wo tatchuad mapt wo bei g pi ha huhugedam doakag.”
D hab kaij g oꞌodham, “Hedai hegam chehanig?” D hab ep kaij g Jesus, “Idam mo hab chuꞌig: Pi g am hu ha muaꞌi g oꞌodham. Pi g am hu ha ehsidad g ha‑wehm kihkam. Pi g am hu haꞌichu ha ehsidad. Pi g am hu haꞌichu ha iattogidad.
Ab g si has ha elidad g e‑ohg ch e‑jeꞌe. Ab g i pihk e elidad ha wui g hemajkam hab masma map hab masma hejel pihk e elid.”
D hab kaij g oꞌodham, “Wehs ani am hab wa chum ha junihim idam chehanig. Shahchu ant hab ep wo juh?”
D hab kaij g Jesus ab wui, “Pegih, pt am wo him k wo gagda wehs haꞌichu map haschu i eniga k wo ha mah g namkigaj g shoꞌigkam k ab wo i him k wo ni‑oidad maptp woho s‑behimk hegai map chum e gahgid.”
Kud si pi ap e taht am i kaiok k gam hu hih no pi d shaꞌi si s‑kais ch si s‑huwid g e‑kaisdag.
D hab hahawa ep kaij g Jesus ab t‑wui, “Neh, nt wo si shel em‑ahgi mat wo shaꞌi si s‑hasigk mas g s‑kakais am wo i wahp Jiosh kownaltalig ed.
Mam hig hab elid mat wo e nako g ka‑mihyo mas am wo gahi wuhsh hoꞌipad jeg ed? Pegih, t hab wa masma pi wo e nako hegam mo hiwig g haꞌichu e‑eniga mas am wo i wahp Jiosh kownaltalig ed.”
Kuchd am wabsh i pi amichud k hab kaij ab wui, “A t hedai hig wo e doꞌibia.”
D g Jesus ab si shel i t‑neid k hab kaij, “Pi at wo e nako wabsh g oꞌodham. T wabshaba g Jiosh wo e nako mat wabsh chum haschu am hab wo juh.”
D g Peter hab kaij, “Nehꞌe, ahchim att wehs haꞌichu dagito k am i m‑oi. Tt haschu ab wo bei heg hekaj?”
D g Jesus hab kaij ab t‑wui, “Woho o wa mamt ab si i ni‑oi. Kunt am wo si shel em‑ahgi mant an wo dahiwua s‑kehg ni‑kownal daikud ed ahni Jiosh si Kehsha. Kumt ahpim an hab waꞌap wo dadhaiwua gamai gohk kownal dadaikud an k d wo uꞌusagakamk am ha dahm hegam gamai gohk dakam e‑wehm Tutuligo.
Matp hedai am wo i dagito g e‑kih o g e‑wepnag o g e‑jehj o g e‑aꞌaliga o g e‑oidag at ab wo ui siant e dahm baꞌich i muꞌi k ab wo bei g pi ha huhugedam doakag.
Muꞌijj hegam mo d wehpegkam hemu at d wo si ha oidchkamk ch muꞌijj hegam mo ga hu si ha oidch hemu d wo wehpegkamk.
“Id ant am wo em‑tashogi id hekaj mant wo haꞌichu wepogi g Jiosh kownaltalig. Heg o wepogidas mat g uhdwis oidag enigakam wabsh i siꞌalim am him k haꞌi ha ui g oꞌodham mat am wo chikp oidaj ed.
T g ha‑namkidadag d wo hegaik mo haschu i uꞌu g pion tash ab. T am ha hekaj hihim k chikp.
“T am hahawa ep hih humukt ohla ch ed. K am haꞌi gegok g oꞌodham ch pi haꞌichu has wua.
K hab ha ahg, ‘Nt wo s‑ap em‑namkid mamt wo chikp am ni‑oidag ed.’
Kut wa woho am chikpano idam. T hab wa masma hab ep e juh am i gamai gohk ohla ch ed ch waik ohla ch ed.
“K am hu d i hetasp ohla. T am hih kahya wui. K am wabsh haꞌi gegok. K hab kaij ab ha wui, ‘Shahchu am ahgch wabsh heki wua g tash pi haꞌichu has wuadch?’
“K hab kaij idam, ‘Pi at hedai t‑chikpanach.’ “K hab hahawa ep kaij ab ha wui, ‘Pegih, k am wo hihim k wo chikp am ni‑oidag ed.’
“Neh, t gam hu si i juh. Kut ihda oidag enigakam hab ah g e‑pionag ha‑geꞌejig, ‘Ab g i ha waid g pion k ab wo i ha namkidahi. T hegam wehpeg wo e namkid mant si ha oidch an ha ui k amjed hegam ehp mant ep ha ui k hegam ga hu si ha oidk wo e namkid mant si wehpeg an ha ui.’
“Kut hegam mat gam hu si i juhk chikp mo d i hetasp ohla ab ui g e‑namkidadag haꞌakia mo heꞌekia uꞌu g pion tash ab ch amjed wehs g haꞌi.
“Kut ab ha ai hegam mat wabsh i siꞌalim chikp. K hab e ahg mat baꞌich i muꞌi wo ui g e‑namkidadag. Mt wabshaba haꞌakia wa ha namkid.
T ab ui g e‑lialiga k babgat ab wui g e‑ahmo k ab wui hab kaij,
‘Neh, hegam oꞌodham mapt si oidk an ha ui al hemako ohla ab chikp. Kutt ahchim ge tash oidk chikp am s‑toni k ed. Kupt eda am wo haꞌakia t‑namkid mapt hegam.’
“K hab kaij g oidag enigakam ab wui hegai mo ha wehhejed neok, ‘Neh, ni‑nawoj, pi ant shaꞌi em‑iattogi namt pi am wa apꞌech mamt haꞌakia k ab wo chikp ni‑wehhejed.
Pegih, ab g wabsh wo uhꞌi g e‑namkidadag k gam hu hihim uhpam no hig pi ab ni‑ab ahni hejel mant haꞌakia wo wa ha namkid hegam mant gam hu si i juhk ha ui mant ahpim heꞌekia em‑namkid.
Ab o ni‑ab mant has masma wo hekaj g ni‑lialiga. Aha nam wabsh s‑ni‑hehgamk mani s‑hemajima?’ ”
D hab hahawa ep kaij g Jesus, “Nehꞌe, t hekaj hab hegam mo gam hu si i ha oidch d wo wehpegkamk ch hegam mo d wehpegkam ga hu wo si ha oidchk.”
Am achd i t‑nakog k gam hu hihi. Kud g Jesus am hejelko t‑wai ahchim gamai gohk
k hab kaij, “Neh, am att wo hihi Jerusalem wui. T hegam mo s‑ni‑kehꞌid am wo ni‑dagito ha wui g uꞌugchu papal ch chehanig em‑mashchamdam. Kut idam ab wo haꞌichu ni‑abch s‑ni‑muꞌamk
k am wo ni‑dagito ha wui g goꞌol hemajkam. T idam wo nahnko ni‑ahgad ch wo ni‑gewittan k amjed ab wo ni‑sisish kots t ab. Nt ab wo muh. T am wo him k d wo i waik tashk amjed. Nt ab wo uhpam i wuhsh muhkig amjed.”
D eda am t‑wehmaj g ha‑jeꞌe g James ch John. D idam am wehmaj hihi Jesus wui ab haꞌichu s‑tahnimk. D g ha‑jeꞌe ab si has elid k ab wui hab kaij matsh ab wo haꞌichu tai.
D hab kaij g Jesus, “Shahchu ap tatchua?” D hab kaij ihda, “Pt hig wo i ha chuhcha idam gohk ni‑mahmad mat am m‑oidch d wo hahaꞌichuk mapt hekid am wo i himch g e‑kownaltalig.”
D hab kaij g Jesus ab ha wui, “Pi am shaꞌi ap mahch mam haschu ab ni‑tahni. Wehpeg ant ab wo nako g geꞌe shoꞌigdag. Kut hegam mat am ni‑oidch d wo si hahaꞌichuk hab waꞌap wo e juh.” D hab kaij idam, “Pegih, tt wo t‑nako.”
D hab hahawa ha ahg g Jesus, “Pegih, woho amt ab wo nako hegai hab mahs shoꞌigdag. K wabshaba pi ab hu ni‑ab manis ahni am wo i ha chuhcha mat hedai am ni‑oidch d wo hahaꞌichuk. Hegam at am wo i e chuhcha mat hedai i ha wehhejed am apꞌech g Jiosh.”
Kuchd ahchim haꞌi babgat ab ha wui hegam gohk mad hab masma ab hejel chum e haꞌichuchud.
D g Jesus ab hahawa wehs i t‑hemapad k hab kaij ab t‑wui, “S‑mahch am mo g ha‑maliomig s‑gewkam ha chehani g e‑pionag ch g ha wanimeddam am ha himchudahim.
T wabshaba pi hab masma hab wo shaꞌi chum mahsk am em‑shahgid. Mt wabsh si s‑hemajim am wo i ha wehmtad g e‑wehm wohochuddam hab sha masma mam d wabsh ha‑pionag mamtp wo tatchuad mamt wo ha wanimedad.
<range>
Ahni ani hab wa masma si s‑hemajim i em‑wehmt ch pi ab hu ni‑haꞌichuchud em‑dahm, chum anis d Jiosh si Kehsha. Ab o em‑wui him g s‑koꞌok namkidadag heg hekaj pi ap em‑chuꞌijig. Nt wabshaba ahni em‑wehhejed wo nako mamt wo e wupulꞌo.” Neh, bad kaij g Jesus.
Kuchd gam hu i wuwha ab Jerico t amjed. D muꞌi hemajkam ab i t‑oi.
D am hu hebai wohg hugid an gohk am dadha g pi neneadam oꞌodham. Kuchd am hihim. D am i t‑kah k s‑mai mo an him g Jesus k si s‑kaidam hab chechꞌe, “Ab g si i s‑t‑hoꞌigeꞌid, ahpi map d s‑apꞌekam t‑kownalig ch apsh d t‑kownaligbad David amjedkam.”
D hegam mo an ha wehgaj si s‑ha kehꞌid ch hab ha ahg mat wo pi shahmunik. D wabshaba baꞌich haha wabsh i s‑kaidam hab kaij, “Ab g si i s‑t‑hoꞌigeꞌid, ahpi Davidbad amjedkam.”
Kud am hahawa i kekiwua g Jesus k ab i ha waid k hab kaij, “Shahchu am tatchua mant hab wo em‑juni?”
D hab kaij idam, “Si g s‑t‑hoꞌigeꞌid k ab i t‑nenchud.”
Kud si s‑ha hoꞌigeꞌel g Jesus k ab ha taht ha‑wuhpui ab. D ha hekaj haꞌichu s‑ap neid k ab i oi.
Kuchd amjed am hihim Jerusalem wui k am ai g Olive Uꞌus Kawulk. D heg mia kihhimag ch hab chehgig Bethphage.
D g Jesus gohk hab ha ah g e‑chuhchai, “Am g wo hihim k ga hu wo dada kihhim t am. Kut am hema wo wulshpik g wuhlu g e‑mad wehm. Mt gam wo ha wulꞌo.
Kumt ab wo em‑kakke mams has wo juh. Kumt hab wo ha ah mani ahni d em‑mashchamdam ch tatchua. Kut ab wabsh wo i ha dagito mamt ab wo i ha wanim ni‑wui.” Neh, bad kaij g Jesus.
K eda heki hu waꞌi oꞌohanas matsh id am hab wo e juh. Hema atki wa an oꞌoha g kelibad Jiosh haꞌichu i tashogidam. K g oꞌohanaj hab chuꞌig:
Am g wo ha ahgid g hemajkam am Jerusalem kihhim t am: Ab at wo hih g s‑apꞌekam em‑kownalig em‑wui k ab wabsh wo si e shoꞌigchudch ch hab g wechij wuhlu wo cheshajhid.
Kud am hihi idam gohk k am hab juh mo haschu hab ha ahg g Jesus
k am ha uꞌapa hegam wuplu. Kuchd an toa g t‑liliwa ha ab. D an dahiwua heg an mo d wechij.
Kud muꞌi hemajkam an t‑wehgaj ch am i tahtdahim g e‑liliwa wohg ch ed. D haꞌi g wechij uꞌus iꞌibhonig an hikkumiꞌak k am toꞌahim wohg oidch.
D hegam muꞌi hemajkam mo an t‑wehgaj hihim si s‑kaidam hihnk ch hab kaij, “T‑doꞌibiakam! Dap amjedkamaj g t‑kownaligbad David. Jiosh atki ia i m‑wuhshad k ab si s‑m‑hoꞌigeꞌid. Kuch ab si has elid g Jiosh.”
Kuchd am i dada Jerusalem kihhim t am. D muꞌijj am wabsh i pi amich mo haschu has e wua k hab kaij, “Dohꞌo wud hegai?”
D haꞌijj hab ep kaij, “Id oki d Jiosh haꞌichu i tashogiddam ch hab chehgig Jesus ch am d kihkam Nazareth t am am Galilee chekshani ch ed.”
D am i wah g Jesus kolhai ch ed mo am kehk g geꞌe cheopi. D eda am haꞌi dadha mo am haꞌichu gagda ch haꞌichu ha nolawt cheopi miabidch. D g Jesus gam hu si ha shahmud k g ha‑dadaikud kuhkpal ha shul. D am haꞌi ep dadha ch am kammialt g lial. Kud g ha‑mimsa gam hu aꞌai kuhkpal si ha shulig
k hab hahawa wehs ha ah, “Bo chuꞌig an Jiosh oꞌohana ed mo hab kaij g Jiosh: Ahni o d ni‑wehhejedkam ihda geꞌe cheopi. Kut id wui ab wo hihhimad g hemajkam mat ab wo ni‑ihmad. Neh, bo kaij g Jiosh. Kumt wabshaba ahpim an be k am eda hab wabsh wua g hejel e‑tatchui ch chum hems haꞌichu s‑aꞌagi ha ehsid ab ha wui haꞌichu gagdach.”
Kumd am wui ha uꞌapa am geꞌe cheopi t am hegam mo d pi neneadam ch hegam mo pi aꞌapkodag. Kud ha dodaj.
D g aꞌal am si hihnk geꞌe cheopi t am ch hab kaij, “Ab ach si has elid ihda mo d t‑kownaligbad David amjedkam ch d Jiosh si Kehsha.” Kud g uꞌugchu papal ch chehanig t‑mashchamdam neid mo g s‑hasig haꞌichu hab wua ch ha kah g aꞌal ch shaꞌi si babgat
k hab kaij ab Jesus wui, “Shahchu ap ahgch pi ha shohbid? Aha nap pi has shaꞌi elid mo has i kaij?” D hab kaij g Jesus, “Am o wa s‑apꞌe. Jiosh at hab masma ha nahto g aꞌal mat si s‑ap ab wo hehgchulidad mo hab masma an hab chuꞌig Jiosh heki hu oꞌohana ed.” Neh, bad kaij g Jesus
ch am ha dagito. Kuchd gam hu hihi Bethany kihhim wui k am kohk.
Baꞌich tash, chd gam hu hebai uhpam hihim Jerusalem wui. Tsh bihugim g Jesus.
D eda am hu hema kehk g suhna uhs. Kuchd ab wui hihi no pi s‑hahhagag ch ab wo chum bahidagk. D oi wa pi ab hu haꞌichu shaꞌi ihbdag. D hekaj hab kaij, “Pi at dahm ab hu ep wo bahidagt.” Kudki wa woho gaksh.
Kuchd am i neidok si has i elid k hab kaij, “S has masma shaꞌi si s‑hohtam gaksh.”
D hab kaij g Jesus, “Nt wo si shel em‑ahgi mamt ab wabsh wo hiwgad g Jiosh. Kut wabsh chum haschu hab wo em‑juni. Mtp hems wo cheha ihda doꞌag mat gam hu wo e wua ge shuhdagi ch ed. Kut wa woho hab wo e juh mamtp wo s‑wohochudad mat hab wo e juh.
Ab g wo tahnid g Jiosh mamt haschu wo i tatchua. T heg hab wo em‑junidad mamtp woho wo s‑wohochudad mat hab wo e juh.”
Kuchd ged hu uhpam dada mo am kehk g geꞌe cheopi. D g Jesus am ha mashcham g hemajkam. D am haꞌi dada g uꞌugchu papal ch geꞌeged k ab kakke ch hab kaij, “Dohp amjed hab chum e elid map an uꞌukch g e‑gewkdag ch am hab haꞌichu wua? Oi g am t‑ahgid.”
D hab kaij g Jesus ab ha wui, “Pegih, nt ahni wehpeg ab epai wo haꞌichu em‑kakke. Mt am wo ni‑ahgi. Nt am haha wo em‑ahgi g em‑kakkei.
Am g hig wo ni‑ahgid mams hedai amjed hab elid mo wa g Johnbad ab uꞌukch g e‑gewkdag ch ha pahl wapkonahim. No ab Jiosh amjed aha no ab oꞌodham amjed?” D idam am wabsh chum hejel si aꞌaga ch hab kaij, “Shahtt hig wo chei? T wo s‑t‑kehꞌid k ab wo t‑kakke matt haschu ahgk pi ab hu wohoch g Johnbad mattp hab wo chei mo ab Jiosh amjed uꞌukch g gewkdag.
T g hemajkam has wo t‑juh mattp hab wo chei mo ab wabsh oꞌodham amjed uꞌukch. Muꞌijj o hab elid mo d Jiosh haꞌichu i tashogidam.”
Neh, bad kaij ch ab hahawa uhpam i e nohnogi Jesus wui k hab kaij, “Pi ach shaꞌi mahch mas hedai amjed ab uꞌukch g e‑gewkdag.” D g Jesus hab epai kaij, “Pegih, nt ahni hab waꞌap pi wo shaꞌi em‑ahgi mani hedai amjed uꞌukch g ni‑gewkdag ch hab wua wehs ihda.”
D hab ep kaij g Jesus, “Am g wo oidahim ihda mant wo em‑ahgi. Matp hems hema g oꞌodham gohk wo aꞌalidagk ch hab wo ah g geꞌechu, ‘Ni‑sulijga, am g hihm k chikpan am uhdwis oidag ch ed id i tashkaj.’
“K hab kaij ihda, ‘Pi ani tatchua mant am wo hih,’ ch wabshaba am shaꞌi heꞌes gawul juh g e‑chegitoidag k am hih oidag wui.
“Kut ihda ohg am hahawa hih heg wui alichu e‑alidag k hab waꞌap kaij ab wui. “K hab kaij ihda, ‘Heuꞌu, am ant wo wa hih,’ ch wabshaba pi am hu hih.
“Dohm hab elid mat ab s‑wohog el g e‑ohg?” D hab kaij hegam, “Hegai mo d geꞌechu.” D hab hahawa ep kaij g Jesus ab ha wui, “Nt wo si shel em‑ahgi mat g em‑uhwaida chechoj ch chechpaꞌawi uꞌuwi am wo i wahp Jiosh kownaltalig ed matp ab wo hiwgad g Jiosh. Mt wabshaba ahpim pi am hu wo i wahp mamtp pi ab hu wo hiwgad.
Ha pahl wapkondam John at wa ia jiwia em‑wui k am chum em‑chehgi g s‑apkokam. Kumt pi ab hu wohoch. T wabshaba idam ab s‑wohoch. Kumt wa chum nei ihda k eda wa pi gawul juh g pi ap e‑chegitoi mamt ab wo s‑wohoch.
“Am g hema ep wo kaiham g haꞌichu wepogida,” bad kaij g Jesus. “Neh, matp hems hema g jewed enigakam am wo ei g uhdwis e‑oidag ed. T g piongaj an si kolhaidad k heg ep nahto mat hekaj am wo i wuhshad g wadgaj k am kei g uhgk kih mat heg amjed wo nuhkudad g eshaj. “T gam hu hasko chihpia g enigakam k haꞌi ha hiwigi g e‑oidag.
T am i e ai mat g uhdwis bai. T am haꞌi ha cheha g e‑pionag mat am wo hihim k ab wo bei hegai wadgaj mo ab d i chum wuikamaj g enigakam. “T am hihim k am dada.
Kut idam nuhkuddam an ha uꞌu k hema gewittan k hema muꞌa k hema ep maꞌichkwua.
“Kut am hahawa baꞌich i muꞌi ep ha cheha mat am wo hihi. Kut am hihim k am dada. T am hab wa masma hab ep ha juh hegam nuhkuddam.
“T g e‑alidag am hahawa ep cheha gam hu si ha oidch no pi hab ha elid mat ab wo wa has el.
“T wabshaba idam oidag nuhkuddam am i nei g alidaj k hab kaij ab aꞌai e wui, ‘Id o d enigakam alidag. Oi g wo, tt wo muꞌa k wehs wo bei g enigaj.’
Neh, t wa woho an be k gam hu si i wuhshad ab amjed g uhdwis oidag k mua.
“Pegih neh, shaht hig wo ha juh idam g enigakam hekid i jiwiak?”
D haꞌijj hab kaij hegam, “Hemho wa at wo ha kokda hegam si pi ap chechoj k gam hu baꞌich haꞌijj ab wo ha nuhkudach mat idam ab hi wo mah hegai mo haschu ab d i wuikamaj.”
D hab ep kaij g Jesus, “Heuꞌu, nat pi s‑ohhod g enigakam alidag. Kumt hab wa masma wo s‑ni‑ohhod. Id o hab ahgch hab chuꞌig g wepogida ahga Jiosh oꞌohana ed: Kihtdam at wo hema chum s‑ohhodam g hodai. T wabshaba id d wo si s‑has haꞌichu hodaik am ha‑kihta wehhejed. Id o hab d ahga mat si s‑kehg haꞌichu hab wo juh g Jiosh.
“Neh, bo chuꞌig g Jiosh oꞌohana. T g Jiosh wo em‑wohppoꞌi g e‑kownaltalig ahpim Tutuligo k hegam ab wo ha mah mat s‑ap am wo i chikp.
Neh, t wo e shoꞌigch hegam mat pi wo ni‑amich. Id at heg wo wa wepok mat ab wo e keiko hodai t ab. Kut hegam mat wo s‑ni‑ohhod wo bei g s‑koꞌok e‑namkidadag. Id at heg wo wa wepok mat g hodai ab ha ab wo gehsh k am wabsh wo s‑ha wia.”
D hegam uꞌugchu papal ch Palasi s‑mahch mo g Jesus ha wepogid hegam pi ap pion
ch heg hekaj an chum s‑behim. D wabshaba g hemajkam hab elid mo g Jesus d hema Jiosh haꞌichu i tashogiddam. K hegam uꞌukchu papal s‑ha gihug.
Jesus ad am hema ep ha ahgid g haꞌichu wepogida am neokch ha wui g hemajkam ch hab kaij,
“Bant masma am ep wo wepogi g Jiosh kownaltalig matp hems hema g kownal am wo i apꞌech g geꞌe gegosig am wehhejed g e‑alidag nat pi wo ha hohnt.
T am i e ai. Kut am ha cheha g e‑pionag mat an wo ha ahgidahi hegam mam ab heki hu ha waid. Kut wabshaba idam pi ab hu i hihimim.
“Kut am hahawa haꞌi ep ha cheha g e‑pionag mat an ep wo i ha ahgidahi. K idam an ha ahgidahim ch hab kaij, ‘Heki at hu e chuama g s‑gihgim ch e gagꞌe g wipsilo ch wehs haꞌichu e nahtokch. Kumt ab wo i hihim k wo e gegos.’
“T wabshaba idam mam ab ha waid pi ab hu shaꞌi kaiham k gam hu hab wabsh wua g hejel e‑chikpan. Hema at gam hu hih e‑oidag wui. T hema gam hu ep hih e‑tiannaga wui.
Kut haꞌijj an ha ui idam pion k ha gewittan k ha kokda.
Kut shaꞌi si bagat hegai kownal k am ha cheha g e‑shondalig mat am wo hihim k epai wo ha kokda hegam mat ha kokda g pion k wo mehi g ha‑kihhim. T wa woho hab juh.
“T am hahawa i ha wai g e‑pionag k hab kaij, ‘E at nahto g gegosig wehhejed g ni‑alidag hohnta. T wabshaba hegam hemajkam mant ab i chum ha wai hab e juh mo pi d hahawa ha‑wuikam.
Kumt am wo hihi wohg oidk k ab wo i ha wai gegosig wui mamtp heꞌekia i hemajkam wo ha cheh.’
“Kut am wa woho hihi g piongaj wohg oidk k ab wehs i ha wai hegam mat ha cheh, chum hems g pi ap hemajkam. T am hahawa muꞌi dada. Kumt wehsijj ab ha mah g s‑kehg eniga heg wehhejed k am i ha wahpki. Kut shuhd g kih.
“Kut am i wah g kownal k am ha nei hegam mat am dada. K am hahawa wabsh hema daha g oꞌodham mo pi ab hu wahkch hegai s‑kehg eniga.
K ab kakke ch hab kaij, ‘Ni‑nawoj, shahpt masma ia i wah pi ab hu wahkch g s‑kehg eniga id wehhejed?’ “T am wabsh i pi amich ihda oꞌodham mat has wo chei.
Kut ihda kownal am hahawa ha ahgi g e‑pionag k hab kaij, ‘Am g wo si wulshp k gam hu wo daꞌich s‑chuhugam k ed. Kut am hu wo shoak k ga hu wabsh wo i si e kiꞌishch nat pi wo shaꞌi si s‑koꞌok haꞌichu nakogad.’
“Pegih, nt wo em‑ahgi mo muꞌi ab ha waid g Jiosh. K wabshaba al heꞌekia d i hemajkamgaj.”
Kutsh am i e hemapai g Palasi am i aꞌamich mat has masma wo heki himch g Jesus ab haꞌichu kakkek.
Tki am haꞌi i ha wehmt hegam mo ab si has elid g kownal Herod k am ha wehm hihi haꞌi hegam Palasi k am dada k hab kaij, “Ha mashchamdam, s‑mahch ach map s‑ap d oꞌodham ch wabsh chum hedai ha mashcham g Jiosh himdag, chum as has wo chei hedai i.
Pegih, k am wo t‑ahgi maps has elid g geꞌe kownal lial kowlanta. No hig t‑hiwgid g t‑chehanig ahchim Tutuligo matt wo ha namkid aha no pi t‑hiwgid?”
D wabshaba g Jesus am wa s‑ha amichud mo g pi apꞌekam hab elid ch hab ha ahg, “Ahpim s‑chu iꞌattomkam am wabsh chum heki s‑ni‑himchudamk.
Ab g wo hema ni‑chehgid hegai lial mam hekaj ha namkid.” Kumd ab hema chehgi.
D hab ha ahg, “Am g hig wo ni‑ahgid mo hedai wuhiosha ch hedai chehgig ab oꞌohadag id ab lial?”
D hab kaij idam, “Hegai mo d uhgchu t‑kownalig.” D hab hahawa ep kaij g Jesus ab ha wui, “Pegih, ab g wo i dagito kownal wui hegai matp d enigaj k am epai wo i dagito Jiosh wui mo haschu d epai enigaj.”
Kud si has i el hegam k gam hu hihi ab amjed.
D heg waꞌi tash ed am haꞌi dada g Sajusi Jesus wui. Hegam mo d Sajusi o pi wohochud mat g muhki ab uhpam wo i wuhsh muhkig t amjed.
D hab kaij idam, “Ha mashchamdam, Mosesbad atki an oꞌoha hegai chehanigaj g Jiosh mo hab chuꞌig matsh g am oidchkam wehngaj hegai mat wo muh pi ha aꞌalidagkch hemho wo wa bei g hohnigaj g e‑wehnagbad. Tsh g ha‑aꞌaliga hab masma wo e kuint mat d wo aꞌalidajk hegai mat muh.
“Pegih, k am hu hebai wewaꞌak d e‑wepngam ch am t‑wehm kih. Kut g si geꞌechu ge hohnt k pi ab hu ha aꞌalidt k muh k an dagito g e‑hohnig. T g am oidchkam nawojij an hahawa ep bei g hohnigaj
k hab waꞌap pi ab hu ha aꞌalidt k hab waꞌap muh. Kut ihda g oidchkam hab waꞌap hohnt k hab waꞌap muh pi ab hu ha aꞌalidtk. Neh, t hab masma i e oi idam wewaꞌak k wehsijj koꞌok huhug.
K am huꞌi hebai, t haha wabsh muh hab wa ehp ihda uwi.
Pegih, am g hig t‑ahgid mas hedai d wo hohnigkad ihda matp ep wo e chegito g koꞌi no pi wehsijj hohnigkahim.”
D hab kaij g Jesus ab ha wui, “Pi am ap chegito nam pi pi shaꞌi mahch g Jiosh oꞌohana ch ep pi shaꞌi mahch mo heꞌes i gewkdag.
Woho at ab uhpam wo ha mah g koꞌi g doakag. T wabshaba hahawa pi wo hohontad hab masma mo g anghil pi hohont.
Mosesbad atki an oꞌoha mash wa hab kaij g Jiosh:
Ahni ani d ha‑Jioshga hegam Abraham ch Isaac ch Jacob. Neh, id o hab kaij g Jiosh, chum as heki hu koi, no pi am e wehm ha nuhkud ch ab uhpam wo i ha wuwhas muhkig amjed. Pi amt woho wo i huhug am i koꞌok matp g Jiosh d em‑Jioshga.”
Kud am i kah ihda g hemajkam k si has i el g mashchamaj.
Kud am haꞌi dada g Palasi mat wo heki himch g Jesus am i kaiok mat ab si ha chehmo g Sajusi.
D hema hegam d Jiosh chehanig hudawogdam
ch hab kaij, “Ha mashchamdam, shahchu o d si baꞌiwechkim geꞌe chehanigaj g Jiosh?”
D hab kaij g Jesus, “Id o d si geꞌe ch baꞌich i si s‑has haꞌichu chehanig: Hemho wa amt ab wo si tatchuad g e‑kownalig Jiosh wehs e‑ihbdagkaj ch id am wo chehgidch wehs e‑doakagkaj ch wehs e‑chegitoikaj.
<range>
K id am oidch d si s‑has haꞌichu chehanig ch wepo chuꞌig: Hemho wa amt ab wo tatchuad g hemajkam hab masma mam ab hejel e tatchua.
Idam gohk chehanig o ab ab wehs shohshonas g Jiosh chehanig ch wehs hegai matki kekelibad Jiosh haꞌichu i tashogiddam an oꞌoha.”
D am i e hemapai g Palasi. D g Jesus hab ha ahg,
“Am g wo ni‑ahgid mam hedai hab elid mat g Jiosh si Kehsha ab d wo amjedkamk?” D hab kaij hegam, “Heg atsh d wo amjedkamk t‑kownaligbad mash hab chehgig David.”
D hab kaij g Jesus, “Pegih, sh wa eda g Davidbad hab aꞌaga, ‘ni‑kownalig’ ch hab kaij g gewkdajkaj g Hekia S‑apꞌekam Gewkdag:
Bo kaij g Jiosh ab ni‑kownalig wui: In g dahiwua ni‑wehm ni‑kownal daikud ed. Kunt wo ha gewito g m‑obga mat ab wabsh wo m‑wechok.
Neh, namt hig s‑ap wo ah mat has masma d wo Davidbad amjedkamk ihda mash d geꞌe kownaligaj?”
Kud pi hedai e nako mas ab hu uhpam has wo chei Jesus wui nih hemako neꞌoki. D heg i tashkaj amjed pi hedai e nako mas ab hu haꞌichu ep wo kakke.
Muꞌi hemajkam ad am haꞌichug t‑wehm.
Kud hab kaij g Jesus ab wehsijj t‑wui, “Hegam chehanig em‑mashchamdam ch Palasi o d hegam mo ab mahks g gewkdag mat am wo i tashogi g chehanig.
Kumt heg hekaj ab wo s‑ha wohog elidad. K wabshaba muꞌijj idam pi am hu hab junihim mo haschu em‑mashcham. Kumt hekaj pi am hu ha oidk hab wo masmak.
Neh, muꞌi s‑hasig haꞌichu o ab em‑chehani. K id d s‑wehch haꞌichu mohtoi am em‑wehhejed. K eda pi haꞌichu hab shaꞌi wua mas hekaj em‑wehm wo moht.
Wehs haꞌichu o heg wabsh hekaj am hab junihim mamt wo ha neidad. An o uꞌa g Jiosh oꞌohana heg wabsh hekaj mamt hab wo ha elidad mo ab wohog elid.
Si o s‑hohhoꞌid mat si s‑apko wo dadhaiwua am geꞌe gegosig ch ed ch am wa si hejelko dadaikud am cheopi ch ed.
Si o s‑hohhoꞌid mamt ab wo si has ha elidad am hemajkam ha‑shahgid ch hab wo ha aꞌagad mo d ge ha mashchamdam.
“Ahpim g pi wo shaꞌi tatchuad mams hab wo em‑aꞌagad ‘ha mashchamdam’ nam pi d aꞌai e‑wepngam. Kuni ahni d waꞌi em‑mashchamdam.
Pi g hedai hab wo aꞌagad ‘ge ni‑ohg’ id dahm jewed. Heg amt waꞌi Jiosh hab wo aꞌagad mo d ge em‑ohg.
Pi g hab wo e aꞌagad mam d ha wanimeddam. Ahni ani d waꞌi em‑wanimeddam Jiosh si Kehsha.
Bamt waꞌi masma d wo si haꞌichuk mamt d wabsh wo ha‑pionagk.
Kut d wabsh wo pi haꞌichuk hegai matp hedai hab wo chum e elidad mo d si haꞌichu. Heg at d wo si haꞌichuk matp hedai ab wabsh wo i pi e haꞌichuchudch.”
D hab hahawa ep kaij g Jesus, “Neh, muꞌijj ahpim chehanig ha mashchamdam ch ahpim Palasi am d wabsh s‑chu iꞌattomkam. Ih, shoꞌig! Jiosh at si s‑koꞌokam wo em‑namkid heg hekaj. Pi am ha hiwgid hegam mo am i chum s‑wahpkimk Jiosh kownaltalig ed ch hab waꞌap hejel pi am hu i wahp. Heg o wa wepo mam ab si yahwidadch g kihjeg am Jiosh kownaltalig wui. [
“Ha am iattogid g heheꞌejel wiꞌikam uꞌuwi ch ha ehsid g ha‑kihki ch eda am wabsh s‑e chehgidamk mam si chew e hoꞌigeꞌidahun. Id at hekaj baꞌich wo i s‑koꞌokk g em‑namkidadag.]
“Am am si i e nakog mamt chum hems hemako am wo i wanchkwua pi wohokam e‑himdag ed. T ihda baꞌich i s‑gewkam wo wulshpik mam ahpim mat am wo gei Jiawul kih ed nat pi baꞌich i s‑gewkam am wo oidad g pi wohokam em‑himdag. T g Jiosh si s‑koꞌokam wo em‑namkid heg hekaj.
“Neh, am am haꞌi ep chum ha mashcham ch eda hab chechꞌe, ‘Pi att hemho wa hab wo juh g t‑neꞌoki mattp wabsh wo gewkaj chehchegch g geꞌe cheopi, heg hi wa matt wo chehcheg hegai ohla mo hekaj e heosid.’
K eda g geꞌe cheopi baꞌich d i si haꞌichu mo hegai heosidakud.
“Kum hab ep chechꞌe, ‘Pi att hemho wa hab wo juh g t‑neꞌoki mattp wabsh wo gewkaj chehchegch hegai iagchulidakud mo am hab chuꞌig geꞌe cheopi t ab, heg hi wa matt wo chehcheg hegai mo an ab e iagchulid.’
K eda g iagchulidakud baꞌich d i si haꞌichu mo hi hegai mo an ab e iagchulid.
K heg wa wepo mam heg chehcheg iagchulidakud mam eda chehcheg g iagchulida.
Kum chehcheg g Jiosh mam eda chehcheg g geꞌe cheopi no pi heg d Jiosh kih.
Kum hab waꞌap chehcheg g Jiosh mam eda chehcheg g dahm kahchim.
“Im am hu hab wabsh i juhkch hegai mo d chum si haꞌichu am Jiosh chehanig ed mamt hab wabsh wo juhkchid g al chum haꞌichu. Neh, wehs am haꞌichu hemako tahpani mahk g Jiosh mo wehst‑mahm e tahpanch, chum hems g haꞌichu hahhag ch haꞌichu kai, ch wabshaba pi ap ha lodait ch pi ha hoꞌigeꞌid ch pi ab hu wohochud g Jiosh. T g Jiosh heg hekaj si s‑koꞌokam wo em‑namkid.
Am am wabsh s‑nenꞌoid g al chuꞌuchum haꞌichu ch g geꞌeged haꞌichu pi chegito. Id o heg wa wepo mamtp hems wo oꞌos g e‑wasib mat am eda wo gei g al chukumug k wabshaba wabsh wo bah wehnadk g ka‑mihyo matp heg am eda wo gei.
“Baꞌich at wo i s‑koꞌokk g em‑namkidadag nam pi hi wa chum si s‑ap e chehgid. K wabshaba am em‑eda haꞌichug g pi amdag ch s‑chu daꞌadag.
Am g wo i e kegchud e‑iꞌibdag ed. T g haꞌichu hab em‑juni am haha wo s‑apꞌek.
“Neh, nat hig pi wo i e kegch g hihaꞌini an e dahm, chum as am eda wo wehchk g ohꞌo ch jewalig? Pegih, m ahpim hab sha masma mo g hihaꞌini
nam pi ab chum e chehgidch mam d s‑apꞌekam. K eda g em‑chegitoi pi aꞌpe. Ih shoꞌig! Jiosh at si s‑koꞌokam wo em‑namkid.
“Em‑shohshon at muꞌi ha kokda g kekelibad Jiosh haꞌichu i tashogiddam. Kum ahpim si s‑kehg ha hehosid g ha‑hihaꞌiniga hegam mamt ha kokda ch hab chechꞌe mamt ahpim hi pi wo chum ha kokda. Dam s‑chu iꞌattomkam ch ha wepo masma mash wa g em‑shohshon. Ih, shoꞌig! Jiosh at si s‑koꞌokam wo em‑namkid namt pi am ha oidk hab wo e juh.
<range>
<range>
S‑ap amt wo nahto hegai mat g em‑shohshonbad i shonwuich.
Damt wo ha muꞌakamk hab masma mo g kohkꞌoi ch hekaj pi hab mahs mams wo e doꞌibia.
Pegih, nt wo em‑ahgi mant am i ha wuwhas g haꞌichu i tashogiddam ch s‑chu aꞌamichuddam ch ha mashchamdam am em‑shahgid. Kumt haꞌi wo ha gewitta am e‑chechopi ed k haꞌi an has wo ha shahmudahim k haꞌi wo ha kokda, chum hems ab ha sisishpk kots t ab.
T g s‑koꞌok em‑namkidadag ab em‑ab wo gei hemu s‑hohtam. Neh, Abelbad atsh wa wehpeg e muhkid. Tsh amjed muꞌi ep e koꞌij. Tsh ga hu si ha oidch hegai Zecariabad mash d Barackiabad alidag e muhkid am ha shahgid g geꞌe cheopi ch iagchulidakud, Kum ahpim ha wepo chuꞌijig hegam matsh wa ha kokda ch ha wepo masma wo bei g s‑koꞌok e‑namkidadag mamtp hedai ha wepo elid haꞌichu.”
<range>
K hab ep kaij g Jesus, “Ih, shoꞌig, ahpim Jerusalem t am hemajkam, nat pi g Jiosh s‑ap wo em‑dagito. Em‑shohshon ash wa ha maꞌichshulig ch muꞌi ha kokda g Jiosh haꞌichu i tashogiddam. Kumt ahpim am ha oidk hab wo e juh. Muꞌikko ani chum tatchua mant wo si s‑ap em‑nuhkud hab sha masma mat g chuchul g e‑mahmad ab e wecho wo ha hemapai. M wabshaba pi ab hu tatchua manis hab wo em‑juh.
<range>
K eda an hab chuꞌig Jiosh oꞌohana ed mamt ab wo chum ni‑ihmad ch hab wo chechꞌed mat g Jiosh am ni‑kehsh k si s‑ni‑hoꞌigeꞌid. Kunt ia wo i s‑ap em‑dagito am hugkam mamt hab hahawa masma hab wo e juh.”
Kud gam hu hahawa i wuhsh g Jesus ab amjed g geꞌe cheopi. Kuchd am i oid k am wui dada k am aꞌaga mo si s‑kehg hab mahs g geꞌe cheopi.
D hab kaij, “Heuꞌu, woho o hi wa si s‑kehg hab mahs. Nt wabshaba si shel wo em‑ahgi mo e aihim mat wehs wo i e shul ihda.”
Kuchd amjed gam hu hejelko hihi wehmaj g Jesus k ab i chehchsh k ab dadhaiwua Olive Uꞌus Kawulk t ab. Kuchd hab ahg g Jesus, “Am g hig t‑ahgid mas hekid hab wo i e juh hegai map am t‑ahgid. Kut haschu d wo chehgidak matt heg ab wo s‑mahchk mo e aihim mapt ep wo jiwia. T g jewed wo huhug.”
D hab kaij g Jesus, “Mt wo si s‑e nenꞌoidad mat pi hedai wo em‑iattogi.
Muꞌi at an wo i wuwha aꞌahidag oidam k ni‑wepo wo e chehcheg hab kaijch mo d Jiosh si Kehsha. Kut muꞌijj ab wo s‑ha wohoch.
T g nahnko mahs hemajkam ch jejewed ab aꞌai wo i e checheggia. Mt wabshaba pi wo e totods. Hemho wa at hab wo e juh hab masma. K wabshaba pi hab d ahga mat e ai mat wo kuhgit. Bihugig at wo gehsh k g jewed wo uꞌugij muꞌikpa.
<range>
Id at d wabsh wo shohshonajk g shoꞌigdag nat pi baꞌich wo i geꞌeda.
“T wo e ai mamt am wo em‑uꞌu k wo em‑dagito mamt wo em‑shoꞌigchud k wo em‑kokda. Wehsko jejewed dakam hemajkam at wo s‑em‑kehꞌidad ni‑hekaj.
Muꞌijj at wo ni‑dagito heg hekaj k wo aꞌai e gagda k wo s‑e kehꞌidad.
Muꞌi at an wo i wuwha g s‑chu iꞌattomkam k hab wo e aꞌagad mo d Jiosh haꞌichu i tashogiddam. T muꞌi hemajkam ab wo s‑ha wohoch.
Pi apꞌekam at wo i geꞌeda. T muꞌijj wo huhug g pihk ha‑elidadag ab aꞌai e wui.
“Mt wo sha e nakog k wo gahi wuwha g e‑shoꞌigdag. T g Jiosh am wo i em‑wahpki e‑kihdag ed.
Ihda s‑kehg haꞌichu ahgaj g Jiosh ab amjed g kownaltaligaj at an wehsko wo e ah jewed dahm. T am haha wo e ai mat wo kuhgit.
“Am g wo amichud ihda mam in neꞌokchulid. Hegai Danielbad mash d Jiosh haꞌichu i tashogiddam at an oꞌoha mat g em‑obga am wo i kei g s‑uam haꞌichu ged hu si eda g geꞌe cheopi.
Kut hemho wa am wo ahhio dohdaꞌag wui hegam mat hedai ia wo haꞌichugk Judea jewed ch ed.
Kut pi hedai am hu wo shaꞌi chum i wah e‑kih ed mat am wo haꞌichu ui, chum as hems imhab wo waꞌi oimmedad e‑kih wehgaj o am wo chikpanad oidag ch ed.
<range>
S‑ta at ehbidam wo mahsk am ha wehhejed hegam mat wo chuꞌuchum mahmadk ch hegam mat wabsh wo kia woꞌok g ali.
“Mt ab wo tahnid g Jiosh mat pi eda hab wo e juh ihda em‑mihshmda tash ed o g s‑hehpichꞌed.
Baꞌich at d wo i si geꞌe shoꞌigdagk mo pi hekid g hemajkam shaꞌi neid ch pi hekid hab masma ep wo nei.
Pi at hedai wo e nako mas am gahi wo wuhsh hegai shoꞌigdag matp tash wo hih. T g Jiosh heg hekaj wo i shopolkai am ha wehhejed g e‑hemajkamga.
“Pi g wo shaꞌi ha wohochud matp hema hab wo sha chei mo am hebai haꞌichug g Jiosh si Kehsha.
Muꞌi at in wo i wuwhag k hab wo chei mo d ni‑ahni Jiosh si Kehsha o d Jiosh haꞌichu i tashogiddam k am hab wo wuad g s‑hasig haꞌichu mat hekaj wo i chum ha wanchshul g Jiosh hemajkamga matp wo e nako.
Neh, ni heki hu am em‑ahgid mamt hekaj wo s‑e nenꞌoidk.
“Tp hems haꞌi hab wo chei mo am haꞌichug g Jiosh si Kehsha tohono jewed ch ed o am hebai e ehstokch. Kumt wabshaba pi wo ha wohochud k pi am hu wo chum hihi.
Wehsko ant wo ni‑chehgi mant hekid ep wo jiwia jewed dahm ahni Jiosh si Kehsha hab sha masma mat g wepgi s‑masma an gahi wo kekiwua chewagi ch ed.
“Neh, s‑mahch am mat hebai wo woꞌok g haꞌichu muhkig an wabsh ha neidch g nunuwi mat am wo e chehm. Pegih, mt hab waꞌap s‑ap wo s‑mahchk mant hebai wo haꞌichugk.”
D hab ep kaij, “T am wabsh wo i chum kuhgi hegai jewed shuhdgim shoꞌigdag. T g tash tonlig wo huhug. T g mashad ep pi wo ha ton. T g dahm kahchim wo ugij. T g huhuꞌu wo i shul.
Nt ab haha wo i ni‑chehgi ab dahm kahchim t amjed k wo jiwia. T wehs hemajkam wo si shoanid ab i ni‑neidok. Nt si s‑masma ab wo hudunihi chewagi ch ed. Kut am wo e maskogi g ni‑gewkdag.
T ab si s‑kaidam wo e kuhu g kuikud. Kunt wo ha cheha g ni‑anghiliga mat ab wehs wo i ha hemapai hegam mant am i ha chuhcha mat wo e doꞌibia. T am wo hihi imhab siꞌal tahgio ch imhab hudunig tahgio ch imhab wakolim tahgio ch imhab juhpin tahgio k wo ha hemapai.”
“Nt wo haꞌichu em‑mashcha heg hekaj suhna uhs. Mt wo s‑mahchk mo g toniabkam e aihim mamt wo nei mat ab wo i iꞌiwgi.
Pegih, mt hab waꞌap wo s‑mahchk mo e aihim mat wehs wo kuhgit mamt wo nei mat hab wo e juh hegai mani em‑ahgid.
Nt wo si shel em‑ahgi mat d wabsh wo kia dodakamk hegam mat wo nei ihda mani em‑ahgid mat hekid wehs wo kuhgit.
Neh, wehs at gam hu hab wo i e juh ihda Jiosh nahtoi mam in neid. T wabshaba g ni‑neꞌoki pi hekid gam hu hab wo i e juh.”
D hab ep kaij, “Heg o waꞌi s‑mahch ni‑ohg Jiosh mant hekid ep wo jiwia. Pi o hedai ep s‑mahch, chum hems g anghil nih ahni mani d hi wa chum alidaj.
Bat wo masmak haꞌichu mant hekid ep wo jiwia mash wa hab chuꞌig mash eda g Noahbad in d doakam.
Hemajkam ash wa gam hu wabsh i si nenead ch e gegosid ch ihꞌed ch e hohont ch gam hu wabsh i pi chegito g Jiosh. T haha wabsh e ai g tash mat hegam Noahbad am i wahp geꞌe wahlko ch ed.
Kut wehs ha wiꞌin g hemajkam k ha hugio. Kut hab wo wa masmak mant hekid ep wo jiwia.
Neh, gohkajj at am wo chikpanad oidag ch ed. T hema gam hu wo i e be k hema am wo wa i e wuiok.
Gohk uꞌuwi at am wo haꞌichu chuꞌad. T hema gam hu wo i e be k hema am wo wa i e wuiok.
“Pegih, mt wo si s‑e nenꞌoidad. Pi o ta machima am em‑wehhejed mant haschu tash ed ep wo jiwia ahni em‑kownalig.
Neh, pi o ta machima mas hekid hema wo jiwia g s‑chu ehskam. Kum heg hekaj chum hekid nuhkud g e‑kihdag.
Pegih, k hab waꞌap pi ta machima em‑wehhejed manis hekid wo uhpam jiwia jewed wui ahni Jiosh si Kehsha. Mt heg hekaj wo si e nahtokchid chum hekid.
“Chum amt hedai wo e nahtokch mamtp wo s‑wapagimak ch wo s‑chu aꞌamichudad. S‑mahch am mat g ha‑ahmo hema wo e‑gahgi g hab mahs pion k wo nuhkudach g e‑kihdag. T heg s‑ap wo ha chikpanchudad ch wo ha dagioꞌidad g e‑wehm pion mat eda pi an hu wo haꞌichugk g ha‑ahmo.
T am ep wo jiwia k wo cheh mo s‑ap am hab junihim g e‑chikpan. Kut d wo si geꞌe s‑hehgigk heg wehhejed pion.
Nt wo si shel em‑ahgi mat g ahmoj am hahawa wehs dahm wo kei g e‑kihdag.
“T wabshaba pi ap d wo ha kehshak matp hedai hab wo i e ah, ‘Pi at oi wo jiwia g ni‑ahmo,’
k wo i ha shoꞌigch g e‑wehm pion k g s‑iꞌimkam ha wehm wo ihꞌed ch wo e gegosidad.
T haha wabsh wo jiwia g ahmoj k wo cheh mo pi ap hab wua g e‑chikpan
k wo si s‑koꞌokam namkid k gam hu hab wo i juh. Neh, bat wa masma hab wo e juh ha wehhejed hegam mat pi ab hu wo wohog elidad g Jiosh. Heg at s‑koꞌokam wo ha namkid. Kut heg hekaj wo shoakad ch ga hu wabsh wo i si e kiꞌishch.”
D hab ep kaij g Jesus, “Baꞌich ant am wo i em‑tashogi g Jiosh kownaltalig am wepogidch hegai kih mat hebai haꞌi wo e hohont. Mt am haꞌi ha wai wehst‑mahm chetcha. T am hihi ha uꞌadch g e‑lalampa k am wo i wahp g wo ha hohntam wehm mat hekid wo jiwia.
Hetasp idam o pi haꞌichu nenꞌoid
ch ep pi ha waꞌigchug g a‑saidi.
Hetasp o s‑chu nenꞌoid ch ep ha waꞌigchug g a‑saidi.
Kut pi oi jiwia g wo ha hohntam. T wehsijj s‑ha kohksimch idam chetcha. T gam hu kohk.
“Neh, t am i e ai g eda hugkam g s‑chuhugam. T ab kaida ihda, ‘Ab o him g wo ha hohntam. Oi g wo i hihim k ab wo namkhi.’
T hegam wehst‑mahm chetcha nehnen k i ha kegchud g e‑lalampa.
“K hab kaij hegam mo pi haꞌichu nenꞌoid, ‘Ab g wo i ha t‑mahki g e‑a‑saidiga. Chuhchkim o g t‑lalampa.’
“K hab kaij hegam mo s‑chu nenꞌoid, ‘Pi att wo t‑nako. Am o wabsh i hejel t‑wehhejed ahim am shuhdagi ch pi wo em‑ai. Am amt wo hihi tianna wui k am hejel wo ha nolawt.’
“T wa woho hab e juh hegam haꞌi k gam hu hihi mat wo ha nolawt g a‑saidi. Kut eda ia hu ha oidk jiwia g wo ha hohntam. Kut hegam hetasp mo e nahtokch gam hu wehmaj i wahp mat am wo e gegos wehmaj. T ab si e kuh g kihjeg.
“T am i uhpam dada hegam haꞌi k ab chum shoani ch hab kaij, ‘Ab g si s‑t‑hoꞌigeꞌid k ab i kuhpiꞌoki matt am wo i wahp.’ “K hab kaij g wo ha hohntam,
‘Nt wo si shel em‑ahgi mani pi shaꞌi em‑mahch mams hedai wud,’ ch am hahawa si kuh g kihjeg.”
Neh, d am i kuhgit g e‑wepogida g Jesus hab kaijch, “Neh, mt wo s‑e nenꞌoidad nam pi pi shaꞌi mahch mant hekid ep wo jiwia.
“Bant masma ep wo i wepogi g Jiosh kownaltalig matp hems g oꞌodham hema hasko wo him k ab i ha wai g e‑pionag mat ab wo ha nuhkudach g haꞌichu e‑eniga.
Hema at mah g hetasp mihl pihsh k hema gohk mihl pihsh k hema ep g hemako mihl pihsh no pi s‑mahch mat heꞌekia i s‑ap wo chikpanad k amjed gam hu mehk jewed wui hih.
“Hegai piongaj mat g hetasp mihl pihsh ab ui at am ha hekaj i e nakog k hekaj ihda lial mat am dahm hetasp mihl pihsh ep nahto.
Kut hegai mat g gohk mihl pihsh ab ui hab waꞌap e juh k gohk mihl pihsh am dahm nahto.
T wabshaba hegai mat g hemako mihl pihsh ab ui gam hu him k am hebai wagt k am ehsto.
“K mehk amjed mat jiwia g ha‑ahmo idam k am ha ui mat wo s‑mai mat has masma hekaj g lialigaj.
“Hegai piongaj mat g hetasp mihl pihsh ab ui at ab i wah k ab i mah g hetasp mihl pihsh am dahm hegai mat ab ui k hab kaij, ‘Ab apt wa ni‑mah g hetasp mihl pihsh. Neh, nt am baꞌich hetasp mihl pihsh ab ep wo m‑mah mant nahto.’
“K hab kaij g ahmoj, ‘S‑ap aptki hab e juh, s‑apꞌekam ni‑pionag, s‑ap hekajk mant heꞌekia ab i m‑mah. Nt hekaj ab baꞌich i muꞌi wo m‑nuhkudach. Am g ni‑wehm s‑hehgigkad.’
“T heg ab hahawa ep i wah piongaj mat g gohk mihl pihsh ab mah k hab kaij, ‘Neh, gohk mihl pihsh apt wa ab ni‑mah. Kunt am baꞌich gohk mihl pihsh ab ep wo m‑mah mant nahto.’
“K hab kaij g ahmoj, ‘S‑ap aptki hab e juh, s‑apꞌekam ni‑pionag, s‑ap hekajk mant heꞌekia ab i m‑mah. Nt hekaj ab baꞌich i muꞌi wo m‑nuhkudach. Am g ni‑wehm s‑hehgigkad.’
“T ab hahawa i wah hegai piongaj mat g hemako mihl pihsh ab mah k hab kaij, ‘Ni‑ahmo, s‑mahch ani map s‑ta keꞌidama ch s‑beihimk hegai map haschu pi ab hu chikpan.
Kunt heg hekaj gam hu s‑aꞌagko eꞌesto g m‑lialiga. Neh, m ia wehch mo haschu d m‑eniga.’
“K hab kaij g ahmoj, ‘Si pi ap ch s‑padmakam ni‑pionag, kups wa chum s‑mahch mani s‑ta keꞌidama ch s‑beihimk hegai mani haschu pi ab hu chikpan.
Pegih neh, pt hems am hi wo wa chum toa g ni‑lialiga wahnko ch ed. Kunt ab wehs uhpam wo ui wehnadk mat haschu ab wo i mahmadt.’
“K hab hahawa ha ahg g haꞌi ep e‑pionag, ‘Mt wo wohppoꞌid k ab wo mah hegai mo wehst‑mahm mihl pihsh edgid.
Baꞌich at ep wo nei g e‑apꞌedag hegam mat hedai s‑ap wo hekaj. T wabshaba wo e wohppoꞌidach mo haschu al i edgid hegam mat pi ap wo hekaj.
Mt gam hu wo daꞌich hegai s‑padmakam pion s‑chuhugam k ed. T am wo si shoakad ch ga hu wabsh wo i si e kiꞌishch nat pi wo shaꞌi si s‑koꞌok haꞌichu nakogad.’
“An ant wo dahiwua ni‑kownal daikud an mant hekid wo i jiwia ha wehm g ni‑anghiliga.
T wehs hemajkam am wo e hemapai ni‑baꞌich. Nt ab wo i ha gawulkai hegam mo d wohokam ab ha amjed hegam mo pi d wohokam hab masma mamt am wo i ha gawulkai g kahwal ch siswat.
<range>
Bant wo ha ahgi hegam mant ab i ha gawulkai, ‘Ab g wo i hihim. S‑em‑hoꞌigeꞌid o g Jiosh. Ni‑gegos amt mani wa d bihugimkam k ni‑wasibi mani wa d tonomkam k am i ni‑wahki e‑kih ed mani wa d wabsh ge oꞌodham k ni‑enigadad mani wa pi haꞌichu edgid k ni‑nuhkud mani wa mumku k am ni‑chechga mani wa d lihso. K g Jiosh am nahtokch g kihdag em‑wehhejed ga hu i amjed mat in i nahto g jewed. Ab g wo i wahpkid k wo edagi.’
<range>
<range>
“Kut hab wo chei ab ni‑wui, ‘T‑kownalig, kuchs hekid i m‑gegosid k m‑wasbid k ab i m‑wahki t‑kih ed k ab m‑enigadad k m‑nuhkud k am m‑chechga?’
<range>
<range>
“Nt hab wo chei, ‘Nt wo si shel em‑ahgi mam ahni am i ni‑wehmt hekid am i ha wehmtch hegam mo d shoꞌigkam ch ab ni‑hiwig.’
“Kunt hab haha wo chei ab ha wui hegam mant pi ab hu i ha gawulkai, ‘Gam g hu hab wo i e juhni. Ab o em‑mohtoꞌid g Jiosh g s‑koꞌok namkidadag. Pi amt ni‑gegos mani wa d bihugimkam k pi ni‑wasibi mani wa d tonomkam k pi am hu i ni‑wahki e‑kih ed mani wa d ge oꞌodham k pi ab hu ni‑enigadad mani wa pi haꞌichu eniga k pi ni‑nuhkud mani wa mumku k pi am hu ni‑chechga mani wa d lihso. Neh, am amt wo e shul heg eda mehi mo d ha wuikam g jijawul.’
<range>
<range>
“Kut hab wo chei hegam ab ni‑wui, ‘T‑kownalig, ch hekid i m‑neid maps d bihugimkam o d tonomkam o d ge oꞌodham o pi haꞌichu eniga o mumku o d lihso, kuchs pi am hu i m‑wehmt.’
“Nt hab wo chei, ‘Nt wo si shel em‑ahgi mam ahni pi am hu i ni‑wehmt, hekid pi am hu i ha wehmtch hegam mo d shoꞌigkam ch ab ni‑hiwig.’
“Kut idam am wo e shul pi ha huhugedam s‑koꞌok namkidadag ed. T g s‑apꞌekam an wo i wahp anai mat an hahawa chum hekid wo edgidad g s‑apꞌekam doakag.”
D am i haꞌasa haꞌichu ha mashcha g Jesus k hab hahawa kaij ab t‑wui,
“S‑mahch am mo gohk tash am wiꞌis matt wo wuhshad mat g Jiosh ha doꞌibia g t‑shohshonbad. Kutki hab wo e juh mat an wo ni‑bei hegam mo ab ni‑wui gegok k ab wo ni‑naggia kots t ab mat wo ni‑mua.” Neh, heg o hab waꞌi kaij.
Kumsh eda woho aꞌaga mamtsh has masma wo be k wo mua. Si uhgchu pahl atsh am i ha hemapai hegam haꞌi uꞌugchu papal ch geꞌeged. Kutsh ab kihj ab nam
k am apꞌech mat s‑aꞌagi an wo bei g Jesus k wo mua,
ash am wabsh aꞌai e ahgid, “Hi wa pi am hu heg eda mat ia wo e hemapadch g hemajkam id hekaj piast. T wo am hu e babgachud k wo t‑cheggia.”
Kuchd am hu hebai am dada Bethany kihhim t am. D am d kihkam hegai mad hab chehgig Simon ch wa chum mumku heg hekaj mo g chuhkugaj wabsh muhkhim.
Id ad ab i t‑waid k t‑gegos. Kuchd am dadhak ch t‑gegosid. T ab haha wabsh hema i wah g uwi g si s‑namkig s‑ap uhw shuhdagi waꞌigchugch am al s‑toa hodai haꞌa ch ed k ab iawua Jesus moꞌo ab.
Kud haꞌi si pi hohhoꞌi g t‑wehm e mashchamdam k hab kaij, “Ih, pt wabsh heki wua ihda s‑namkig haꞌichu.
Eda atp huꞌi muꞌi lial wo nam sha e gagdak. T heg wo e hekaj ha wehhejed g shoꞌigkam.”
Kud s‑mahch g Jesus mach haschu am aꞌaga ch hab kaij ab t‑wui, “Pi g am wo shaꞌi kehꞌidad ihda uwi. Si at s‑kehg haꞌichu hab juh am ni‑wehhejed.
Mt wabsh chum hekid wo i ha wehmt g shoꞌigkam. Kunt ahni hi pi tash ia hu wo em‑shahgidk.
Ab at iawua g uhw shuhdagi mat wo i nako g ni‑honshpadag hiashpa.
Nt wo si shel em‑ahgi mat am wo s‑e chegitok mat haschu has juh ihda uwi mat hebai wo i e ahgachugad g s‑kehg haꞌichu ahgaj g Jiosh an wehsko jewed dahm.”
D am ha hekaj t‑dagito g Judas Iscariot k gam hu hih. Kuchd am i dahm s‑mai matsh am hih uꞌugchu papal ha wui
ash hab kaij, “Heꞌekia amt wo i ni‑namkid mant an wo em‑behi g Jesus?” Kutsh am chehgid k kuint g waikko wehst‑mahm plahda pihsh matsh id wo mah.
Tsh ab i amjed g Judas am i e nako matsh wo gagda g Jesus.
D am hahawa s‑ap i e ai hegai t‑shohshonbad ha doꞌibiadag piast. K id eda pi e koꞌa hegai pahn mo jewajidas. Kud d wehpeg tash heg eda gegosig. Kuchd am dada Jesus wui k ab kakke machs hebai wo i apꞌech matt am wo huh g kahwal mad iagchulig gegosig.
D gohkajj hab t‑ahg, “Am amt wo hihi Jerusalem wui. K am hema d kihkam ch am wo e chehgi. Mt hab wo ah mani hab kaij mat e ai g ni‑tashga. Kutt t‑wehm wo huh g kahwal mad iagchulig gegosig am kihj am.”
Kud am hab e juh mad hab ha ahg g Jesus k am i apꞌech g gegosig.
D am i hud. Kuchd am dadhaiwua k am t‑gegosid.
Kud hab haha wabsh kaij g Jesus, “Nt wo si shel em‑ahgi mat has wo e juh hemu. Hema amt wo ni‑gagda ahpim mam ab si ni‑wecho e mashcham.”
Kuchd si pi ap t‑taht k gan hu hab i cheꞌiatahi, “Ih, hi wa pi ahni, ni‑kownalig.”
D hab kaij g Jesus, “Heg at hab wo juh mat hedai am ni‑wehm wo wakch g chemait hidod ch ed.
Bant masma wo ni‑muhkid mo has masma heki hu oꞌohanas Jiosh oꞌohana ed mat g si Kehshaj wo e muhkid. T wabshaba wo si s‑koꞌokam e namkid hegai mat wo ni‑gagda. Baꞌich at wo i chum s‑apꞌek heg wehhejed mat hems wabsh pi wo chum mahsi.”
D hegai Judas matki gagda hab kaij, “Aha nap ahni hab ni‑ahg, t‑mashchamdam?” D hab kaij g Jesus, “Dap ahpi.”
Chd am wabsh kia t‑gegosid. D g Jesus am bei g chemait k ab hoꞌigeꞌel g Jiosh k am hahawa i hahain k ab t‑mah k hab kaij, “Oi g wo huhgi ihda. Do ni‑honshpadag.”
D am hahawa bei g tahsa k ab ep hoꞌigeꞌel g Jiosh k ab t‑mah g wasib k hab kaij, “Wehsijj g ab wo ihꞌe.
Id o d ni‑ehꞌed. Id ani hab ahgch hab kaij mant wo ni‑muhkid em‑wehhejed. T g ni‑ehꞌed wo e iawua. T g Jiosh heg hekaj am hab wo juh hegai mo wa hab kaij mat gam hu hab wo i juh g pi ap ha‑chuꞌijig g hemajkam.
Ia o i s‑apꞌe. Kunt pi hekid em‑wehm hab ep wo juh ihda k wabshaba em‑wehm wo si s‑hehgigk Jiosh kihdag ed.”
Neh, kuchd am hahawa kuhgit am hema ahgk g mihshmda neꞌi k am wuwhag k gam hu hihi Olive Uꞌus Kawulk wui.
D hab t‑ahg g Jesus, “An o oꞌohanas mo hab kaij g Jiosh: Nt wo hiwigi mamt wo mua g kahwal ha nuhkuddam. T g kahwal wabsh aꞌai wo wohp. K id hab d ahga mamt wehsijj wabsh wo ni‑dagito k gam hu aꞌai wo wohp mant hekid wo ni‑muhkid.
Kunt wabshaba ep wo ni‑chegito k gam hu wo hih Galilee wui. Mt ab haꞌab wo ni‑nei.” Neh, bad kaij g Jesus.
D g Peter hab kaij, “Ahni ant hi pi hekid wo shaꞌi m‑dagito, chum as wehsijj wo m‑dagito idam.”
D hab kaij g Jesus ab wui, “Nt wo si shel m‑ahgi mat koi wo kuhu g keli chuchul id i chuhug ab. Kupt waikko hab wo waꞌi chei map pi shaꞌi ni‑mahch.”
D hab kaij g Peter, “Pi ant hekid hab wo shaꞌi chei manis pi m‑mahch, chum anis wo ni‑muhkid m‑wehm.” Kuchd wehsijj hab waꞌap kaij.
Kuchd ged hu dada heg ab oidag mo hab e aꞌaga Gethsemane. D pi am hu t‑wehmaj g Judas Iscariot. D hab kaij g Jesus ab t‑wui, “Ia g hu wo i dadhak. Nt ahni am baꞌich wo i him k wo ni‑hoꞌigeꞌidahu.”
Bad kaij ch am ha uꞌuk g Peter ch James ch John. T idam gam hu oi. Kush s‑masma si pi ap e tahtk g Jesus ch si e kudut
ch hab kaij ab ha wui, “Ab at wabsh i si ni‑shuhd g pi ap tahhadkam ch si s‑ni‑mukima tahhadchud. Ia g wabsh wo dadk ch wo haꞌichu si nenashanad.” Kutsh am dadhaiwua.
Tsh g Jesus baꞌich ep shaꞌi him k am i gei jewedo k hab kaij ab Jiosh wui, “Ni‑ohg, matp am wo s‑apꞌek, pt im hu hab wo i juh hegai si s‑koꞌok shoꞌigdag mo ab ni‑wui him. Kuni eda tatchua mat ahpi g m‑tatchui hab wo e juh.”
Tsh am hahawa uhpam ep jiwia ha wui hegam waik. Kush am kohksh. Sh hab kaij ab ha wui, “Pi amtki shaꞌi e nako mamt wo ni‑wehm nenead al hemako ohla ab.
Si g wo haꞌichu nenashanad ch ab wo tai g Jiosh g gewkdag mamt pi am hu wo shul pi apꞌekam ch ed. Chum am hi wa g s‑apꞌekam hab elid ch eda pi e nakog.”
Bash kaij ch amjed gam hu hahawa ep him k hab kaij ab Jiosh wui, “Ni‑ohg, am o wa s‑apꞌe ni‑wehhejed matp d wo m‑tatchuik mant hemho wa wo nako ihda si s‑koꞌok shoꞌigdag.”
Neh, k am hahawa uhpam ep jiwia ha wui. Kush ep kohksh no pi shaꞌi s‑ha kohksimchud.
Tsh gam hu hahawa ep hih g Jesus k heg hab kaij ab Jiosh wui matsh wehpeg
ch am hahawa uhpam ep jiwia ha wui k hab kaij, “Kumtki ep kohk. T eda e ai mamt ni‑gagda ahni Jiosh si Kehsha am ha wui g pi apꞌekam hemajkam.
Oi g wo wahpamigi. Tt wo hihi. Neh, ia at hu jiwia hegai mat ni‑gagda.”
Am ad wabsh kia neok. Kud am jiwia g Judas. D shaꞌi si muꞌijj wehmaj, haꞌijj g iꞌis‑papayo uhꞌukch ch haꞌijj g uꞌus. Idam atki g uꞌugchu papal ch geꞌeged am ha cheha matsh am wo hihim k wo bei.
Kuki eda g Judas heki hu ha ahgid idam mo am wehmaj mat ab wo chintad g Jesus kahmaj ab. T hab masma wo s‑mahchk mat hedai an wo bei.
D am wabsh i chum jiwia g Judas k wabsh shel i hih ab Jesus wui k hab kaij, “Jiosh at wo s‑m‑hoꞌigeꞌel, ni‑mashchamdam!” Neh, bad cheꞌe k ab chintad.
D hab kaij g Jesus ab wui, “Ih, ni‑nawoj, oi g s‑hohtam am hab juhni hegai mapt haschu ahgk ia jiwia.” Kud ab haꞌi hihim k an bei g Jesus k gan hu si s‑wihnam uꞌukch.
Kud hema g t‑wehm e mashchamdam am i wuhshad g e‑is‑pahyo k ab si gehg g neholigaj g uhgchu pahl k an si hikuch g nahkaj.
D hab kaij g Jesus ab wui ihda, “Ga g hu uhpam kehsh g e‑is‑pahyo. Hegam mat wo hekaj g is‑pahyo at heg hekaj hab waꞌap wo e muhkid.
Aha nap pi mahch mantp ab wo tai g ni‑ohg, t ha hekaj wo ha cheha g shaꞌi si muꞌi mihl anghil mat ni‑wehhejed wo ha cheggia.
K wabshaba an hab chuꞌig Jiosh oꞌohana ed mat hemho wa am ni‑tahgio hab wo e juh ihda mo hab e wua.”
Neh, bad kaij g Jesus ch hab hahawa ha ahg hegam mat an bei, “Wehs tashkaj ani am dahiwup ch ha mashcham geꞌe cheopi t am. Kumt pi an hu ni‑be k wabshaba hahawa ia dada an uhꞌukch g iꞌis‑papayo ch uꞌus mamt wo ni‑bei.
Pegih, bat wa masma an heki hu oꞌoha g kekelibad Jiosh haꞌichu i tashogiddam mant hab masma an wo ni‑behij mat g pi ap hemajkam.” Neh, bad kaij g Jesus. Kuchd am haha wabsh i dagito k gam hu si aꞌai wohp.
Kumtsh am i bei g Jesus heg kih wui uhgchu pahl mo hab chehgig Caiaphas. Tsh eda am heki hu i e hemapai g chehanig t‑mashchamdam ch geꞌeged.
Sh g Peter ga hu wabsh mehkjed ha oid ch am i wah kolhai ch ed. Sh am haꞌi dadha g ha‑pionag. Tsh g Peter am ha wehm i dahiwua s‑neidamkch mams has wo juh g Jesus.
Sh g uhgchu pahl ch hegam e jehnigiddam am chum i e nakog mat g iattogi haꞌichu ab wo abch g Jesus mat heg hekaj wo mua.
Kutsh muꞌi ehp am i gegokiwua k ab haꞌichu chum abch. Sh wabshaba pi e wepot g haꞌichu ha‑ahga. Tsh am hahawa gohkajj i gegokiwua
k hab kaij, “Ihda oꞌodham o hab kaij matsh wo e nako mat wo i wua g Jiosh geꞌe cheopiga. Tsh am d wo i waik tashk, tsh am uhpam ep wo kei.”
Tsh am hahawa kekiwua g uhgchu pahl k hab kaij ab Jesus wui, “Napt pi am hu has wo chei heg amjed mam ab m‑abchud?”
Kush wabshaba g Jesus pi has shaꞌi kaij. Tsh am ep neo g uhgchu pahl k hab kaij ab wui, “Am g t‑ahgid g wohokam am tahgio g Jiosh. Nap hab e elid map ahpi d Jiosh alidag matp am t‑dahm wo i e kei?”
Sh hab kaij g Jesus, “Dani ahni. Kunt ab ep wo em‑ahgi mat g Jiosh am wo e chehgi mo ab si has ni‑elid an e‑hugid an ni‑dahshk e‑kownal daikud ed. T am wo i e ai mant ab wo i hud chewagi ch ed k am ep wo jiwia jewed dahm. Kumt wehsijj wo s‑mai mani d ahni.”
Tsh g uhgchu pahl ab si wantsh g e‑eniga no pi si pi hohhoꞌid g neꞌokij k hab kaij, “Pi ach hedai ep shaꞌi tatchua mas am wo ah g chuꞌijigaj. Am am wa kah g pi kehg neꞌokij.
Shahm i elid?” Kush hab kaij g e jehnigiddam, “Ab at moht g chuꞌijig am hugkam mat hemho wa wo e muhkid.”
Tsh idam ab si siswua wuhioshaj ab k an si maꞌishk wuh g wuhpuij k ab si shonikkash
ch hab ahg, “Am g hig t‑ahgid mas hedai ab m‑shonikka, ahpi Jiosh si Kehsha e ahga.”
Sh eda g Peter am daha kih bahsho. Kutsh am hema jiwia g uwi piongaj g uhgchu pahl k hab kaij ab Peter wui, “Ahpi ap ep wehmaj hegai Jesus.”
Tsh wabshaba g Peter pi mahch k e ah g Jesus am ha tahgio hegam mo am dadha hab kaijch, “Pi ani shaꞌi mahch maps haschu hab ahg.”
Bash kaij ch ha hekaj gam hu hih mash am haꞌi gegok kolhai kihjeg t ab. Kush hema hab ep kaij ab ha wui, “Id o ep wehmaj hegai Jesus.”
Kutsh ep pi e edagi g Peter hab kaijch, “Do si wohokam mani pi shaꞌi mahch hegai oꞌodham.”
Kutsh shaꞌi haꞌas, tsh hegam chechoj mo am gegok am dada Peter wui k hab ahg, “Pi g shaꞌi pi e edgid. Dapki woho hema hegam Jesus. Ab ap wabsh e ahgch e‑neꞌoki ab map d ha wehm oꞌodham.”
Tsh g Peter am ha hekaj si ha ahgi, “Pi ani shaꞌi mahch ihda oꞌodham mam an aꞌaga. T g Jiosh wo si ni‑jehkaꞌich mantp em‑iattogid.” Tsh am hahawa hema si kuhu g keli chuchul.
Tsh am ha hekaj i chegito g Peter mo wa g Jesus ab wui hab kaij, “Pi at koi wo kuhu g keli chuchul. Kupt waikko hab wo waꞌi chei map pi shaꞌi ni‑mahch.” Tsh gam hu wuhsh g Peter k si pi ap e tahtk ch shoak.
Tsh am wabsh i chum mahsi. Tsh am hahawa i apꞌech g uꞌugchu papal ch geꞌeged mat wo e muhkid g Jesus.
Tsh am i e kuhgit g ha‑namki. Kutsh am si i maniadad g nohnhoij g Jesus k gam hu i wanim matsh am wo i bei heg wui mo d kownal heg eda chekshani ch hab chehgig Pilate.
Sh eda g Judas an himad ch ha neid. Sh am wanimed g Jesus kownal wui mat wo e muhkid. Kutsh si e tods g Judas k am him k am uhpam i ui hegai waikko wehst‑mahm plahda pihsh ha wui g uꞌugchu papal ch geꞌeged
k hab kaij, “Tki wo e muhkid hegai mo pi ha chuꞌijig. K d ni‑chuꞌijig nant pi ab em‑wui gagda.” Sh hab kaij hegam hahaꞌichu, “Pi ach has shaꞌi elid hegai. Heg o ahpi ab m‑ab.”
Tsh g Judas am si nehnich hegai lial k am shul geꞌe cheopi ch ed k gam hu hahawa wuhsh jeg ed k wabsh hejel e naggia.
Tsh g uꞌugchu papal am ui hegai lial k hab kaij, “Id o d namkigaj mat hema wo e muhkid. K g t‑chehanig pi t‑hiwgid matt am wo toa geꞌe cheopi wehhejed.”
Bash kaij ch am apꞌech matsh heg hekaj wo hema ha nolawt g oidag mat d wo ha‑simin‑jihlok hegam mo d wabsh ge oꞌodham. Hegai mamt ha nolawt o heki hu hab e aꞌaga Hahaꞌatdam Oidag
ch wabshaba hab hahawa e aꞌaga Ehꞌed Oidag.
Neh, id atsh wa hab e juh hab masma mash wa g Jiosh heki hu waꞌi hab kaij matsh hab masma hab wo e juh. Hegai kelibad Jiosh haꞌichu i tashogiddam mash hab chehgig Jeremiah atki an oꞌoha mash hab kaij g Jiosh: Tutuligo at wo hema nolawt g oꞌodham g waikko wehst‑mahm plahda pihshkaj.
Kumt id am haha wo ui namkigaj k wo ha nolawt g hahaꞌatdam oidag.
Sh eda am kehk g Jesus kownal wui. Sh hegam mo s‑muꞌamk ab abchud mo chum e kownalchud. Sh g kownal ab kakke, “No wa woho mapsh hab chum e elid map d ha‑kownalig idam Tutuligo?” Sh hab kaij g Jesus, “Dani ahni.”
Sh g uꞌugchu papal ch geꞌeged ab muꞌi haꞌichu abchud. Sh pi am hu has shaꞌi kaij g Jesus.
Sh hekaj hab kaij g Pilate ab wui, “Neh, muꞌi haꞌichu o ab m‑abchud. Napt pi ab hu wo ha kaiha?”
Kush ep pi am hu has shaꞌi kaij g Jesus. Tsh heg hekaj si has i el g kownal.
K am hab e wua ahid ab id eda gegosig mo g kownal hema dadagitod g lihso am ha wehhejed g hemajkam.
K am hema d lihso ch hab chehgig Barabbas. K wehsijj s‑mahch ihda.
Tsh am i e hemapai g hemajkam amai mash am daha g Pilate ch hab wua g lodaita. Tsh ab ha kakke, “Nam hab elid mant wo dagito g Barabbas aha nam id hab elid Jesus mo hab e aꞌaga Jiosh si Kehsha.”
Neh, bash kaij nash pi chum s‑dagitoimk g Jesus ch hab ha elid mo hegam waꞌi hahaꞌichu s‑hehgamk ch s‑muꞌamk.
Sh am daha g Pilate lodaita daikud ed. Kutsh eda g wehmaj kihkam heki hu hema cheha matsh am wo him k wo ahgi mo hab kaij, “Pi g am hu has shaꞌi juhni hegai oꞌodham no pi pi ha chuꞌijig. Muꞌi ant haꞌichu nako chuhug chehchkch ab amjed.”
Sh eda hegam uꞌugchu papal ch geꞌeged ab ha chehani g hemajkam matsh ab wo tai g Pilate mat wo dagito g Barabbas k g Jesus hab wo juh mat wo e muhkid.
Pegih, sh g kownal ab ha kakke mas hedai am wo i dagito ha wui idam gohk. Sh hab kaij g hemajkam, “Barabbas”.
Sh hab hahawa ep kaij g Pilate mas has wo juh hegai Jesus mo hab e aꞌaga Jiosh si Kehsha. Sh hab kaij g hemajkam, “Muꞌani ab kots t ab.”
Kutsh hab chum chei g Pilate, “Haschu ahg? Shahchu at hig pi ap has juh?” Kutsh oi wa wabsh baꞌich i si s‑kaidam hab ge kaij muꞌikko, “Muꞌani! Muꞌani ab kots t ab!”
Tsh am i nei g Pilate matki heki hu i babgat g hemajkam k am hu wo e cheggia. Tsh am ge was g shuhdagi k am hemajkam ha tahgio i ha wapko g e‑nohnhoi k hab kaij ab ha wui, “Pi o haꞌichu d shaꞌi ni‑chuꞌijig matp wo e muhkid ihda oꞌodham. Ahpim o d em‑chuꞌijig.”
Sh wehsijj hab kaij hegam mo am haꞌichug, “Ahchim g t‑aꞌaliga ha wehm att ab wo moht g s‑koꞌok namkidadag id hekaj.”
Tsh g Pilate am hahawa i dagito g Barabbas ha wui k am ha cheha g shondal mat wo gewitta g Jesus k am hahawa i dagito mat ab wo naggia kots t ab.
Tsh amjed g Pilate shondaliga am i bei g Jesus k gd hu uꞌapa kownal geꞌe kih am k am wehs ha wai g e‑wehm shondal.
Kutsh am i e hemapad k nahnko wua. Msh ab abchud mash chum e kownalchud. Pegih, tsh gam si wuashul g wehschugaj k g kownal eniga ab wahkid
k ge hoꞌi gihkot k ab wahki moꞌoj ab k g uhs an behijel s‑apko nowij an k wabsh nahnko ahg ch ab i tohtonwua wui k hab kaij, “Tash g d ha‑kownaligk g Tutuligo.”
Sh ab si siswuimad k an si gewitta moꞌoj an.
Tsh am i haꞌasa nahnko juh k am wuahawua hegai kownal eniga k ab uhpam wahki g enigaj k gam hu hahawa i bei mat ab wo naggia kots t ab.
Tsh ab hema i ha nam g oꞌodham mo ab Cyrene kihhim t ab d kihkam ch hab chehgig Simon. Id amtsh ab wabsh si kushwiotach hegai kots mamt ab ab wo naggia g Jesus.
Kumtsh gam hu i bei g Jesus mamtsh am wo naggia. K hab e aꞌaga amai Golgotha. K id hab d ahga Koshwak.
Kumtsh ab chum iꞌich g nawait mo g kulani am wehnags mat wo hehogi g s‑koꞌok. Tsh ab chum jeh k pi ab hu ih.
Kumtsh ab hahawa sisish kots t ab k am i kei g kots. Tsh am haꞌi e chichwi g shondal k am aꞌai e gehg g wehschugaj
k am hahawa i dadhaiwua k nuhkud.
Kumtsh an oꞌoha mam haschu ab abchud k ab sihsh kots t ab ab dahm mo ab i moꞌokch g Jesus. Sh hab chuꞌig, “Id o d Jesus ch d Tutuligo ha‑kownalig.”
Tsh gohk ab ep ha nahngia kokots t ab gan hu aꞌai. Sh eda d s‑chu eꞌeskam idam.
Sh hegam mo an bihbimhim si gahi e moꞌogid ch ab si s‑koꞌokam has ahg g Jesus
hab kaijch, “Naptsh woho wo i wua g geꞌe cheopi k am uhpam ep wo kei waik tash ab? Pegih, ab g hig i huduni kots t amjed k wo e doꞌibia maptp woho d wo Jiosh alidagk.”
Sh g uꞌugchu papal ch chehanig ha mashchamdam ch geꞌeged hab wa masma ep nahnko ahg hab kaijch,
“Id atsh haꞌi ha doꞌibia k atki wabshaba pi wo e nako mas wo hejel e doꞌibia. Nash hig pi woho d t‑kownalig? Pegih, tt ab wo s‑wohoch matp ab wo i huduni k wo e doꞌibia.
Ab o si hiwig g Jiosh ch hab e ahg mo d alidaj. Pegih, tt hig wo nei mas hu wo doꞌibia g Jiosh hemu.”
Chum wa hema hegam s‑chu eꞌeskam mamt ab hab waꞌap ha nahngia kots t ab hab waꞌap s‑koꞌokam has ahg.
T am i dahm juh. T wehsko gei g s‑chuhugam waik ohla ab.
Kutsh am i e ai g waik ohla. Sh si s‑kaidam hab kaij g Jesus, “Eli, Eli, lama sabaktani,” mo hab d ahga, “Ni‑Jioshga, Ni‑Jioshga, shahchu apt ahgk am wabsh i ni‑dagito?”
Sh haꞌijj hab kaij hegam mo am gegok, “Elijabad o ab chum waid.”
Tsh ab hema ha hekaj i med k an haꞌichu usko mat am wakch nawait ch ed k am uhgk i be k ab chum iꞌich g Jesus.
Kush haꞌi hab kaij, “Kia koi, tt hig wo nei mas ia wo jiwia g Elijabad k wo doꞌibia.”
Kutsh am si s‑kaidam hab haꞌichu ep chei g Jesus k am hahawa i muh.
Kutsh hegai s‑kowk ikus kuhpadag mash am s‑tadnim naggia ged hu si eda g geꞌe cheopi ab si shel e wantsh. T g jewed uꞌugij k gam si e hahai g geꞌeged hohodai.
Kutki g hihaꞌini gam si e kuhkpiꞌo. T muꞌijj hegam mat heki hu koi ab s‑wohochudch g Jesus ab i wuwha muhkig amjed
i dahm mat g Jesus i wuhsh k gam hu i wahp amai mo hab e aꞌaga Si Hekia S‑apꞌekam Kihhim ch d Jerusalem. K muꞌijj ha neid amai.
Tsh idam shondal g e‑geꞌejig wehm am i nei mat g Jesus muh k taht g jewed uꞌujig k shaꞌi si e totodsid k hab kaij, “Woho oki d Jiosh alidag.”
Sh eda muꞌijj am haꞌichug hegam uꞌuwi mo ga hu amjed wehmaj g Jesus ab Galilee t amjed ch am haꞌichukaj i wehmaj. Idam ash ga hu wabsh mehk gegok ch ab neid.
Sh am ha wehmaj g Mary Magdalene ch hegai Mary mo d ha‑jeꞌe g James ch Joses ch heg ehp mo d Zebedeebad wehm kihkam ch d ha‑jeꞌe g James ch John.
Tsh am hahawa jiwia ihda s‑kais oꞌodham mo hab chehgig Joseph ch ab Arimathea t amjed ch ab s‑wohochud mo g Jesus d Jiosh si Kehsha. K eda e aihim mat wo i hud.
Tsh heg hekaj gam hu hih ihda Joseph ab Pilate wui k ab tahni g Jesus honshpadag. Kush g Pilate am ha chehani mamt wo mah.
Tsh gam hu uhpam jiwia. Kumtsh am wehhejed ab i huduni g Jesus honshpadag. K am mia hab chuꞌig g Joseph hihaꞌini ch ab heki hu cheotas hodai ch ed. Kumtsh am i bei g honshpadag k am i hobino g si s‑kehg ikuskaj k am cheh heg eda cheo k ab hahawa g ge geꞌe hodai i himchud k ab hekaj kuh g hihaꞌini. Tsh gam hu hahawa uhpam hihi hegam Joseph.
<range>
Kush am dadha g Mary Magdalene heg wehm hema Mary ch am neid mat hebai cheh.
Baꞌich tash o d shahwai. Tsh am dada g uꞌugchu papal ch Palasi Pilate wui
k hab kaij, “T‑kownalig, s‑chegito ach mo wa ihda s‑chu iattomkam hab kaij matsh uhpam wo e chegito matsh d wo waik i tashk.
Neh pt am wo ha cheha mat wo si e nuhkud g hihaꞌini waik tash ab. T hekaj hab pi wo e nako g piongaj mas ab wo ha ehs g honshpadag k hab wo ha ahgi g hemajkam matki i wuhsh ab muhkig t amjed. Neh, ihda ha‑iattogi at baꞌich wo i si pi apꞌek mo g wehpegkam.”
Kush hab kaij g Pilate ab ha wui, “Am g haꞌi wo ha uꞌuk g shondal k am has i masma ab wo nuhkud g hihaꞌini.”
Kutsh am ha oi g shondal. Kutsh gam hu hihim k ab si s‑wihnam i kuh g hihaꞌini k an bidsh g hodai k ab si chepos. Sh idam shondal am nuhkud g hihaꞌini tash oidam ch chuhug oidam.
Sh am e aihim g domig tash. Tsh am hihaꞌini wui hihi g Mary Magdalene heg wehm hema Mary.
D am hahawa si uꞌugij g jewed. Tsh g anghil ab i hud dahm kahchim t amjed k im hu hab i melch g hodai k an dahm dahiwua.
Sh g wuhioshaj si s‑masma tonod hab masma mo g wepgi. Sh g wehschugaj hab masma s‑toha mo g s‑mohoni gew.
Kutsh wabsh wohoꞌi totods hegam shondal mo ab nuhkud k si gigiwek ch amjed hab sha e juh mo d wabsh koꞌi.
Kush ab neok hegai anghil ch hab kaij ab ha wui hegam uꞌuwi, “Pi g am wo shaꞌi e totodsid. M ani wa s‑mahch mam g Jesus chuhkug an chum gahghim.
Ab g wo i hihim k wo nei mo pi ia hu haꞌichug iia mat ia e cheh. Uhpam at ep i wuhsh muhkig amjed mo wa hab wa kaij.
Kumt am s‑hohtam wo hihim k wo ha ahgi hegam mo am wehmajkahim mat uhpam e chegito k gam hu wo hih Galilee wui. Mt gam hu wo hihim k am haꞌab wo nei. Neh, am ani em‑ahgid mo has i kaij.” Bash kaij g anghil.
Kutsh si e totodsid k si s‑hohtam ga hu hihi ab amjed g hihaꞌini k eda si s‑hehgig ch ia hu chum wohp matsh wo t‑ahgi.
Tsh wabshaba haha wabsh ha nam g Jesus k hab kaij, “T wo s‑em hoꞌigeꞌel g Jiosh.” Tsh ab si i shul wui k an ui tahtdaj an k ab si ihm.
Sh hab kaij ab ha wui, “Pi g am wo ni‑ehbenid. Am g wo hihim k wo ha ahgi g ni‑wepnag mat am wo hihi Galilee wui k am haꞌab wo ni‑nei.”
Kutsh gam hu hihi hegam uꞌuwi. Tsh hegam shondal mash am nuhkud g hihaꞌini am haꞌi hihim k ged hu dada kihhim t am k am ha ahgi g uꞌugchu papal wehs haꞌichu matsh haschu has i e juh.
Tsh g uꞌugchu papal am ha wehm e nam g geꞌeged k am e aꞌaga k am hahawa muꞌi ha mah g lial idam shondal
k hab ha ahg, “Bamt wo chei matki am dada g piongaj chuhug ch ed k am em‑ehs g honshpadag mam kohksh.
Kutp wo sha kah g kownal mam has i kaij, tt wo wa em‑doꞌibia.”
Kutsh am ui g lial hegam shondal k am hab e juh mam has i ha ahg. Ia o i idani hab masma am e aꞌaga am ha shahgid g Tutuligo.
Kuchd ahchim gamai hemako am hihi heg wui doꞌag am Galilee ch ed mo wa hab kaij g Jesus matt am wo hihi.
D g Jesus am haꞌichug. Kuchd ab si ihm. D eda hi wa haꞌi sha pi wohoch.
D ab si i t‑miabi g Jesus k hab kaij ab t‑wui, “Jiosh at ab ni‑mah g gewkdag wehs haꞌichu dahm an dahm kahchim ch ed ch id dahm jewed.
Gamai g wo hihim wehsko hemajkam ha wui k wo i ha mashcha g haꞌichu ni‑ahga k ab wo i ha pahl wapko am chehchegch g ni‑ohg Jiosh ch ahni ep ni‑chehcheg mani d alidaj ch heg ehp Hekia S‑apꞌekam Gewkdag.
Ab ani em‑chehani mamt has wo masmak. Kumt ab wo i ha mashcha g hemajkam mat ab wo s‑wohog elidad wehs haꞌichu mani haschu ab em‑chehani. Kunt chum hekid wo em‑wehmajk, chum as wo huhug g jewed.”
Id o d s‑kehg haꞌichu ahgaj g Jiosh ab amjed g alidaj Jesus Christ. Shonaj ihda haꞌichu ahgaj.
o an hab chuꞌig oꞌohanaj ed hegai Jiosh haꞌichu i tashogiddam mash hab chehgig Isaiah. Heg atki an oꞌoha mash g Jiosh hab kaij ab e‑alidag wui: An ant hema wo i wuhshad mat am wo i ha apꞌech g hemajkam mapt ahpi am wo i wuhsh jewed dahm.
Id at gam hu jeg ed wo ha mihshmad g hemajkam hab kaijch: Neh, in atsh wo i wuhsh jewed dahm hegai mo d ge kownal wehs haꞌichu dahm. Kumt heg wehhejed wo i e nako. Neh, bash ahg g e‑alidag g Jiosh.
Kutsh wa woho am hab e juh. M atsh hema i wuhshad g Jiosh g oꞌodham. K id hab chehgig John ch am i e chehgi Judea chekshani ch ed miabidch hegai akimel mo hab chehgig Jordan. Ab ash e enigadadch g John g ka‑mihyo wopo ikuskaj ch ge hogi giwud ch heg waꞌi hekaj e gegosid kohktpul ch sitꞌol. Kush muꞌi hemajkam am wui hihim heg amjed chekshani chum hems ab Jerusalem kihhim t amjed. Sh g John am amog ch hab ha ahg, “Mamt gam hu wo s‑ohhod g pi ap e‑chegitoi k wo e pahl wapko. T g Jiosh ab wo i s‑em‑hoꞌigeꞌid k gam hu hab wo i juh g pi ap em‑chuꞌijig.” Neh, bash kaij g John ch am ep ha pahl wapkon akimel ch ed hegam mash ab wui hihimad ch am ahg g pi ap e‑chuꞌijig.
<range>
<range>
Sh hab ha ahg g John, “Pi g hab wo ni‑elid manis ahni d si haꞌichu. Ab atsh hema wo i wuhsh ni‑oidk mat d wo si s‑has haꞌichuk.
Ahni ani hi wabsh em‑pahl wapkon. Tsh wabshaba heg ab wo em‑mah g Hekia S‑apꞌekam Gewkdag matsh heg chum hekid wo em‑wehmajk.”
Kush eda g Jesus wenog ab d kihkam heg eda al kihhim mash d Nazareth ch am eda g Galilee chekshani. Kutsh am i him k am jiwia mo am oimmed g John hab ahgk matsh wo e pahl wako. Tsh g John am pahl wako akimel ch ed.
Tsh ab wabsh i chum wuhsh ab amjed g shuhdagi. Tsh g dahm kahchim ab si i e kuhpiꞌo. Kutsh g Hekia S‑apꞌekam Gewkdag i hud ab ab g Jesus hab sha masma mat g hohhi.
Sh ab neok g Jiosh dahm kahchim t amjed ch hab kaij ab wui g Jesus, “Ahpi ap d si ni‑tachuidch ni‑alidag ch am si ni‑tatchui oidch hab masma.”
Am waꞌi hekaj, sh g Hekia S‑apꞌekam Gewkdag hab ahg g Jesus matsh gam hu hejelko wo hih.
Kutsh am hih tohono jewed wui k am haꞌichug giꞌikko wehst‑mahm tash ab mo am haꞌichug g mischini haꞌichu doakam. Sh heg i oidam g ge Jiawul am chum s‑wuimk pi apꞌekam ch ed. Sh wabshaba g anghil am nuhkud.
Sh am hu hebai, tsh e kuhpach hegai John mo am ha pahl wapkon. Tsh heg i dahm am jiwia g Jesus Galilee chekshani t am am ahgachugch g s‑kehg haꞌichu ahgaj g Jiosh
hab kaijch, “Gam g hu wo s‑ohhod g pi ap e‑chegitoi k ab wo i s‑wohoch idda s‑kehg haꞌichu ahgaj g Jiosh. E at ai mat am baꞌich wo i e tashogi g Jiosh kownaltalig.”
Neh, bash kaijhim ch an him hugidaj an hegai al kahchki mo d Galilee Kahchki. Sh eda am haꞌi oiopo g waptopi ha uꞌudam ch am wuhpa g e‑chuagia shuhdagi ch ed. Tsh am ha cheh g Jesus. Kush d idam gohk e wepngam mo hab chehgig Simon ch Andrew.
Sh hab ha ahg g Jesus, “Ab g wo i ni‑oid k pi hegam waꞌi waptopi wo ha uꞌud ch wabshaba g hemajkam wo i ha wanchkwua ab Jiosh wui.”
Kutsh ha hekaj dagito g e‑chikpan k am i oi.
Tsh am shaꞌi hihim k haha wabsh gohk ep ha cheh. Idam ash am kegchud g e‑chuagia wahlko ch ed ch d James ch John. Kush g ohgaj hab chehgig Zebedee.
Tsh ab i ha wai g Jesus. Kutsh gam hu i oi am dagitok g e‑ohg wahlko ch ed ha wehm g ha‑pionag.
Kutsh am hihim k am dada Capernaum kihhim t am. Tsh am i e ai g shahwai mach heg eda t‑mihshmad. Kutsh am i wahp ha‑cheopi ed. Tsh g Jesus am ha mihshmad.
Kutsh g hemajkam ab si e totods ab mashchamadaj amjed nash pi baꞌich i si s‑e mamachim ha mashcham mo hi hegam mo d chum chehanig ha mashchamdam.
Kush eda am hema haꞌichug g oꞌodham mash g jiawul uꞌukch g chegitoidaj.
Tsh heg hab juh mash am si s‑kaidam neok ch hab kaij, “Shahchu ap ahgch t‑kudut, ahpi Jesus map ab Nazareth t amjed. Napt heg hekaj ia wabsh jiwia mapt gam hu hab wo i ni‑juh id amjed oꞌodham? S‑m‑mahch ani map d hekia s‑apꞌekam ch ab d Jiosh amjedkam.”
Tsh g Jesus ab si s‑kehꞌel g jiawul k hab kaij, “Ab g wabsh i pi shahmuni k gam hu hab wo i e juh.”
Tsh g jiawul si ugij ihda oꞌodham. Kutsh si hihin. Tsh g jiawul hahawa dagito.
