k ash hab kaij ab ha wui, “Hegai mat hedai am ni‑wehhejed s‑ap ab wo neidad g al ali ch hab waꞌap s‑ap ab ni‑neid. Kutp hedai s‑ap ab wo ni‑neidad ch hab waꞌap s‑ap ab neid g Jiosh nani pi d Kehshaj. Hegai mo hedai i si pi e haꞌichuchud am em‑shahgid o d si haꞌichu.”
Sh am hu hebai g John hab kaij, “T‑mashchamdam, hema ach neid g oꞌodham. K heg am m‑chehcheg ch gam hu hab i ha wua g jijawul ab ha amjed hegam mo an ha uꞌukch. Kuch hab ahg mat wo haꞌasa no pi pi am hu t‑wehmaj.”
Kush hab kaij g Jesus ab ha wui, “Pi g am wo shaꞌi shohbid. Tki wo i em‑wehmt hegai matp hedai pi ab hu em‑wui kehk.”
Kush s‑mahch g Jesus mo e aihim mat g Jiosh am wo uhpam i bei e‑kihdag wui ch heg hekaj am i e shelch mat am wo hih Jerusalem wui k am wo i e nako.
Sh am hihimad ch am hema miabid g kihhim Samaria chekshani ch ed. Kutsh g Jesus am haꞌi ha cheha g e‑chuhchai matsh ha baꞌich wo hihim k wo bei g koksikud ch haꞌichu hugi. Kutsh idam ha e juh.
Tsh wabshaba am i s‑mai hegam hemajkam mash d gam hu himdam g Jesus Jerusalem wui k heg hekaj pi hohhoꞌi mat am wo jiwia nash pi pi ha hohhoꞌid g Jerusalem t am hemajkam.
Kutsh hekid g James ch John am i s‑mai mo pi hohhoꞌid k hab kaij, “T‑kownalig, nap tatchua matt ab wo i tai g Jiosh. T ab wo i huduni g mei k wo ha kokda?”
Sh g Jesus si s‑gewkam ha shohbid.
Tsh amjed gam hu hahawa hihi hema ep kihhim wui.
Sh am hu hebai hihim. Kush hema g oꞌodham hab kaij ab Jesus wui, “Ni‑nahtokch ani ahni mant wo i m‑oid k wo i m‑wehmt.”
Sh hab kaij g Jesus ab wui, “Napt hig wo e nako? Neh, chum o hems g gagso ge wahpagga ch g uꞌuwhig ge koksh. Ni wabshaba ahni Jiosh si Kehsha pi shaꞌi ha kih ia jewed dahm. K heg hekaj s‑hasig maps wo ni‑oidad.”
Sh hab ep kaij g Jesus ab hema wui g oꞌodham, “Oi g ni‑oid.” Kush wabshaba hab kaij, “Heuꞌu, ni‑kownalig. T hoꞌipki hekid muh g ni‑ohg. Nt wo hiashpok haha wo m‑oi.”
Sh hab kaij g Jesus, “Am g ha hiwgid hegam mo pi uꞌukch g wechij doakag mat wo ha hiash g koꞌi. Pt ahpi hi am wo him k wo i ahgahi ab amjed g Jiosh kownaltalig.”
Sh hema hab ep kaij g oꞌodham, “Ni‑kownalig, am ant wo i m‑oid k wabshaba wehpeg wo hih uhpam k an wehs wo i ha neidok g ni‑hajuni.”
Sh hab kaij g Jesus ab wui, “Neh, nat hig shelinim wo moihunad hegai mat hedai am uhpam wo nea amai mo hebaijed him? Pegih, t hab wa masma pi haꞌichu wehhejed wo s‑kehgajk am Jiosh kownaltalig ed hegai mat am uhpam wo nea.”
Tsh amjed g Jesus am haꞌi ep i ha chuhcha wewaꞌakko gamai gohk matsh goꞌogok e wehm wo ahgahi g haꞌichu ahgaj am ha oidch hegam kihhim matsh hebai apꞌech matsh am epai wo hih.
Sh hab kaij g Jesus ab ha wui, “Neh, muꞌij o hegam mo e nahtokch mat wo e doꞌibia. Kuch eda pi muꞌij ahchim mach am ha ahgidahim g doꞌibiadag ahga. Id o heg wa wepo mat hebai g ha‑hihka wo si geꞌejk. T g ha‑pionag pi wo muꞌijk. Ab g wo si tahnid g Jiosh mat muꞌi wo i ha chuhcha mat am wo ha ahgidahid g s‑kehg haꞌichu ahgaj ch ab wo i ha baꞌihamad hegam mo e nahtokch.
“Neh, bat masma wo s‑ta ehbidamak g hemajkam am em‑wehhejed mat g sheshꞌe am ha wehhejed g kahwal mahmad.
Mt wabshaba pi haꞌichukaj wo e kudut k pi haꞌichu wo uꞌad nih g haꞌichu eniga nih chum hems g lial. Jiosh at hab wo ha juh g hemajkam mat wo em‑dagioꞌi. Am amt wo s‑e hohtmagi kihhim wui k pi hedai wo hiwigi mas wo em‑shohbi wohg ch ed.
“Kumt hebai wo dada ha‑kih am k am hab wo chei, ‘Jiosh o ab em‑makiog g s‑ap tahhadkam.’
Kut s‑ap ab wo i em‑nei matp ab wo s‑em‑wohoch k ab wo i em‑wahpki mamt am wo dadkkad. Kumt pi has wo elid k am wo dadkkad ch wo e gegosidad ch an wo i ha ahgidahid g s‑kehg haꞌichu ahgaj g Jiosh am hugkam mamt gam hu wo hihi ab amjed hegai kihhim. Chikpandam o ab d wuikam mat ab wo bei g e‑nam‑kidadag. K idam d ha wuikam mat am hab wo juh. Pi amt inhas wo wahpkid k am wo dadkkad am hugkam mamt ep wo baꞌich hihi.
<range>
Kut hebai g hemajkam s‑ap ab wo i em‑nei kihhim ch ed, mt wo huh mat haschu wo i em‑gegos
k wo ha doaj g kokꞌodam k wo ha ahgi g hemajkam mat ab i ha miabi g Jiosh kownaltalig.
“Kut hebai pi ap ab hu wo i em‑nei g hemajkam, mt am wo i wuwha kahya ch ed
k ab wo si i shahmud g e‑shuhshk k hab wo chei, ‘Id att hekaj am wo em‑chehgi matt wo em‑dagito. Mt wabshaba wo s‑chegitok mat ab i chum em‑miabi g Jiosh kownaltalig.’
Neh, hegam si pi apꞌekam hemajkam mash wa am kihkahim Sodom kihhim ch ed at wo bei g s‑koꞌok e‑namkidadag mat hekid wo e ai g geꞌe lodaita tash. T wabshaba baꞌich wo i s‑koꞌokam e namkid hegam mat pi ab hu wo em‑kaiha.
“Muꞌi s‑hasig haꞌichu ant am hab juh Korasin ch Bethsaida kihhim ch ed. Kutki eda g hemajkam amai pi ab hu ni‑wohoch. T heg hekaj ab wo bei g s‑koꞌok e‑namkidadag geꞌe lodaita tash ch ed. Hegam mo am kih Tyre ch Sidon kihhim t am ch pi geꞌe mahch ab amjed g Jiosh at pi am hu hugkam wo bei g s‑koꞌok e‑namkidadag. Tp hems ab wo i e shoꞌigchud k gam hu wo s‑ohhod g pi ap e‑chegitoi matp wo nei ihda s‑hasig haꞌichu.
<range>
Capernaum t am hemajkam o ab si e haschud. T wabshaba g Jiosh gam hu wo i ha shul jiawul kih ed.”
Sh hab ep kaij ab e‑chuhchai ha wui, “Heg o wa wepo mo ahni ab ni‑kaiham hegai matp hedai ab wo em‑kaiha. Kut ahni s‑ni‑ohhod matp hedai wo s‑em‑ohhod. Kutp hedai wo s‑ni‑ohhod k hab waꞌap s‑ohhod g Jiosh nani pi d kehshaj.”
Tsh woho gam hu hihi hegam wewaꞌakko gamai gohk. Tsh am hebai i cheka. Tsh am i uhpam dada k shaꞌi si s‑hehgig ch hab kaij, “T‑kownalig, chum hems g jijawul ab s‑t‑wohog elid mach am m‑chechcheg ch ab si ha chehani mat gam hu hab wo i e juh.”
“Heuꞌu, nat pi hegai mo d ha‑geꞌejig ch d Satan heb hu wua g e‑gewkdag,” bash kaij g Jesus, “Neid ani mat ab i gei Jiosh kihdag amjed hab sha masma mat g wepgi.
Neh, ab ant em‑mah g gewkdag mamt wo e nako mamt am wabsh wo ha keish g kohkꞌoi ch nanakshel ch wehs g gewkdag g ge Jiawul. Kut pi wo shaꞌi s‑koꞌokam em‑juh.
Mt wabshaba pi heg hekaj wo s‑hehgigk mo g jijawul ab s‑em‑wohog elid. Heg amt hekaj wo s‑hehgigk mo gan hu oꞌohanas g em‑chechgig Jiosh kihdag an mam d e doꞌibiakam.”
Kutsh iaꞌi idani g Hekia S‑apꞌekam Gewkdag ab mah g Jesus g si geꞌe s‑hehgig. Kush am e hoꞌigeꞌidahun ch hab kaij, “Ni‑ohg Jiosh, dap kownal wehs haꞌichu dahm. K hab d m‑elida mat pi hedai wo e nako mas hejel wo s‑amich g haꞌichu m‑ahga. E o ehstokch ab ha amjed g s‑chu aꞌamichuddam. Kup wabshaba am ha chehgid idam mo haꞌichu s‑mahchimk hab masma mo g aꞌal. Ni heg hekaj ab si m‑hoꞌigeꞌid.”
Neh, bash kaij g Jesus ch am hahawa ha ahgid g hemajkam, “Ni‑ohg Jiosh at ab ni‑mah wehs haꞌichu. Pi o hedai ni‑mahch ch hegai waꞌi ni‑ohg s‑ni‑mahch. K pi hedai mahch g ni‑ohg. Ni ahni waꞌi s‑mahch ch hegam ehp mani hedai i wui tashogid.”
Tsh am hahawa i e hejelko hegam Jesus. Kush hab ha ahg, “Do si s‑ap tahhadkam mam am neid ch kah ihda mam haschu i neid ch kah.
Muꞌijj g kekelibad Jiosh haꞌichu i tashogiddam ch kokownalbad o wa chum s‑neidamk hegai mam haschu i neid ch chum s‑kaimk mam haschu i kah.”
Tsh am hu hebai am hema jiwia g chehanig ha mashchamdam k wabsh chum heki s‑himchudam g Jesus hab kaijch, “Ha mashchamdam, shahnt wo ni‑juh. T hekaj ab wo i ni‑wahki g Jiosh e‑kihdag ed?”
Kush hab kaij g Jesus ab wui, “Nap hig pi mahch mo has chuꞌig an Jiosh oꞌohana ed heg amjed.”
Sh hab kaij hegai oꞌodham, “Heuꞌu. Bo chuꞌig: Matt hemho wa ab wo si pihk t‑elidad t‑kownalig Jiosh wui wehs t‑ihbdagkaj ch id am wo chehgidch wehs t‑doakagkaj ch wehs t‑gewkdagkaj ch wehs t‑chegitoidagkaj. K hab ep chuꞌig: Matt hemho wa ab wo si pihk t‑elidad t‑nawoj wui hab masma mach has i masma hejel t‑wehhejed si pihk t‑elid.”
Sh hab kaij g Jesus, “Heg o wud. Kut s‑ap ab wo i m‑wahki maptp heg am hab wo junihid.”
Kush ihda oꞌodham s‑mahch mo pi am hu hab junihim hegai chehanig ch wabshaba gam hu wabsh chum s‑e oanamk ch ash ab kakke g Jesus, “K hedai d ni‑nawoj?”
Sh g Jesus am ahgid ihda haꞌichu wepogida ahga, “Neh, matp hems am hema hih g t‑wehm Tuhligo Jerusalem t amjed gam hu Jerico wui. T am haha wabsh g s‑chu eꞌeskam am cheggia k ehs g haꞌichu enigaj k gewichkwua k chum alo mua.
K am woꞌo. “T ab haha wabsh g pahl hema hih wohg oidch k nei mo am woꞌo ihda oꞌodham k gam hu wabsh mehk him k an bij.
T hab wa masma g papal ha wehm chikpandam ab hema him k am nei hegai oꞌodham mo am woꞌo k gam hu wabsh bijim k gam hu hih.
T g hema Samaria t am oꞌodham am hahawa him k cheh ihda oꞌodham. Kum ab aꞌai s‑e kehꞌid g Samaria t am hemajkam ha wehm. T eda ihda si s‑hoꞌigeꞌid
k ab i wako g ehꞌed g nawaitkaj k ab i huhud k an i hobino g ikuskaj k an hahawa dai e‑shoiga an k gam hu i bei kihhim wui mat am hebai wo ha nuhkudach.
“K am baꞌich d i tash. T gam hu wo hih ihda oꞌodham k wabshaba ab haꞌi ha mah g lial mat wo nuhkud k hab ha ah, ‘Am g wo nuhkud. Kunt ia ep wo jiwia k wo wa em‑namkid mamt haschu baꞌich wo i heki gei wehhejed.’
“Neh, kup hedai hab elid idam waik mo s‑ap d nawojij hegai mamt gewichkwua?”
Sh hab kaij hegai chehanig ha mashchamdam, “Hegai mo s‑hoꞌigeꞌid.” Sh hab kaij g Jesus, “Pegih, gamai g hihm k am hab e junihid hab masma.”
Sh amjed am hebai hihim idam Jesus ch am dada hema kihhim t am. Sh am hema g uwi hab chehgig Marda ch ab i ha wahpki e‑kih ed.
Kush am wehmaj daha g wehngaj ch hab chehgig Mary ch id ab i dahiwua Jesus wui k ab si kaiham g haꞌichu mashchamaj.
Sh eda g Marda si chikpan ch e kudut k am jiwia Jesus wui k hab kaij, “Ni‑kownalig, nap pi shaꞌi has elid mat g ni‑wehnag am wabsh i ni‑dagito mant hejel hab wo juh g chikpan. Ab g ahgid mat ab wo i him k wo i ni‑wehmt.”
Sh hab kaij g Jesus ab wui, “Ih, Marda, muꞌi ap haꞌichukaj e kudut.
K eda am d waꞌi hemako haꞌichu mo d si haꞌichu. Id at g Mary ab bei. Kut pi wo shaꞌi e wohppoꞌidach.”
Sh am hu hebai e hoꞌigeꞌidahun g Jesus ch am i kuhgit. Sh hema hab kaij g chuhchaij ab wui, “T‑kownalig, oi g hig t‑mashcham matt has masma wo t‑hoꞌigeꞌidahu hab masma mo wa g John ha mashcham hegam mo ab si wecho e mashcham.”
Sh hab kaij g Jesus ab ha wui, “Id amt hab wo chei am e hoꞌigeꞌidahunch: Jiosh t‑ohg, ab ach si has m‑elid ch si haꞌichuchud g m‑chehgig ch tatchua mapt wo i geꞌedaj g e‑kownaltalig ia t‑shahgid.
Ab g i s‑t‑hoꞌigeꞌid k ab wo t‑mahkad g haꞌichu hugi wehs tashkaj.
Gam g hu hab i juhni g pi ap t‑chuꞌijig nach pi ahchim gam hu pi chechegitod g ha‑chuꞌijig hegam mat hedai i pi ap has chuꞌi ab t‑wui. Pi g am hiwgid g Jiawul mas am wo t‑shul pi apꞌekam ch ed.”
Sh hab ep kaij g Jesus ab ha wui hegam mo ab si wecho e mashcham, “Neh, tp hems hema pi am hu geꞌe wo haꞌichu hugik. T am hema mehkjed wo jiwia hudunk ab mat ab i chehgim. Kut am wo hih g kihkam e‑hugid am kihkam wui k ab wo haꞌi tai g sismito mat wo gegos g e‑nawoj.
<range>
“T hab haha wabsh wo chum chei g hugidaj am kihkam, ‘Pi g ia hu ni‑kudut. Heki ant hu ab yahwidad g ni‑kihjeg. Kutt heki hu wohpiwua g t‑aꞌaliga ha wehm. Nt pi wo i wamig k wo m‑mah haꞌichu.’
“T wabshaba pi has wo e elid k ab wabsh wo kia tahnid. T am haha wo i wamig k ab wo mah nat pi pi haꞌasa ab wo tahnid.
“Pegih, mt ahpim hab wa masma pi haꞌasa ab wo tahnid g Jiosh mam haschu i tatchua. T ab wo em‑mah. Am g wo haꞌichu i e gahgidad. T wo em‑chehgi. Ab g wo shontpag g kihjeg. T ab wo i e kuhpiꞌo em‑wehhejed.
<range>
“Neh, s‑mahch am mat pi hedai wabsh g wamad ab wo mah g e‑alidag mat g watopi ab wo tai.
Kut pi wabsh g nakshel ab wo mah mat g chuchul nonha ab wo tai.
Mam has i masma pi apꞌe ch wabshaba s‑mahch mamt g s‑kehg haꞌichu ab wo ha mah g e‑aꞌaliga. No hig pi g em‑ohg Jiosh baꞌich i e nahtokch mat ab wo ha mah g Hekia S‑apꞌekam Gewkdag hegam mat ab wo tai.”
Sh am hu hebai hema pi ha neok g cheoj nash pi g jiawul an uꞌukch. Kutsh g Jesus gam hu hab i juh g jiawul. Tsh am ha hekaj i neo. Tsh g hemajkam si has i el.
Sh eda haꞌi hab kaij, “Moki g jijawul ha‑geꞌejig ab mahkch g gewkdag. K heg hekaj gam hu hab i ha wua g jijawul ab ha amjed hegam mo an ha uꞌukch.”
Sh haꞌijj wabsh chum heki s‑himchudamk g Jesus ch ab chehani mat g s‑hasig haꞌichu hab wo juh k hekaj am wo ha chehgi mo ab Jiosh t amjed.
Sh wabshaba g Jesus s‑mahch mo haschu am chegito ch hab kaij ab ha wui, “S‑mahch am mat g oꞌodham wo padch g hejel e‑jewedga mat ab aꞌai wo e cheggia. Kut g e‑wehm kihkam hab waꞌap wo padch g hejel e‑kihdag mat ab aꞌai wo e cheggia.
Pegih, t has hig masma g Jiawul pi wo padch g hejel e‑kownaltalig matp ab wo sha ni‑mah g gewkdag mant am wo i ha wuwhas g piongaj?
Neh, em‑pionag o hab waꞌap i ha wuwhasid g jijawul. Kum eda pi hab masma hab ha elid mo g Jiawul ab ha mahkch g gewkdag. Pegih, idam at wo em‑ahgi mo pi woho hegai mam hab chum elid.
Jiosh gewkdagkaj ani gam hu hab i ha wua g jijawul. K id am wohokamchud mat heki hu in i wuhsh g Jiosh kownaltalig em‑shahgid.
“Nat hig pi wo e nahtokch g si s‑gegoki kownal g e‑cheggiakudkaj mat wo nuhkud g e‑kih. T hab pi hedai wo wohppoꞌi g haꞌichu enigaj.
Tp wabshaba g baꞌich i s‑gegoki kownal wo cheggia k wo gewito k gam hu wo i ui hegai cheggiakudaj mo ab chum si hiwig k am wo aꞌai i tahp g haꞌichu enigaj am ha wehhejed g e‑shondalig. Neh, bani wa masma cheggia g ge Jiawul.
K hegam mat hedai pi ab hu wo i ni‑wehmajk ab ni‑wui gegok ch wabsh ha gantan hegam mani s‑ha doꞌibiamk.”
Kush hab ep kaij g Jesus, “Matp hems g jiawul an wo hema uꞌukch g oꞌodham ch wabsh wo dagito mat am hebai ep wo e ul. Kut hegai oꞌodham wo i chum kegch g e‑doakag. T wabshaba g jiawul pi hebai wo chehg k hekaj hab wo i e ah, ‘Mo hig woho d ni‑kih hegai oꞌodham. Nt hig am uhpam wo hih wui.’
Kut wa woho am uhpam wo him k wo cheh mo am wabsh jeg ch si kegchudas ch hehosimhunas.
T am haha wo him k wewaꞌak ep wo ha uꞌapa g jijawul. T idam baꞌich wo i pi apꞌek ch am wehmaj wo i chiwia. Neh, t ihda oꞌodham hahawa baꞌich wo i pi apꞌek mo wa ga hu i heki hu.”
Sh an wehgaj gegok g hemajkam. Kush hema g uwi hab kaij am wui g Jesus, “Do si geꞌe s‑hehgig heg wehhejed uwi mat an m‑mahsid k m‑siꞌichudahim.”
Sh wabshaba hab kaij g Jesus, “Baꞌich at wo i s‑hehgigk hegam mat ab wo kaihamad g Jiosh haꞌichu ahga.”
Sh am i muꞌidahim g hemajkam. Kush hab kaij g Jesus, “Muꞌijj o g ha‑chegitoidag pi apꞌe. K heg hekaj s‑neidamk mant hab wo juh g s‑hasig haꞌichu k am wo wohokamch mani ab Jiosh amjed. Bant waꞌi masma am wo ha chehgi mani d Jiosh si Kehsha matsh wa hab e juh hegai kelibad Jiosh haꞌichu i tashogiddam mash d Jonah.
Heg atsh wa am si has masma i e chehgi ha wui g Ninevah t am hemajkam. Nt ahni am si has masma wo i ni‑chehgi am ha wui g hemajkam iaꞌi idani.
“Hegam Ninevah t am hemajkam atsh gam hu s‑ohhod g pi ap e‑chegitoi am i kahk g Jonabad k hab pi ab hu wo e chuꞌijigch geꞌe lodaita tash ch ed. Ni ahni baꞌich d i si haꞌichu mo g Jonabad. Kum eda pi ab hu ni‑kaiham ch heg hekaj ab wo motoig g chuꞌijig lodaita tash ch ed. (31) Mehkjed atsh ab i hih g uwi kownal ab wakolim tahgio amjed mat ab wo kaiha g Solomonbad haꞌichu mahchig. Ni ahni baꞌich d i si haꞌichu mo g Solomonbad. Kum eda pi ab hu ni‑kaiham ch heg hekaj ab wo motoig g chuꞌijig lodaita tash ed.”
<range>
Kush hab ep kaij g Jesus, “Wohokam o wepogidas mo g lahmpa. Kum s‑mahch mo pi hab d ahga g lahmpa mas am wo e ehsto haꞌichu wecho. Mt an wo dai mat hebai wo ha tonlidad hegam mo ab i wahpk.
“Em‑wuhpui at s‑ap am wo i wahki g tonlig matp wo s‑mamsk k wabshaba pi am hu wo i wahki matp pi wo mamsk. Kum heg hekaj s‑ap ha nuhkud.
Pegih, wahm amt wo si s‑ap nuhkudad g haꞌichu e‑amichudadag mat heg s‑ap am wo i wahki g wohokam.
Bat waꞌi masma ab wo i shuhdad g em‑chegitoidag g wohokam.”
Tsh am i haꞌasa neo g Jesus. Tsh am hema jiwia g Palasi k am waid mat wo wehmaj e gegos. Kutsh wa woho am i wahk k am i dahiwua matsh wo e gegos.
Tsh hegai Palasi si has i el neidok mat pi e wako hab masma mo d ha himdag.
Kush s‑amichud g Jesus ch hab kaij ab wui, “Neh, ahpim Palasi am si kegchud g e‑honshpadag. K wabshaba g em‑chegitoi wabsh shuhdags g pi apꞌekamkaj. Heg o wa wepo mam an waꞌi wehgaj si kegchud g hohas‑hahaꞌa. K ged hu ha eda wabsh kia s‑bibtagi.
Damt wabsh wo totontok mamtp heg wo waꞌi s‑ap nuhkud e‑honshpadag. Jiosh at hab waꞌap nahto g em‑doakag. Kumt heg ep wo chum nuhkud.
Am g wehs wo i dagito Jiosh wui k hab wo s‑chechojimak ab shoꞌigkam ha wui ch wo nei mat wehs haꞌichu wo s‑kehgajk am em‑wehhejed.
“Neh, ahpim Palasi am ab mahk g Jiosh g hemako tahpani mo wehst‑mahm e tahpanch g em‑eniga, chum hems g nahnko mahs pi‑miandi ch haꞌichu tatk. T wabshaba g Jiosh s‑koꞌokam wo em‑namkid nam pi pi apꞌechud hegai mam haschukaj ha shoꞌigchud haꞌi ch pi ab hu tatchua g Jiosh.
Shaꞌam waꞌi s‑hohhoꞌid mamt si s‑apko wo dadhaiwua am cheopi ch ed ch s‑hohhoꞌid mat ab wo si has em‑elidad g hemajkam mamt an wo i wuwha kahya ch ed.
Ih, shoꞌig! Mt wo si s‑koꞌokam e namkidach. Neh, pi at wo mahsk g hihaꞌini matp pi am hu wo tohnkdask. Kumtp hems am wabsh dahm wo oiopod. Pegih, bat sha masma pi wo mahchk g hemajkam mam d pi apꞌekam nam pi ehstokch g pi ap e‑chuꞌijig.”
Kush hema hab kaij g chehanig ha mashchamdam ab wui, “Ha mashchamdam, ahchim ap hab waꞌap has t‑ahg hab kaijch.”
Sh hab kaij g Jesus, “Pegih, ab em‑wui o hab waꞌap him g s‑koꞌok em‑namkidadag. Muꞌi s‑hasig haꞌichu am ab ha chehani g hemajkam. K id d s‑wehch haꞌichu mohtoi am ha wehhejed. M eda ahpim pi haꞌichu hab shaꞌi wua mams hekaj ha wehm wo moht.
“Em‑shohshon at muꞌi ha kokda g Jiosh haꞌichu i tashogiddam. Kum ahpim ha wepo masma, chum ams ha hehosid g ha‑hihaꞌiniga hegam mamt ha kokda. K heg hekaj ab em‑wui him g s‑koꞌok em‑namkidadag.
<range>
Heki o hu hab kaij g Jiosh, ‘Ab ant wo i ha wuwhas g haꞌichu i tashogiddam ha shahgid g hemajkam. Kut haꞌi wo ha‑kokda k haꞌi wo ha shoꞌigch.’
Neh, kum ha wepo chuꞌijig mamtp ha wepo haꞌichu elid. Kut wepo masma wo em‑ai g s‑koꞌok ha‑namkidadag heg hekaj wehs mat hab juh ga hu i amjed mat in i e nahto g jewed.
Abelbad atsh wa wehpeg e muhkid. Tsh amjed muꞌi ep e koꞌij. Tsh g Zecariabad ga hu si ha oidch e muhkid amai shahgid g iagchulidakud ch geꞌe cheopi. Kum ahpim ha wepo chuꞌijig hegam matsh wa ha kokda ch ha wepo masma wo bei g s‑koꞌok e‑namkidadag mamtp hedai ha wepo elid haꞌichu.
“Ahpim chehanig ha mashchamdam amt wo i chum ha amichudach g hemajkam mat has masma wo s‑mahchk g Jiosh. Kum eda ahpim pi mahch ch ep ha shohbidch hegam mo s‑mahchimk. Heg o wa wepo mam ab yahwidad g kihjeg mat pi hedai am hu wo i wah. Jiosh at s‑koꞌokam wo em‑namkid heg hekaj.”
Tsh am i wuhsh g Jesus k gam hu chum hih. Tsh hegam chehanig ha mashchamdam ch Palasi ab hahawa si s‑ta keꞌidam has ahg k muꞌi haꞌichu kakke
hab wabsh chum ahgch mat wo heki himch mat pi ap haꞌichu hab wo chei.
Kutsh shaꞌi si muꞌi mihl hemajkam am i e hemapad k wabsh aꞌai e keishshap. Sh hab kaij g Jesus ab ha wui g e‑chuhchai, “Neh, hegam mo d Palasi o hab wabsh s‑e junimk mo d s‑apꞌekam. Mt wo s‑e nenꞌoidk mamt pi am hu ha oidk hab wo masmak.
Hegai mo chum e maꞌishch at wehs wo e maꞌishpiꞌo. Pej, wehs s‑aꞌagi haꞌichu at wo s‑e mai.
Wehs at wo mahsko e wua mamtp haschu chum s‑aꞌagi hab kaij. Kut wehs am si s‑kaidam wo e ahgad kih dahm amjed mamtp haschu i chum s‑jupij hab kaij ged hu si e‑kih ed.”
Sh hab hahawa kaij g Jesus ab ha wui g hemajkam, “Neh, ni‑naipijju, pi g wo shaꞌi ha ehbidad hegam matp hedai wo chum s‑em‑kokdaim. Pi at wo e nako mas baꞌich s‑koꞌokam has wo i em‑juh em‑kokdak.
Heg at waꞌi Jiosh wo e nako mat am wo em‑daꞌich Jiawul kih ed mamtp pi am hu wo wohog elidad. Kumt heg ab wo waꞌi si has elidad.
K wabshaba g Jiosh si s‑hemajima ch pi tatchua mas wo s‑koꞌokam em‑juh. Am g wo oidahim mo chum hems g al uꞌuwhig s‑ap ha nuhkud. K eda chum alo pi haꞌichu namkig idam. Kum ahpim wehs haꞌichu baꞌich d i haꞌichu am tahgio. Jiosh o wehs haꞌichu s‑mahch ab em‑ab. Mt heg hekaj pi haꞌichu wo shaꞌi ehbidad ab wui e dagitokch.”
<range>
Sh hab ep kaij g Jesus, “Neh, am amt wo s‑ni‑mahch k ah hemajkam ha tahgio mani d em‑doꞌibiakam. Kunt ahni hab waꞌap wo s‑em‑mahch k ah am ha tahgio g anghil ch am Jiosh tahgio.
Kutp wabshaba hedai pi wo ni‑mahch k ah am ha tahgio g hemajkam, nt ahni hab waꞌap pi wo mahch k ah am ha tahgio g anghil ch am Jiosh tahgio.
“Jiosh at gam hu hab wo i juh g pi ap chuꞌijigaj hegai mat hedai wo wa chum has ni‑ah matp gam hu wo s‑ohhod g pi ap e‑chuꞌijig. T wabshaba pi gam hu hab wo i e juh g pi ap chuꞌijigaj hegai mat hedai wo s‑koꞌokam has ah g Hekai S‑apꞌekam Gewkdag.
“Pi g wo shaꞌi kudut ab amjed mamt has masma e wehhejed wo neo mamtp hems am wo em‑lodai chechopi ch ed o am ha tahgio g kokownal.
Hekia S‑apꞌekam Gewkdag at wo em‑ahgi mamt has wo chei.”
Sh am hema g oꞌodham hab kaij ab wui, “Ha mashchamdam, hab g ahgid g ni‑nawoj mat am wo i ha ni‑tahpani hegai mat g t‑ohg an dagito t‑wehhejed.”
Sh hab kaij g Jesus ab wui, “Pi ant heg hekaj ia hu jiwia manis wo em‑lodait k am wo i em‑apꞌechudach g haꞌichu em‑eniga am em‑shahgid.”
Sh am baꞌich hab ep kaij ab wehs ha wui, “Am g wo s‑e nenꞌoidk mamt pi heg wo waꞌi huꞌuidad s‑kaisdag. Pi amt d wo s‑ap doakamk heg hekaj mam haschu i eniga, chum ams d wo s‑kaisk.”
Sh id am hahawa chum ha tashogid ch hab kaij, “Tp hems hema d wo s‑kaisk. K g eꞌeshaj si geꞌe babhe.
K hab e ahg, ‘Pi o an hu wiꞌis mant hebai ep wo toa g haꞌichu bahidag. Shuhshud at g ni‑waptto.
Nt hig wo i ha shulig k am baꞌich i geꞌeged haꞌi wo i chuhcha k am wo baꞌiha g haꞌichu bahidag ch wehs haꞌichu ni‑eniga.
Si at haꞌichu s‑ni‑abam. Nt muꞌi aꞌahidag ab wo hekaj ihda s‑iꞌowi haꞌichu k wo ni‑ulinihogidad ch wo ni‑gegosidad ch wo ihꞌed ch wo si s‑hehgigk.’ Neh, bo e ahg ihda s‑kais.
“K wabshaba ab wui hab kaij g Jiosh, ‘Dap wabsh tohnto. Id i s‑chuhugam ab apt wo muh. Kut d wabsh wo hemak ch wo ui g haꞌichu m‑eniga map hejel am chum e wiꞌidch.’
Neh, bo wa chuꞌig ch hab waꞌap wo wa chuꞌigk wehs ha wehhejed hegam mo hejel s‑e kaischudamk ch wabshaba pi am hu Jiosh wehhejed hekaj g s‑e‑kaisdag,” bo kaij g Jesus.
Sh hab hahawa ep kaij g Jesus ab ha wui g e‑chuhchai, “Heg ani hekaj am em‑ahgid ihda mamt pi wo si e kudutad ab haꞌichu e‑hugi ab o ab haꞌichu e‑eniga ab.
Jiosh at ab em‑mah g em‑doakag, pegih, k hab waꞌap ab wo em‑mah mamt haschukaj wo e dagioꞌidad.
“An g wo i ha neid g hahawani. Idam o pi haꞌichu eꞌeshad ch pi od g haꞌichu esha ch pi ha kihki o ha waptto mat am eda wo baꞌiha. Jiosh o ha gegosid. Kum eda ahpim baꞌich d i si haꞌichu mo g uꞌuwhig am tahgio g Jiosh. T heg s‑ap wo em‑dagioꞌidad.
Pi amt wo e nako mams am baꞌich wo i himch g e‑aꞌahidagga am wabsh hekaj e kudutch.
Mamtp pi wo e nako mamt hab wo juh ihda al haꞌas chum haꞌichu, pegih, k haschu ahgk wo e kudutad g baꞌich i geꞌeged haꞌichukaj?
“An g wo i ha neid hegam haꞌichu wuhshanig m an chuhch. Pi o chikpan ch pi shohshom g haꞌichu eniga. Kuki eda g ha‑heosig baꞌich i s‑kehgaj mo g haꞌichu enigaj hegai s‑kais kownalbad mash hab chehgig Solomon.
Neh, tp hems s‑hohtam wo gaksh hegai shaꞌi m an chuhch k wo hekaj e nanda. K eda heg wa wepo mo g Jiosh si s‑kehg enigadadch g heosigkaj. Pegih, am g wo s‑wohochud mat ab s‑ap wo em‑enigadadch.
Pi g heg waꞌi hekaj wo e kudutad mamt wo e gahgi g haꞌichu hugi.
Wehs hemajkam an jewed dahm o chum hekid id an si e gahgid. K wabshaba g em‑ohg Jiosh s‑mahch mam tatchua ihda.
Mt g Jiosh kownaltalig wehpeg am wo ul e‑doakag ed. T g Jiosh ab epai wo em‑mah mam haschu i tatchua.
“Pi g am wo shaꞌi haꞌichu ehbidad ahpim mam al heꞌekiajj ab ni‑hiwig. Em‑ohg Jiosh o ab si tatchua mat ab wo i em‑mah g e‑kownaltalig.
Wehs g wo gagda mam haschu i edgid k wo ha mah g namkigaj g shoꞌigkam k an haha wo edgidad g baꞌich i s‑kehg kaisdag Jiosh kihdag ed. T heg pi hekid wo huhug. T pi hedai wo em‑ehs. T g hiopch pi hekid wo padch.
Kumt am wo s‑hihimim no pi g em‑tatchuidag am ulinig mo hebai haꞌichug hegai mam haschu hab elid mo d em‑kaisdag.”
Kush hab ep kaij g Jesus, “Mt wo si e nahtokch mat haschu has wo e juh hab sha masma mat g pion wo si e nahtokch mat g ha‑ahmo wo uhpam jiwia. Ha‑ahmo atp hems am wui wo hih g wo ha hohntam gegosig k pi oi wo uhpam jiwia. T wabshaba g piongaj ab wo s‑ap e enigadadch ch ab wo mehidch g e‑kanjel ch g e‑ahmo ab wo nenida. T am wo i jiwia k wo si shontpa. T ab ha hekaj wo i kuhpiꞌo g kihjeg wehhejed.
<range>
T wo si s‑hehgigk hegam pion mat g ha‑ahmo wo ha cheh mo nenead ch e nahtokch. Neh, t heg ab hab wo juh g bahshodag k wo si s‑ap ha dadsh k wo ha gegos.
T wo si s‑hehgigk hegam mat wo e nahtokch mat wo jiwia, chum as hems eda wo i huh g s‑chuhugam o i baꞌiwichkim.
“Neh, pi o ta machima mas hekid hema wo i jiwia g s‑chu ehskam. Kum heg hekaj chum hekid nuhkud g e‑kihdag.
Pegih, k hab waꞌap pi ta machima em‑wehhejed manis hekid wo uhpam jiwia jewed wui ahni Jiosh si Kehsha. Mt heg hekaj wo si e nahtokchid chum hekid.”
Sh hab kaij g Peter, “T‑kownalig, nap ahchim waꞌi hab t‑ahg aha nap wehs hab ha ahg?”
Sh hab kaij g Jesus, “Chum amt hedai wo e nahtokch mamtp wo s‑wapagimak ch wo s‑chu aꞌamichudad. S‑mahch am mat g ha‑ahmo hema wo e gahgi g hab mahs chikpandam k wo nuhkudach g e‑kihdag. T heg s‑ap wo ha chikpanchudad ch wo ha dagioꞌidad g e‑wehm pion mat eda pi an hu wo haꞌichugk g ha‑ahmo.
T am ep wo jiwia k wo cheh mo ihda s‑ap am hab junihim g e‑chikpan. Kut d wo si geꞌe s‑hehgigk heg wehhejed pion
nat pi g ahmoj am hahawa wehs dahm wo kei g e‑kihdag.
“T wabshaba pi ap d wo ha‑kehshak matp hedai wo i ha shoꞌigchudad g e‑wehm pion ch wo si e gegosidad ch wo nawmmukad hab e ahgch mat pi oi wo jiwia g ahmoj.
T haha wabsh wo jiwia k wo cheh mo pi ap hab wua g e‑chikpan k wo si s‑koꞌokam namkid k gam hu hab wo i juh.
“T wo bei g s‑koꞌok e‑namkidadag hegai pion mat wo s‑mahchk g e‑ahmo tatchui ch eda pi am hu hab wo junihid.
T wabshaba pi am hu i si s‑koꞌokam wo bei g e‑namkidadag hegai mo pi e mahch ch hab junihim g pi apꞌekam. Baꞌich i geꞌe haꞌichu amt uhpam wo s‑behim ab amjed hegai mamt baꞌich haꞌichu nuhkudach.”
Kush hab ep kaij g Jesus, “Ia ant jiwia jewed dahm mant wo i ha chuꞌamu g hemajkam hab sha masma mant am wo si i nai ha‑iꞌibdag ed. T hab wo s‑nenenashanik ab Jiosh wui. Mat huꞌi heki hu hab wo e juh.
Am ant s‑ta ehbidam haꞌichu gahi wo wuhshani k si ni‑kudut heg hekaj.
Pi g hab wo e elidad mat wo dodolimat g hemajkam mant ia jiwia.
Ab at em‑wui wo gegokiwua hegam mat pi wo ni‑tatchuad, chum hems haꞌakia em‑wehm kihkam.
Cheoj atp hems wo s‑kehꞌidad g e‑ohg o g e‑alidag. T g uwi g e‑jeꞌe o g e‑mad o g e‑kahkma jeꞌe wo s‑kehꞌidad.”
Sh hab hahawa ep kaij g Jesus, “Neh, mt wo s‑mahchk mas wo juh o as wo tonih am neidk mas hebaijed hewed ch has mahs chewagi i wushke. M eda pi am hu i aꞌamichud mo haschu has e junihog iaꞌi idani neidch mani haschu hab wua. Shahag wepo mam pi mahchimk.
<range>
<range>
“E o aihim mat g Jiosh wo ha lodai g hemajkam. Am g wo aꞌamichud mamt has wo chum masmak.
S‑mahch am mamt hemho wa s‑hohtam am wo i e apꞌech heg wehm mat ab wo haꞌichu i em‑abch. Tp hems am wo i em‑wahpki lodaita ch ed mamtp pi am hu wehmaj wo i e apꞌech. T g usagakam am wo i em‑dagito chi‑lihhi wui. T heg ged hu wo si em‑kuh.
Kumt pi wo shaꞌi i e wuhshad am hugkam mamt hekid wo i wehs ha namkid mamt heꞌekia i em‑toꞌi.”
Kush iaꞌi idani haꞌi g oꞌodham am ahgid g Jesus matsh g kownal Pilate haꞌi ha kokda g Galilee t am hemajkam mash eda idam am hab chum wua g iagchulida Jiosh wui.
Sh g Jesus hab kaij am ha wui, “Kumtp hab elid mo id am wohokamchud mo baꞌich d i si pi apꞌekam mo hedai i Galilee t am kihkam namt pi hab masma ha kokda.
K eda pi woho. Wehsijj am hab masma d pi apꞌekam ch wo bei g s‑koꞌok e‑namkidadag mamt wo sha pi ohhod g pi ap e‑chegitoi.
“Neh, am atsh i gei g uhgk kih Siloam woꞌo t am Jerusalem ch ed. Kutsh gamai gigiꞌik e koꞌij. Kum hab elid mo id am wohokamchud mo idam baꞌich d i si pi apꞌekam mo hedai i hegam mo am kih Jerusalem t am.
K eda pi woho. Wehsijj am hab masma d pi apꞌekam ch wo bei g s‑koꞌok e‑namkidadag mamt wo sha pi ohhod g pi ap e‑chegitoi.”
Sh g Jesus am ha ahgid ihda haꞌichu wepogida ahga, “Neh, matp hema g oꞌodham ge suhnaga am uhdwis e‑oidag ed ch am him k am s‑uꞌim g suhna. K pi ab hu bahidag.
“K hab ahg g oidag nuhkuddam, ‘Neh, waik aꞌahid ab ach am nenneid hegai suhna uhs ch pi koi haꞌichu shaꞌi bei ab amjed. Pt wo shonch. S haschu ahgk am hig wo kehkk oidag ch ed?’
“K wabshaba hab kaij g oidag nuhkuddam, ‘Am att hig wabsh wo dagito hemako ahidag ehp. Nt am wo si i moihun k am wo iawua g haiwani biht an wehgaj.
Kut am wo s‑apꞌek matp ab wo bahidagt. Nt wabshaba am haha wo si shonch matp pi ab hu wo bahidagt.’ ”
Sh am hu hebai mihshmda tash ch ed g Jesus am ha mashcham cheopi ch ed.
Sh am hema haꞌichug g uwi mash g jiawul an uꞌukch. Kush gamai gigiꞌik aꞌahid ab waꞌi mumku mash ab wabsh i e olatch ch pi e nako mat wo shel i kekiwua.
Tsh am i cheh g Jesus k ab si wai. Tsh ab i hih. Kush hab kaij, “Ahpi uwi, ia at wo i doa g m‑mumkidag,”
K ab hahawa taht. Kutsh ha hekaj shel i kekiwua k ab si ihm g Jiosh.
Kutsh ab si bagat hegai mash d ha‑wanimeddam am cheopi ch ed matsh g Jesus ha doaj ha‑mihshmda tash ed k ash hab ha ah g hemajkam, “Am o haꞌichug g chuhdp tash matt heg eda wo chikpanad. Kunt heg oidam tash ia wo dada k wo e doaj, hi wa pi t‑mihshmda tash ed mo g Jiosh am kehshch.”
Sh hab kaij g Jesus ab wui, “Ih, pi ap shaꞌi woho ab hu has elid g Jiosh pi ab hu hoꞌigeꞌidch ihda uwi no pi d chum aligaj. S‑mahch ap mat wabsh chum hedai g e‑woiwisga o g e‑wuhluga am wo wulꞌok k am wo be k ged hu wo iꞌich, chum hems e‑mihshmda tash ed.
Pegih, tt wahm wo i wehmt ihda t‑wehm oꞌodham. Jiawul o wa ab wulshch gamai gigiꞌik ahid ab. Kutt hemho wa wo wulꞌo, chum hems mihshmda tash ed.”
Kutsh si e el hegam mo s‑kehꞌid. Sh wabshaba g hemajkam si s‑hehgig heg hekaj si s‑kehg haꞌichu mat hab juh.
Sh hab ep kaij g Jesus, “Am ant heꞌes wo i em‑tashogi g Jiosh kownaltalig
am wepogidch g haꞌichu kai. Neh, heg am eꞌesha mo al chumaj ch oi wa am wo wuhshani k haꞌas wo i geꞌeda mo g s‑ehheg uhs. Tp hems g uꞌuwhig an ab wo koksht. Pegih, t hab wa masma wo geꞌe i geꞌeda g Jiosh kownaltalig, chum as al chum am wo shonwua.”
Sh hab ep kaij g Jesus, “Jiosh kownaltalig o hab waꞌap wepogidas mo g jewajidakud. Heg amt wo be k am wo wah wehnadk g chuꞌi k am heꞌes wo i dai. T g jewajidakud wo chehmo g wahga mat wehs am wo i kopodka. Pegih, t g Jiosh kownaltalig hab wa masma wo chehmo g jewed.” Neh, bash kaij g Jesus
<range>
Sh am hihimhim hegam Jesus ha oidk g kihhim. Sh g Jesus am haꞌichu ha mashcham g hemajkam ch am wabsh i si haꞌab e gewkadch Jerusalem wui.
Sh hema ab kakke ch hab kaij, “Ni‑kownalig, nat pi shaꞌi muꞌi wo e doꞌibia g hemajkam?” Sh hab kaij g Jesus ab wui,
“Heuꞌu. Kumt heg hekaj am wo si e nakogad mamt am wo i wahp Jiosh kownaltalig ed. Muꞌijj at am wo chum s‑wahpkim k pi wo e nako. Heg o wa wepo mamt am wo i wahp al aj kihjeg t amjed.
Id ant wo wepogi g kih enigakam mat am wo i ha wahpki g e‑machiga k am haha wo si kuh g pualit. T ab haꞌi ep wo i chum s‑wahpkim. T hab wo ha ah, ‘Gam g hu wo hihim. Pi ani shaꞌi em‑mahch.’
“Neh, bat wa masma muꞌi am wo i chum s‑wahpkim ni‑kownaltalig ed hab kaijch, ‘M‑wehm ach t‑gegosidahim. Kup am ha mashcham t‑kihhim am.’
“Kunt hab wo ha ah, ‘Pi ani shaꞌi em‑mahch. Gam g hu wo hihim ab ni‑amjed. Dam si pi ap hehemajkam.’
“T haha wo si shoanid ch ga hu wabsh wo i si e kiꞌishch nat pi wo shaꞌi si s‑koꞌok haꞌichu nakogad. T eda am wo haꞌichugk g Abrahambad ch Isaacbad ch Jacobbad ch wehs g Jiosh haꞌichu i tashogiddam.
Kut g hemajkam ab wo i hihi siꞌal tahgio amjed ch huduni tahgio amjed ch ab juhpin tahgio amjed ch wakolim tahgio amjed k am wo dadhaiwua e wehm Jiosh kownaltalig ed.
Kut am d wo si hahaꞌichuk hegam mo hemuch d pi hahaꞌichu. T hegam mo hemuch d si hahaꞌichu d haha wo pi hahaꞌichuk.”
Tsh am ha hekaj haꞌi dada g Palasi k hab kaij ab Jesus wui, “Gam g hu hihm ia amjed nash pi s‑m‑muꞌamk g Herod.”
Sh hab kaij g Jesus ab ha wui, “Herod o sha ban masma ch hab kaij. Him k ahgid mant haꞌas tash am wabsh kia gam hu hab wo i ha junihid g jijawul ch wo ha doajidad g kokꞌodam ch haha wo s‑ap nahto g ni‑chikpan.
Kunt pi wo shaꞌi ni‑muhkid im hu haha wabsh i himadch. Am o waꞌi Jerusalem t am e koꞌijid g Jiosh haꞌichu i tashogiddam.
“Ih, t wo si e shoꞌigch g Jerusalem t am hemajkam nat pi g Jiosh s‑ap wo ha dagito. Ha‑shohshon ash wa ha maꞌichshulig ch muꞌi ha kokda g Jiosh haꞌichu i tashogiddam. T idam am ha oidk hab wo e juh. Muꞌikko ani hab chum si ni‑tahtk mant wo si s‑ap em‑nuhkud hab sha masma mat g chuchul g e‑mahmad ab e wecho wo ha hemapai. M wabshaba pi ab hu tatchua manis hab wo em‑juh.
K eda an hab chuꞌig Jiosh oꞌohana ed mamt ab wo chum ni‑ihmad ch hab wo chechꞌed mat g Jiosh am i ni‑kehsh k si s‑ni‑hoꞌigeꞌid. Kunt ia wo i s‑ap em‑dagito am hugkam mamt hab hahawa masma hab wo e juh.”
Sh hema d uhgchu ch d Palasi ch hebai hab juh g geꞌe gegosig ha‑mihshmda tash ed k ash ab i wai g Jesus. Kutsh am jiwia.
Sh eda an hema haꞌichug g cheoj ch mahniko nash pi g kakhioj ch nohnhoij ge totskoni. Kumsh an si s‑nenꞌoid g Jesus mas wo doaj nash pi ab haꞌichu s‑abchudamk.
Sh hab kaij g Jesus ab ha wui hegam chehanig ha mashchamdam ch Palasi, “Shahchu am ahgch hab elid mo pi t‑hiwgid g t‑chehanig machs wo ha doaj t‑mihshmda tash ed?”
Sh pi hedai has shaꞌi kaij. Tsh g Jesus ab hahawa i wai ihda oꞌodham k doajid k am hahawa dagito. Kutsh gam hu hih.
Sh hab hahawa kaij g Jesus ab ha wui, “Neh, namt hig pi woho ab ha hekaj wo i wuhshad g e‑alidag o chum hems g e‑woiwisga matp am wo sha gei wawhia ch ed, chum as d wo em‑mihshmda tashk?”
Kush pi hedai e nako mas has wo chei.
Kutsh haꞌi hegam ha‑waida gan hu si wehpeg s‑apko dadhaiwua. Kush am ha neid g Jesus ch hab kaij,
“Pi g am hu si s‑apko wo dadhaiwua mamt hekid am wo hihi gegosig wui. Tp hems am hema wo jiwia mat am baꞌich d wo i s‑has haꞌichuk.
Kut am haha wabsh wo jiwia hegai mat ab i em‑wai k hab wo em‑ah mamt wo hiwigi hegai s‑has haꞌichu abai mamt ab chum dahiwua. Kumt wo si e el namt pi hahawa ga hu wabsh si ha oidk wo dahiwua.
“Baꞌich at wo i s‑apꞌek mamt ga hu wabsh mehk wo dahiwua. Kut g kihkam ab wo i him k hab wo em‑ah, ‘Ni‑nawoj, oi g i hihm k ia hu s‑apko ni‑miabidch i dahiwua.’ Neh, t id ab wo em‑mah g si has elida am ha tahgio hegam haꞌi ha‑waida.
“Mt wo pi haꞌichuch hegai mat hedai wo chum si e haꞌichuch k ab wo si haꞌichuch hegai mat wo pi e haꞌichuch.”
Sh hab hahawa ep kaij g Jesus ab wui hegai mat ab i wai, “Pi g hegam ab waꞌi ha waid e‑naipijju o g e‑wepnag o g e‑hajuni o g s‑kakais e‑hugid an kihkam mapt hekid hab wo juh g gegosig. Ab at epai wo i m‑wai idam. Kupt hab masma ab wo bei g e‑namkidadag heg hekaj mapt id hab juh.
Ab g i ha waid g shoꞌigkam ch mamaniko ch pi hihimidkam ch pi neneadam mapt hekid hab wo juh g gegosig.
Pi at wo e nako idam mat wo uhpam m‑namkid. T g Jiosh ab wo m‑mah g s‑kehg m‑mahkigdag mat hekid am wo i ha wuwhas g s‑apꞌekam hemajkam ab muhkig amjed.”
Sh am hema daha g oꞌodham ch kah ihda. Tsh am i haꞌasa neo g Jesus. Sh id ab wui hab kaij, “Ttki wo si s‑hehgigkad, am i wahpk Jiosh kihdag ed, heg wa wepo matt am wo dadhaiwua geꞌe gegosig ch ed.”
Sh hab kaij g Jesus, “Heuꞌu, mamtp woho am wo i wahp. Id o wepo masma matp hems hema hab juh g geꞌe gegosig k muꞌi ab ha waid g hemajkam.
T am i e ai. Kut am hema cheha g e‑pionag. T heg am him k ha‑ahgi mo wehs haꞌichu e nahtokch.
“K wabshaba idam am ahgid mat pi wo e nako mat am wo hihi. “Neh, tp hems hema am wo ahgi, ‘Ha ant nolawt g oidag k heg s‑neidamk ch hekaj pi am hu wo hih.’
“Kutp hems hema am wo ahgi, ‘Wehst‑mahm woiwis ant am ha nolawt k hegam s‑ha aꞌappemimk.’
“Kutp hems hema am wo ahgi, ‘Ha ant hohnt k hekaj pi am hu wo hih.’
“Neh, t am hahawa uhpam hih ihda ha‑pionag k am ahgi g e‑ahmo. T g ahmoj wabsh woho i bagat k hab kaij ab e‑pionag wui, ‘S‑hohtam g am hihm kahya ch ed ch wohg ch ed k ab wo i ha ui g shoꞌigkam ch mamaniko ch pi neneadam ch pi hihimidkam.’
“Kut wa woho hab juh k am hahawa jiwia k hab kaij, ‘Bant juh g m‑chehanig. K wabshaba am wabsh kia wiꞌis g kih.’
“K hab ep kaij g ahmoj, ‘Am g i wuhshani k an mehk hihm chuꞌuchum wopog oidch an shaꞌi ch ed k hab wo ha juh mat ab wo i hihi mat wo shuhd g ni‑kih.
Pi at ab hu i hihi hegam mo d chum si ni‑waida. Kunt pi hema wo shaꞌi hiwigi mas wabsh wo i jeh g ni‑gegosig.’ ”
Sh am hu hebai hihim hegam Jesus. Sh muꞌi hemajkam am ha wehm hihim. Tsh ab i ha nei g Jesus k hab kaij ab ha wui,
“Pi am ab hu shaꞌi ni‑tatchua mamtp pi baꞌich ab wo i ni‑tatchua mam hi g e‑jehj ch e‑wepnag ch e‑wehm kihkam ch e‑aꞌaliga.
Hemho wa amt gam hu wo dagito g hejel hab e‑elida k ahni hab ni‑elida hab wo junihid ch ni‑wehhejed wo e shoꞌigchudad. Id at heg wo wa wepok mam ab mohto g kots ch ab ab wo e muhkid.
“Neh, nat hig pi am hu wo i aꞌamich hegai matp hedai am hema geꞌe wo kiht mas am hi wa ahim lialiga mat wo nahto g e‑kihta?
Mt wo ashad matp am hab wabsh wo juh g shondaj k pi wo e nako mas am hu wo i nahto g e‑kihta.
Kut hab wo e chechꞌed, ‘Ihda oꞌodham at am chum hema i kei g kih k wabshaba pi e nako mat wo nahto.’ Pegih, mt ahpim hab wa masma wo i aꞌamich mams wo e nakog k ab wo ni‑hiwgad.
“Neh, matp hems hema g kownal wo s‑cheggiam g e‑obga k eda al wehst‑mahm mihl (10,000) wo shondaligak. T g obgaj gokko wehst‑mahm mihl (20,000) wo shondaligak ch ab him. T hegai kownal am wo i chum aꞌamich mas hu hi wo wa e nako mat wo cheggia.
Tp hab wo mahsk matki pi wo e nako, t hemho wa am wo haꞌi ha cheha mat ab wo nam hegai hema kownal mat ga hu wabsh kia mehk wo himad k wo s‑mai mas heꞌekia wo i namkid. T pi wo cheggia.
Neh, bo chuꞌig. Kumt ahpim pi wo e nako mamt ab wo ni‑hiwgad, heg hi wa mamt wehs haꞌichu wo dagito am ni‑wehhejed.”
Sh hab ep kaij, “Mt haꞌichu wehhejed wo chum s‑kehgajk hab masma mo g on.
Heg at gam hu wabsh wo s‑e ohhod mat wo sha kahko. Kumt wo s‑e nenꞌoidad namt pi wabsh wo s‑e ohhod mamtp pi haꞌichu wehhejed wo s‑kehgajk. Ab g wo i aꞌamichud ahpim mam kah ihda.”
Sh am hu i hebai, sh muꞌi lial ha kowlantdam ch pi ap hemajkam ab i miabi g Jesus mat ab wo kaiha.
Tsh g Palasi ch chehanig ha mashchamdam ab i s‑babgam neneok k hab kaij, “Ihda oꞌodham o wabsh s‑ap ab ha neid g pi ap hemajkam ch ha wehm e gegosid.”
Tsh heg hekaj am ha ahgi ihda haꞌichu wepogida ahga, hab kaijch:
“Id o wepo masma mamtp hems hema ahpim siant wo kahwaligak. Kut hema wo heb hu hih. Namt hig pi am wo ha dagito hegam humukto gamai humukt kolhai ch ed k am wo i gahghi hegai hema am hugkam mamt wo chehg
k an haha wo kushwiot k hih uhpam
k ab wo i ha wai g e‑naipijju. T am wo i e hemapai. Kumt hab wo ha ah, ‘Si g wo s‑hehgigk ni‑wehm. Cheh ant g ni‑shoiga mat chum heb hu hih.’ Kut am em‑wehm wo si s‑hehgigk.
Pegih, t hab wa masma d wo si s‑hehgigk an eda g Jiosh kihdag chum hems hemako em‑wehhejed mamt gam hu wo s‑ohhod g pi ap e‑chegitoi. Kum eda haꞌi hejel hab chum e elid mam d s‑apꞌekam hemajkam ch pi tatchua mams gam hu wo s‑ohhod g pi ap e‑chegitoi.”
Kush id am ep ha ahgid g Jesus ch hab kaij, “Matp hema g uwi wehst‑mahm wo enigak g lial ch hema wo heb hu wua. Tp hems wo mehi g e‑lahmpa k an wo i wosu g e‑kih k an wo i gahghi am hugkam mat wo chehg
k ab haha wo i ha wai g e‑naipijju. T am wo i e hemapai. T hab wo ha ah, ‘Si g wo s‑hehgigk ni‑wehm. Cheh ant g ni‑lialiga mant chum heb hu wua.’ Kut am wehmaj wo si s‑hehgigk.
Pegih, t hab wa masma wo si s‑hehgigk g anghil chum hems hemako em‑wehhejed mamt gam hu wo s‑ohhod g pi ap e‑chegitoi.”
Sh hab ep kaij g Jesus, “Matp hems hema g oꞌodham gohk wihpiopga.
T g chumchu ab wui i him k hab kaij, ‘Ni‑ohg, wapt wo i ni‑mah hegai mat d wo chum ni‑wuikamk.’ Kut wa woho am i gawulkai g e‑eniga k ab ha mah g e‑wihpiopga hegai mo haschu d ha‑wuikam.
“T ihda chumchu am ha hekaj gagda g e‑eniga k bei g namkigaj k gam hu simnolt mehk jewed wui k am heki wua g e‑lialiga am hab wuadch g pi apꞌekam.
T am i huhug g lialigaj. T am hahawa gei geꞌe bihugig. K ihda simnoltdam pi haꞌichu edgid mas wo huh.
K am hahawa hema chikpanachud e‑oidag ed mat wo ha nuhkud g kokji.
Kut chum hems heg s‑hugim mo haschu g kokji koꞌa. T pi hedai haꞌichu mah mas wo huh.
“T am hahawa haꞌichu kop moꞌoj ed. K hab e ahg, Wehs g ni‑ohg pionag o s‑edgid g haꞌichu hugi. Kuni eda ahni d bihugimkam.
Nt hig wo uhpam hih ni‑ohg wui k hab wo chei, ‘Ni‑ohg, pi ant ap has chuꞌi ab m‑wui ch ab Jiosh wui.
K hahawa pi d ni‑wuikam mams hab wo ni‑aꞌagad mani d m‑alidag. Chum anis hems d wabsh wo m‑pionagk.’
“Neh, t am ha hekaj i wuhshani k am wui hih g e‑ohg. T heg cheh mo im hu wabsh kia him k ab si s‑hoꞌigeꞌid k ab wui med k gan hu kohm k ab chintad.
“K ab wui hab kaij g alidaj, ‘Ni‑ohg, pi ant ap has chuꞌi am m‑wui ch am Jiosh wui. K hahawa pi d ni‑wuikam mams hab wo ni‑aꞌagad mani d m‑alidag.’
“T wabshaba g ohgaj hab wabsh ha ah g e‑pionag, ‘Ab g wo i bek g s‑kehg eniga k an wo wahkid k g anilo an wo shaꞌich nowij an k g shuhshk ab ep wo cheka
k wo mua g s‑gihg wisilo. Kutt hab wo juh g geꞌe gegosig k wo si s‑hehgigk.
Uhpam at ep jiwia ihda ni‑alidag mat gam hu mehk hih. Id o heg wa wepo mat muh k ep e chegito.’ Neh, t wa woho hab e juh g si geꞌe s‑hehgig.
“K eda gam hu chikpan g geꞌechu alidaj oidag ch ed ch pihhun k ab hih. K eda si s‑hehgig ch neꞌed ch keihin.
Kut kah k ab hema kakke g pion mas has d ahga ihda.
“K heg hab kaij, ‘M‑wehnag at jiwia. Kumt mua g s‑gihg wisilo k hab juh g geꞌe gegosig nat pi s‑ap jiwia.’
“Neh, t bagat ihda geꞌechu k pi am hu i wah. T am hahawa kah g ohgaj k am i wuhshani k am wabsh s‑ap ab chum waid.
K wabshaba ab wui hab kaij, ‘Nehꞌe, haꞌakia aꞌahidag ani ab m‑wecho ch chum hekid hab wua g m‑tatchui. Kupt eda pi hekid chum hems g siwat mad ab ni‑mah mant wo ni‑gegosid k wo s‑hehgigk am ha wehm g ni‑naipijju.
T wabshaba ia jiwia ihda m‑alidag mat hedai heki wua g m‑kihdag ha wehm g chechpaꞌawi. Kupt muꞌij g s‑gihg wisilo.’
“K g ohgaj ab wui hab kaij, ‘Ni‑alidag, ahpi ap chum hekid ni‑wehmaj. K wehs hegai mo d ni‑eniga d m‑eniga.
K wabshaba hemu am wa s‑apꞌe matt wo si s‑hehgigk nat pi uhpam ep jiwia ihda m‑wehnag mat am simnolt. Heg o wa wepo mat muh k ep e chegito,’ bo kaij g ohgaj.”
Sh am ep ha ahgid g Jesus ihda wepogida ahga ch hab kaij, “Tp hems am hu hebai hema d wo s‑kais oꞌodhamk. K hegai mat am i kei mo d maliom wabsh heki wua g lialigaj.
T am i wai e wui k hab kaij, ‘Am ant haꞌichu sha naksh ab m‑amjed k antki hekaj hab wo chei mapt am wo i kuint k am wo oꞌoha wehs map has i masma nuhkud g haꞌichu ni‑eniga nantki pi wo m‑dagito.’
“T hab i e ah ihda oꞌodham, ‘Tki wo i ni‑wuhshad g ni‑ahmo. Nis has wo ni‑juh? Pi ant wo ni‑nako manis wo waikkat k si ni‑elid manis wo haꞌichu ha tahnid.
Neh, s‑mahch ani mantki has wo ni‑juh k muꞌi wo naipijjuk. T idam ab wo i ni‑wahki e‑kihki ed mamt hekid wo i ni‑wuhshad id amjed ni‑chikpan.’
Bo kaij ch am hahawa hehemako ha waid hegam mo ab ab e wulshch g ahmoj. Kut am hema jiwia. K g maliom ab wui hab kaij, ‘Nap s‑mahch map heꞌekia ab ab i e wulshch g t‑ahmo?’
“K hab kaij ihda, ‘Heuꞌu, hemako siant waplin g a‑saidi ani ab ab ni‑wulshch.’ “K hab kaij hegai maliom, ‘Ab ant wo i huduni. Pt am waꞌi hetaspo wehst‑mahm waplin ab ab wo e wulshch.’ “T gam hu hih hegai. Kut am hema ep jiwia.
“K g maliom ab wui hab kaij, ‘Nap s‑mahch map heꞌekia ab ab i e wulshch g t‑ahmo?’ “K hab kaij ihda, ‘Hemako mihl kokstal g pilkani.’ “K hab kaij hegai maliom, ‘Ab ant wo i huduni. Pt am waꞌi gigiꞌik siant kokstal ab ab wo e wulshch.’
“Neh, t g ahmoj si has i el am i kahk mat has e juh ihda s‑chu banmadamkam maliom nat pi si s‑e mahch k hab e juh. Neh, hegam mo pi mahch g Jiosh o em‑baꞌich i s‑e mahch ch hab wua haꞌichu.
“Id ani em‑ahgid mamt wo s‑ap hekaj g e‑kaisdag am ha wehhejed hegam mo tatchua g i wehmtadag. T g Jiosh s‑ap am wo i em‑wahpki e‑kihdag ed mamt hekid wo muh.
“Hegai matp hedai s‑ap wo nuhkud g al chuꞌuchum haꞌichu at hab waꞌap s‑ap wo nuhkud g geꞌeged haꞌichu. Kutp hedai wo ha banmad g al chuꞌuchum haꞌichukaj k hab waꞌap wo ha banmad g geꞌeged haꞌichukaj.
Am g wo s‑ap nuhkudad hegai mam haschu em‑nuhkudachud id dahm jewed. T g Jiosh am wo haꞌichu em‑nuhkudach e‑kownaltalig ed. Heg o d s‑wohom kaisdag
ch d wo em‑enigak mamtp wo s‑ap nuhkud hegai mam haschu em‑nuhkudachud id dahm jewed.
“Pion at pi wo e nako mat gohk wo aꞌamok. Hema at baꞌich ab wo i tatchuad ch baꞌich i s‑ap wo chikpanidad. Kumt ahpim hab waꞌap pi wo shaꞌi e nako mams wepo ab wo ha tatchuad g Jiosh ch ihda jewed dahm s‑kaistalig.”
Sh am haꞌi kah g Palasi wehs ihda. K eda g Palasi si pihk e elid g s‑kaisdagkaj. Kush idam heg hekaj nahnko ahg g Jesus.
Sh hab kaij g Jesus ab ha wui, “Ahpim am hab chum e wua mam d s‑apꞌekam am ha tahgio g hemajkam. K wabshaba g Jiosh s‑mahch g em‑iꞌibdag. Hegai mo haschu i g hemajkam hab chum elid mo d si haꞌichu o d wabsh pi haꞌichu am Jiosh nena ed.
“Mosesbad ch hegam haꞌi kekelibad Jiosh haꞌichu i tashogiddam at an oꞌoha mamt has wo chum masmak. Kumt id wo chum hekaj am hugkam mat ab i wuhsh hegai John mo em‑pahl wapkonahim. K am i amjed ihda s‑kehg haꞌichu ahga ab amjed g Jiosh kownaltalig am e ahgahim. K wabsh chum hedai am chum e nakog mat am wo i wah.
T wabshaba pi wabsh wo huhug hegai chehanig. Baꞌich at wo i pi hasigk mat g dahm kahchim ch jewed wo huhug.
“Dat wo pi ap chuꞌijkamk hegai matp hedai wo s‑ohhod g e‑wehm kihkam k hema ep wo bei. K hab waꞌap wua g pi apꞌekam hegai matp hedai an wo bei g ha‑ohhoda.”
Sh id am ep ha ahgid g Jesus: “Tp hems hema d shaꞌi si s‑kais oꞌodham ch chum hekid g si s‑namkig eniga ab wahpkch ch wehs tashkaj si s‑kakaisim kihdag.
K am hema d si shoꞌigkam oꞌodham ch hab chehgig Lazarus ch wehsko hihiwog. Kum ab i bebhe ch ab dadsha s‑kais oꞌodham kihjego.
hab elidch mat heꞌes haꞌichu wo al huh mo ab i shulig s‑kais oꞌodham mihsa t ab. K g gogogs ab winikon g hihiwdaj.
“T am i muh ihda shoꞌigkam oꞌodham. T g anghil am i be k an uꞌapa anai mam am ha nuhkud g s‑apꞌekam. “Kut g s‑kais oꞌodham hab waꞌap muh. Kumt ged hu cheh.
T am i e chegito k oki am haꞌichug mo am kuhkpi g pi apꞌekam ch shaꞌi si s‑koꞌok haꞌichu tahtk ch ab i nea e dahm. K g Lazarusbad ab wehmaj daha g t‑shohshon Abraham.
K ihda s‑kais oꞌodham ab si s‑kaidam hab kaij, ‘Ni‑shohshon, Abraham, geꞌe s‑koꞌok ani nakog id eda mehi. Ab g si i s‑ni‑hoꞌigeꞌid k ab wo cheha g Lazarus mat am wo wahki g e‑nowi shuhdagi ch ed k ab wo i him k ab wo iawua ni‑nehni ab.’
“K wabshaba hab kaij g Abrahambad, ‘Ni‑hajuni, am g i chegito map wa in d doakam ch wehs haꞌichu s‑kehg edgid. K wa g Lazarus d wabsh si shoꞌigkam ch wabshaba hemuch ab si s‑ap e tahtk iia. Kup ahpi g s‑koꞌok tahtk.
Gamai wa baꞌich o an ge sꞌtadani ch s‑juhk hiktani an t‑tahgio. Kutt pi wo t‑nako machs hedai am gahi wo i chesh em‑wui o mamt ahpim ab gahi wo i chesh t‑wui.’
“K hab kaij g s‑kais oꞌodham, ‘Pegih, ni‑shohshon, am ani hetasp wepnag. K idam am wabsh kia d dodakam ch am kih ni‑ohgbad kih am. Ab g si i s‑ni‑hoꞌigeꞌid k am wo cheha g Lazarus mat am wo him k am wo ha shohbi. T pi ia hu haꞌab wo dada mo ia g s‑koꞌok e tahtk.’
<range>
“K hab kaij g Abrahambad, ‘M‑wepnag o edgid g Moses oꞌohana ch Jiosh haꞌichu i tashogiddam ha‑oꞌohana. T heg am wo ha shohbi matp ab wo kaiha.’
“K hab hahawa ep kaij g s‑kais oꞌodham, ‘Ni‑shohshon, Abraham, pi at woho ab wo kaiha. Pt wabshaba hema hab wo sha juh mat ep wo e chegito. T ab wo kaiham k gm hu wo s‑ohhod g pi ap e‑chegitoi.’
“K hab kaij g Abrahambad, ‘Pi o ab hu kaiham g Moses oꞌohana ch Jiosh haꞌichu i tashogiddam ha‑oꞌohana. K am wa tasho mat hab waꞌap pi ab hu wo wohoch hegai matp hems ep wo e chegito.’ Neh, bo kaij ch am dagito.”
Sh hab hahawa ep kaij g Jesus ab ha wui hegam mash ab hiwig, “Chum o hekid haꞌichu hab e wua mamtp hems heg hekaj am wo i shul pi apꞌekam ch ed. T wabshaba s‑koꞌokam wo e namkid hegai mat hab wo em‑juh mamt am wo i shul.
Baꞌich at wo i s‑apꞌek wehhejed matp hems wo e wachumchud k wo e mua. T hab pi am hu wo ha shul g al ni‑wohochuddam pi apꞌekam ch ed.
Am g wo s‑e nenꞌoidad! “Mt wo ahgi g e‑wehm wohochuddam matp pi ap wo chuꞌi ab em‑wui. Kutp hems ab s‑ap wo em‑kaiham k gam hu wo s‑ohhod g pi ap e‑chegitoi. Kumt ab wo i s‑hoꞌigeꞌel.
Tp hems muꞌikko hab wo juh g pi apꞌekam ab em‑wui hemako tash ed. Mt wabshaba chum hekid ab wo i s‑hoꞌigeꞌel mat hekid gam hu wo s‑ohhod g pi ap e‑chegitoi k ab wo em‑tai g hoꞌigeꞌelig.”
Sh hab kaij g Jesus chuhchai ab wui, “T‑kownalig, ab g i geꞌedajid g t‑wohochudadag.”
Kush hab kaij g Jesus, “Pi am tatchua g geꞌe wohochudadag. Wehs at hab wo e juh hegai mamt hab wo cheꞌe k wo s‑wohoch mat hab wo e juh. Mtp hems am wo ahgi ihda gohi uhs mat wo e huhpshan k ged hu wo e ei ge shuhdagi ch ed. Kut wa woho hab wo e juh.”
Sh g Jesus am haꞌichu ha wepogid ch hab kaij, “Pi o ab hu shaꞌi ab g ha‑ahmo mas wo ha hihidol g e‑pionag, chum as hegam ge tash oidam am chikpan oidag ch ed.
Pion at wo hihidol g e‑ahmo k wo gegosid k hahawa hejel wo e gegos.
Ab o ha ab mat am hab wo wa juh hegai mo haschu am hab i ha chehani. Kut pi hab wo chum el mas ab wo ha hoꞌigeꞌel.
Pegih, bo wa masma am em‑wehhejed. Wehs amt haꞌichu am hab wo juh mo haschu ab i em‑chehani g Jiosh k hab wabsh wo e ahgad mam d wabsh pion ch am hab wabsh juh g e‑chikpan.”
Sh am wabsh kia hihim hegam Jesus Jerusalem wui ch am hihi ha shahgid g Samaria chekshani ch Galilee chekshani.
Sh am hema d al kihhim. Kush am haꞌi dadha jeg ed nash pi kokꞌo heg hekaj mo g ha chuhkug muhkhim ch chum pi ha doajig. Tsh am i chum wahp hegam Jesus mash em kihjeg g kolhai. Tsh idam kokꞌodam am cheh g Jesus k i wahpamig k d wehst‑mahm ch am nam k ga hu wabsh mehk gegok
ch amjed s‑kaidam hab kaij, “Jesus, t‑kownalig, ab g i s‑t‑hoꞌigeꞌid.”
Sh ab ha neid g Jesus ch hab kaij, “Gamai g wo hihim k ab wo e‑chehgi papal ha wui.” Tsh am heꞌes i hihim k s‑mai matki ha doda.
Kutsh hema ab uhpam i hih am i s‑mahchk mat doa k ab si ihm g Jiosh si s‑kaidam
k atsh am si gei jewed dahm ab Jesus wecho k ab si hoꞌigeꞌel. Kush eda ihda pi d Tuhligo ch d wabsh Samaria t am oꞌodham.
Kush hab kaij g Jesus, “A nant pi woho wehst‑mahm oꞌodham ha dodaj.
T eda al hemako ia uhpam jiwia k ab hoꞌigeꞌel g Jiosh k d wabsh goꞌol oꞌodham.
Kekiwuani k gamai hihm. Ab ap ni‑hiwig ch heg hekaj doa.”
Sh haꞌi g Palasi hab si kaij ab wui g Jesus, “A pt hekid hig am wo i t‑chehgi ihda Jiosh kownaltalig map an ahgachug?” Kush hab kaij ab ha wui, “Pi amt g e‑wuhpuikaj wo nei g Jiosh kownaltalig
mams hab wo chei, ‘Ia o haꞌichug’ o ‘Gd o hu haꞌab haꞌichug.’ K eda am em‑shahgid.”
Sh amjed hab kaij hegam ha wui mash ab si wecho e mashcham, “Ab o him g tash mamt wo chum tatchuad mant ia wo em‑wehmajk chum hems hemako tash ab ahni Jiosh si Kehsha. Nt wabshaba pi ia hu wo haꞌichugk.
Haꞌi at hab wo kaijjid ‘Gad g hu wo neid g Jiosh si Kehsha’ o ‘Ia g hu wo neid.’ Mt wabshaba pi am hu wo i ni‑gahghi.
Wehsko ant wo ni‑chehgi mant hekid ep wo jiwia jewed dahm hab sha masma mat g wepgi s‑masma an gahi wo kekiwua chewagi ch ed.
Nt wabshaba hemu muꞌi wo ni‑shoꞌigch. T pi ab hu wo ni‑tatchua idam hemajkam aiꞌi idani.”
Kush hab ep kaij g Jesus, “Bat wo masmak mant hekid ep wo jiwia mash wa hab chuꞌig eda mash g Noahbad in d doakam.
Hemajkam ash wa gam ha wabsh i si nenead ch e gegosid ch ihꞌed ch e hohont ch gam hu wabsh i pi chegito g Jiosh. T haha wabsh e ai g tash mat hegam Noahbad am i wahp geꞌe wahlko ch ed. Kut mel g shuhdagi k ha wiꞌin k wehs ha kokda.
“Bat ep wo masmak mash wa hab masma mash wa g Lotbad in d doakam. Wehsijj ash gam hu wabsh i si nenead ch e gegosid ch ihꞌed ch haꞌichu ha nolawt ch haꞌichu gagda ch haꞌichu eꞌesha ch kihkit.
Kutsh wa g Lotbad ab i wuhsh Sodom kihhim t amjed. Tsh g mei ch haꞌichu s‑mehidkam ab ha dahmjed i e iawua hab sha masma mo g juhki. Kutsh wehs e kokda.
“Bat wo wa masmak heg i tash mant am wo i ni‑maskogi.
Kut pi hedai am hu wo shaꞌi chum i wah e‑kih ed mat am wo haꞌichu ui, chum as hems imhab wo waꞌi oimmedad e‑kih wehgaj o am wo chikpanad oidag ch ed.
Pi at chum hems wo s‑huwi g e‑kihdag. Batsh wa e juh g Lotbad hohnigbad k hekaj e muhkid.
Bat wa masma wo heb hu wua g e‑doakag hegai matp hedai wo chum s‑huwidad g e‑doakag hejel e wehhejed. T wabshaba wo doꞌibia g e‑doakag hegai matp hedai wo hekaj ni‑wehhejed.
Tp hems gohk am wo kohkshad e‑kih ed ch hema gam hu wo i e be k hema am wo wih mant hekid ep wo jiwia.
Gohk uꞌuwi atp hems am e wehm wo chuꞌad g pilkani. T hema gam hu wo i e be k hema am wo e wuiok. [
Gohk oꞌodham at am wo oiopod oidag ch ed. T hema gm hu wo i e be k hema am wo e wuiok.]”
Sh hab kaij g chuhchaij ab wui, “A t hebai hab wo i e juh ihda?” Sh hab kaij g Jesus, “Am at wo tashok mat hebai hab e juh. Namt hig pi wo mahchk mat hebai wo kahchk g muhki am neidch mo am e hemapadch g nunuwi? Pegih, mt hab waꞌap wo s‑ap s‑mahchk mat hebai hab wo i e juh ihda mani em‑ahgid.
“Chum amt hekid wo e hoꞌigeꞌidahunad am Jiosh wui ch pi hekid wo dagito,” bash kaij g Jesus ch am hahawa ha ahgid ihda haꞌichu wepogida ahga:
“Tp hems am hebai hema d usagakam ch wabshaba pi ab hu has elid g Jiosh ch pi ab hu ha haꞌichuchud g hemajkam.
T am wui hema jiwia g hejel wiꞌikam uwi k ab tai mat am wo i wehmt namsh pi s‑lodaitamk. T pi ab hu wohog el. K wabshaba id chum hekid ab wui jijiwhia. “Kut hab i e ah g usagakam, ‘Chum ani hi wa pi ab hu has elid g Jiosh ch pi ab hu ha haꞌichuchud g hemajkam.
<range>
K wabshaba shaꞌi si ni‑kudut ihda uwi ch wo am hu ni‑gewkoch pi ni‑dagitok. Nt heg hekaj am hab wo juni hegai mo ab ni‑chehani.’ ”
Sh hab hahawa ep kaij g Jesus, “Neh, bat wo ha juni g pi apꞌekam usagakam hegai mo haschu chum hekid ab tahni.
Pegih, bamt wa masma chum hekid ab wo tahnid g Jiosh g i wehmtadag.
Kut s‑hohtam am wo i apꞌech haꞌichu am em‑wehhejed. T eda muꞌi am wo e chehgi mo pi woho ab hu ni‑hiwig mant hekid ia ep wo jiwia jewed dahm.”
Haꞌi ash hab e elid g hemajkam mo d s‑apꞌekam ch eda hab ha elid haꞌi ehp mo d pi apꞌekam. Sh g Jesus am ha ahgid ihda haꞌichu wepogida ahga:
“Neh, gohk oꞌodham at am hihi geꞌe cheopi wui mat wo e hoꞌigeꞌidahu. K hema d Palasi
ch am hejelko kehk ch am e hoꞌigeꞌidahun ch hab kaij, ‘Ab ani si m‑hoꞌigeꞌid, Jiosh, mani pi s‑banma ch pi hekid haꞌichu ha iattogid ch pi am hu hab junihim g s‑uam haꞌichu hab masma mo chum hedai hab e junihim. Ab ani m‑hoꞌigeꞌid mani pi hab masma mo hegai pi ap ha kowlantdam m an kehk.
Gohk tash ani ni‑hoꞌigeꞌidahun ch pi haꞌichu koꞌa domig ed ch ab m‑mahk g hemako tahpani mo wehst‑mahm e tahpanch mani heꞌes haꞌichu ab i neid.’ Neh, bo wa masma e haschud g Palasi.
“K wabshaba hegai hema ga hu wabsh mehk kehk ch pi e nako mas ab wo uhgk i nea dahm kahchim wui no pi si e shoꞌigchud. Id o hab kaij, ‘Jiosh, ab g si i s‑ni‑hoꞌigeꞌid ahni pi apꞌekam hemajkam.’ Neh, bo kaij hegai hema.
“Kunt wo em‑ahgi mat id am i apꞌech g Jiosh e tahgio. T s‑ap e taht k hih uhpam. T g Jiosh pi am hu i apꞌech hegai Palasi. Do wohokam mat g Jiosh wo haꞌichuch hegai mat hedai hejel pi wo e haꞌichuch k wo pi haꞌichuch hegai mat hejel wo chum e‑haꞌichuch.”
Sh haꞌi g oꞌodham am ha uꞌapa g al chuꞌuchum aꞌal Jesus wui mat ab wo ha taht. Kush g chuhchaij ha neid ch chum s‑ha kehꞌid mo hab e wua.
Tsh wabshaba g Jesus ab i ha wai g aꞌal k hab kaij ab ha wui g e‑chuhchai, “Ab g wabsh wo i ha hiwgid g aꞌal mat ab wo i hihi ni‑wui k pi an hu wo shaꞌi ha shohbi. Am at wabsh s‑moimam wo i wahp Jiosh kownaltalig ed ab ni‑hiwigch.
Nt wo si shel em‑ahgi mamt hab waꞌi masma wo i wahp.”
Kush hema g Tutuligo ha wanimeddam ab kakke g Jesus ch hab kaij, “Ha mashchamdam map d s‑apꞌekam, shahchu ant am hab wo juh mant ab wo bei g pi ha huhugedam doakag?”
Sh hab kaij g Jesus, “Pi ap mahch map haschu ahgch hab ni‑aꞌaga mani d s‑apꞌekam. Heg o waꞌi Jiosh d s‑apꞌekam. Kup pi woho mahch mani hedai wud.
S‑ha ap mahch idam chehanig mo hab chuꞌig: Pi g am hu ha ehsidad g ha‑wehm kihkam. Pi g am hu ha muaꞌi g oꞌodham. Pi g am hu haꞌichu ha ehsidad. Pi g am hu haꞌichu ha iattogidad. Ab g si has ha elidad g e‑ohg ch e‑jeꞌe.” Neh, bash kaij g Jesus.
Sh hab kaij ihda oꞌodham, “Wehs ihda ani hab junihim ged hu i ni‑alijk amjed.”
Tsh am i kah g Jesus ihda k hab kaij ab wui, “Hemako haꞌichu o am wiꞌis mapt am hab wo juh. Wehs apt wo gagda map haschu i edgid k wo ha mah g namkigaj g shoꞌigkam k ab wo i ni‑oid k am wo ni‑wehmajk. Bapt masma wo edgidad g s‑kaistalig an dahm kahchim ch ed.”
Tsh si pi ap e taht ihda oꞌodham am i kaiok nash pi d shaꞌi si s‑kais ch si s‑huwid g s‑e‑kaisdag.
Tsh am i nei g Jesus mo pi ap e tahtk k hab kaij, “Shaꞌat waꞌi si s‑kawkam wo i wahp Jiosh kownaltalig ed hegam mo d s‑kakais.
Nam hig hab elid mat wo e nako g ka‑mihyo mas am wo gahi wuhsh hoꞌipad jeg ed. Pegih, t hab wa masma pi wo e nako hegam mo hiwig g haꞌichu e‑eniga mas am wo i wahp Jiosh kownaltalig ed.”
Sh hab kaij idam, “A t hedai wo e nako mat wo e doꞌibia.”
Sh g Jesus hab kaij, “Pi at hedai wo e nako mas hejel wo e doꞌibia. T wabshaba g Jiosh wo e nako mat wo ha doꞌibia.”
Sh g Peter hab kaij, “Neh, ahchim att am i dagito g t‑kihdag matt wo i m‑oi.”
Sh hab kaij g Jesus ab ha wui, “Woho amt hab e juh. Kunt am wo em‑ahgi mat g Jiosh baꞌich i geꞌe haꞌichu ab wo em‑mah ia jewed dahm ahpim mamt hedai wo dagito g e‑kihdag o g e‑wehm kihkam o g e‑wepnag o g e‑jehj o g e‑aꞌaliga wehhejed g Jiosh kownaltalig. T am i dahm g pi ha huhugedam apꞌedag ab wo em‑mah e‑kihdag ed.”
<range>
Kutsh am hejelko i ha ui hegam gamai gohk e‑chuhchai k hab kaij ab ha wui, “Neh, am att wo hihi Jerusalem wui. T am hab wo e juh am ni‑tahgio hegai mo wa g kekelibad Jiosh haꞌichu i tashogiddam an oꞌohan ab ni‑amjed.
Am amt wo i ni‑dagito ha wui g gawul mahs hemajkam. T hegam wo nahnko ni‑ahgad ch ab wo ni‑siswuimad
ch wo ni‑gewittan k hahawa wo ni‑mua. Nt wabshaba ep wo ni‑chegito mat d wo i waik tashk amjed.”
Kush wabshaba pi shaꞌi amichud mas haschu hab ahg g Jesus. Heg o wa wepo mo e eꞌestokch g haꞌichu ahgaj.
Sh am hihim hegam Jesus miabidch g Jerico. Sh g pi neadam am hema daha wohg hugid an ch haꞌichu ha nead.
Kutsh an bihbij. Sh id ha kah ch ab ha kakke mas haschu an has e wua.
Kumsh hab ahgid, “An o him hegai Jesus mo ab Nazareth t amjed.”
Sh am si s‑kaidam hab kaij, “Jesus, ab g si i s‑ni‑hoꞌigeꞌid, ahpi map d t‑kownaligbad David amjedkam.”
Sh hegam mash am baꞌich hihim g Jesus si s‑kehꞌid ch hab ahg mat wo pi shahmuni. Kush wabshaba haha wabsh baꞌich i s‑kaidam hab kaij, “Ab g si i s‑ni‑hoꞌigeꞌid, ahpi Davidbad amjedkam.”
Tsh am hahawa i kekiwua g Jesus k ha chehani mat ab wo i e bek g pi neadam oꞌodham. Tsh am i jiwia. Sh hab kaij g Jesus ab wui,
“Shahchu ant hab wo m‑juni?” Sh hab kaij ihda, “Ni‑kownalig, chum ani tatchua mant ep wo haꞌichu neidad.”
Sh hab kaij g Jesus, “Haꞌichu g neid. Doa apt nap pi ab ni‑hiwig.”
Tsh am ha hekaj wabsh s‑ap haꞌichu neid k ab si i hoꞌigeꞌel g Jiosh k gam hu i oi g Jesus. Tsh am i nei g muꞌi hemajkam ihda k wehsijj ab si ihm g Jiosh.
Tsh am dada hegam Jesus Jerico t am k am wabsh gahi wo wuwha.
Sh am hema chum si s‑neidamk g Jesus ch d uhgchu lial kowlantdam ch d si s‑kais ch ash hab chehgig Zackias.
Sh wabshaba shaꞌi muꞌij g hemajkam. Kush eda al shopolk ihda ch pi ap neid
ch hekaj gam hu ha baꞌich meh g hemajkam k an i chesh uhs t an.
Tsh am i ai g Jesus mo an da k ash an uhgk i neid k hab kaij ab wui, “S‑hohtam g ab i huduni, Zackias. Ab ant wo jiwia m‑kih am.”
Kutsh ha hekaj ab i hud g Zackias k si s‑hehgig ch ab i wahki e‑kih ed.
Kush wehsijj g hemajkam si s‑juꞌujpij neneok ch hab kaij, “Ihda oꞌodham atki am wo i dahiwua heg kih am mo d wabsh pi ap hemajkam.”
Tsh am i kekiwua g Zackias k hab kaij ab Jesus wui, “Nehꞌe, eda hugkam ant wo ha mah g shoꞌigkam g haꞌichu ni‑eniga k uhpam ep wo ha namkid giꞌikko e dahm mantp heꞌes i ha banmad.”
Sh hab kaij g Jesus ab wui, “Id o am chehgidch map wepo wohochudadag mo g t‑shohshon Abraham ch hekaj e doꞌibia id i tash ab.
Id ant hekaj ia jiwia jewed dahm ahni Jiosh si Kehsha mant an wo i ha gahghim k wo ha doꞌibia g pi ap chuꞌijkam.” Neh, bash kaij g Jesus.
Pi ash shaꞌi tash matsh gam hu wo dada idam Jesus Jerusalem t am. Kush hab e ahg g hemajkam mat si e ai mat am wo i wuhsh g Jiosh kownaltalig. Tsh heg hekaj am ha ahgi g Jesus ihda haꞌichu wepogida ahga
k hab kaij: “Hema o d sha s‑has haꞌichu id eda haꞌichu ni‑ahga. Kum am waid mehk jewed amjed mamt wo kownalch.
T pi koi him k ab i ha wai g wehst‑mahm e‑pionag k wehsijj g hemako ohla lial ab i ha mahkhi mat wo hekaj k am wo i muꞌidaj mat am wo i hih.
K eda muꞌijj pi hohhoꞌid g wehmaj oꞌodham ch am haꞌi i e chuhcha mat am wo hihim k hab wo chei mo pi hohhoꞌid mat d wo ha‑kownaligk ihda oꞌodham.
“Kumt wa woho hab juh hegai s‑has haꞌichu oꞌodham mamt kownalch. T am i uhpam jiwia k am ha hekaj ha wai hegam e‑pionag mat am wo dada k am wo e ah mat heꞌekia i dahm nahto g lial heg amjed mat wa ab ha mah.
“K g wehpegkam hab kaij am jiwiak, ‘Ni‑kownalig, wehst‑mahm lial ant nahto am dahm hegai hemako mapt ni‑mah.’
“K hab kaij g ahmoj, ‘S‑ap apt hab e juh k d si s‑wagimakam ni‑pionag. Bant wo m‑juh mapt wehst‑mahm kihhim wo nuhkud napt pi s‑ap nuhkud g al chuꞌuchum haꞌichu.’
“K hema ep hab epai kaij am jiwiak. ‘Ni‑kownalig, hetasp lial ant nahto am dahm hegai hemako mapt ni‑mah.’
“K id hab ahg g ahmoj, ‘Bant wo m‑juh mapt hetasp kihhim wo nuhkud.’
“K hema ep hab epai kaij am jiwiak. ‘Ni‑kownalig, m ia kahch g m‑lialiga. Gd ant hu si wuh pa‑nihda ch ed k ged hu si ehsto.
S‑m‑ehbid ani heg hekaj map s‑ta keꞌidama. Am ap wabsh uꞌu hegai map haschu pi chikpan ch am bahbhiam hegai haꞌichu bahidag mo pi d m‑esha.’
“K hab kaij g ahmoj ab wui, ‘Hegai map has i kaij ant hab masma wo m‑mohtoꞌi g chuꞌijig, ahpi s‑padmakam pion. S‑mahch apki mani s‑ta keꞌidama ch wabsh uꞌu hegai mani haschu pi chikpan ch ab i bahbhiam hegai haꞌichu bahidag mo pi d ni‑esha.
Pegih neh, pt haschu ahgk pi am hu cheh g ni‑lialiga wahnko ch ed mant ab uhpam wo ui wehnadk hegai mat haschu ab mahmadt.’
k hab hahawa kaij ab ha wui hegam mo am gegok, ‘Gam g wo si wohppoꞌid hegai lial k heg wo mah mat g wehst‑mahm lial nahto.’
“K hab kaij idam ab wui, ‘T‑kownalig, heki o hu wehst‑mahm lialiga.’
“Sh hab kaij ab ha wui, ‘Pi at has e juh nat pi baꞌich haꞌichu ab ep wo i nei hegai mat s‑ap wo nuhkud g e‑nuhkuda. T wabshaba wo e wohppoꞌidach mo heꞌes al i chum nuhkud hegai mat pi ap wo nuhkud.
Kumt ab wo i ha uꞌu k wo ha kokda am ni‑tahgio hegam ni‑obga mo chum pi tatchua mant d wo ha‑kownaligk,’ bo kaij g ha‑ahmo id eda haꞌichu ni‑ahga.”
Kutsh gam hu hahawa hihi idam Jesus Jerusalem wui. Sh g Jesus am ha baꞌich him.
Kush gohk al kihhimag ch hab chehgig Bethphage ch Bethany ch ab hugidaj ab g Olive Uꞌus Kawulk. Tsh gohk am ha cheha g e‑chuhchai
k hab ha ahg, “Am g wo hihim heg wui kihhim m am mia kehk k am wo i wahp. T am wo hema e wulshch g wechij wuhlu mat koi shaꞌi e chesh. Id amt wo wulꞌok k ab wo i wanim.
Kutp hema wo sha em‑kakke mams haschu ahgk wulꞌo, mt hab wo ah mani ahni em‑mashchamdam tatchua.”
Kutsh wa woho am hihi hegam gohk. Kutsh hab masma hab e juh mash hab ha ahgid g Jesus.
Kush am wupulꞌok hegai wuhlu. Sh hab kaij g enigakam mas haschu ahgk am wulꞌo.
Sh hab kaij hegam, “T‑mashchamdam o tatchua.” Kutsh ha hiwigi.
Tsh gam hu i wanim g wuhlu Jesus wui k an toa g e‑liliwa wuhlu dahm k an i cheshaj g Jesus.
Kush am him cheshajch. Sh idam g e‑liliwa am i toꞌahim wohg oidk.
Sh am i aihim g Jerusalem. K g wohg am agshp i huduni ab amjed g Olive Uꞌus Kawulk. Sh muꞌi hemajkam an ha wehgaj ch ab i hoꞌigeꞌid g Jiosh ch ab si ihm si s‑kaidam heg hekaj si geꞌe haꞌichu mo neidchkahim ch hab kaij:
“Jiosh at wo s‑m‑hoꞌigeꞌel ahpi mapt ia jiwia wehhejed. Si geꞌe s‑hehgig o an haꞌichug dahm kahchim ch ed ch si geꞌe has elidadag ab wui g Jiosh.”
Sh am haꞌi gegok g Palasi ch hab kaij ab wui g Jesus, “Ha mashchamdam, ha g chehani mat wo haꞌasa hab chei.”
Sh hab kaij g Jesus, “Neh, matp idam wo haꞌasa hab chei, kut chum hems g hohodai si s‑kaidam ab wo ihmad g Jiosh ni‑hekaj.”
Sh am i aihi g Jerusalem. Kutsh shosha g Jesus
k hab kaij, “Mat hu wo i s‑mahchk g Jerusalem t am hemajkam id i tashkaj mat has wo e juh k wo e doꞌibia.
Ab o him g tash mat wo ha biha g ha‑obga k wo ka kuh
k s‑ap wo ha hugio wehsijj hegam mat am wo haꞌichugk k wehs wo wuahawua g kihhim. K pi shaꞌi mahch mat idani wo chum ha doꞌibia g Jiosh.”
Kutsh am hahawa hih g Jesus k ged hu jiwia geꞌe cheopi t am. Sh eda am haꞌi dadha geꞌe cheopi wehgaj ch am haꞌichu gagda. Kutsh gam hu si i ha wuwhas
hab kaijch ab ha wui, “Bo chuꞌig g Jiosh oꞌohana mo hab kaij g Jiosh: ‘Ahni o d ni‑wehhejedkam ihda geꞌe cheopi. T ab wui wo hihimad g hemajkam ch ab wo si has ni‑elidad.’ Neh, bo kaij g Jiosh. Kumt eda an be k am eda hab wabsh wua g hejel e‑tatchui ch chum hems haꞌichu s‑aꞌagi ha ehsid ab ha wui haꞌichu gagdach.”
Kush wehs tashkaj am ha mashcham g Jesus geꞌe cheopi ch ed. Sh hegam uꞌugchu papal ch chehanig ha mashchamdam ch ha wanimeddam g hemajkam chum s‑muꞌamk.
Sh wabshaba g hemajkam chum hekid ab si kaiham. Kush heg hekaj pi e nakog hegam mash chum s‑muꞌamk.
Sh am hu hebai g Jesus am ha mashcham g hemajkam geꞌe cheopi ch ed ch am ha ahgid g s‑kehg haꞌichu ahgaj g Jiosh. Kutsh am dada g uꞌugchu papal ch chehanig ha mashchamdam ha wehm g geꞌeged
k hab kaij ab wui, “Dohp hab chum elid map ab amjed ab uꞌukch g e‑gewkdag ch am hab haꞌichu wua. Oi g am t‑ahgid.”
Sh hab kaij g Jesus ab ha wui, “Pegih, nt ahni wehpeg ab epai haꞌichu wo em‑kakke. Am g wo ni‑ahgid
mams hedai hab elid mat ab mah g Johnbad g gewkdag mat wo ha pahl wapko. Nat g Jiosh ab mah aha nat wabsh g oꞌodham?”
Kush idam am wabsh hejel si aꞌaga ch hab kaij, “Shahtt hig wo chei? T ab wo t‑kakke matt haschu ahgk pi ab hu wohoch mattp hab wo chei mo ab Jiosh amjed uꞌukch g gewkdag.
T g hemajkam wo t‑maꞌichshul mattp hab wo chei mo ab wabsh oꞌodham amjed uꞌukch. Muꞌijj o hab elid mo d Jiosh haꞌichu i tashogiddam.”
Neh, bash kaij ch ab hahawa uhpam i e nohnogi Jesus wui k hab kaij, “Pi ach shaꞌi mahch mas hedai amjed ab uꞌukch g e‑gewkdag.”
Sh hab kaij g Jesus ab ha wui, “Pegih, nt ahni hab waꞌap pi wo em‑ahgi mani hedai amjed uꞌukch g ni‑gewkdag ch hab wua wehs ihda.”
Neh, bash kaij g Jesus ch am hahawa ha ahgid g hemajkam ihda haꞌichu wepogida ahga hab kaijch: “Neh, matp hems hema am ei g uhdwis e‑oid ed k hab hahawa i e ah mat gam hu hasko mehk wo him k pi oi wo jiwia. Kut haꞌi wo nuhkudad g oidaj ch wo namkid hegai mo haschu ab d i chum wuikamaj. Pegih, t am ha shulig k gam hu hih.
Kut am i e ai mat wo bai g uhdwis. T am hema cheha g e‑pionag mat am wo him k ab wo i uꞌidk g wuikamaj. T wabshaba g nuhkuddam gewichkwua g piongaj k pi haꞌichu shaꞌi mah. Kut gam hu uhpam hih.
“T g enigakam hema ep cheha g e‑pionag mat am wo hih. T id ep gewichkwua g nuhkuddam k si s‑ta edam shoꞌigchud k pi haꞌichu shaꞌi mah. T gam hu uhpam hih.
“T g enigakam hema ep cheha mat am wo hih. T hab waꞌap s‑koꞌokam has juh k gam hu si wuhshad.
“K hab hahawa kaij g uhdwis oidag enigakam, ‘Neh, si ni‑tatchuidch ni‑alidag ant wo cheha mat am wo hih. Heg at hemho ab wo wa has el.’
“T heg gan hu hih. T wabshaba ab i nei hegam nuhkuddam k hab kaij ab aꞌai e wui, ‘Id o d enigakam alidag. Tt hig wo mua. T d wo t‑enigak g uhdwis oidag.’
T wa woho hab e juh k gam hu si i wuhshad ab amjed g uhdwis oidag k am i mua.” K hab hahawa ep kaij g Jesus,
“Neh, nat hig pi woho wo ha kokda g oidag enigakam k am haꞌi ep wo ha hiwigi mat wo nuhkud.” Tsh am i kah ihda g hemajkam k hab kaij, “Ih, pi at woho hab wo e juh hegai map am t‑ahgid.”
Kush ab si ha neid g Jesus ch hab kaij, “Woho at hab wo e juh. K g Jiosh oꞌohana am tashogid mamt hab wa masma wo s‑ni‑ohhod. Id o hab ahgch hab chuꞌig g wepogida ahga Jiosh oꞌohana ed: Kihtdam at wo chum hema s‑ohhodam g hodai. T wabshaba id d wo si s‑has haꞌichu hodaik am ha‑kihta wehhejed. Neh, bo chuꞌig g Jiosh oꞌohana.
Kut wo e shoꞌigch hegam mat pi wo ni‑amich. Id at heg wo wa wepok mat ab wo e keiko hodai t ab. Kut wo bei g s‑koꞌok e‑namkidadag hegam mat wo s‑ni‑ohhod. Id at heg wo wa wepok mat g hodai ab ha ab wo gehsh k am wabsh wo s‑ha wia.”
Neh, bash kaij g Jesus ch hegam hab ha ahg chehanig ha mashchamdam ch uꞌugchu papal. Kutsh hegam heg hekaj wabsh chum si s‑behim. Sh wabshaba muꞌijj g hemajkam ab si has elid g Jesus. Sh idam ha mashchamdam ch papal s‑ha ehbid ch pi am hu be
k wabsh am s‑nenꞌoid mat am wo ha apꞌet. Tp hems haꞌichu hab wo chei mat heg ab wo abchud k an wo be k am wo i dagito kownal wui. Tsh heg hekaj haꞌi ha namkid mat am wui wo hihim k ab wo haꞌichu kakke k wo heki himch.
Sh hab kaij idam ab wui, “Ha mashchamdam, s‑mahch ach map wabsh chum hedai ha mashcham g wohokam ab amjed g Jiosh himdag, chum as has wo chei hedai i.
Pegih, k am wo t‑ahgi maps has elid g geꞌe kownal kowlanta. No hig t‑hiwgid g t‑chehanig ahchim Tutuligo matt wo ha namkid aha no pi t‑hiwgid?”
Sh wabshaba g Jesus s‑ha amichud mo g pi apꞌekam hab elid ch hab ha ahg,
“Ab g wo hema ni‑chehgid hegai lial mam hekaj ha namkid.” Kumtsh ab hema chehgi. Kush hab ha ahg, “Am g wo ni‑ahgid mo hedai wuhiosha ch hedai chehgig ab oꞌohadag id ab lial?” Sh hab kaij idam, “Hegai mo d uhgchu t‑kownalig.”
Sh hab hahawa ep kaij g Jesus, “Pegih, ab g wo i dagito kownal wui hegai matp d enigaj k am epai wo i dagito Jiosh wui mo haschu d epai enigaj.”
Kutsh pi e nako idam mas wo heki himch am ha tahgio g hemajkam k oi wa am wabsh i pi has kaij ch si has i el mat has masma ab i nodagi g ha‑kakkei.
Tsh am haꞌi dada Jesus wui hegam mash hab e aꞌaga Sajusi. Idam o d ha wohochudadag mat g Jiosh pi ep wo ha chegitoich g koꞌi. Sh ab kakke idam ch hab kaij,
“Ha mashchamdam, an o hab chuꞌig ihda chehanigaj g Jiosh Mosesbad oꞌohana ed ch hab chuꞌig matsh g oidchkam wehngaj hegai mat wo muh pi ha aꞌaligak hemho wo wa bei g hohnigaj g e‑wehnagbad. Tsh g aꞌaligaj hab masma wo e kuint mat d wo aꞌaligajk hegai mat muh.
Pegih, k am hu hebai wewaꞌak d e‑wepngam. Kut g si geꞌechu ge hohnt k pi ha aꞌalidtok am i muh.
T g oidchkam an bei ihda uwi k hab waꞌap muh.
T amjed g waikkokam an be k hab waꞌap muh. T wehsijj hab e juh idam wewaꞌak mat pi ha aꞌalidtok koꞌo k huhug.
T gam hu si ha oidk heg ep muh uwi.
Pegih, k idam wehsijj hohnigkahim. Kut hedai d wo hohnigk matp g koꞌi ep wo i wuwha?”
Sh g Jesus hab kaij ab ha wui, “Ia o waꞌi e hohont g hemajkam jewed dahm.
K wabshaba pi hab chuꞌig an Jiosh kihdag ed. Jiosh at uhpam wo ha chegitoich g e‑doꞌibiakam k am wo i ha wahpki e‑kihdag ed. T hahawa pi wo e hohontad ch pi wo koꞌod hab masma mo g anghil hab chuꞌig.
<range>
Mosesbad atki wa an oꞌoha mash wa g Jiosh am e chehgid wui heg hekaj shaꞌi mash meihid ch pi meitto. Sh hab kaij g Jiosh: Ahni ani d ha‑Jioshga hegam Abraham ch Isaac ch Jacob. Neh, id o hab kaij g Jiosh, chum as heki hu koi, no pi am e wehm ha nuhkud ch ab uhpam wo i ha wuwhas muhkig amjed.
Pi amt wabsh woho wo i huhug am i koꞌok matp g Jiosh d em‑Jioshga.” Neh, bash kaij g Jesus.
Kush haꞌi hegam mo d chehanig ha mashchamdam ab neneok ch hab kaij, “S‑ap apt hab chei, ha mashchamdam.”
Tsh amjed pi hedai e nako mas ab haꞌichu ep wo kakke.
Sh hab kaij g Jesus ab ha wui, “Am g wo oidahim mas hedai d wo Jiosh si Kehshak. Bo e aꞌaga matsh d wo amjedkamk hegai t‑kownaligbad mash hab chehgig David.
Kush wa eda g Davidbad hab aꞌaga ‘ni‑kownalig’ natsh oꞌoha ihda mo an hab chuꞌig neꞌi ed heg eda Jiosh heki hu oꞌohana: Bo kaij g Jiosh ab ni‑kownalig wui: In g dahiwua s‑apkojed ni‑hugid an.
Kunt wo ha gewito g m‑obga mat ab wabsh s‑ap wo m‑wechok.
Neh, namt hig s‑ap wo ah mat has masma d wo Davidbad amjedkamk ihda mash d kownaligaj?”
Kush wehsijj ab si kaiham g Jesus hegam muꞌi hemajkam. Kush ab ha ahgid g e‑chuhchai ch hab kaij,
“Hegam mo d chum chehanig em‑mashchamdam o am si s‑apko dadhaiwup cheopi ch ed ch geꞌe gegosig ch ed. Si o s‑kehg e enigadad ch an oiopo no pi tatchua mamt ab wo si has ha elidad. Kumt wo s‑e nenꞌoidad mamt pi hab wo masmak mo hegam.
Chum as si chew e hoꞌigeꞌidahun am em‑tahgio ch eda haꞌichu s‑aꞌagi ha wohppoꞌid hegam mo d heheꞌejel wiꞌikam. T g Jiosh baꞌich i s‑koꞌokam wo ha namkid heg hekaj pi ap ha‑chuꞌijig no pi wabsh pehegia e hoꞌigeꞌidahun ch hab wua ihda pi apꞌekam.”
Sh am hu hebai dadha idam Jesus mash am e shulig g ha‑mahkigdag am wehhejed g geꞌe cheopi. Kush g s‑kakais muꞌi am shulig g lial.
Tsh am hema jiwia g al shoꞌigkam oks mash d hejel wiꞌikam k atsh gohk s‑oꞌamchu am shul. Kush am neid g Jesus
ch hab ha ahg g e‑chuhchai, “Neh, ihda al shoꞌigkam oks at baꞌich i geꞌe mahkigdag hab juh mo hegam s‑kakais.
Hegam o ab wabsh mahk hegai mo haschu i pi tatchua no pi wabsh s‑lialiga. T wabshaba ihda al oks wehs mah mo haschu al i edgid mat hekaj wo chum kihdagk.”
Kush am haꞌi neneok ab amjed g geꞌe cheopi ch am aꞌaga mo si s‑kehg hab mahs ch si s‑kehg hohodaikaj hab junis ch si s‑kehg mahkigdagkaj e heosid. Sh hab kaij g Jesus,
“Heuꞌu. Nt wabshaba wo si shel em‑ahgi mo e aihim mat wehs wo i e shul ihda mam neid.”
Sh g chuhchaij ab kakke ch hab kaij, “Hekid at hab wo i e juh ihda? Kut haschu d wo chehgidak matt heg ab wo s‑mahchk mo e aihim matki am hab wo e juh?”
Sh hab kaij g Jesus, “Mt wo s‑e nenꞌoidad ch pi am hu wo e iattogi. Muꞌi at an wo i wuwha aꞌahidag oidam k ni‑wepo wo e chehcheg hab kaijch mo d Jiosh si Kehsha ch hab wo chei mat e ai g tash. Pi g am hu wo i ha oid idam.
An at wo kaida mo am hahasko aꞌai e cheggia g jejewed. Kumt wabshaba pi heg hekaj wo e kudutad, chum as hems wo wohok. Hemho wa at hab wo mahsk haꞌichu wehpeg. K wabshaba pi hab d ahga mat e ai mat wo huhug g jewed.
Jejewed at ab aꞌai wo i e cheggia.
T an aꞌai hab wo e juh mat g jewed shaꞌi s‑ta ehbidam wo uꞌugij. T g bihugig wo gehsh k g s‑cheawagig ab wo i hih. S‑ta ehbidam haꞌichu at am wo i e chehgi ab dahm kahchim t amjed.
“Mat koi hab wo e juh ihda, kumt an wo em‑uꞌu k wo em‑shoꞌigchud k am wo em‑uꞌapa chechopi ha wui k wo em‑kuh. Kumt wo e lodai am ha tahgio g kokownal nam pi ab s‑ni‑wohochud.
Id at am wo em‑apꞌet mamt am wo ah g s‑kehg haꞌichu ahgaj g Jiosh.
Pi g am heki hu wo e kudutad heg hekaj mamt has wo chei hejel e wehhejed.
Ab ant wo em‑mah g neꞌoki ch amichudadag. Kut pi wo e nako g em‑obga mas ab wo wui kekiwua mamt has wo chei.
Em‑jehj ch em‑wepnag ch em‑hajuni ch em‑naipijju at am wo i em‑dagito ha wui g hahaꞌichu. Kumt haꞌijj wo e koꞌij.
Muꞌijj at wo s‑em‑kehꞌel nam pi ab ni‑hiwig.
Mt wabshaba s‑ap am wo gahi wuwha mamtp has wo i em‑juh
k wabsh wo s‑ha bahbgi. T g Jiosh wo em‑doꞌibia.
“Shondal at an wo biha g Jerusalem. Kumt hab wo s‑mahchk mo e aihim mat oi wo e padch g kihhim.
Hemho wa at am wo ahhio dohdaꞌag wui hegam mat am wo haꞌichugk Judea chekshani ch ed. T hegam mo am haꞌichug Jerusalem kihhim t am hemho wa wo ahhio ab amjed. Kut hegam mo gam hu wabsh jegko kih pi am hu wo i wahp kihhim ch ed
nat pi wo e ai mat wo s‑koꞌokam ha namkid g Jiosh k am wo wohokamch wehs hegai mo an oꞌohanas oꞌohanaj ed.
Ih shoꞌig! S‑ta at ehbidam wo mahsk am ha wehhejed hegam mat wo chuꞌuchum mahmadk ch hegam mat wabsh wo kia woꞌok g ali. Ab at wo i hih g geꞌe shoꞌigdag id dahm jewed. T g s‑koꞌok ha‑namkidadag ab wo gei ha ab idam hemajkam heg hekaj ha‑chuꞌijig.
Mt wo haꞌi ha kokda k wo haꞌi ha lilsochud k gam hu wo i ha ui mehk jewed wui. Kut g gawul mahs hemajkam an wo bei ihda Jerusalem k ia wo i e chiwiadad am hugkam mat wo kuhgit g ha‑apꞌedag g gawul mahs hemajkam.
“T wo e uꞌugij mo haschu an hab chuꞌig t‑dahm. Kut s‑ta ehbidam hab wo e juh g tash ch mashad ch huhuꞌu k wo dagito g e‑wopogga. Kut g ge shuhdagi an wo wewgad ch an wo toꞌotonkad. T id wehs wo chehgi mat geꞌe haꞌichu hab wo e juh wehsko jewed dahm. T g hemajkam wo si s‑ehbidad wehs jejewed ch ed ch wo s‑e chuhug nat ge wo mahchk mat haschu has wo e juh.
<range>
Kunt ab hahawa si s‑masma wo i hud chewagi ch ed ab Jiosh kihdag amjed ahni Jiosh si Kehsha. Kut am wo e maskogi g ni‑gewkdag.
Bat masma wo e chehgi mo ab e aihim g ha‑doꞌibiadag hegam mat ab wo ni‑hiwgad. Kut heg hekaj wo chum si s‑ap e taht mat hekid wo i shonwua ihda mani em‑ahgid.”
Tsh amjed g Jesus am ha ahgi ihda haꞌichu wepogida ahga, “Neh, mt wo s‑mahchk mo g toniabkam e aihim mamt wo nei mat g suhna jeꞌe ch nahnko mahs uꞌus ab wo i iꞌiwgi.
<range>
K hab wa masma hab mahs mamt wo nei mat hab wo e juh idam mani am heki hu em‑ahgid k wo s‑mahchk mo e aihim mant ep wo jiwia.
“Neh, hegam mat wo nei ihda mani em‑ahgid at d wabsh wo kia dodakamk jewed dahm mat hekid wehs am hab wo e juh.
Wehs am gam hu hab wo i e juh ihda Jiosh nahtoi mam in neid. T wabshaba g ni‑neꞌoki pi hekid gam hu hab wo i e juh.
“Si g wo s‑e nenꞌoidad mat haha wabsh wo em‑ai hegai tash. Mt am hu pi wo mahchk. Pi g am wo shaꞌi e hiwgid mamt wabsh si muꞌi haꞌichu k ed wo e nakogad ch wo si e gegosidad ch wo nawkkoꞌod ch g e‑kihdagkaj wo e kudutad.
Hegai tash at am hab haha wabsh wo si e juh wehs hemajkam ha tahgio.
Mt wo si s‑e nenꞌoidad ch wo e hoꞌigeꞌidahunad chum hekid mamt ab wo uꞌukch g gewkdag ch s‑ap am gahi wo wuhsh wehs ihda mat am hab wo e juh. Nt pi an hu haꞌichu wo em‑abch ahni Jiosh si Kehsha mamt hekid wo ha lodai g hemajkam.”
Sh g Jesus wehs tashkaj am ha mashcham geꞌe cheopi ch ed. Kush muꞌijj am wui daiw wabsh i sisiꞌalimad mat ab wo kaiha. Sh am i huhuduk, sh gam hu hihhim idam Jesus Olive Uꞌus Kawulk wui ch am koksho.
<range>
Sh am i e aihim mash eda e wushshad matsh wa g Jiosh ha doꞌibia g ha‑shohshonbad. Sh heg eda pi e koꞌa hegai pahn mo jewajidas.
Sh g uꞌugchu papal ch chehanig ha mashchamdam am wabsh s‑aꞌagi e nakog matsh wo mua g Jesus ch wabshaba s‑ha ehbid g hemajkam.
Kutsh g ge Jiawul Satan an bei g Judas Iscariot.
Tsh id am i ha dagito hegam Jesus k am him k am ha wehm aꞌaga g uꞌugchu papal ch geꞌe cheopi nuhkuddam ha‑geꞌegeꞌejig mat has masma am wo i dagito g Jesus ha wui.
Tsh si s‑hohhoꞌi idam k ab si ahgi mat wo namkid.
Tsh amjed am i e nako g Judas mat am wo neidad mat s‑aꞌagi wo gagda g Jesus ab ha wui. T pi wo mahchk g hemajkam ab amjed.
Tsh am hahawa s‑ap i e ai hegai ha‑shohshonbad ha‑doꞌibiadag piast. Kush d wehpeg tash matsh eda wo e kokda g kahwal mahmad.
Sh g Jesus hab ha ahg g Peter ch John, “Am g wo hihim k am wo i apꞌech g t‑gegosig matt wo wuhshad g t‑shohshon ha‑doꞌibiadag.”
Kush hab kaij hegam, “Bahtt hab wo juh g t‑gegosig?”
Sh hab kaij, “Neh, am amt wo hihi Jerusalem wui. T ab hema wo himad g cheoj ch wo waꞌigchugad ab haꞌa t ab. Kumt am wo i oi. Kut am hu hebai wo him k am wo i wah hema kih ed.
Kumt hab wo chei ab wui g kihkam, ‘Neh, s‑mahchimk o g t‑mashchamdam mas an hebai i ha wiꞌis matt wo wuhshad g t‑shohshon ha‑doꞌibiadag.’
Kut am wo hema em‑chehgi g kih. T id gan hu ha‑kih dahm hab wo chuꞌigk ch wo geꞌejk ch am wo apchudask. Kumt an haꞌab wo i apꞌech g t‑gegosig”
Kutsh wa woho am hihi idam kihhim wui. Tsh wa woho s‑ap am hab e juh mash has i ha ahg. Kutsh am i apꞌech g gegosig.
Tsh am i hud. Kutsh am hahawa dada hegam haꞌi. Tsh g Jesus am i dahiwua mihsa wui. Tsh g chuhchaij am ep dadhaiwua.
Kush hab kaij ab ha wui, “Si ani tatchua mant wo em‑wehm huh ihda gegosig mant koi wo ni‑muhkid
nant pi pi hekid ia hu em‑wehm ep wo huh ihda hab mahs gegosig. T wabshaba ab wo e ai mat wo s‑ap e nahto g em‑doꞌibiadag. Kumt an wo ni‑wehmajk dahm kahchim ch ed.”
Mtsh ab hahawa mah g nawait am tahsa ch ed. Kutsh ab i hoꞌigeꞌel g Jiosh k hab kaij ab ha wui, “Ab g wo behꞌi ihda k wehsijj ab wo ha ih.
Neh, ahni ant pi hekid ab hu ep wo ih ihda uhdwis wadag k ab wo ai mat wo e nahto g Jiosh kownaltalig.”
Neh, bash kaij ch am hahawa bei g chemait k ab hoꞌigeꞌel g Jiosh k am i hahain k hab kaij, “Do ni‑honshpadag ihda mant am i em‑hahaini. Id ani hab ahgch hab kaij mant wo ni‑muhkid am em‑wehhejed. Ab g wo huhgi ihda hahainig k id chum hekid am hab wo junihid mamt hekaj wo s‑ni‑chegitok.”
Tsh ab hahawa ep ha mah g wasib k hab kaij, “Do ni‑ehꞌed ihda nawait. Id ani hab ahgch hab kaij mat g ni‑ehꞌed wo e iawua mat hekaj am hab wo e juh hegai mo wa g Jiosh hab kaij matsh hab wo em‑juni.
“Neh, hegai mat wo ni‑gagda o ia ni‑wehm daha mihsa wui.
Bant wa masma wo ni‑muhkid mat has masma g Jiosh am i apꞌech mat g si Kehshaj wo e muhkid. T wabshaba wo si s‑koꞌokam e namkid hegai mat wo ni‑gagda.”
Tsh ab ha hekaj aꞌai i e kakke mas hedai wud wok ch hab wo e juh.
Kush am e neꞌowin hegam Jesus chuhchai am aꞌagadch mas hedai d wo si haꞌichuk am ha shahgid.
Sh hab kaij g Jesus ab ha wui, “Neh, ab am si e haꞌichuchud hab sha masma mo g kokownal. S‑mahch am mo hegam si s‑gewkam an ha uꞌukch g e‑hemajkamga. Kut hemho wa am hab wo junihid mo haschu ab ha chehani. Mt wabshaba ahpim pi hab masma am wo ha dahmkad g e‑wehm wohochuddam. Si amt s‑hemajim am wo i ha wehmtad. Hegam kokownal o tatchua mat g hemajkam hab wo ha elidad mo geꞌe haꞌichu hab ha junid. Mt wabshaba ahpim pi hab masma hab wo e elidad mam geꞌe haꞌichu hab ha junid g hemajkam.
<range>
Aha nam hig hab chum e elid mam d ha‑aꞌamo ch am wo dadhaiwua mat g em‑pionag wo em‑gegos? Ni eda ahni pi hab masma hab ni‑wua, chum anis d em‑kownalig ch wabshaba heg ni‑wepogid mani d em‑pionag.
“Ahpim amt pi hekid shaꞌi ni‑dagito am oidam g haꞌichu ni‑nakogig,
Kunt heg hekaj wo em‑kokownalch hab masma mat g ni‑ohg Jiosh ni‑kownalch.
Mt am ni‑wehm wo e gegosidad ni‑kownaltalig ed. Kunt hab wo em‑juh mamt d wo uꞌusagakamk am ha dahm hegam gamai gohk kawod dakam Tutuligo hemajkam.”
