Kush hab kaij g Jesus ab Simon Peter wui, “Ih, Simon, Jiosh at wo hiwigi g ge Jiawul mat wehsijj wo em‑aꞌappe hab sha masma mat g pilkani hihkdam wo nehnich g e‑hihka k gam hu wo i gawulkai g mohgaj. Jiawul o hab chum e ahg mat gam hu hab wo i em‑juh hab masma mo g mohg.
Nt wabshaba ab i tai g Jiosh mat wo i gewkaj g m‑wohochudadag, Simon. Kupt am wo i ha gewkemhu g e‑wehm wohochuddam mapt hekid ab uhpam wo i e nodagi ni‑wui.”
Sh hab kaij g Peter, “Ni‑kownalig, ni‑nahtokch ani mant wo ni‑kuhpachud k wo ni‑muhkid m‑wehm.”
Sh hab kaij g Jesus, “Neh, Peter, pi at koi am hu wo kuhu g keli chuchul id i chuhug ab, kupt waikko hab wo chei map pi shaꞌi ni‑mahch.”
Sh hab ep kaij g Jesus ab ha wui, “Neh, namd haꞌichu i pi edagi mam wa ahgachug g haꞌichu ni‑ahga pi uꞌuk g e‑lial kokstal o g limoshana kokstal o g shuhshk?” Sh hab kaij hegam, “Pi haꞌichu.”
Sh hab hahawa ha ahg, “Mt wabshaba hemu an wo uꞌad g e‑lial kih ch e‑is‑pahyo chum ams hems wo gagda g e‑lihwa k hekaj wo hema ha nolawt g is‑pahyo.
Hemho wa at am hab wo e juh ihda mo ab ni‑amjed oꞌohanas ch hab chuꞌig: Bamt masma ab wo mohtoꞌi g chuꞌijig g Jiosh si Kehsha mamt g pi ap hemajkam.”
Sh hab kaij hegam chuhchaij, “Pegih, t‑kownalig, m ia gohk wehch g iꞌis‑papayo.” Sh hab kaij g Jesus, “Neh, e at ai matt wo hihi.”
Tsh amjed gam hu hih g Jesus Olive Uꞌus Kawulk t ab mash hab wa e wua. Kutsh oi hegam chuhchaij.
Tsh am i dada amai. Sh hab kaij ab ha wui, “Am g wo e hoꞌigeꞌidahun mamt s‑ap wo nako g e‑aꞌappema.”
Neh, tsh am hahawa ha dagito k am baꞌich shaꞌi him k am tonwua k e hoꞌigeꞌidahun
hab kaijch, “Ni‑ohg, matp am wo s‑apꞌek, pt gam hu hab hig wo i juh hegai si s‑koꞌok shoꞌigdag mo ab ni‑wui him. Kuni eda tatchua mat ahpi g m‑tatchui hab wo e juh.” [
Tsh am haha wabsh hema jiwia g anghil ab wui k ab si i gewkaj.
Kutsh si e kudut k am baꞌich haha wabsh si e hoꞌigeꞌidahu. Kush g wahuddaj am e iawua jewed dahm k d wabsh ehꞌed.]
Tsh am i haꞌasa e hoꞌigeꞌidahun k am hih mash am dadha hegam chuhchaij. Kush am kohksh nash pi wabsh i ha baꞌiwich g pi ap tahhadkam.
Sh hab kaij ab ha wui, “Shahchu am ahgch kohksh? Ab g wo nehnen k wo e hoꞌigeꞌidahu mamt s‑ap wo nako g e‑aꞌappema.”
Sh am wabsh kia neok. Sh ab haꞌi ge hihim g hemajkam. Kush heg ha wanimed Judas mash d chum hema kehshaj g Jesus ch ab wui i hih matsh ab wo chintad.
Sh hab kaij g Jesus, “Ih, Judas, pt wo ni‑gagda ab ni‑chintadk ahni Jiosh si Kehsha!”
Tsh am i nei hegam haꞌi Jesus chuhchai mo haschu has e wua k hab kaij, “T‑kownalig, natt wo ha cheggia g iꞌis‑papayokaj?”
Kutsh hema ab si i widu g is‑pahyo k g uhgchu pahl neholiga nahk an si hikuch.
Sh hab kaij g Jesus, “Am g wo wa i haꞌasa,” k an taht ihda cheoj nahk k doaj.
Tsh am wui dada g uꞌugchu papal ch cheopi nuhkuddam ha‑geꞌegeꞌejig ch g geꞌeged mat an wo bei. Sh hab kaij g Jesus ab ha wui, “Bamki ni‑elid mani d s‑chu ehskam ch hab ia dada uꞌukch g iꞌis‑papayo ch uꞌus.
Am ani em‑wehm haꞌichug cheopi t am wehs tashkaj. Kumt pi an hu ni‑bei. T wabshaba hemu am i em‑apꞌet. Pi apꞌekam at s‑ap am hab wo e juh s‑chuhugam k ed.”
Tsh an bei g Jesus k gam hu i bei uhgchu pahl kih wui. Sh g Peter ga hu wabsh mehkjed ha oid.
Kutsh eda am ge e nai kolhai ch ed. Kutsh am i jiwia g Peter k am ha wehm dahiwua hegam mo am dadha.
Kutsh am hema jiwia g chehia pion k am nei g Peter k ab si i neid k hab kaij, “Ihda oꞌodham o wa an wehmaj hegai mamt an bei.”
Tsh wabshaba pi mahch k e ah g Peter hab kaijch, “Pi ani shaꞌi mahch hegai.”
Sh am shaꞌi haꞌas. Kutsh am hema ep cheh g Peter k hab kaij, “Ahpi ap d hema hegam Jesus.” Sh wabshaba hab kaij g Peter, “Ih, pi o woho.”
Sh am hu d i hemako ohla amjed. Kush hema oꞌodham am si e gewkaj ch hab kaij, “Woho o wa mo ihda oꞌodham hab d waꞌap ha wehm oꞌodham noki pi ab d kihkam Galilee chekshani ch ed.”
Sh hab kaij, “Pi ani shaꞌi mahch maps haschu hab ahg.” Neh, sh am wabsh kia neok. Tsh g keli chuchul am si ku.
Kutsh ab si e sikolkai g Jesus k ab si i nei g Peter. Tsh am wabsh si chegito g Peter g jesus neꞌoki mo wa hab kaij, “Koi at wo kuhu g keli chuchul, kupt waikko hab wo waꞌi chei map pi ni‑mahch.”
Tsh gam hu hahawa i wuhsh g Peter k si pi ap e tahtk ch shoak.
Sh hegam mash am nuhkud g jesus nahnko ahg ch an si maꞌish k wuh g wuhpuij
k ab si shonikkash ch hab ahg, “Am g hig t‑ahgid mas hedai ab m‑shonikka.”
Kush muꞌi nahnko ep s‑koꞌokam ahg.
Tsh am i mahsi. Kutsh am e nam hegam geꞌeged ch uꞌugchu papal ch chehanig ha mashchamdam mash d e jehnigiddam. Kumtsh am ha wui uꞌapa g Jesus.
Sh idam hab kaij, “Am g t‑ahgid maps d Jiosh si Kehsha.” Sh hab kaij g Jesus, “Pi amt woho ab hu wo ni‑wohoch mantp am wo em‑ahgi mani hedai wud.
Kumt pi woho ab hu wo i nodagi hegai mantp haschu wo em‑kakke.
Nt wabshaba wo em‑ahgi mant iꞌajed an s‑apkojed hugidaj an wo dak g Jiosh ahni si Kehshaj.”
Kush wehsijj hab kaij, “A kuptp d Jiosh alidag?” Sh hab kaij ab ha wui, “Dani ahni.”
Sh hab kaij hegam, “Neh, pi ach shaꞌi hema tatchua mat wo si s‑mahch k ah. Ahchim ach hejel kah mo si pi ap neok ab Jiosh t amjed ch hekaj wo chum e muhkid.”
Kutsh wehsijj hegam hahaꞌichu ab si e wehmt k am i bei g Jesus heg wui mash d kownal am Judea chekshani ch ed ch hab chehgig Pilate.
Sh ab ha kaiham. Kush ab wui ab haꞌichu abchudahim g Jesus hab kaijch, “Neh, ihda oꞌodham o im hu hab wabsh i ha wawan g t‑hemajkamga hab ha ahgch mat pi wo namkid g geꞌe kownal. Kuch kah mo hab hejel e ahg mo d jiosh si Kehsha ch d uhg kownal. Kupt hemho wa wo mua.”
Kush ab kakke g Pilate g Jesus ch hab kaij, “Nap d ha‑kownalig g Tutuligo hemajkam?” Sh hab kaij g Jesus, “Dani ahni.”
Tsh g Pilate am i mamche hegai mam ab abchud. Sh eda muꞌi an oiopo g hemajkam s‑neidamk mo has e wua. Tsh g Pilate am ha kaichudk hab ha ah g uꞌugchu papal, “Pi ant haꞌichu shaꞌi cheh mas pi ap hab juh ihda oꞌodham mat heg hekaj wo e muhkid.”
Kush wabshaba baꞌich i e gewpkad ch hab kaij, “Am o ha chuꞌamun g t‑wehm oꞌodham haꞌichu ha mashchamch wehsko ga hu Galilee t amjed ch ia Judea ch ed ch chum hems iia Jerusalem ch ed.”
Tsh am i kah g Pilate ihda k hab kaij ab ha wui, “Kutp ab Galilee chekshani ch ed d kihkam ihda oꞌodham?”
Kumsh am ahgid mash am haꞌab d kihkam. Sh g Herod am d ha‑kownalig Galilee chekshani ch ed ch iaꞌi idani am hab waꞌap haꞌichug Jerusalem t am. Kumtsh heg hekaj am wui uꞌapa g Jesus.
Kush si s‑hehgig g Herod nash pi tash waꞌi chum s‑neidamk hab chum e ahgch matp hems am tahgio hab wo juh g s‑hasig haꞌichu.
Kumtsh am kei tahgio. Kush muꞌi haꞌichu kakke. Sh wabshaba pi has shaꞌi kaij g Jesus.
Kush g uꞌugchu papal ch chehanig ha mashchamdam am gegok ch si s‑gewkam ab haꞌichu abchud g Jesus.
Sh g Herod g e‑shondalig ha wehm haha wabsh nahnko ahg g Jesus ch si ash k ash g si s‑kehg kahba ab wahki. Tsh ab hahawa ha cheha g Herod mat wo uhpam bei am Pilate wui.
Kutsh heg i tash ab g Pilate ch Herod ab hahawa e nawojt k ash eda chum s‑e kehꞌid.
Tsh g Pilate am i ha hemapai g uꞌugchu papal ch ha wanimeddam g hemajkam
k ash hab kaij ab ha wui, “Ia amt uꞌapa ihda oꞌodham ni‑wui hab kaijch mo goꞌolko ha wanimed g hemajkam. Kunt hemuch ia em‑kaichudk am i mamche hegai mam ab abchud k pi haꞌichu shaꞌi cheh mas pi ap hab junihi m.
Kutsh Herod hab waꞌap pi haꞌichu shaꞌi cheh. T g shondaligaj ab uhpam i uꞌapa t‑wui. Pi atki haꞌichu hab juh ihda mas heg hekaj wo e muhkid.
Kunt wabsh wo ha cheha mat wo gewittan k wo dagito.” [
Neh, bash kaij nash pi am hema i dadagitosh g lihso ha wehhejed wehs ahid ab mo eda hab e wua hegai geꞌe gegosig.]
Kush wehsijj hegam muꞌi hemajkam mo am haꞌichug si s‑kaidam hab kaij, “Pi ach tatchua ihda. Barabbas apt wo i dagito t‑wehhejed.”
Sh eda ihda Barabbas am e kuhpch nash pi chum haꞌi ha wehm cheggia g kownal ch haꞌi ha kokda.
Sh am ep chum ha wehm neok g Pilate nash pi chum s‑dagitoimk g jesus.
Sh wabshaba am ep si s‑kaidam hab ge kaij muꞌikko, “Muꞌani! Muꞌani ab kots t ab!”
Sh hab ep chum kaij g Pilate, “A t haschu pi ap hab juh. Pi ant haꞌichu shaꞌi cheh mas heg hekaj wo e muhkid. Ab ant wo ha cheha mat wo gewittan k wo dagito.”
Sh wabshaba am wabsh si s‑kaidam hab kaij matsh ab wo naggia kots t ab. Neh, tsh g ha‑hihinki gewito g Pilate.
Tsh am i apꞌech mat am hab wo e juh g ha‑tatchui.
Kumtsh gam hu i wuhshad hegai mash d ha cheggiadkam ch d ha muꞌakam k amtsh g Jesus am i dagito ha wui mat am hab wo juh mo has i elid.
Kumtsh gam hu i bei g Jesus ab kushwiotachudk g kots. Kush am hu hebai hihim. Tsh ab hema i ha nam g oꞌodham mash ab him Jerusalem wui. Id ash hab chehgig Simon ch ab d kihkam mash am d Cyrene ch ash ab him ga hu oꞌoidag amjed. Kumtsh am wabsh si be k ab kushwiotach g kots k atsh hab juh mat ab oidk wo himad g Jesus.
Kush muꞌi hemajkam ab oidch hihim. Sh g uꞌuwi si shoanihim wehhejed.
Tsh ab i ha nei g Jesus k hab kaij ab ha wui, “Pi g am ni‑wehhejed wo shoanid, ahpim Jerusalem t am kihkam, ch wabshaba hejel e wehhejed ch e‑aꞌaliga ha wehhejed.
Ab o him g tash mat hab wo chei g hemajkam mo si haꞌichu s‑ha abamk hegam uꞌuwi mat pi hekid shaꞌi mahmadt.
Woho o wa mat s‑ta ehbidam haꞌichu hab wo e juh am ni‑tahgio. T wabshaba baꞌich i s‑ta ehbidam haꞌichu hab haha wo juh am ha tahgio hegam mo d pi ap chuꞌijkam ch pi ab hu ni‑wui e nohnogimk. (30) Hegam at pi wo e nako mas heg wo nako k heg hekaj wo chum tatchua mat g dohdaꞌag am ha dahm wo i shulig k wo ha ehsto.”
<range>
Kumsh gohk ep ha uꞌa mamtsh am wehmaj wo ha kokda. Sh idam d pi ap hehemajkam.
Kumtsh an dada anai mash am hab e aꞌaga Koshwak. Tsh g shondal ab hahawa sisish g Jesus kots t ab k am i kei g kots wag ch ed k gan hu aꞌai hab waꞌap ha nahngia hegam pi ap hehemajkam kokots t ab.
Tsh ab hahawa e hoꞌigeꞌidahu g Jesus k hab kaij, “Ni‑ohg Jiosh, ab g wabsh si i s‑ha hoꞌigeꞌid hegam mat ab ni‑naggia. Pi o shaꞌi mahch mani d si m‑Kehsha ch d s‑apꞌekam.” Kutsh g shondal am e chichwi k g wehschugaj e toꞌi.
Sh g hemajkam am gegok ch neid wehs ihda. Sh g ha wanimeddam nahnko ahg g Jesus ch hab kaij, “Ha at doꞌibia haꞌi, pegih, k hejel wo e doꞌibia matp d Jiosh si Kehsha.”
Kush g shondal hab waꞌap nahnko wua ch hab wabsh s‑junim k ab chum mah g nawait
ch wabsh nahnko ahg hab kaijch, “Oi g hejel e doꞌibiad napsh pi d ge kownal.”
Sh am dahm oꞌohadag ihda, “Id o d Tutuligo hemajkam ha‑kownalig.”
Kush hema hegam pi ap hehemajkam mash ab hab waꞌap naggia kots t ab ab si s‑koꞌokam has ahg g Jesus ch hab kaij, “Neh, kuptp d ge Jiosh si Kehsha, pegih, k wo hejel e doꞌibia k ahchim ep wo t‑doꞌibia.”
Kush g hema ab si s‑kehꞌid ihda ch hab kaij, “Aha nap pi ehbid g Jiosh. Ia ach t‑wehm nahngia ch ab t‑wepo mohtoꞌidas g chuꞌijig.
Kuch ahchim s‑ap ab mohtoꞌidas nach pi wa woho d pi ap chuꞌijkam. Kutsh eda ihda pi hab shaꞌi juh g pi apꞌekam.”
Neh, bash kaij ihda hema ch ab Jesus wui hab hahawa ep kaij, “Jesus, ab apt wo wa al s‑ni‑chegitok hekid ab bek g e‑kownaltalig.”
Sh hab kaij g Jesus ab wui, “Neh, ni ab si m‑ahgid mapt id i tashkaj wo ni‑wehmajk an Jiosh kihdag ed.”
Kutsh am i dahm juh. Tsh muh g tash k wehsko s‑chuhugam ch ab ai g waik ohla.
Kutsh am geꞌe cheopi ch ed g s‑kowk ikus kuhpadag ab si shel e wantsh.
Kush am si s‑kaidam e hoꞌigeꞌidahun g Jesus Jiosh wui ch hab kaij, “Ni‑ohg, ab ant i m‑mah g ni‑doakag.” Neh, bash cheꞌiok am i muh.
Kutsh am i nei g shondal ha‑geꞌejig matsh haschu has e juh k ab si ihm g Jiosh ch hab kaij, “Woho oki d s‑apꞌekam oꞌodham ihda.”
Tsh amjed muꞌijj gam hu uhpam hihi hegam mash ab neid ab wabsh e wecho wahpkch nash pi oi wa si ap e tatat.
Kush wehsijj hegam mo si s‑mahch g Jesus ga hu wabsh mehk gegok ch ab neid wehs ihda. Haꞌi idam ash d hegam uꞌuwi mash ga hu Galilee t amjed an wehmajkahim g Jesus.
Sh eda wa hema hegam e jehnigiddam chum pi hohhoꞌid matsh g wehmaj e jehnigiddam s‑muꞌam k ah g Jesus. Id ash hab chehgig Joseph ch ab d kihkam mash am d Arimathea ch s‑ap d oꞌodham ch ab nenida g Jiosh kownaltalig.
<range>
Tsh hekid am i muh g Jesus, tsh ha hekaj am wui hih g Pilate k ab si e shoꞌigchud k tahni g honshpadaj. Tsh am wa apꞌech matsh wo bei.
Tsh gam hu ep him k ab i huduni. Sh am mia hab chuꞌig g hihaꞌini ch ab heki hu cheotas hodai ch ed ch pi koi e hekaj. Tsh g Joseph am i bei g honshpadag k ged hu heg eda cheh am i hobinodk g s‑kehg ikuskaj.
Tsh hegam uꞌuwi mo wehmajkahim g Jesus ab Galilee t amjed gam hu oi g Joseph k ash neid mat hebai e cheh g Jesus k has masma ab e woi. (54) Kush d wialos. Sh g hemajkam chum e nakog no pi g shahwai d ha‑mihshmda tash.
<range>
Kutsh gam hu uhpam hihi idam uꞌuwi mash hebai dadha k am i apꞌech haꞌichu mat hekaj wo s‑ap hab juh mo hab masma hab ha wua g e‑koꞌidag k ash am hahawa e ulinihogi mihshmda tash ch ed mo hab masma d ha‑chehanig.
Sh am e aihim g domig tash. Tsh am hihi idam uꞌuwi hihaꞌini wui k ash uꞌa hegai matsh am nahto matsh hekaj wo i apꞌech g muhki.
Kush gam hu e melchudas hegai geꞌe hodai mash ab hekaj e kuhpch g hihaꞌini.
Tsh am i wahp k pi shaꞌi edagi g muhki
k am wabsh i gegok pi amichudch ihda. Tsh am haha wabsh gohk i e chehgi ha wui mo hab sha mahs mo g oꞌodham. Kush wabsh si tonod g haꞌichu ha‑eniga.
Kutsh si e totods idam uꞌuwi k ab si i shul jewedo. Sh hab kaij idam gohk ab ha wui, “Shahchu am ahgch ia gahg hihaꞌini t am hegai mo d doakam?
Pi o ia hu haꞌichug g Jesus nat pi i wuhsh ab muhkig amjed. Am g wo i chegito mo wa has kaij ab em‑wui. Am am wa wabsh kia haꞌichug Galilee t am.
K wa hab kaij, ‘Hemho ant am wo wa i ni‑dagito pi apꞌekam hemajkam ha wui ahni Jiosh si Kehsha. T hegam ab wo ni‑naggia kots t ab mat wo ni‑mua. Nt wabshaba wo i wuhsh muhkig amjed am heg eda waik tash amjed.’ Neh, bo kaij g Jesus ab em‑wui.”
Kutsh idam uꞌuwi am i chegito mash wa hab kaij g Jesus
k ga hu uhpam hihim k ash am ha ahgid hegam gamai hemako Jesus chuhchai ch wehs g haꞌi mat has e juh.
Haꞌi idam uꞌuwi mash am ha ahgid ash d Mary Magdalene ch Joanna ch hegai Mary mash g madaj hab chehgig James.
Kush hegam Jesus chuhchai pi ab hu ha wohochud nash pi hab ha elid mo wabsh pi e mahch ch hab kaij.
Tsh wabshaba g Peter am i e nakog k am meh hihaꞌini wui k ged hu meliw k am i koachsh. Kush heg am waꞌi kahch s‑kehg ikus mash heg hekaj chum e hobinodch. Tsh amjed gm hu uhpam hih am wabsh i pi amichudch matsh haschu has e juh.
Kush heg waꞌi tash gohkajj am hihim Emmaus kihhim wui. Id amt ab wo ai kihhim am hu i gohk ohla ab am hihimadch Jerusalem t amjed.
Sh idam am hihimad ch neneok ab amjed hegai matsh haschu has e juh am tahgio g Jesus.
Tsh g Jesus am ha aꞌa k am ha wehm hih.
Kush hi wa chum neid ch wabsh pi amichud.
Sh hab kaij g Jesus ab ha wui, “Shahchu am am si aꞌagad ch ia hihim?” Tsh am wabsh i gegokiwua k si pi ap e tahtkam mahs.
Sh hema idam hab chehgig Cleopas ch id hab kaij ab wui, “Aha nap ahpi waꞌi hejel pi mahch mat haschu has e juh hemuch huꞌi ch eda am daha Jerusalem t am?”
Sh hab kaij g Jesus, “Shahchu ap hab ahg?” Kush hab kaij ihda, “Hegai mat hab e juh am tahgio hegai mo hab chehgig Jesus ch ab d kihkam Nazareth t ab. Heg oki d Jiosh haꞌichu i tashogiddam. K wehsijj ab si has elid mo haschu hab junihim ch has i kaij.
Kut g uꞌugchu papal ch t‑wanimeddam am i dagito kownal wui mat wo mua. Kumt ab sisish kots t ab k mua.
Kuch eda id hab chum si elid mo d hegai matsh wa wo t‑doꞌibia ahchim Tutuligo hemajkam. K hemuch d i waik tash amjed mat hab e juh.
Kut am haꞌi hihi g uꞌuwi t‑wehm wohochuddam wabsh i siꞌalim
k atsh pi cheh g muhki k uhpam dada k t‑tods am t‑ahgidch matsh am haꞌi i e chehgi g anghil ha wui. Sh idam hab ha ahgid mo d doakam g Jesus.
T am haꞌi hihi g chechoj hihaꞌini wui k am s‑mai mash wa woho pi am hu haꞌichug g muhki mo hab chum kaij hegam uꞌuwi.”
Sh hab hahawa kaij g Jesus ab ha wui, “S‑wohom am hig pi haꞌichu aꞌamichud ch pi wohochud hegai mo wa g kekelibad Jiosh haꞌichu i tashogiddam am ahg.
No hig pi hab wa mahs mat hab masma wo e shoꞌigch g Jiosh si Kehsha k am wo i wah si s‑kehg e‑apꞌedag ed.”
Neh, bash kaij g Jesus ch amjed am i wuhshad k am tashogi wehs hegai matki g Mosesbad ch wehs hegam kekelibad Jiosh haꞌichu i tashogiddam an oꞌoha ab amjed.
Kutsh am hihim k am i aihi hegai al kihhim mo am wui d hihimdam. Sh gam hu wabsh i si him g Jesus.
Kush wabshaba an shoshobid ch hab kaij, “Ia apt wo waꞌi jiwia t‑wehm. Hudunihim o k ch ab i s‑chuhugamhi.” Kutsh wa woho am ha wehm i jiwia.
Tsh am wo i gegos. Tsh am bei g chemait k am e hoꞌigeꞌidahun k am hahawa hahain k ab ha mah.
Kutsh am hahawa i amich. Tsh wabshaba am wabsh i piꞌata.
Sh hab hahawa kaij ab aꞌai e wui, “Neh, ab at wa si i t‑shuhdad g s‑ap tahhadkam mo wa ab t‑wehm neokhim ch am tashogid g Jiosh oꞌohana mach ab hihim wohg oidch.”
Tsh am ha hekaj i e nakog k gam hu uhpam hihi Jerusalem wui. Kush am e hemapadch hegam gamai hemako Jesus chuhchai haꞌi ha wehm g e‑wehm wohochuddam. Tsh am dada idam gohk.
Kush hegam am ha ahgid ch hab kaij, “Neh, woho atki i wuhsh g t‑kownalig Jesus ab muhkig amjed. Kutsh g Simon nei.”
Kush idam gohk am hahawa epai ha ahgid matsh haschu has e juh am wohg ch ed ch heg ehp matsh amich g Jesus matsh am hahai g chemait.
Sh am wabsh kia aꞌaga ihda. Sh am haha wabsh kehk ha shahgid g Jesus ch ash hab kaij ab ha wui, “Am g wo s‑ap e tahtkkad.”
Kutsh shaꞌi si e totods hab em‑ahgch mo d wabsh kokꞌoi.
Sh hab kaij ab ha wui, “Pi g wo shaꞌi e kudut k ab wabsh wo s‑ni‑wohochudad.
Ab g wo i neid g ni‑nohnhoi ch ni‑tahtad k wo s‑mai mani d ahni. Ab g wo ni‑tahtam k wo nei mani pi d kokꞌoi. Kokꞌoi o pi ha chuhkug ch pi ha ohꞌo mani ahni hemuch imhab chuꞌig.”
Kush hab cheꞌiok ab ha chehgi g e‑nohnhoi ch e‑tahtad.
Kush chum si s‑ap e tahtk ch wabshaba wabsh i hahaꞌadka natsh pi wabsh i pi mai mat has wo el. Kush heg hekaj ab ha kakke mas am haꞌichu chekch mat wo hu.
Kutsh ab ge mah g watopi gaꞌi.
Kutsh ab be k huh. Sh id wehsijj neid.
Kush hab hahawa kaij ab ha wui, “Wehs ani am em‑ahgid ihda heki hu. Wehs haꞌichu at hemho wa am hab wo e juh mo an oꞌohanas ab ni‑amjed ha‑oꞌohana ed g Mosesbad ch hegam haꞌi kekelibad Jiosh haꞌichu i tashogiddam ch heg eda nenꞌei oꞌohana mo an hab chuꞌig Jiosh heki hu oꞌohana ed.”
Neh, bash kaij ch ab hahawa i ha mah g amichudadag mat wo s‑amich g Jiosh oꞌohana
k ash hab kaij ab ha wui, “Bant masma hab ni‑juh mo wa hab chuꞌig an Jiosh oꞌohana ed mant hab wo wa ni‑juh. An o oꞌohanas mantsh wo ni‑shoꞌigchud k wo ni‑muhkid. Kutsh d wo i waik tashk amjed. Ntsh ep wo ni‑chegito. Neh, heg ant hab juh.
Kut ia Jerusalem t amjed am aꞌai wo i e ahgahi gam hu wehsko jejewed ha dahm mat g hemajkam ab wo i ni‑hiwig k gm hu wo s‑ohhod g pi ap e‑chegitoi. T g Jiosh im hu hab wo i juh g pi ap ha‑chuꞌijig.
Ahpim amt am wo ahgahid ihda si s‑has haꞌichu mam neid ch kah.
T g Hekia S‑apꞌekam Gewkdag ab wo em‑mah g gewkdag mamt hab wo junihid. Heg ant am wo cheha mat wo em‑wehmajkad hab masma mo g ni‑ohg Jiosh hab kaij mat hab wo e juh. Mt heg hekaj ia wo dadkad Jerusalem t ab ch ab wo ai mamt ab wo bei hegai gewkdag.”
Tsh am hahawa i ha wanim amai mash am miabidch g Bethany. Tsh am hu hebai i dada. Kutsh am uhgk ul g e‑nohnhoi ha dahm k ab ha hoꞌigeꞌelid,
Tsh g Jiosh gam hu i bei dahm kahchim wui.
Sh idam ab si has elid ch gam hu hahawa hihi Jerusalem wui s‑hehgigch
k amjed chum hekid am hihhim geꞌe cheopi wui ch ab hoꞌigeꞌelid g Jiosh.
Gd hu i si wehpeg ash d doakam hegai mach hab aꞌaga Jiosh Neꞌoki. Id ash d Jiosh ch am wehmaj g e-ohg Jiosh.
Jiosh ash am e wehm dahshch mash eda pi koi haꞌichu shaꞌi nahtois
ch am i kei matsh wehs haꞌichu wo nahto. Kutsh wa woho wehs haꞌichu nahto
k an uꞌukch g gewkdag ch wehs ha mah g haꞌichu doakam g doakag. K ihda doakag am tonlidch g hemajkam chegitoidag.
K wabshaba g hemajkam pi e nakog hejel mas wo s-amich mo haschu chum ha tashogid.
Am ad hema i kei g Jiosh g oꞌodham mat wo t-mihshmad. D id hab chehgig John.
D g mihshmdaj hab chuꞌig matsh in wo i wuhsh jewed dahm hegai mo ab t-mahkch g t-doakag. K hab d elidaj g Jiosh mat wehs hemajkam wo kah ihda haꞌichu ahga k ab wo hiwgad hegai mat in i wuhsh.
Pi ad hejel hab e ahg g John ch wabsh heg an ahgachug mad in i wuhsh.
Id o d wohokam tonlig ch am tonlidch g wehs hemajkam ha-chegitoidag.
Pegih, d ia haꞌichug g Jiosh Neꞌoki jewed e-nahtoi dahm. D wabshaba hemajkam nahtoij pi amichud.
Ia adki mahsi k d t-wehm oꞌodham. D eda muꞌijj g Tutuligo pi amichud ch pi ab hu hiwig.
Kuchd wabshaba haꞌijj ab i s-wohoch mo d Jiosh si Kehsha k ab hiwig. Kud heg hekaj ab t-mah g apꞌedag matt d haha wo aꞌaligajk g Jiosh.
Pi ach heg wabsh hekaj d Jiosh aꞌaliga matt in mamsi o heg wabsh hekaj mo g t-jehj ab s-wohochud g Jiosh o heg wabsh hekaj mach hab t-elid machs d aꞌaligaj. Jiosh at hab t-juh mach d hahawa aꞌaligaj.
Hegai mo d Jiosh Neꞌoki ad e wepogi g hemajkam k woho t-wepo chuꞌig ch ia t-shahgid d doakam. D g John an aꞌaga k si s-kaidam hab kaij, “Id o d hegai mani hab ahg ch am em-ahgid mat ab hema wabsh ni-oidk wo i e maskogid k eda woho d si s-has haꞌichu nash pi chum hekid an haꞌichug.” Neh, bo kaij g John. Kuchd heg amjed s-mahch g Jesus Christ ch am hahawa s-mai moki d Jiosh alidag ch si s-hemajima ch heg waꞌi ahg wohokam ch woho ab si s-t-hoꞌigeꞌid.
<range>
<range>
Dash Mosesbad matsh wa an oꞌoha g Jiosh chehanig am ha wehhejed g hemajkam. K wabshaba d Jesus Christ mad ia uꞌapa g Jiosh hemajimatalig ch wohokam.
Pi oki hekid hedai shaꞌi e-wuhpuikaj neid g Jiosh. K wabshaba g alidaj am wehmaj d hemako ch ab t-wui mahsko wua.
Am ad t‑mihshmad ihda John tohono jewed ch ed. K eda am Jerusalem kihhim t am dadha g t‑geꞌegedga ahchim Tutuligo. Tsh am i ha ai g haꞌichu kaida ab amjed g John. Kutsh am haꞌi ha cheha g papal ch hegam mo d papal ha wehm chikpandam matsh wo s‑mai mas hedai wud hegai John. Tsh idam am hihim k am dada k ab s‑mahchim mas hedai chum e elid ab wui hab kaijch, “Nap hab chum e elid map d Jiosh si Kehsha?”
D ab wabsh si ha wehm neok g John ch am si tasho ha ahgid mo pi d hegai.
D ab ep kakke, “Aha nap d hegai Elijabad ch ia uhpam jiwia?” D g John hab kaij, “Piaꞌa, pi ani d hegai.” D ab ep kakke, “Nap d hegai Jiosh haꞌichu i tashogiddam matsh in wo i wuhsh?” D hab ep kaij, “Piaꞌa, pi ani d hegai.”
D hab hahawa kaij, “Pegih, k am wo t‑ahgi map hedai wud. Hemho wa att am wo ha ahgi g t‑geꞌegedga map has e aꞌaga.”
D g John hab hahawa kaij, “Ahni ani wud mo hab ni‑ahg ch an oꞌohanas: Hema atsh gam hu jeg ed wo ha mihshmad g hemajkam hab kaijch, ‘Neh, in atsh wo i wuhsh jewed dahm hegai mo d ge kownal wehs haꞌichu dahm. Kumt heg wehhejed wo i e nako am dagitok g pi ap e‑chuꞌijig.’ Neh, id o d neꞌokij hegai kelibad Jiosh haꞌichu i tashogiddam mash hab chehgig Isaiah,” bad kaij g John.
Idam mad ab haꞌichu kakke g John o d haꞌi hegam mo hab e aꞌaga Palasi. K hegam Palasi chum si nuhkud g t‑himdag.
D heg hekaj hab ep kaij idam ab John wui, “Pegih, p haschu ahgch ha pahl wapkon ch eda wa chum pi d Jiosh si Kehsha ch pi d Elijabad ch pi d hegai Jiosh haꞌichu i tashogiddam matsh in wo i wuhsh?”
D hab hahawa kaij ab ha wui, “Ha ani pahl wapkon mat wo i e nako. Hemu at in wo i wuhsh hegai mo hig woho d si s‑has haꞌichu, pej hemu ia haꞌichug em‑shahgid. Kum pi amichud.
Pi g hab wo ni‑elidad manis ahni d si haꞌichu. Ihda mat am ni‑oidk wo i wuhsh at wehs ha baꞌich d wo i si haꞌichuk.”
Neh, wehs ihda ad hab e juh gan hu aigojed g Jordan akimel mo am d wahlko kih.
Am baꞌich d i tash, d am jiwia g Jesus John wui. D heg an aꞌaga ch hab kaij, “Neh, id o d hegai mat wo e wepogi g kahwal mad k ab wo e iagchul Jiosh wui mat gam hu hab wo i juh g pi ap t‑chuꞌijig.
Id ani hab ahg mani wa hab em‑ahgid mat ab wabsh ni‑oidk wo i wuhshani k wabshaba wehs ha baꞌich d i si haꞌichu no pi chum hekid an haꞌichug.
Pi ani hab wa shaꞌi mahch mas hedai d wo Jiosh si Kehshak. K wabshaba g Jiosh am ni‑chehani mant wo ha pahl wapko g hemajkam. T hab wa masma am wo tashogi g si e‑Kehsha am t‑wui ahchim Tutuligo.” Neh, bad kaij g John.
D am hebai i cheka, d si s‑mahch ch ahg g John hab kaijch, “Bo kaij g Jiosh ab ni‑wui, ‘Ab at wo i hud g Hekia S‑apꞌekam Gewkdag k ab wo e ul si ni‑Kehsha ab. Kupt hab wo s‑mahchk mo d ihda mat wo ha mah g hemajkam g Hekia S‑apꞌekam Gewkdag.’ Neh, bo kaij g Jiosh ab ni‑wui. Kut wa woho si s‑hemajim ab i hud g Hekia S‑apꞌekam Gewkdag k ab e ul id ab Jesus hab masma mat g hohhi an hasko wo i dahiwua ab i hudunik.
<range>
Kunt wa neid k heg hekaj si s‑mahch mo ihda Jesus d Jiosh alidag.”
Am baꞌich d i tash, d am ep haꞌichug g John. Kuchd gohkajj an wehmaj ahchim mach ab si wecho t‑mashcham.
D ab him g Jesus. Kud g John neidok hab kaij, “Neh, m ia him hegai matsh kahwal mad wepo wo e iagchul am t‑wehhejed.”
Kuchd am i kah ahchim gohk k gam hu i oi g Jesus.
D ab haꞌab i e wua k ab i t‑neid k hab kaij, “Shahchu am tatchua?” Ch hab kaij, “Bahp dak ch amjed ha mashcham?”
D hab kaij, “Oi g wo ni‑oid k wo nei mani hebai da.” Kuchd gam hu oid k am wehmajkahim im hu i juhk amjed ch ga hu si ai g s‑chuhugam.
Hegai mad ni‑wehm kah g John ch am i oi g Jesus o hab chehgig Andrew. K g wehngaj ihda hab chehgig Simon.
K g Andrew d wehpegkam mat am i gahghi g e‑wehnag k hekid am i chehg k hab ahgid, “Cheh att hegai moki d Christ.” (Id o hab d ahga ‘Jiosh si Kehsha.’)
D g Andrew am hahawa uꞌapa Jesus wui. T ab si shel i nei g Jesus k hab kaij, “S-mahch ahni map d Simon ch d alidaj hegai mo hab chehgig Jonas. Iꞌajed apt hab wo chehgigk Peter.” (Id o hab d ahga ‘Hodai.’)
Am baꞌich d i tash, d hab i e ah g Jesus mat gam hu wo hih Galilee chekshani wui. K eda an oimmed hegai mo hab chehgig Philip ch am d kihkam Bethsaida t am. (Ahchim g Andrew ch Peter ha wehm ach am hab waꞌap d kihkam Bethsaida t am.) Jesus ad am cheh g Philip k hab kaij ab wui, “Ab g i ni-oid k wo ni-wehmajk.”
<range>
D g Philip gam hu i gahghi g Nathanael k am i chehgiok hab kaij, “Cheh att hegai matki wa ab amjed an oꞌoha hegam Mosesbad ch kekelibad Jiosh haꞌichu i tashogiddam. Heg oki wud mash d Jesus ch heg d alidag mash d Josephbad ch ab Nazareth kihhim t ab d kihkam.”
D ab wabsh ge i nen k hab kaij, “Ih, nat hig woho haꞌichu s-apꞌekam wo i wuhsh ab Nazareth t amjed?” D g Philip hab kaij, “Pegih, k ab wo i him k hejel e-wuhpuikaj wo nei.”
D ga hu haha wabsh i hihim. D g Jesus neid k hab kaij, “Neh, id o d si oꞌodham m ab him.”
D g Nathanael hab kaij, “P has masma s-ni-mahch?” D hab kaij g Jesus, “M ani wabsh tonlid ch m-neid map am da suhna wecho mat eda koi m-cheh g Philip.”
D hab kaij g Nathanael, “Ih, neh, kupki d Jiosh alidag ch d t-kownalig ahchim Tutuligo hemajkam.”
D hab kaij g Jesus, “Ab ap ni-hiwig nani pi am wabsh tonlid ch m-neid. Nt wo si shel m-ahgi mapt baꞌich i s-ta neidamam haꞌichu wo nei imhab i baꞌich.
Dani Jiosh si Kehsha ch am wo kuhpiꞌo g dahm kahchim am em-wehhejed. Kumt wo nei mat am wui wo i chehchsh g anghil ab ni-amjed k ab ni-wui ep wo i huhud.”
Am gohk d i tash amjed, tsh am haꞌi wo e hohont Cana kihhim t am. Ihda Cana o am Galilee chekchani ch ed. K am haꞌichug g Jesus jeꞌe.
Kumd ahchim ab i t-wai. Chd am hihi g Jesus wehm k am haꞌichug. Kumd am hahawa hab juh g gegosig.
D wabshaba am i huh g nawait. D g Jesus jeꞌe ab wui hab kaij, “Huh at g ha-nawait.”
D hab kaij g Jesus, “Pi o ab hu haꞌichu ni-him heg amjed. Pi at koi chum e ai mant am wo i ni-maskogi.”
D wabshaba g jeꞌej hab ha ahg g pion, “Am g hab wo juhni matp haschu wo i em-ahgi mamt am hab wo juh.”
K eda d t-himdag ahchim Tutuligo mach muꞌi haꞌichu has masma wapkon. D g hohodai hahaꞌa chuhdp am dadha mamt ab wo chum waꞌig k am hab wo junihid g t-himdag. D idam hahaꞌa hemako am hu i waikko wehst-mahm walohn shuhdagi am wo e toa.
D hab kaij g Jesus am ha wui g pion, “Am g wo i ha shuhshud g shuhdagikaj.” D wa woho am si i ha shuhshud.
D hab hahawa ep ha ahg, “Am g wo wassibi k wo mah hegai mo nuhkud g e-hohontam piast.” D wa woho hab e juh k am i wassibi k ged hu ha mah.
D ab jeh mo d si s-kehg nawait k eda pi mahch mas hebai waꞌi. Hegam o hi wa s-mahch pion mat hebai waꞌi.
D am i cheh g ha-hohntam am i jehk g nawait k hab kaij ab wui, “Shaꞌi s-ap ab kahk ihda nawait. Haꞌi at an hi wo wa i ha wassibi g s-kehg nawait ga hu i wehpeg k wabsh g pi kehg nawait wo ha wassibi im hu i oidch. Kuptki eda ahpi im hu i oidch g si s-kehg nawait ha wassibi.”
Neh, k id d si wehpeg s-hasig haꞌichu hab junij g Jesus. D am mahsko wua g e-gewkdag. Kuchd ab si s-wohochud mo woho d Jiosh si Kehsha.
D am hahawa hab i e ah g Jesus matt am wo hihi Capernaum kihhim wui. D g jeꞌej ch wepngaj ep t-oi. Ch am haꞌichugkahim heꞌekia tash.
Wehs ahid ab o am e wushshad Jerusalem t am matsh wa g Jiosh ha doꞌibia g t‑shohshon. Kud am i e ai. Kuchd gam hu hihim
k ged hu dada geꞌe cheopi t am. D eda am haꞌi ha gagda g haiwani ch kahwal ch hohohi ch am haꞌi kammialt g lial heg wehhejed.
Kud si pi hohhoꞌi g Jesus mo id am hab e wua geꞌe cheopi t am k hekaj hema gewikudt g wijinakaj k gam hu wehs si ha shahmud g haiwani ch kahwal k am gai ha shul g ha‑mimsa hegam mo g lial kammialt k gam hu si gantad g ha‑lialiga
k hab ha ahg hegam mo g hohohi ha gagda mat gam hu wo i ha wuwhas hab kaijch, “Pi g hab wo shaꞌi juhni g ni‑ohg kih mat d wabsh wo haꞌichu gagdakudk.”
Kuchd am hahawa i chegito mo g Jiosh heki oꞌohana hab chuꞌig: Jiosh si Kehsha at ab wo si has elidad g geꞌe cheopi.
D ab si chehmo g hahaꞌichu k hab ahg, “Shahchu ap ahgch hab wua ihda? Am g hig t‑chehgid g s‑hasig haꞌichu. Kutt hab wo s‑mahchk map uꞌukch g e‑gewkdag ab amjed g Jiosh.”
D hab kaij g Jesus, “Pegih oig, m ant wo wa em‑chehgi g s‑hasig haꞌichu. Mt wo padch ihda mo g Jiosh am eda kih. Kunt ahni ep wo i kegch mat d wo i waik tashk.”
D idam si e shoꞌoshodkad k hab kaij, “Giꞌikko gamai chuhdp (46) aꞌahid ab at hahawa i e nahto ihda geꞌe cheopi. Kuptp eda ahpi waik tash ab ia wo i kei.”
K eda g Jesus hejel hab e ahg mat wo e muhkid k uhpam ep wo e chegito.
Kutt s‑chegito g neꞌokij mat hekid uhpam e chegito am e muhkidk. Neh, bo chuꞌig g Jiosh oꞌohana mat uhpam wo e chegito g Jiosh si Kehsha. Kutt hahawa s‑amichud k ab s‑wohoch.
Am achd haꞌichugkahim Jerusalem t am wehs oidam g t‑shohshon ha‑doꞌibiadag wuhshda. Kud muꞌijj ab i s‑wohoch g Jesus. D wabshaba pi am hu i e tashogi ha wui mas hedai wud no pi s‑mahch mo heg wabsh hekaj ab s‑wohochud mo am neid mo hab juni him g s‑hasig haꞌichu.
<range>
Pi o hedai ab hu hiwig g Jesus mas am wo ahgi g hemajkam ha‑chegitoi no pi heki hu s‑mahch.
Am ad hema d si s‑has haꞌichu am t‑himdag ed ch d ge Palasi ch hab chehgig Nicodemas.
Kuchd am hu hebai dadha chuhug ch ed. D id am i chehgim g Jesus k hab kaij ab wui, “S‑mahch ach mat am i m‑kei g Jiosh mapt wo t‑mashcha. Pi at hedai wo e nako mas hejel hab wo juh hegai s‑hasig haꞌichu map hab junihim. Jiosh oki ab m‑mahkch g gewkdag.”
D hab kaij g Jesus, “Nt wo si shel m‑ahgi mat hegam d wo waꞌi Jiosh hemajkamgak mat hedai gokko wo mamsi. Bo wa chuꞌig g Jiosh kownaltalig.”
D hab kaij g Nicodemas, “Tt has hig masma ep wo mahsi heki hu kelitk. Aha natt am ep wo i wah t‑jeꞌe ed k ep wo mahsi?”
D g Jesus hab kaij, “Piaꞌa. Dam wabsh ha‑aꞌaliga ab ha ab mamsik. Bani m‑ahgid ab amjed g wechij doakag. Id at g Hekia S‑apꞌekam Gewkdag ab wo em‑mah mamt wo e chehgi g pahl wakonakaj mamt dagito g pi ap e‑chuꞌijig. Mt hab s‑ap am wo i wahp Jiosh kownaltalig ed.
<range>
Pi g am e todsid mani hab kaij mamt hemho wa ep wo mamsi.
Neh, kah ap g hewel m an hewelhog. Nap hig s‑mahch mas hebai amjed med ch hebai wo meh? Pegih, k hab wa masma pi ta machima hab e junihim g Hekia S‑apꞌekam Gewkdag ch an ha wechij mamsid mo hedai hab i elid.”
D g Nicodemas hab kaij, “A, kus has masma hab chuꞌig?”
D hab kaij g Jesus, “Aha, nap pi amichud ch eda d wa chum ge uhgk ha mashchamdam g Tutuligo?
Do si wohokam ihda mani m‑ahgid. M ach ahgachug mach haschu s‑ap s‑mahch ch am em‑ahgid mach haschu neid. M eda pi wohochud g haꞌichu t‑ahga.
Ihda mani em‑ahgid o in hab waꞌi e junihim jewed dahm. M eda pi ni‑wohochud ch hab pi wo e nako mams wo s‑ni‑wohoch mant am wo em‑ahgi mo haschu has e junihim an dahm kahchim ch ed.
An ani wa kih dahm kahchim ch ed ch d Jiosh si Kehsha. Kut pi hedai ep wo e nako mas hab masma wo em‑ahgi ab amjed mant ahni.”
D hab ep kaij g Jesus, “An o hab chuꞌig Jiosh oꞌohana ed matsh wa g t‑shohshonbad muꞌi e keꞌij g kohkꞌoikaj mash eda am oiopo tohono jewed ch ed. Kutsh wa g Mosesbad am hema hab juh g koꞌoi g kohwlikaj k ab uhgk ul uhs t ab. T hedai ab i neid k doa. Pegih, kumt ahni hab waꞌap uhgk wo i ni‑ul uhs t ab ahni Jiosh si Kehsha.
Kutp hedai ab wo ni‑hiwig k wo e doꞌibia ab amjed g pi ap e‑chuꞌijig.” Neh, bad kaij g Jesus.
Pegih neh, ab o si t‑tatchua g Jiosh ch hiwigi g e‑alidag mat am i e dagito k e muhkid am t‑wehhejed mach d pi ap chuꞌijkam. Kut pi wo bei g s‑koꞌok e‑namkidadag matp hedai ab wo hiwig k wabshaba g pi ha huhugedam doakag wo bei.
Jiosh at am cheha g e‑alidag mat in wo i wuhsh jewed dahm k wo ha doꞌibia g hemajkam. Kut pi heg hekaj in i wuhsh mas ab wo haꞌichu t‑mohtoꞌi.
Pi o ab hu haꞌichu mohtoꞌis hegam mo ab hiwig g Jiosh alidag. Hegam o ab heki hu haꞌichu mohtoꞌis mo pi ab hu hiwig.
Ia at jiwia jewed dahm hegai mo woho tonlidch g t‑chegitoidag. K wabshaba hegam mo hab s‑junimk g pi apꞌekam pi tatchua g tonlig nat pi wo mahsko wua g pi ap haꞌichu hab ha‑juni. K oi wa ab him g lodaita heg hekaj pi apꞌekam.
<range>
Hegam mo hab wua g s‑apꞌekam o tatchua g tonlig mat wo mahsko e wua mo hab wua g Jiosh tatchui.
Am i dahm, kuchd am i wuwha Jerusalem kihhim t amjed k am oiopohim Judea chekshani ch ed ch ha pahl wapkon g hemajkam.
Md eda wenog koi kuh hegai John mad ha pahl wapkon. Sh am oimmed ch ha pahl wapkon Aenon t am miabidch g Salim kihhim no pi am ge shohshon ch s‑shuhdagig.
<range>
Sh am haꞌichug hegam mash ab si wecho e mashcham. Kutsh am hema jiwia g t‑wehm oꞌodham k ha wehm neꞌowi ab amjed g pahl wakona.
Tsh idam am hahawa hihi John wui k hab kaij, “T‑mashchamdam, hema at wa am m‑wui jiwia map wa am ha pahl wapkon gam hu aigojed g Jordan akimel. Kup wa am si s‑mahch ch ahg mo hig woho d si s‑has haꞌichu. Pegih, heg ash hab waꞌap ha pahl wapkon. Kush wehsijj gam hu haꞌab him wui.”
Sh hab kaij g John, “Heg ach ab waꞌi bekch mo haschu g Jiosh ab t‑mahkch.
Bani wa kaij mani pi d Jiosh si Kehsha ch wabsh am haꞌichu i apꞌechud g ia jiwhiadaj wehhejed. Am am wa kah mani wa hab kaij.
Jiosh si Kehsha o heg wepogidas mo g wo ha hohntam. K g hemajkam heg wepogidas mo g wo ha hohnta. T g nawojij wo si s‑hehgigk mat hekid s‑ap wo e hohont. Bani wa masma si s‑hehgig mo ab wui him g hemajkam nani pi d nawojij.
Heg at am wo e maskogi mo hig woho d si s‑has haꞌichu. Kunt ahni im hu hab wabsh wo i ni‑junihi.” Neh, bash kaij g John.
Nt ahni hab wo chei mo g John d wabsh oꞌodham ch am t‑ahgid mo haschu i neid ch ep kah ia jewed dahm. T wabshaba g Jiosh alidag ia jiwia ab dahm kahchim t amjed k d si s‑has haꞌichu wehs haꞌichu dahm
ch am t‑ahgid mash haschu i neid ch ep kah an dahm kahchim ch ed. K wabshaba pi shaꞌi muꞌijj ab wohochud g ahgaj.
Jiosh at am cheha g e‑alidag mat ia wo jiwia jewed dahm k s‑baꞌama ab mah g Hekia S‑apꞌekam Gewkdag. K g alidaj heg hekaj ahg g neꞌokij. (33) Pegih, kuch heg hekaj s‑ap ab s‑wohochud g Jiosh neꞌoki ahchim mach ab s‑wohochud g alidaj ahga.
<range>
Jiosh o si pihk e elid ab e‑alidag wui ch wehs haꞌichu ab mah.
Kuch wehsijj uꞌukch g pi ha huhugedam doakag ahchim mach ab hiwig g alidaj. T hegam mat pi ab hu wo wohog el pi wo edagi g pi ha huhugedam doakag k wabshaba g s‑koꞌok e‑namkidadag wo edagi. T heg hab waꞌap pi hekid wo huhug.
D baꞌich i muꞌi hemajkam ab him Jesus wui mo ab wui g John kch ab wecho e mashcham. Kuchd ahchim ha pahl wapkon mach ab si wecho t‑mashcham. D am i kah hegam Palasi ihda k an si i neneo.
<range>
D hekaj g Jesus hab i e ah matt wo i wuwha ab Judea chekshani t amjed k gam hu uhpam wo hihi Galilee chekshani wui.
K eda idam ha shahgid chechkshani am hab chuꞌig g Samaria chekshani.
Kuchd heg am gai hihimad ch gam hu ai g Sychar kihhim mat am dahm juh. K am wawhiag miabidch g kihhim. D am dahiwua g Jesus gewkok natt pi mehk waꞌi hihi.
<range>
Kuchd ahchim gam hu hihi kihhim wui matt wo ha nolawt g haꞌichu hugi. D an hema i t‑bij g uwi waꞌigamedam k atsh am jiwia mo am daha g Jesus. Sh hab kaij g Jesus ab wui, “Ab g i ha ni‑wasbid g shuhdagi.”
<range>
Sh hab kaij g uwi, “Neh, dapki Tuhligo. Ni ahni d Samaria t am oꞌodham. P haschu ahgch ab ni‑tahni g wasib?” Neh, bash kaij nach pi s‑ha uhwaid ch chum hems g haꞌu pi ha wehm wo ha hekaj.
Sh g Jesus hab epai kaij ab wui, “Ahpi apt aigo ab wo haꞌichu ni‑tai maptp wo s‑mahchk mani hedai wud ch haschu i m‑makiog. Hegai mani m‑makiog o ab Jiosh d amjedkam ch heg wepogidas mo g shonkam shuhdagi.”
Sh hab ep kaij g uwi, “Pt has hig masma wo waꞌi map pi ha kuhwo? K eda s‑juhk g wawhia.
Aha nap baꞌich i gewkdag mo g t‑shohshon Jacobbad. Heg at ia wawhiat e‑oid ed k ia ihꞌehim g e‑aꞌaliga ha wehm ch haꞌichu e‑shoshoiga.”
Sh g Jesus hab kaij, “Huhume o g shuhdagi m‑waꞌigi. Kup ep tonommek.
T wabshaba pi hekid wo huhug hegai mani ahni m‑makiog. Heg at am wo m‑edak ch hab wo masmak mo g shonkam ch ab wo m‑mah g pi ha huhugedam doakag.”
Sh hab kaij g uwi, “Ih, pegih, si g s‑ni‑hoꞌigeꞌid k ab i ni‑mahki ihda shuhdagi mant pi hekid ep wo tonom k pi wo ge i waꞌigammedad.”
Sh hab kaij g Jesus, “Pegih, k ab wo i wai g e‑kun.”
Sh g uwi hab kaij, “Pi ani ha kun.” Sh hab hahawa ep kaij g Jesus, “Wohokam ap ahg map hab kaij map pi ha kun.
Hetasp ap waꞌi ha kuhkunkahim. K hegai map hemuch an wehm kih pi d m‑kun.”
Tsh ab wabsh ge nen k kekiwua g uwi k hab kaij, “Ih, dapki ge Jiosh haꞌichu i tashogiddam!
Pegih neh, am g ni‑ahgid mam haschu ahgch ahpim Tutuligo hab chechꞌe mo g Jerusalem d waꞌi amai mat am wo e ihmad g Jiosh. Ch eda ahchim Samaria t am kihkam ia haꞌab ihm mo hebai g t‑shohshon ihmahim id ab doꞌag.”
Sh hab kaij g Jesus, “Nt wo si shel m‑ahgi mo ab him g tash mat wabsh chum hebai wo e ihm g em‑ohg Jiosh, pi iia waꞌi id ab doꞌag o am Jerusalem t am.
T wabshaba g Jiosh ab i t‑gawulkai ahchim Tutuligo mat am gai t‑wuhshanim wo e maskogi am ha wui g nahnko mahs hemajkam. M ahpim Samaria t am oꞌodham pi koi am hu i si s‑mahch g Jiosh.
E at ai g tash mat g hemajkam si e‑ihbdag amjed woho ab wo ihmad g e‑ohg Jiosh. Bo masma hab ha elid g Jiosh mat hab masma ab wo ihmad.
Do wabsh doakag g Jiosh ch pi ha honshpadag mams am hebai wo kihchud k heg waꞌi eda wo ihmad. Pegih, mt wabsh chum hebai wo ihmad ch wehs e‑ihbdag amjed.”
Sh am wabsh shaꞌi pi amichud g uwi ch hab kaij ab wui, “Heg ani hi wa s‑mahch mat wo jiwia hegai mo d Jiosh si Kehsha ch hab e aꞌaga Christ k wehs haꞌichu wo t‑ahgi.”
Sh hab kaij g Jesus, “Dani ahni Jiosh si Kehsha.”
Kuchd edapk i dada. D am wabsh kia wehmaj neok hegai uwi. Kuchd si has i t‑elid k wabshaba pi has shaꞌi kaij.
D ihda uwi am wabsh i dagito g e‑haꞌa k gam hu si s‑hohtam uhpam hih kihhim wui k ash am ha ahgid k hab kaij,
“Oi g ab wo i hihim k wo nei hegai mo am wehs ni‑ahgid mani has i ni‑wua. Kutp hu d i Jiosh si Kehsha.”
Kudki ab ha hekaj i hihi g hemajkam s‑neidamk g Jesus.
D koi e chehm g hemajkam, kuchd ab chum si ahgid g Jesus mat wo haꞌichu huh.
D wabshaba hab kaij, “Am o haꞌichug g hab mahs gegosig mam ahpim pi shaꞌi mahch.”
Chd hab kaij ab aꞌai t‑wui, “A nat ia heki hu hema gegos?”
D hab kaij g Jesus ab t‑wui, “Ni‑gegosig o d ihda mant hab wo juh g Jiosh tatchui k wo nahto hegai chikpan mo ab ni‑mohtoꞌid.
Neh, bo e chechꞌe mat g ha‑esha wo i e baꞌiha mat d wo giꞌik i mashadk. Nt wabshaba wo em‑chehgi mat hemu si s‑hohtam wo e baꞌiha haꞌichu.
Ahni ant am ei g Jiosh haꞌichu ahga. Kumt ahpim wo ha baꞌiha hegam mat wo bei g pi ha huhugedam doakag. Kutt hekaj t‑wehm wo s‑hehgigk.
Id o heg wepogidas hab cheꞌidag mo hab chuꞌig, ‘Hema oꞌodham at am wo haꞌichu ei. T d wabsh wo hemak ch am wo hih g esha.’
Ab g wo neid hegam mo ab hihim. Pi amt ha ahgi g Jiosh haꞌichu ahga k wabshaba wo ha baꞌiha hegam mat wo e doꞌibia.”
Kud wa muꞌijj hegam kihkam ab i s‑wohoch mo g Jesus d Jiosh si Kehsha heg hekaj mo hab kaij hegai uwi, “Heg o wehs ni‑ahgid mani has i ni‑wua.”
D heg hekaj ab si ahgid g Jesus am wui dadak mat wo si s‑ha hoꞌigeꞌid k am wo kia ha wehmajkahim heꞌekia tash. Kuchd wa woho am ha wehmajkahim gohk tash.
D muꞌijj ab ep i s‑wohoch ab i kaiok g ahgaj
k hab hahawa kaij idam heg wui uwi, “B att hahawa si hejel kah k ab s‑wohochud k s‑mahch moki woho d wehs hemajkam t‑doꞌibiakam id dahm jewed.”
Kuchd amjed gam hu hahawa haꞌab hihi Galilee chekshani wui
no pi hab kaij g Jesus, “No hu d wabsh i neida g Jiosh haꞌichu i tashogiddam amai mo hebai d si kihj am jewed.”
D wabshaba muꞌijj g hemajkam amai ab haꞌichugkahim Jerusalem t ab ch wuhshad g t‑shohshon ha‑doꞌibiadag ch am neid g Jesus. Kud wa am hab wua g s‑hasig haꞌichu. D idam si s‑hehgig ch ab neid g Jesus matt ged hu dada.
Kuchd oi wa gam hu haꞌab hihi Cana kihhim wui mat wa am si wehpeg hab juh g si s‑hasig haꞌichu mat wa wabsh g shuhdagi nawaitt. D am hema jiwia g kownal pionag ab Capernaum kihhim t amjed am i kaiok mo am haꞌichug g Jesus. Sh id alidag muhkhim. D hab kaij ihda ab wui g Jesus mat am wo hih Capernaum wui k wo doaj g alidaj.
<range>
D hab wabsh kaij g Jesus ab wui, “Aha, namt pi hedai ab hu wo i s‑ni‑wohoch, mt hekid wo ipki nei mant hab wo juh g si s‑hasig haꞌichu?”
D am hab waꞌap kaij g s‑has haꞌichu, “Ab g si i s‑ni‑hoꞌigeꞌid k wo ni‑oi am ni‑kih wui mat koi wo muh g ni‑aliga.”
D hab hahawa kaij g Jesus ab wui, “Gamai g s‑ap e tahtk hihm. T wo doa g m‑aliga.” D si i ihbheiwua ihda s‑wohochudk k gam hu hahawa hih uhpam.
Sh am himad ch ab haꞌi ha nam g e‑pionag mash si s‑hehgig ch hab kaij, “Tki wo doa g m‑aliga.”
Sh am hahawa ha kakke, “Heꞌekia ohla k ed at ab i apꞌetahi.” Sh hab kaij g piongaj, “Do i hemako ohla tako mat jumal gei g s‑tonjig ab ab.”
Sh am ha hekaj i chegito g ohgaj mo am d wabsh i si hegai ohla mo hab ahgid g Jesus, “T wo doa g m‑aliga.” Tsh ged hu jiwia e‑kih am k am si aꞌaga ihda g e‑wehm kihkam ha wehm. Tsh wehsijj ab i s‑wohoch mo g Jesus d Jiosh si Kehsha.
Neh, id o d i gokkokam s‑hasig haꞌichu mat hab juh g Jesus ia Galilee chekshani ch ed.
D am hahawa hema i e aihi g t‑mihshmda piast. Kuchd hekaj gam hu hihi Jerusalem wui.
Am o hema woꞌog kihhim ch ed ch hab e aꞌaga Bethsada ch an miabidch hegai kolhai kihjeg mam an ha gagda g kahwal. K an hetasp wapttog heg wehgaj woꞌo.
K idam ha wecho shaꞌi muꞌi nahnko mahs kokꞌodam an woꞌowop ch haꞌi d pi neneadam ch haꞌi d pi hihimidkam ch haꞌi ab wabsh i s‑momoik. [Kush idam nenida g shuhdagi matsh am wo i hoi
no pi hab elid mash hab hu g anghil am i huhuduk shuhdagi ch ed ch am i nonoig g shuhdagi. T hedai si wehpeg am wo hud shuhdagi ch ed mat am wabsh wo chum i nonoi k ash hab hu wo s‑doajima ab e‑mumkidag amjed.]
D am hema woꞌo g oꞌodham ch waikko wehst‑mahm gamai gigiꞌik (34) aꞌahid ab waꞌi mumku.
D g Jesus am neid ch s‑mahch mo tash am waꞌi woꞌo ch hab kaij ab wui, “Nap tatchua mapt wo doa?”
D hab kaij g mumkudam, “Ni‑nawoj, pi o an hu hedaig mas am wo i ni‑huduni shuhdagi ch ed mo hekid am i hoike. Ni im hu haha wabsh i ni‑nakog mant am wo i hud, k gam hu heki hu hema ni‑baꞌiwichchek.”
D hab kaij g Jesus, “I wuhshani k am behꞌi g e‑wahkus k hihm!”
Neh, d ha hekaj doa k am bei g e‑wahkus k s‑ap hih. Id ad hab e juh chum t‑mihshmda tash ed ahchim Tutuligo.
D haꞌi neid g t‑wehm oꞌodham ch hab ahg, “Neh, ahpi, melchkwua ap g t‑chehanig map kushwiotch g e‑wahkus. A nap pi mahch mo d mihshmda tash?”
D hab hahawa kaij hegai mo wa mumkuhim, “Hegai mat ni‑doaj o hab ni‑ahg mant am wo bei g ni‑wahkus k wo hih.”
D ab hahawa kakke mas hedai wud hegai mo hab ahg mat wo kushwiotk hih g e‑wahkus.
D wabshaba am wabsh i pi e amich nad pi g Jesus im hu pi e mahsid hemajkam ha shahgid no pi shaꞌi muꞌijj g hemajkam amai.
D am hahawa g Jesus s‑neidam k am cheh geꞌe cheopi ch ed k hab ahg, “Neh, doa apt. Pi g am hu hab i ep junihim g pi apꞌekam nat pi haꞌichu baꞌich i pi ap hab wo e juh am m‑tahgio mapt am hab ep wo i junihi g pi apꞌekam.”
D am i wuhshani k gam hu him k am ha ahgi moki d Jesus mat doaj.
D am i s‑mai idam mash d Jesus mat hab juh ihda mihshmda tash ed k heg hekaj am i kudu ab neꞌowinch.
D g Jesus hab kaij ab ha wui, “Ni‑ohg Jiosh o chum hekid g s‑apꞌekam chikpan. Ni ahni hab waꞌap chum hekid hab ni‑wua.”
D am hahawa i si e gewpkai mat wo mua nad pi am i kah mo hab masma ihm g Jiosh ch heg hekaj e wepogid g Jiosh.
D hab hahawa kaij g Jesus ab ha wui, “Nt wo si shel em‑ahgi mani pi haꞌichu hejel hab wua ch wabshaba hab wua mo haschu g ni‑ohg Jiosh ni‑chehani.
Ni‑ohg o ab si pihk ni‑elid ch am ni‑chehgid mant has wo chum juni. T ab wo ni‑mah g gewkdag mant baꞌich i geꞌe haꞌichu hab wo juh mo ihda. Mt ab wabsh wo i hahaꞌadka.
Ni‑ohg o i ha wuwhasid g koꞌi ab muhkig amjed ch ab ni‑mahkch g gewkdag mant s‑ap hab wo juh. Nt hekaj ab wo i ha wuwhas mani hedai hab i elid.
K g ni‑ohg pi hedai ha lodait ch wabshaba ahni ab ni‑mah hegai apꞌedag mant wo ha lodai
no pi hab elid mat wehsijj ab wo si has i ni‑el hab masma mo ab si has i elid g ni‑ohg. Am at i ni‑kei g Jiosh. T hedai pi ab hu has wo ni‑elidad ch hab wa masma pi ab hu has elid g ni‑ohg.
“Do si wohokam ihda mant hab wo chei. T wo edagi g pi ha huhugedam doakag k am wo wehmajk g Jiosh hegam mat hedai ab wo kaihamad g haꞌichu ni‑ahga ch ab wo hiwgad g Jiosh. Pi ant ab hu wo ha mohtoꞌi g ha‑chuꞌijig mas hekaj gm hu hab wo i e juh ab amjed g Jiosh.
Nt wo si shel em‑ahgi mo ab him g tash, pej heki hu e ai, mant ab wo i ha wai g koꞌi ahni Jiosh alidag. T hegam mat ab i kaiha g haꞌichu ni‑ahga ab wo i wuwha.
Ni‑ohg o d hegai mo ab ha mahkch g doakag ch ab ni‑mahkch g gewkdag mant hab waꞌap wo ha mah g doakag.
T ab ni‑mah g gewkdag mant ahni hab wo juh g lodaita nani pi d si Kehshaj.
“Pi g am wo e totodsid id hekaj mani has i kaij. Ab o him g tash mat wehs g koꞌi s‑ap wo ni‑kah k ab wo i wuwha.
Hegam mo hab junihim g s‑apꞌekam at ab wo i e wamgid k ab wo bei g e‑apꞌedag. T hegam mo hab junihim g pi apꞌekam ab wo i e wamgid k ab wo bei g s‑koꞌok e‑namkidadag.”
D hab ep kaij g Jesus, “Pi ant wo shaꞌi ni‑nako mant hejel haꞌichu hab wo juh k wabshaba am si ni‑ohg oidk hab masma wo ha lodai. K hekaj hab s‑apꞌe g ni‑lodaita.
“Pi amt wo mahchk manis am ahg g wohokam mantp wabsh hejel wo ni‑wohokamch.
K heg hekaj am wa ni‑wehhejed neok g ni‑ohg Jiosh. Kuni s‑mahch mo d wohokam mo am ahg ab ni‑amjed.
“Neh, am amt wa haꞌi hihi heg wui John mo wa em‑pahl wapkonahim. K wa am em‑ahgid g wohokam.
Id ani hab wabsh kaij mamt hekaj wo e doꞌibia nam pi ahpim heg tatchua mat g oꞌodham am wo i wohokamch haꞌichu mamt ab haha wo i s‑wohoch. Ni ahni hi heki hu s‑mahch mani hedai wud ch pi shaꞌi tatchua mas am hema wo ge i ni‑wohokamch.
John o wa ahgachug g wohokam ch hekaj em‑tonlidch. Kumt wa haꞌijj ahpim heꞌes ab si s‑hohhoꞌi g haꞌichu ahgaj k an e hehemapaid wehgaj hab masma mat g huꞌul nahgi wo s‑hohhoꞌi g tonlig.
“John o s‑ap ni‑wohokamchud. K wabshaba ahni ab ni‑mahkch g Jiosh mani g s‑hasig haꞌichu hab wua. K id baꞌich i s‑ap ni‑wohokamchud mani d ni‑ohg kehsha.
Pi am hekid neid g Jiosh. K pi hekid ab hu em‑wuhiosha neid ch neok ch wabshaba am ni‑wohokamchud mani d kehshaj.
Am o ni‑wohokamchud g Jiosh mani d si Kehshaj. Kum eda pi ab hu ni‑tatchua nam ge wohochud.
Am am si hoan g Jiosh oꞌohana nam pi tatchua mamt wo e doꞌibia k wo edgidad g pi ha huhugedam doakag. K g Jiosh oꞌohana am ni‑wohokamchud
mani ahni d em‑doꞌibiakam. M eda pi ab hu ni‑hiwig.
“Neh, pi ani heg nenꞌoid mas g hemajkam ab wo si ni‑haꞌichuch. Jiosh at ab wo si ni‑haꞌichuch.
Kuni s‑em‑amichud ch s‑mahch mam pi ab hu shaꞌi tatchua g Jiosh.
Ia ant jiwia g ni‑ohg si wehhejed. Kum pi ab hu has ni‑elid. Hegam at ab has d wo em‑elidak matp hedam wabsh hejel e wehhejed ab wo i wuwha.
Pi amt has masma ab hu wo s‑wohoch g Jiosh nam pi heg am waꞌi s‑nenꞌoid mamt ab aꞌai wo si has i e el. K eda d chum Jiosh mamt ab wo chum hehgchul.
Ni wabshaba pi d ahni manis ab wo haꞌichu em‑abch am ni‑ohg wui. Mosesbad chehanig am ab hiwig. K d hegai mat am wo tashogi g pi ap em‑chuꞌijig.
Mosesbad at haꞌichu oꞌoha ab ni‑amjed. Kumt ab wo s‑ni‑wohoch mamt hems woho ab wo s‑wohochudad g Mosesbad oꞌohana.
Pi amt has masma ab hu wo s‑wohoch g ni‑ahga namki pi woho wohochud mat haschu an oꞌoha g Mosesbad.” Neh, bad kaij g Jesus am ha mihshmadch. Am i amjed, tt gam hu hahawa hihi Jerusalem t amjed.
Am hu hebai ep amjed machd an oiopohim Galilee Kahchki hugid an ch gam hu hahawa i chehchsh haꞌabjed k am dada.
D eda muꞌi hemajkam chum hekid an oidahim g Jesus neidok mo g s‑hasig haꞌichu hab wua ha doajidch g kokꞌodam.
D ab i chesh g Jesus kawulk t ab. Kuchd ahchim waꞌi mach ab si wecho t‑mashcham am i oid k am wehmaj dadhaiwua.
D eda e aihim mat wo e wuhshad g t‑shohshon ha‑doꞌibiadag.
Kud muꞌi hegam mad gam hu wo piasto ab i hihi s‑kaimkch g Jesus. D am i ha nei g Jesus k hab kaij ab Philip wui, “Neh, Philip, chs hebai hig wo ui g haꞌichu hugi matt wo ha gegos haꞌakia i hemajkam?”
Bo kaij ch wabsh s‑aꞌappemamk g Philip no pi wa chum s‑mahch mat has masma hab wo juh.
D hab kaij g Philip, “Pi att wo shaꞌi t‑nako. Chum achs hems gohk siant pihshkaj wo ui g pahn, t eda pi wo ha ai g haꞌakia hemajkam.”
D hegai mo d Simon Peter nawoj ch hab chehgig Andrew hab kaij,
“Ia o hema haꞌichug g ali ch hi wa hetasp sismito ch gohk waptopi uꞌa. T wabshaba pi haꞌichu ab hu wo shaꞌi ha nako haꞌakia hemajkam ha wehhejed”.
D ab hahawa t‑ahgid g Jesus matt wo ha cheha g hemajkam mat wo dadhaiwua no pi an s‑washaig. D am i wehsijj dadhaiwua g hemajkam k d hetasp mihl chechoj ch muꞌi ehp g uꞌuwi ch aꞌal.
D g Jesus am ui g sismito k ab hoꞌigeꞌel g Jiosh k ab t‑mah. Kuchd ahchim an hahawa i ha mahkhi g hemajkam. D hab waꞌap juh hegam gohk waptopi. Kuchd wehsijj hug k si s‑kokwod.
D hab hahawa t‑ahg g Jesus, “An g wo i uꞌihim g ha‑wiꞌa. Kutt pi haꞌichu wo shaꞌi heki wua.”
Kuchd an i uꞌihim k gamai gohk wapshomi ha shuhshud heg hekaj wihpiꞌidag.
Neh, d am i nei g hemajkam mat si s‑hasig haꞌichu hab juh g Jesus k hab kaij, “Neh, mo d wabsh i si shel moki id d hegai Jiosh haꞌichu i tashogiddam mach nenida matsh ia wo jiwia id dahm jewed.”
D g Jesus ha amich mat an wabsh wo si be k wo geꞌe kownalch k hekaj gam hu hejel baꞌich i chesh doꞌag t ab.
Hudunihim o g tash. Kuchd gam hu i huhud
k am chum i chehchsh g wahlkokaj Capernaum wui nad pi hab t‑ah g Jesus k hab kaij matsh pi oi gam hu wo hih. D am i s‑chuk.
D g s‑gewk hewel ab i med k ab i kudu g shuhdagi.
Kuchd am himchud g wahlko am hu i giꞌik mihya. D ab haha wabsh hema him t‑wui an wabsh shuhdagi dahm. Kuchd hab i neidok si t‑totods.
D ab hahawa t‑wui neo k oki d Jesus ch hab kaij, “Pi g am wo e totodsid. Ahni ani wud”.
Kuchd si s‑ap i t‑taht k gan hu i cheshajch wahlko ch ed. Neh chd am waꞌi hekaj gan hu aigo dada mach am haꞌab t‑tatchua.
Baꞌich i siꞌalim, d hegam hemajkam mad ab wih s‑mahch mad pi i t‑oi g Jesus no wa pi neid mo d hemako g wahlko. Kuchd ahchim waꞌi heg ab an dadhaiwua k i hihi.
D idam an chum gagahim ch pi cheh g Jesus k nei matt pi am hu ep dada. D oi wa am i haꞌi dada g wapalko ab Tiberias kihhim t amjed miabidk mat am ha gegos g Jesus hegam muꞌi hemajkam. D idam hemajkam an e baꞌiham k gam hu i gahgio Capernaum wui
<range>
K hekid am i chehg k hab kaij ab wui, “T‑mashchamdam, hekid apt ia i jiwia?”
D hab kaij g Jesus, “Am ani woho ni‑chehgidch em‑wui heg hekaj s‑hasig haꞌichu mani hab wua. M wabshaba pi heg hekaj ab s‑ni‑wohochudamk. Neh am ant em‑gegos. Kumt kokwod k heg wai hekaj ni‑gahg.
Pi g am wo si e kudutad wabsh g haꞌichu hugikaj ch wabshaba heg wo chum s‑behim mo d pi ha huhugedam. Ahni ani em‑makiog g pi ha huhugedam doakag. Heg at hekaj am i ni‑kei g Jiosh k am ni‑wohokamch.”
D hab kaij g hemajkam, “Tt has wo t‑juh k ab wo bei g pi ha huhugedam doakag?”
D g Jesus hab ha ahg, “Ihda waꞌi mamt ab wo ni‑hiwgad ahni Jiosh si Kehsha.”
D hab ep kaij g hemajkam, “Am g hig hab juhni g s‑hasig haꞌichu. T heg am wo t‑chehgi map woho d Jiosh si Kehsha. Tt ab wo s‑m‑wohoch.
Neh, ab ash gegshshe dahm kahchim t amjed hegai haꞌichu hugi mash hab e aꞌaga ‘manna’. Kush heg koꞌa g t‑shohshon mash am jeg ed oiopo. Bo chuꞌig g Mosesbad oꞌohana: Ab o ha mahk hegai haꞌichu hugi mo am gegshe ab dahm kahchim t amjed. Pegih, pt ahpi has hig wo juh?”
D hab ep kaij g Jesus, “Pi o d Mosesbad mo wa ab ha mahk hegai haꞌichu hugi. Do ni‑ohg mo wa hab wua. K heg d wabsh haꞌichu hugi mo wa heg hekaj d dodakam jewed dahm. K g ni‑ohg baꞌich i s‑kehg haꞌichu ab em‑makiog
mamt heg hekaj d wo dodakamk chum hekid. Id o heg wa wepo mo d s‑kehg haꞌichu hugi. Kumt wo be k heg ab wo bei g s‑kehg doakag.”
D ab si tahni ch hab kaij idam, “Ih, pegih, ab g chum hekid t‑mahkad ihda map hab ahg.”
D hab kaij g Jesus, “Ahni ani wud mo g ni‑ohg ab em‑makiog. Ab g wo ni‑hiwig. Nt wo em‑mah g pi ha huhugedam doakag. Id at heg wo wa wepok mamt wo huh g hab mahs haꞌichu mamt chum hekid d wo dodakamk ch pi hekid ep wo bihugk.
Nehꞌe mani wa hab wa heki hu kaij mam wa chum ni‑neid ch eda pi ab hu ni‑wui e dagitokch.
T wabshaba wehs ab ni‑wui wo i e dagito hegam mat g ni‑ohg am ha eda wo i chikp. Nt pi hedai wo shaꞌi ohhod mat ab wo i e dagito ni‑wui.
Do ni‑ohg tatchui mamt ab ni‑wui wo i e dagito ch hab wo edagi g pi ha huhugedam doakag. Nt wo si em‑nuhkudad mamt pi hedai wo heb hu wua g e‑doꞌibiadag. Kunt ab wo i em‑wuwhas muhkig t amjed mat hekid wo huhug ihda jewed. Id o d ni‑ohg tatchui. Kunt heg hekaj ia jiwia ab dahm kahchim t amjed.”
<range>
<range>
D g hahaꞌichu si gahghai e mohmgid ch s‑babgam neneok
ch hab kaij, “K haschu ahgch hab kaij mat ia jiwia ab dahm kahchim t amjed? S‑mahch ach ch ep s‑ha mahch g jehj. Do wabsh Jesus ch d alidaj g Josephbad.”
D hab kaij g Jesus, “Pi g am wo gahghai e mohmgid k s‑babgam neneok.
Pi at hedai wo shaꞌi e nako mas ab wabsh hejel wo i e dagito ni‑wui. Jiosh ni‑ohg at am wo i chikp ha eda. T hekaj ab ni‑wui wo i e dagito. T ab wo i e ai g si oidchkam tash. Nt ab wo i ha wuwhas muhkig t amjed.
Kekelibad Jiosh Haꞌichu i tashogiddam atki wa an oꞌoha: Wehsijj at wo ha mashcha g Jiosh g hemajkam. Neh, t ab ni‑wui wo i e dagito matp hedai ab wo kaiha g Jiosh ni‑ohg k ab wo mai g mashchamaj.
Pi am hedai g e‑wuhpuikaj neid g ni‑ohg. Ahni ani waꞌi neid nant pi ab amjed ia jiwia.
“Neh, hegam mat ab wo i s‑ni‑wohochud k wo ni‑bei at hekaj wo edagi g pi ha huhugedam doakag.
T‑shohshon ash wa koꞌa hegai manna ch wabshaba pi heg hekaj edagi g pi ha huhugedam doakag. Mt wo edagi hegai pi ha huhugedam doakag ab ni‑bek. Id o heg wa wepo mani d haꞌichu hugi em‑wehhejed.
<range>
Baꞌich ani d i s‑kehg haꞌichu hugi mo hi hegai manna namt pi g pi ha huhugedam doakag wo edagi ab ni‑bek.
I atsh gei g manna ab dahm kahchim t amjed k ab ha mahkch g doakag. Ni wabshaba d ahni mant woho ia jiwia ab Jiosh kihdag amjed k ia uꞌapa g pi ha huhugedam doakag. Nt wo dagito g ni‑chuhkug mant wo ni‑muhkid k hab wo ha doꞌibia g hemajkam.”
D id kaiok am si s‑babgam e neꞌowi g hahaꞌichu hab kaijch, “Pi at has shaꞌi masma wo t‑mah g e‑chuhkug machs wo huh.”
D hab kaij g Jesus, “Pi amt wo edagi g pi ha huhugedam doakag pi ab hu ni‑bek ahni Jiosh si Kehsha.
Ab amt wo i s‑wohoch mant wo iawua g ni‑ehꞌed k wo muh em‑wehhejed k hab wo edagi g pi ha huhugedam doakag. Id at heg wo wa wepok mamt wo huh g ni‑chuhkug k wo ih g ni‑ehꞌed. Kunt ab wo i em‑wuwhas muhkig t amjed mat hekid wo kuhgit g jewed.
Ihda ni‑chuhkug ch ni‑ehꞌed o heg wa wepo mo d haꞌichu hugi ch haꞌichu iꞌidag.
T wo edagi g wechij doakag hegam mat ab wo ni‑bei. Am ant ha eda wo ul g ni‑doakag.
Ni‑ohg at wa am ni‑cheha mant ia wo jiwia jewed dahm. Kuni d pi ha huhugedam doakam no pi g ni‑ohg d pi ha huhugedam doakam. T hab waꞌap d wo pi ha huhugedam doakamk matp hedam ab wo ni‑bei nant pi am ha eda wo ni‑ulinid chum hekid.
Heg ani hekaj pi hab masma mo hegai manna. Hegam mash wa koꞌa hegai at pi heg hekaj edagi g pi ha huhugedam doakag. T wabshaba wo edagi matp hedam ab wo ni‑bei.”
Neh, bad kaij g Jesus mad eda am ha mashcham g hemajkam ha‑cheopi ed amai Capernaum t am.
D muꞌijj hegam mo am t‑wehm oid g Jesus hab hahawa kaij, “Shoꞌoki waꞌi si s‑hasig ihda mashchamaj ch pi ab hu ta kaihama.”
D g Jesus wabsh ha amich mo has kaij an s‑juꞌujpij neneokch k hab kaij ab ha wui, “Pi amki hohhoꞌid g ni‑mashchama
ch eda wo nei mant am uhpam ep wo hih dahm kahchim wui ahni Jiosh si kehsha.
Pi amt wo bei g pi ha huhugedam doakag ab amjed g haꞌichu hugi k wabshaba ab wo s‑wohoch g haꞌichu ni‑ahga. Kunt ab wo cheha g Hekia S‑apꞌekam Gewkdag mat am em‑eda wo i e ulin k wo em‑mahkad g pi ha huhugedam doakag.
Kum eda haꞌijj pi ab hu ni‑wohochud.” Neh, bo kaij g Jesus no pi s‑mahch mat hedam pi ab hu wo wohoch ch ep s‑mahch mat hedai wo gagda mat wo e muhkid.
D hab ep kaij, “Pi amt hedai wo e nako mams ab wo s‑ni‑wohochud k wo ni‑bei, heg hi wa mat g ni‑ohg am wo i chikp em‑eda.”
D muꞌijj hegam mo am t‑wehm oid g Jesus dagito am i kaiok g s‑hasig haꞌichu ahgaj k pi dahm an hu hahawa ep wehmaj.
D heg hekaj hab kaij g Jesus ab t‑wui ahchim gamai gohk, “Mt ahpim has wo e juh? Namt hab waꞌap wo ni‑dagito?”
D g Simon Peter hab kaij ab wui, “T‑kownalig, pi o an hu hedai ehp machs heg wui wo hihi. Ahpi ap waꞌi am ahgachug hegai matt hekaj wo bei g pi ha huhugedam doakag.
Ch hahawa s‑wohochud ch s‑mahch map ahpi d hekia s‑apꞌekam ch ab amjed i hih g Jiosh.”
D hab kaij g Jesus, “Heuꞌu, woho o wa. Kunt am i em‑chuhcha ahpim gamai gohk mamt id an wo ahgachugad. M wabshaba hema d wabsh sha jiawul.”
Pi achd mahch mas hedai hab ahg. Kuki eda heg hab ahg Judas mo d alidaj g Simon Iscariot ch d hema ahchim gamai gohk ch atki wo gagda g Jesus.
Am amsh chum s‑muꞌamk g Jesus Judea chekshani ch ed. D hekaj pi am hu himimk. Kuchd an oiopo Galilee chekshani ch ed.
D eda e aihim hegai piast mach ab ihm g Jiosh mo babhaijid g t‑eꞌes.
D heg hekaj hab kaij g Jesus wepnag ab wui, “Pt hems gm hu wo hih iꞌajed Judea wui. T wo nei g s‑hasig m‑chikpan hegam mo wa an m‑oidahim Judea ch ed.
Pi apt wo ge ehstod hegai map hab junihim maptp wo tatchuad mat ab wo i m‑mai g hemajkam. Am g ha chehgid g hemajkam map hab wua g s‑hasig haꞌichu.”
Neh, bad kaij noki pi koi wohochud mo d Jiosh si Kehsha.
D hab kaij g Jesus ab ha wui, “Pi ant am hu wo em‑oi id wui gegosig nat pi koi e ai mant am wo si s‑ap i ni‑maskogi. Mt gamai wo hihi namt pi ahpim hi wa wabsh chum hekid am wo e chehgi. Pi o am hu haꞌichug mas heg hekaj wo s‑em‑kehꞌidad g hemajkam. K wabshaba ahni s‑ni‑kehꞌid nani pi chum hekid ab ha ahgid mo am hab junihim g pi apꞌekam.”
<range>
<range>
Neh, bad kaij ab ha wui ch am wabsh i wih Galilee ch ed.
Heg i dahm mad gam hu hihi g Jesus wepnag, d am hahawa epai him k wabshaba wabsh s‑aꞌagi. Kuchd ahchim gam hu i oi.
Sh hegam mo d hahaꞌichu am Judea ch ed an gahg ch an kaiam mas hebai has chuꞌig.
D eda an s‑juꞌujpij neneok g hemajkam ch hab kaij, “Do si s‑ap oꞌodham.” D haꞌi hab ep kaij, “Pi o ap d oꞌodham no pi t‑iattogid.”
K wabshaba s‑aꞌagi an aꞌaga no pi s‑ha ehbid g hahaꞌichu.
Kud eda hugkam waꞌi hih g piast. D am hih g Jesus geꞌe cheopi wui k am i ha mashcha.
D hegam hahaꞌichu si has i elid k hab kaij, “S has hig masma geꞌe haꞌichu s‑mahch ihda oꞌodham mat eda pi shaꞌi e mashcha g papal ha‑mashchama?”
D hab kaij g Jesus ab ha wui, “Jiosh at ab ni‑cheha mant ia wo jiwia jewed dahm. K d Jiosh mashchamadag ihda mani i ha mashcham.
Tp hedai wo i tatchuad mat am hab wo juh g Jiosh tatchui wo chum s‑mahchk mas wa woho d Jiosh amjedkam ihda mani i ha mashcham.
Hegai mat wo ah g hejel e‑mahchig at wabsh wo chum si e haschud k atp hems d s‑chu iattomkam. Nt wabshaba ahni ab haꞌichuchud g Jiosh ch am ahg g wohokam.
Bam chum e wua mam am hab si junihim hegai chehanig mat wa g Jiosh ab mah g Moses am em‑wehhejed. M wabshaba pi woho hab junihim nam pi s‑ni‑muꞌamk.”
D ab si neneok g hemajkam ch hab kaij, “P haschu ahgch hab kaij mam s‑m‑muꞌamk? Jiawul o an uꞌukch g m‑chegitoidag.”
D hab kaij g Jesus ab ha wui, “Woho am s‑ni‑muꞌamk. Ha ant dodaj mihshmda tash ed. Kum heg hekaj s‑ni‑muꞌamk.
Neh, nt am wo em‑chehgi mam ahpim hab waꞌap wua g chikpan mihshmda tash ed. Mosesbad atki wa an oꞌoha mat haschu g Jiosh heki hu ab ha cheha g t‑shohshon mamt wo ha pahl hikuch g e‑chechoj aꞌaliga mat d wo i gigiꞌik tashk ab ha‑mahsidag amjed. Kum heg hab wua chum as hems d wo mihshmda tashk
mamt pi wo mul hegai chehanig matki g Mosesbad an oꞌoha. Pegih, mt haschu ahgk babgat mant hema s‑ap doaj am mihshmda tash ed?
Am g wo si i aꞌamichud mamt s‑ap wo s‑mahchk haꞌichu.”
D haꞌijj hab kaij g Jerusalem t am kihkam, “Aha no hig pi woho d ihda mam chum s‑muꞌamk.
K eda haschu ahgch pi hedai has ahg? K ia t‑jehnigid. Aha no hab elid g hahaꞌichu mo wa woho d Jiosh si Kehsha?
S has hig masma d wo hegaik mach eda s‑mahch mo hedai d amjedkam ch hebai d kihkam. Kutsh wa eda g Jiosh si Kehsha pi hedai wo mahchk mat hebaijed ia wo jiwia.”
D si s‑kaidam hab kaij g Jesus, “Pegih, s‑mahch am mani hedai wud ch hebaijed him. Nt wabshaba pi wabsh hejel ni‑wehhejed i hih. Jiosh o ab ni‑chehani mant ia wo i wuhsh jewed dahm. Kum pi mahch g Jiosh ch hekaj pi woho ni‑mahch. Ahni ani hi s‑mahch ch ep s‑mahch mo d wohokam nant pi ab amjed i hih.” Neh, bad kaij g Jesus am ha mashchamch geꞌe cheopi ch ed.
<range>
Kumd am hahawa chum bei. T wabshaba pi koi e ai g tashgaj. D pi e nako idam.
Kud muꞌi ab i s‑wohochud k wabsh s‑juꞌujpij hab kaij ab aꞌai e wui, “Naꞌas woho d Jiosh si Kehsha nat pi pi hedai wo shaꞌi e nako mas hab wo juh hegai hab mahs s‑hasig haꞌichu mo ihda hab wua.”
D am haꞌi oiopo g Palasi ch am i kah hegai mo hab e kaij k am hihim k atsh am ha ahgi g uꞌugchu papal. Tsh hegam am ha cheha g geꞌe cheopi nuhkuddam mat an wo bei g Jesus.
D hab kaij g Jesus, “Pi ant shaꞌi tash ia hu wo em‑wehmajkahim ch gam hu hahawa uhpam wo hih heg wui mat ia i ni‑ahꞌad.
Kumt wo chum ni‑gahgad ch wabshaba pi wo ni‑edgid k pi wo e nako mams am wo hihi mant hebai wo haꞌichugk.”
D am wabsh i pi amich g hemajkam k hab kaij ab aꞌai e wui, “A t hebai wo hih, chs hab pi wo edagi?” D haꞌi hab ep kaij, “Naꞌas gam hu wo hih goꞌol hemajkam ha‑kihhim wui mo am haꞌichug g t‑wehm oꞌodham k wo ha mashcha g goꞌol hemajkam.
A shahꞌo d ahga mo hab kaij matt wo chum gahgad ch wabshaba pi wo edgid k pi wo t‑nako machs am wo hihi mat hebai wo haꞌichugk.”
D am i e ai g si oidchkam tash mo baꞌiwechkim d si geꞌe tash heg eda piast. D am e hemapadch g hemajkam. Kud g Jesus am si amog ch hab kaij, “Ab g wo i e dagito ni‑wui k ab wo bei g wechij doakag hab masma mamt hemho wa wo ih am i tonomk.
Bo chuꞌig g Jiosh oꞌohana mamtp hedai ab ni‑wui wo i e dagito k heg wa wepo mamt wo edgidad g shonkam shuhdagi am e‑ihbdag ed. T heg chum hekid ab wo daꞌiwunid.”
Bo kaij g Jesus ch hab ahg matt ab wui wo i t‑dagito k hekaj wo bei g Hekia S‑apꞌekam Gewkdag. K eda wenog koi ab hu t‑mahks g Hekia S‑apꞌekam Gewkdag nat pi koi gahi wuhsh g muhkig g Jesus k koi bei g e‑kownaltalig.
D muꞌi hab kaij am i kaiok, “Ihda oꞌodham oki d wa woho hegai Jiosh haꞌichu i tashogiddam mach nenida.”
D hai hab ep kaij, “Doki Jiosh si Kehsha.” D wabshaba haꞌijj hab epai kaij, “Pi oki d shaꞌi hegai no pi d Galilee t am oꞌodham.
K eda an hab chuꞌig Jiosh oꞌohana ed matsh g Jiosh si Kehsha ab d wo t‑kownaligbad David amjedkamk ch ab wo amjedk g Bethlehem kihhim. Am ash d kihkam g Davidbad Bethlehem t am.”
D heg hekaj ab aꞌai e wui gegokiwua g hemajkam.
Haꞌijj o chum s‑kuhpamk. D wabshaba pi hedai shaꞌi e nako mas hab juh.
D am uhpam hihi g geꞌe cheopi nuhkuddam am ha wui g uꞌugchu papal ch Palasi. D idam ab ha kakke ch hab kaij, “Shahchu amt ahgk pi an hu bei?”
D hab kaij g geꞌe cheopi nuhkuddam, “Pi o hekid hedai hab shaꞌi kaidam neok mo ihda.”
D hab kaij hegam Palasi ab ha wui, “Aha nat hab waꞌap em‑iattogi?
Pi ach hedai ab hu s‑wohochud ahchim Palasi o hegam mo d t‑wanimeddam mas d Jiosh si Kehsha ihda.
Idam pi haꞌichu aꞌamichuddam hemajkam o ab s‑wohochud no pi pi mahch g Mosesbad chehanig. T g Jiosh s‑koꞌokam wo ha namkid.”
D am ha wehmaj hegai mat wa am hu hebai chuhug ch ed am i chehgim g Jesus k hab chehgig Nicodemas. Id o hab waꞌap d Palasi ch hab kaij ab ha wui,
“Bo chuꞌig g t‑chehanig matt pi hedai ab hu wo shaꞌi haꞌichu ha abch k hoꞌipki am i mamche am lodaitk mas wa woho pi ap haꞌichu hab juh.”
D hab kaij idam, “Pegih, pki ahpi ab ep si ha wehmaj idam mo ab wabsh al Galilee t amjed. Am g i hoan g Jiosh haꞌichu ahga k wo s‑mai mo pi hema g Jiosh haꞌichu i tashogiddam ab hu shaꞌi Galilee t amjed.” [
D amjed gam hu aꞌai himto g hemajkam.
Kuchd ahchim gam hu hihim k an kohksh Olive Uꞌus Kawulk t an.
D ab i chesh g tash. Kuchd ged hu uhpam dada geꞌe cheopi wui. D muꞌi am e chehm g hemajkam Jesus wui k gan hu biha. D am dahiwua k ha mashcha.
D ab wui haꞌi dada g chehanig ha mashchamdam ch Palasi am hema uꞌapadch g uwi. Id atsh ha ehs g ha‑kun. Kud am t‑shahgid i kehsh
K hab kaij ab wui g Jesus, “Neh, ahpi map ia ha mashcham, ihda uwi att s‑ap cheh mat ha ehs g ha‑kun.
K eda hab chuꞌig g t‑chehanig matt hemho wo wa maꞌichkwua k wo mua g uwi mat hab wo sha e juh. Pt ahpi has wo chei?”
Neh, bo kaij no pi wabsh haꞌichu s‑kaimk ch s‑abchudamk g Jesus. D wabshaba g Jesus pi ab hu shaꞌi ha hudawog k am wabsh Haꞌichu oꞌoha jewedo g e‑nowikaj.
D oi wa idam pi dagito k ab ep kakke. D ab hahawa i e shel g Jesus k hab kaij ab ha wui, “Pegih, mt ahpim wehpeg ab wo maꞌihi g uwi mamt hedai pi hekid hab shaꞌi juh g pi apꞌekam.”
Bo kaij ch am hahawa i e jumalkad k am ep oꞌoha jewedo.
D am i kah ihda g chehanig ha mashchamdam ch Palasi k wabsh sha hehemako gam hu aꞌai hihi si e elidch. D hegam mo d geꞌeged wehpegat k wehsijj himto. K heg am waꞌi wih uwi Jesus wehm.
D ab i e shel g Jesus k ab wui hab kaij, “Baht hihi hegam mo ab haꞌichu m‑abchud? Nat pi ia hu hema wih mat ab wo m‑maꞌihi?”
D hab kaij g uwi, “Pi at ia hu hema wih, ni‑kownalig.” D hab hahawa ep kaij g Jesus, “Ahni ani hab waꞌap pi ab hu haꞌichu m‑abchud. Gamai g hihm k pi hab ep juhni g pi apꞌekam.”]
D hab ep kaij g Jesus ab ha wui g hemajkam, “Dani geꞌe tonlig am wehs ha wehhejed g hemajkam. Kut s‑ap am wo himad Jiosh apꞌedag ed ch pi hekid haꞌichukaj wo pi e amich hegam mat hedai ab ni‑wui wo e dagitokchid.”
D eda am haꞌi gegok g Palasi ch ab wui hab si kaij, “Ih, p wabsh chum hejel e wohokamchud ch aptp hems wabsh t‑iattogid.”
D hab kaij g Jesus, “Pi ani em‑iattogid chum anis am hi wa hejel ni‑wohokamchud. Do wohokam mani has i kaij. S‑mahch ani mant hebaijed ia jiwia k hebai wo hih. Ahpim am hi pi mahch ihda.
Am am chum ahg mani has chuꞌig ab wabsh ni‑neidch ch eda pi woho ni‑mahch. Ni ahni hemu pi hedai em‑lodait.
Kut wabshaba d wo wohokamk g ni‑ahga mant hekid wo ah mam has chuꞌig nat pi g Jiosh am ni‑wehm wo em‑aꞌappe.
Neh, an o oꞌohanas em‑chehanig ed mamt wo s‑ha wohoch matp gohkajj am haꞌichu wo wohokamch.
Pegih, ni ahni hejel ni‑wohokamchud. K g ni‑ohg am hab waꞌap ni‑wohokamchud.” Neh, bo kaij g Jesus.
D ab kakke idam, “A k hebai has chuꞌig g m‑ohg?” D hab kaij g Jesus, “Pi am shaꞌi ni‑mahch ch ep pi mahch g ni‑ohg. Mt hems wo s‑ap s‑ni‑mahchk ch hab waꞌap wo s‑mahchk g ni‑ohg.”
Neh, id ad wehs hab kaij g Jesus am geꞌe cheopi t am heg eda kih mo g hemajkam am shulig g e‑mahkigdag g geꞌe cheopi wehhejed. T pi hedai e nako mas an wo bei nat ge koi e ai g tashgaj.
D hab ep kaij g Jesus ab ha wui, “Am ant hu wo hih. Kumt an haha wo i chum ni‑gahghim k wabshaba wo koi pi e doꞌibiak. Pi amt wo e nako mamt am wo hihi mant hebai wo i hih.”
D heg hekaj hab kaij hegam hahaꞌichu, “Shahꞌo ahgch hab kaij matt pi wo t‑nako matt am wo hihi mat hebai wo i hih. Aha nat wabsh hejel wo e mua.”
D hab kaij g Jesus ab ha wui, “Ia am waꞌi amjed id dahm jewed. Ni ahni hi ab dahm kahchim amjed.
Kum eda pi ni‑wohochud mani d ge ahni. Ni heg hekaj am em‑ahgid mamt wo koi pi e doꞌibiak.”
D ab kakke, “Kup hedai wud higi?” D hab kaij g Jesus, “Ahni ani wud mani ga hu i wehpeg hab kaij mani hedai wud.
Muꞌijj o g em‑chuꞌijig. Kunt heg wo ah. K g ni‑ahga d wohokam nani pi heg waꞌi ahg mo haschu ni‑ahgid hegai mat am i ni‑kei. K heg chum hekid ahg g wohokam.”
D idam pi amichud mo g Jiosh hab ahg.
D heg hekaj hab ep kaij g Jesus, “Mt wo mai mani d ge ahni mamt hekid ab uhgk wo ni‑ul mamt wo ni‑mua ahni Jiosh si Kehsha. Am amt haha wo mai mani pi hab wua g hejel ni‑tatchui ch wabshaba hegai waꞌi ni‑ohg tatchui hab wua ch g mashchamaj ahgachug.
Chum ani hekid ab s‑wohog elid. K heg hekaj ni‑wehmaj.” Neh, bo kaij g Jesus.
T muijj hegam mat ab kah ihda ab i s‑wohoch.
D heg hekaj hab kaij g Jesus ab ha wui hegam mat ab i chum s‑wohoch, “Mtki woho ab i e dagito ni‑wui mamtp am hab wo i junihi g ni‑mashchama.
Mt haha wo mai g wohokam. T heg hab wo em‑juh mamt hahawa pi d wo neneholk.”
D haꞌi hab kaij, “Pi ach hekid hedai d shaꞌi neneholiga nach pi d Abrahambad amjedkam. P haschu hab ahg ch hab kaij matt hahawa pi d wo neneholk?”
D g Jesus hab kaij, “Wehs am d nenehol mamtp hedai hab i junihim g pi apꞌekam nam pi heg hekaj e wulshch.
Pi o am hu ha wehm d si kihkam g nehol mo hig g ha‑aliga.
Nt ahni woho wo i em‑wulꞌo mamtp ab wo i e dagito ni‑wui. Kumt hahawa pi d wo neneholk namt pi d wo aꞌaligajk g ni‑ohg Jiosh.
S‑mahch ani mam d Abrahambad amjedkam. M eda s‑ni‑muꞌamk nam pi pi ab hu ap wohochud g ni‑mashchama.
Heg ani am ahgahim mo haschu g ni‑ohg ab ni‑chehgid. M ahpim hi heg wa wepo mam d ge Jiawul amjedkam nam pi hab wua g tatchuij.”
D hab kaij ab wui, “Pi ach d ge Jiawul amjedkam. Abrahambad o d t‑shohshon.” D hab kaij g Jesus, “Pegih, m haschu ahgch pi hab masma hab e wua mo g Abrahambad no pi heg chum hekid hab wua g s‑apꞌekam.
M eda am e nakog mamt wo ni‑mua ahni mani heg waꞌi em‑ahgid wohokam mo g Jiosh ab ni‑ahgid.
Heg am d wabsh amjedkam mam am oidch hab e junihim.” D hab kaij, “Ahchim ach hi pi d shaꞌi shaꞌi ch ed ha‑aꞌaliga. Jiosh o d si t‑ohg.”
D hab kaij g Jesus, “Ia ant jiwia ab amjed g Jiosh. Kumt heg hekaj ab wo si ni‑tatchuad mamtp woho d wo aꞌaligajk. Pi ant wabsh hejel hab i ni‑ah mant ab wo i hih. Jiosh at ab ni‑chea.
Pi am amichud mani has i kaij nam pi s‑koꞌokod g haꞌichu ni‑ahga.
Dam wabsh ge jiawul amjedkam ch s‑hohhoꞌid mamt am hab wo wuad g tatchuij. Heg o d ha muꞌakam ged hu i si wehpeg amjed ch d ep s‑chu iattomkam ch pi has shaꞌi elid haꞌichu ha iattogidch no pi wehs g iattogig ab d amjedkamaj.
Kuni ahni g wohokam ahg. Kum heg hekaj pi ni‑wohochud.
Neh, namt hig wo e nako mamt am wo wohokamch mas haschu d i pi ap ni‑chuꞌijig? Pegih, ab o em‑ab mamt ab wo s‑ni‑wohoch nani pi em‑ahgid g wohokam.
Hegai mo ab d amjedkamaj g Jiosh o ab kaiham g Jiosh neꞌoki. Kum pi ab hu kaiham nam pi pi ab hu d amjedkamaj.”
D g hahaꞌichu ab hahawa si chehmo g Jesus ch hab kaij, “Dapki wabsh t‑obga ch d wabsh sha jiawul.”
D hab kaij g Jesus, “Pi o woho mam has i kaij. Pi ani d shaꞌi jiawul. Ab ani si haꞌichuchud g ni‑ohg. M wabshaba ahpim wabsh pi ni‑haꞌichuchud.
Pi ani heg am hu neidahim mas hedai ab wo si has ni‑elidad. K wabshaba am hema d hegai mo am ni‑gahgid g ab has elidadag ch wo ha lodai hegam mo pi ab hu has ni‑elid.
Nt wo si shel em‑ahgi mat pi hekid wo huhug hegai mat hedai ab wo si i bei g haꞌichu ni‑ahga.”
D hab kaij ab wui, “Si att hahawa s‑ap s‑mai mapki d wabsh sha jiawul. Neh, muh at g Abrahambad. T g kekelibad Jiosh haꞌichu i tashogiddam hab waꞌap koꞌok k huhug. P eda hab kaij mat pi hekid wo huhug hegai mat hedai ab wo si i bei g haꞌichu m‑ahga.
Chum apki si e haꞌichuchud ch hab kaij ihda. Abrahambad atki muh. Nap hab e elid map gam hu baꞌich d i si haꞌichu mo hegai? T g Jiosh haꞌichu i tashogiddambad hab waꞌap koꞌok k huhug. Dohp hab chum e elid?”
D hab kaij g Jesus, “Nt wabsh wo pehegi neokad mantp ab hejel wo chum si ni‑haschudad. Heg o ab si has ni‑elid ni‑ohg mam e‑Jioshga ahg.
Pi am hekid shaꞌi woho mahch hegai. Ni wabshaba ahni s‑mahch. Kuntp hab wo chei mani pi mahch k d wabsh wo s‑chu iattomkamk mam hab chuꞌig ahpim. S‑mahch ani ch ab si uꞌukch g haꞌichu ahgaj.
Em‑shohshon Abrahambad o si s‑ap e tahtk mat wo nei mant an wo i wuhsh. T hekid i neidok si s‑hehgig.”
D si has i el idam k hab kaij, “Ih, heki at hu waꞌi muh. Aha nap neid ch eda pi koi ai g hetaspo wehst‑mahm ahidag?”
D hab kaij g Jesus, “Nt wo si shel em‑ahgi mani an haꞌichug ni‑ohg kih ed mat eda koi mahsi g Abrahambad.”
Neh, d gan hu i uꞌihi g hohodai mat hekaj wo maꞌichkwua g Jesus. D wabshaba wabsh s‑aꞌagi am ha shahgid him k gam hu i wuhsh geꞌe cheopi amjed.
Kuchd am hihim. D ab haha wabsh hema daha g oꞌodham ch e‑mahsidag amjed pi nea.
Kuchd ab kakke g Jesus, “Neh, t‑mashchamdam, dohꞌo d chuꞌijig mo d pi neadam ihda oꞌodham? No d hejel chuꞌijigaj aha no d geꞌegedgaj ha‑chuꞌijig?”
D hab kaij g Jesus, “Id o pi hab d shaꞌi ahga mas d ha‑chuꞌijig. Heg o hekaj pi nea mat g Jiosh am wo chehgi g e‑gewkdag ab amjed.
Am att hab wo junihid g chikpanaj hegai mat ia i ni‑ahꞌad mo idani am kia wiꞌis g tash no pi ab him mamt hahawa pi wo e nako.
Dani tonlig am em‑wehhejed mani ia em‑wehmaj.”
D hab cheꞌiok g Jesus k am siswua jewed dahm k am hab juh g bid k hekaj ab bidsh g wuhpuij hegai pi neadam
k hab ahg, “Am g him k ab i wakon g e‑wuhiosha heg eda woꞌo mo hab e aꞌaga Siloam.” (K hab d ahga ihda “I Ahꞌad.”) T wa woho am hih ihda pi neadam k am wako g e‑wuhiosha k am i uhpam jiwia s‑ap haꞌichu neidch.
Hegam mo s‑mahch ch hegam mo si neid mo wabsh haꞌichu ha tahni ad am i neidok hab kaij, “Aha no pi woho d hegai mo am dahiwup ch haꞌichu ha tahni?”
D haꞌi hab kaij mo d hegai. D haꞌi hab ep kaij, “Pi o d hegai. Ho o wabsh si wepo mahs.” D hekaj hab kaij ihda mo wa pi neakahim, “Dani ahni.”
Kumd ab ep kakke, “Shahpt masma nent?”
D hab kaij, “Hegai mash d Jesus at ab bidsh g ni‑wuhpui am jewedo siswuak k hab ni‑ahg mant wo him k wo wako g ni‑wuhiosha am Siloam woꞌo ch ed. Kunt am him k hab wabsh chum ni‑wakon k ha hekaj s‑ap haꞌichu neid.”
D hab kaij idam, “T hebai hih?” Kud hab hahawa kaij mo pi mahch mas hebai hih.
D am wa haꞌi bei ihda oꞌodham mo wa pi nea am Palasi ha wui.
K d t‑mihshmda tash mad eda g Jesus hab juh ihda.
D g Palasi ab hahawa kakke mas has masma nent. D hab kaij, “Hegai Jesus at ab bidsh g ni‑wuhpui am siswuak jewedo. Nt ab i wako g ni‑wuhiosha k hahawa s‑ap haꞌichu neid.”
D haꞌi hab kaij hegam Palasi, “Neh, pi o ab hu shaꞌi Jiosh amjed nat pi melchkwua g t‑chehanig hab juhk ihda t‑mihshmda tash ed.” D am aꞌai e wui gegokiwua g hemajkam nad pi haꞌijj hab epai kaij, “Pi at wo e nako g pi ap chuꞌijkam mas hab mahs s‑hasig haꞌichu hab wo juh.”
D heg hekaj ab ep si kakke hegam Palasi, “Shahp i elid hegai oꞌodham map hab kaij mat m‑nench.” D hab kaij, “Bani elid mo d ge Jiosh haꞌichu i tashogiddam.”
D wabshaba pi wohochud idam hahaꞌichu mas wa woho d pi neadam ch am ha waid g geꞌegedgaj
ch muꞌi haꞌichu ha kakke mas d ha‑aliga ihda ch ga hu i e‑mahsidag amjed pi nea, kch ehp mas has masma hahawa haꞌichu neid.
D hab hahawa kaij g geꞌegedgaj mo d ha‑aliga ch ga hu e‑mahsidag amjed pi nea
ch wabshaba pi mahch mas has masma s‑ap haꞌichu neid ch ep pi mahch mas hedai doaj ch ab ha ahgid mat wo kakke no pi d geꞌe k ch hejel am wo e ah.
Hegam hahaꞌichu ad wa am heki hu apꞌech mat pi wo ha hiwigi mat am hu ep wo i wahp cheopi ch ed hegam mat hedam hab wo chei mo g Jesus d Jiosh si Kehsha. D heg hekaj s‑ha ehbid g geꞌegedgaj ch hab kaij mat ab wo kakke, t hejel am wo e ah.
<range>
D ab ep i wai g Palasi ihda mat bei g e‑nendag k hab ahg, “Am g t‑ahgid g wohokam mapt ab wo hehgchul g Jiosh. S‑mahch ach mo ihda has chehgi d pi ap chuꞌijkam.”
D hab kaij ihda mat bei g e‑nendag: “Pi ani shaꞌi mahch mas d pi ap chuꞌijkam ch wabshaba id s‑ap s‑mahch mani pi neakahim ch hemuch haha wabsh si s‑nea.”
D idam ab hahawa ep kakke, “T has m‑juh k m‑nench?”
D hab kaij, “M ani wa heki hu em‑ahgid. Mt pi ab hu ni‑kaiha. A m haschu ahgch ab ep ni‑kakke? Aha namt ahpim hab waꞌap ab wo i s‑wohoch mo d Jiosh si Kehsha?”
D idam ab si s‑kehꞌid ch hab kaij, “Ahpi apt ab i s‑wohoch hegai hemajkam. Ahchim ach hi g Mosesbad ab s‑wohochud.
S‑mahch ach mo g Jiosh g Mosesbad ab haꞌichu ahgid. Kuch pi shaꞌi mahch mas hebai amjed him hegai.”
D hab kaij ihda, “M haschu ahgch pi mahch mas hebai amjed him. T eda ab i ni‑nench.
S‑mahch ach mo g Jiosh pi ab hu kaiham g pi ap chuꞌijkam ch wabshaba ab ha kaiham hegam mo ab si has elid ch am hab junihim g tatchuij.
Pi ach hekid shaꞌi kah mas hedai i nench hegai mo e‑mahsidag amjed pi nea.
T hi wo wa e nako hema mat hab wo juh ihda hab mahs haꞌichu matp ab Jiosh amjed wo himad.”
D ab si s‑koꞌokam has ahg ch hab kaij, “Dap wabsh si hekia pi apꞌekam ga huꞌi e‑mahsidag amjed ch eda chum haꞌichu t‑mashcham.” D amjed gam hu si i wuhshad cheopi t amjed k pi hiwigi mas am ep wo i wah.
D kah g Jesus mamt i wuhshad k am i gahghim k hab kaij am i chehgiok, “Nap ab si hiwig g Jiosh si Kehsha?”
D hab kaij ihda oꞌodham, “A k hedai wud. Am g ni‑ahgid. Nt ab wo si i hiw.”
D hab kaij g Jesus, “Dani ahni map hahawa s‑ap ni‑neid mant wa m‑nench.”
D ab si i gei wui k hab kaij, “Ab ani si m‑hiwig, s‑apꞌekam ni‑kownalig.”
D hab hahawa kaij g Jesus, “Ia ant jiwia jewed dahm mant wo mahsko wua mo hedai pi nea ch hedai s‑nea id eda Jiosh apꞌedag.”
D haꞌi am gegok g Palasi ch si has i elid k hab kaij, “Nap ahchim hab ep chum t‑ahg mach hab waꞌap pi nenea.”
D hab kaij g Jesus, “Pi amt ab hu wo em‑abch mamtp wo wohokamch mam pi nenea am Jiosh apꞌedag ed. M wabshaba hab chum kaij mam s‑nenea.”
D hab ep kaij g Jesus, “No hig pi woho mat g s‑chu ehskam wabsh s‑aꞌagi haskojed ab wo i wah heg eda kolhai mam am ha nuhkud g kahwal k wo s‑ha ehsidam?
T wabshaba g si ha nuhkuddam ab wo i wah kihjeg amjed.
T g kihjeg nuhkuddam ab wo i kuhpiꞌoki. K g ha nuhkuddam am si ha chehcheg ch gam hu i ha wanimed.
T am wo i wuwhag k gam hu wo i oi no pi s‑mahch g neꞌokij. T am ha baꞌich wo himad.
Pi at hedai ep wo i oi no pi pi mahch g ha‑neꞌoki k wabsh wo e gantad.”
Neh, id ad hekaj am chum haꞌichu ha mashcham g Jesus. D wabshaba pi shaꞌi amichud mo haschu hab ahg.
D heg hekaj hab ep kaij, “Ahni ani hab ni‑ahg ch ni‑wepogid g kolhai kihjeg.
Hegam mo hab e aꞌaga mo d em‑wanimeddam ch eda pi ab hu ni‑wohochud o d s‑chu eꞌeskam ch d ha muꞌakam. K wabshaba g ni‑wohochuddam pi ab hu ha kaiham.
Heg ani wepo mo g kihjeg. Kahwal o am wapke kolhai ch ed. K pi haꞌichu has e wua am ha tahgio. Kumt ahpim ab wo s‑ni‑wohochud k hab waꞌap wo e doꞌibia. Kahwal o ab mahks g s‑kehg haꞌichu hugi. Kum ahpim ab ep mahks mam haschu i tatchua.
S‑chu ehskam at wo jiwia mat wo ha uꞌu k wo ha kokda. Nt ahni ia jiwia mant s‑baꞌama ab wo i em‑mah g doakag
nani pi s‑wohom d em‑nuhkuddam. “Neh, kahwal ha nuhkuddam at chum hems ha wehhejed wo e muhkid.
Hegai mo d wabsh ha‑pionag at am wabsh wo i ha dagito k wo meh mat am wo jiwia g shehꞌe. T g shehꞌe am wo wahk k wo muꞌa k wo ha gantad.
Pion at wo heb hu meh no pi pi ha tatchua g ha‑shoshoiga.
“Nt eda ahni wo i nako g shoꞌigdag am ha wehhejed g ni‑wohochuddam hab masma mo g si ha nuhkuddam g kahwal chum anis wo ni‑muhkid am ha wehhejed. Kahwal ch ha nuhkuddam o ab aꞌai s‑e mahch. Kuch g ni‑wohochuddam ch ahni ab hab waꞌap aꞌai s‑t‑mahch. Ch ahchim g ni‑ohg wehm hab wa masma ab aꞌai s‑t‑mahch.
<range>
Ha nuhkuddam at wehs ab wo i ha hemapai g e‑kahwaliga. Nt ahni hab wa masma ab wo i ha hemapai wehs hegam mat ab wo i s‑ni‑wohoch, chum hems g gawul mahs hemajkam.
“Am ant wabsh wo i ni‑dagito muhkig wui. K g ni‑ohg heg hekaj si ni‑tatchua. Nt ab uhpam ep wo i ni‑chegito.
Pi at hedai wo shaꞌi e nako mas wabsh hejel wo e elid k wo ni‑mua. Uꞌukch ani g ni‑apꞌedag mant am wo i ni‑dagito muhkig wui k ab uhpam ep wo i ni‑chegito. Ab o ni‑chehani g ni‑ohg mant id am hab wo juh.”
D am ep aꞌai e neꞌowi g hemajkam heg hekaj mo has i kaij.
Kud muꞌijj hab nahnko kaij babgatk, “Doki wabsh jiawul. Pi o wehsig. Shahchu am ahgch ab kaiham?”
D wabshaba haꞌijj hab epai kaij, “Pi at wo e nako hegai mo d wabsh sha jiawul mas hab kaidam s‑kehg wo neokad ch wo nench g pi neadam.”
D am i e ai g geꞌe cheopi wakonadag tash. D eda d s‑hehpichꞌedkam.
Kuchd am oiopo anai mo hab e aꞌaga Solomonbad watto am geꞌe cheopi t am.
D am i e chehm g hahaꞌichu k hab kaij ab Jesus wui, “Tt heꞌes i tash wo m‑nenida mapt wo t‑ahgi maps wa woho d Jiosh si Kehsha.”
D hab kaij g Jesus, “Heki ani hu am em‑ahgid. M eda pi ni‑wohochud. Ni‑ohg o ab ni‑mahkch g gewkdag mant hab wo juh g s‑hasig haꞌichu. K heg am chum em‑tashogid mani hedai wud.
M wabshaba pi ab hu ni‑wohochud nam d ge ni‑hemajkamga.
Neh, am o oid g e‑nuhkuddam g kahwal no pi s‑mahch am i s‑amichudk g neꞌokij. K hab waꞌap ni‑oid g ni‑wohochuddam no pi s‑ni‑mahch. Ni ahni ep s‑ha mahch.
Ab ani ha mahkch g pi ha huhugedam doakag. T hegam pi hekid wo huhug. T pi hedai wo shaꞌi ni‑wohppoꞌi.
Ni‑ohg o wehs haꞌichu dahm s‑gewkdag ch si s‑wihnam an ha uꞌukch hegam mo ab ni‑mahkch. T pi hedai wo wohppoꞌi.
Ahni g ni‑ohg wehm ach d hemako.” Neh, id ad hab wabsh chum chei g Jesus.
D g hemajkam am ep uꞌihi g hohodai mat wo maꞌichkwua.
D hab kaij g Jesus, “Muꞌi ant haꞌichu hab juh g s‑apꞌekam nat pi ab ni‑mah g ni‑ohg g gewkdag. K haschu d hegai mamt heg hekaj wo ni‑maꞌichkwua?”
