D hab kaij g hemajkam, “Pi ach heg hekaj s‑m‑maꞌichkwuimk s‑apꞌekam ch wabshaba heg hekaj map pad neok. Dap wabsh oꞌodham ch eda hab chum aꞌaga g Jiosh mo d si m‑ohg ch hab ab chum e wepogid g Jiosh.”
D hab kaij g Jesus, “An o oꞌohanas em‑chehanig ed mo g Jiosh hab ha aꞌaga jijosh hegam mo uꞌachug g haꞌichu ahgaj, chum as d wabsh hemajkam.
<range>
T wahm ahni hig woho am si i ni‑kehsh k ia i ni‑ahꞌad id dahm jewed. M eda haschu ahgch hab ni‑ahg mani pad neok mani hab kaij mani d Jiosh alidag?
Mantp wa woho pi am hu hab wo junihid g ni‑ohg chikpan, mt s‑ap pi wo ni‑wohoch.
Ni wabshaba am hab junihim. Mt heg hekaj wo s‑mahchk mach d hemako g ni‑ohg wehm.”
D g hahaꞌichu am hahawa ep chum cheha g cheopi nuhkuddam mat am wo hihim k wo bei. D wabshaba ep e doꞌibia ab ha amjed.
Kuchd gam hu hahawa hihim k gam hu ai g Jordan Akimel k am aigo i chehchsh k am dada mo wa g Johnbad am ha pahl wapkon k am dadha.
D muꞌi hemajkam am wui dada hab kaijch, “Pi at wa haꞌichu s‑hasigam hab juh g John. Kuki wabshaba d wohokam mo haschu i t‑ahgid id amjed oꞌodham.”
D muꞌi hemajkam ab i s‑wohoch g Jesus amai.
Am ad wa hema kih Bethany kihhim t am ch hab chehgig Lazarus ch am hu hebai haha wabsh mumku. Lazarusbad uꞌuwiga ad d Marda ch Mary.
(Ihda Mary o wa d hegai mad wa g uhw shuhdagi an iawua Jesus tahtad an k an i dagio wabsh g e‑cheꞌechew moꞌokaj.)
Kudki idam uꞌuwigaj am hema cheha mad am wo him k wo ahgi g Jesus, “S-apꞌekam t-kownalig, si m-nawoj at mumku.”
D am i kah g ha-ahga g Jesus k am t-ahgid, “Lazarus ash mumku. K wabshaba pi hab d ahga mat gam hu hab wo i e juh. Nt wo doꞌibia mamt hekaj ab wo ihm g Jiosh. T g Jiosh heg hekaj ab epai wo ni-ihm.”
Jesus ad wa ab wa chum si pihk e elid ha wui idam Marda ch Mary ch Lazarus
ch wabshaba pi am hu wa hekaj i hih mo ab waid. K am d i gohk tash amjed.
D hab kaij ab t-wui, “M att hig ep wo uhpam hihi Judea chekshani wui.”
Kuchd ahchim chum pi hohhoꞌid ch hab kaij ab wui, “T-mashchamdam, pi o koi d shaꞌi tash mo wa am chum s-m-maꞌichkwuimk g hemajkam. Ttp eda am ep wo hihi!”
D hab kaij g Jesus, “T am wabsh s-ap wo himad g oꞌodham tash ch ed ch wabshaba wo e huchwua s-chuhugam k ed. Pegih, pi at has wo e juh mo eda ni-apꞌechudch g Jiosh mant hab wo junihid g chikpanaj.”
<range>
D hab ep kaij g Jesus, “Koi at g t-nawoj Lazarus. Nt wabshaba am wo uhpam him k wo wuha.”
Kuchd hab kaij, “Kohsig o s-kehgaj wehhejed. T wo wa hejel apꞌet.”
D eda g Jesus heg hab ahg mat muh g Lazarus
ch heg hekaj hab kaij, “Neh, muh at g Lazarus.
Ni wabshaba wabsh s-ap ni-tahtk mani pi am hu wehmaj namt pi haha wo nei mant has wo ni-juh k ab baꞌich wo i s-ni-wohoch. Tt oi wo hihim k wo nei.”
D ihda Thomas mam hab aꞌaga Kuadi hab kaij ab t-wui, “Pegih, ttp wo oi g t-mashchamdam k wehmaj wo t-koꞌij.”
Kuchd ged hu dada Bethany t am k s-mai mash d waꞌi giꞌik tash matsh ged hu e cheh g Lazarus.
Tki eda muꞌijj am dada g hemajkam ab Jerusalem t amjed mat am wo i ha gewkemhu g Marda ch Mary no pi d waꞌi gohk mihya.
<range>
D ga hu t-nam g Marda nash pi kah mo ab him g Jesus. Tki g Mary ga hu waꞌi wih ha-kih ab.
D hab kaij g Marda ab wui g Jesus, “Neh, ni-kownalig, mapt hems s-hohtam wo jiwia, t chum pi wo muh g t-wehnag.
Ni wabshaba s-mahch mat g Jiosh ab wo m-mah mapt haschu ab wo i tai, chum hems hemuch mat i geꞌeda g haꞌichu pi t-apꞌedag.”
D hab kaij g Jesus, “T wo uhpam e chegito g em-wehnag.”
Kud hab ep kaij g Marda, “S-mahch ani mat uhpam wo e chegito mat hekid wo i huhug g jewed.”
D hab kaij g Jesus ab wui, “Ia ani haꞌichug ahni mant wo i ha wuwhas g koꞌi ab amjed g muhkig k ab wo i ha mah g doakag. Ab ani ha mahkch g pi ha huhugedam doakag hegam mo ab ni-hiwig. T wo uhpam e chechegito am i koꞌok. Nap s-wohochud ihda?”
<range>
Kud hab kaij g Marda, “Heuꞌu, ni-kownalig, s-wohochud ani map d Jiosh si Kehsha ch d Jiosh alidag. An o oꞌohadag Jiosh oꞌohana ed maptsh ia wo jiwia jewed dahm.”
Kud gam hu hahawa uhpam hih g Marda k atsh am wabsh s-aꞌagi wai g Mary ash hab kaijch mo ab him g ha mashchamdam ch ab waid.
D am ha hekaj s-hohtam hih g Mary k ged hu jiwia mat am t-nam g Marda natt ge koi ai g kihhim.
<range>
Kud muꞌijj i oi g Mary hegam moki am ha wehm shoani ash hab em-ahgch mat gam hu uhpam ep wo hih hihaꞌini wui mat am wo shoakad.
D am i cheh g Mary g Jesus k ab i gei wecho k hab kaij, “Ni-kownalig, mapt hems s-hohtam wo jiwia, t chum pi wo muh g t-wehnag.”
D am i nei g Jesus mo shoak g Mary. D hegam ep shoani mo wehmaj. D ged hu si ai g ihbdaj. D si has e tahtk
k ab ha kakke mas hebai ehsto g chuhkugaj. D hab kaij idam, “Oi g t-oid k am wo nei matt am ehsto.” Kuchd am hahawa hihim k am dada k am nei mat am ehsto.
D am i shosha g Jesus.
D heg hekaj hab kaij g hemajkam, “Neh, kuki ab si pihk e elid wui.”
D wabshaba haꞌijj hab ep kaij, “Neh, t wa g pi neadam doaj. T haschu ahgk pi doaj g Lazarus mat pi wo muh?”
D am ep si has i e taht g Jesus k am i miabi g hihaꞌini. Id o ab cheho ch ed hab chuꞌig ch g hodaikaj ab kuhpi.
D hab ha ahg g Jesus mat gam hu wo i nuꞌichkwua g hodai. D g Marda hab kaij, “T-kownalig, heki at hu padt no pi d waꞌi giꞌik tash mat am e cheh.”
D hab kaij g Jesus ab wui, “Napt pi chegito mani wa m-ahgid mapt wo nei g s-hasig haꞌichu k wo taht g Jiosh gewkdag maptp ab wo s-ni-wohoch.”
D gam hu hab i e nuꞌichkwua g hodai. D am e dahm i nea g Jesus k hab kaij, “Ni-ohg, ab ani i m-hoꞌigeꞌelid map ab ni-kaiham.
S-mahch ani map chum hekid ab ni-kaiham ch wabshaba hab kaij ihda idam ha wehhejed hemajkam. T hab wo s-wohoch mapt ahpi ia i ni-ahꞌad,”
k am i haꞌasa e hoꞌigeꞌidahun k am hahawa si s-kaidam neok ch hab kaij, “Lazarus, ab g i wuhshani!”
D ab i wuhsh g Lazarus k an wabsh kia bihiwigs g iꞌikuskaj mach hekaj ha bihiwig g t-koꞌi ch ab wabsh kia maꞌishp g wuhioshaj g ikuskaj. D hab ha ahg g Jesus, “Gam g hu wo padch g iꞌikus k wo hiwigi mat wo hih uhpam.” Neh, d wa woho hab e juh.
Muꞌijj hegam mad am i ha chehgio g Marda ch Mary ad ab i s‑wohoch mo g Jesus d Jiosh si Kehsha am i neidok mad haschu hab juh.
Tki wabshaba haꞌi ehp gam hu hihi Palasi ha wui k am ha ahgi mat haschu hab juh.
Kutsh am e nam g Palasi ch uꞌugchu papal ha wehm g geꞌe e jehnigiddam k am aꞌaga mas has wo juh ihda s‑hasig haꞌichu hab wuadam.
“Wehsijj at ab wo i s‑wohoch mo d Jiosh si Kehsha mattp am wabsh wo neidad. T g Rome kokownal am wo i e nakog k wo i wua g geꞌe t‑cheopi k wo wehs t‑kokda,” bad kaij idam am aꞌagadch.
Sh am haꞌichug hegai mad d si uhgchu pahl ch hab chehgig Caiaphas ch si s‑gewkam hab ha ahg, “Kaij, ahpim am shaꞌi pi haꞌichu aꞌamichud
ch pi mahch mo baꞌich i s‑apꞌe mat hemako oꞌodham wo muh wehs t‑wehhejed kih hegai mattp wehsijj wo t‑koꞌij.”
Neh, bad kaij ch eda pi mahch mo g Jiosh am tashogid heg hekaj neꞌokij mo e aihim mat g Jesus wo e muhkid ha wehhejed g Tutuligo
ch wehs ha wehhejed g nahnko mahs hemajkam. T idam haꞌi ab wo i s‑wohoch g Jesus k ab wo i e hemakoj e wehm.
Neh, iaꞌi amjed ad g hahaꞌichu am i e nako mat wo mua g Jesus.
D heg hekaj hahawa pi an hu s‑masma oimmed g Jesus Judea chekshani ch ed am i dagitok g Bethany. Chd gam hu hihim k am haꞌichugkahim mo am d Ephraim kihhim mo am miabidch g tohono jewed.
Kud eda e aihim mat wo e wuhshad g t‑shohshon ha‑doꞌibiadag. K muꞌijj am hihim gam hu aꞌaijed Jerusalem kihhim wui mat am wo i e nako heg wehhejed.
D chum hedai an chum neid g Jesus am i e hemapadk geꞌe cheopi t am ch hab kaij ab aꞌai e wui, “Pi atp hems ia hu wo shaꞌi jiwia. Shahm i elid.”
Kuki eda g uꞌugchu papal ch Palasi am i ha chehani g hemajkam mat hemho wa wo ha ahgi sha s‑mahchk mo hebai haꞌichug g Jesus. T an wo bei.
Chuhdp tash o wa am wiꞌis mat wo e ai g t‑shohshon ha‑doꞌibiadag wuhshda.
Kud wa am hab e juh g geꞌe gegosig Bethany t am wehhejed g Jesus. Kuchd gam hu hihim k am ha wehm t‑gegosid. D g Lazarus am ep t‑wehmaj. Marda ad am ha wehmaj hegam mad am hihidod ch an t‑toꞌid.
D g Mary ged hu jiwia Jesus wui k g si s‑namkig uhw shuhdagi uꞌa ch an iawua Jesus tahtad an. K eda d hemako s‑wehch. D an i dagio wabsh g e‑cheꞌechew moꞌokaj. D wehsko uhwa ihda uhw shuhdagi am kih ch ed.
D hab kaij hegai t‑wehm kehshaj g Jesus mo hab chehgig Judas Iscariot,
“T haschu ahgk pi e gagda ihda uhw shuhdagi matt wo ha mah g shoꞌigkam, natt pi ahim g waik siant pihsh namkigdag ab wo i nei g lial heg amjed.”
D eda pi woho s‑ha hoꞌigeꞌid g shoꞌigkam ch wabshaba s‑behimk g lial nadki pi s‑chu ehsk ch chum nuhkud g t‑lialiga ch wabsh hejel hekaj.
D hab kaij g Jesus ab wui, “Dagitoni. T‑himdag oidk at hab juh g ni‑muhkig wehhejed.
Chum o hekid ia em‑shahgid g shoꞌigkam. Nt wabshaba ahni hi pi wabsh chum hekid ia wo em‑shahgidk.”
D eda wehsko kaidag mad g Jesus ab i wuhshad g Lazarus muhkig amjed. Kud muꞌi am dada g Judea t am hemajkam s‑ha neidamk.
Kud muꞌijj ab i s‑wohoch mo g Jesus d Jiosh si Kehsha k am i ha dagito g e‑wanimeddam am i neidok g Lazarus. D am i s‑mai g uꞌugchu papal k am i e nako mat g Lazarus hab waꞌap wo mua.
<range>
D am baꞌich i mahsi. Kuchd am i t‑nakog k gam hu hihi Jerusalem wui. D eda muꞌi am e hemapadch g hemajkam kihhim ch ed mat wo wuhshad g t‑shohshon ha‑doꞌibiadag. Chd am hihim wohg ch ed. D muꞌijj ga hu t‑nam am i kaiok mat am wo jiwia g Jesus.
Idam ad ha uhꞌukch g chukud shosha uꞌus iꞌibhonig ch ab si has elid g Jesus si s‑kaidam hab kaijch, “Id o d s‑apꞌekam t‑kownalig ch ia jiwia am wehhejed g Jiosh. K g Jiosh si s‑hoꞌigeꞌid.”
D g Jesus am hema ha tai g wechij wuhlu k heg cheshadk.
Heki o hu an hab chuꞌig Jiosh oꞌohana ed matsh id hab wo e juh ch hab chuꞌig: Pi g am wo e totodsid, ahpim Tutuligo! Idani at ia wo jiwia g geꞌe em‑kownalig an daichugch wechij wuhlu t an.
Kuchd pi shaꞌi amichud wehs ihda. Kut wa wabshaba hekid ab uhgk i e bei g Jesus dahm kahchim wui, tt am hahawa i chegito mo an oꞌohanas ihda Jiosh oꞌohana ed. Kutki heg hekaj hab e juh am wehhejed.
Idam muꞌi hemajkam ad wa am nam g Jesus nash pi kah mat ab i wuhshad g Lazarus muhkig amjed. Hegam mo wa am neid ash am ha ahgid.
<range>
D hab kaij g Palasi ab aꞌai e wui am i ha neidok, “Ha g wo neid matki wehsijj am i oi. Pi attki wo t‑nako matt wo keshwua.”
D am haꞌi dada g Greek hemajkam Jerusalem t am mat ab wo has el g Jiosh heg eda doꞌibiadag wuhshda piast.
Kuchd am oiopo. D idam am dada k am cheh g Philip k am ahgi mo s‑neidamk g Jesus.
D g Philip am ahgi g Andrew. (Idam ad am d chum kihkam Bethsaida t am am Galilee chekshani ch ed.) Kud am hahawa e wehm hihim k am ahgi g Jesus.
D hab kaij g Jesus ab ha wui, “Idani at e ai g ni‑tashga mat g ni‑ohg wo ni‑maskogi mani d si Kehshaj.
T wabshaba wehpeg haꞌichu hab wo e juh am ni‑tahgio. Neh, nat hig am wo i wuhshani k ab wo muꞌida g pilkani pi am hu e eshk? Hemho wa at am wo e ei jewed wecho k wo muh k hab waꞌi masma wo i wuhshani k ab wo muꞌida.
Id ani hab ahg mat g oꞌodham wo heki wua g e‑doakag matp wo s‑huwidad hejel e wehhejed k wabshaba wo edgidad g pi ha huhugedam doakag matp wo hugio g e‑doakag am ni‑wehhejed.
Bat wo junihid g ni‑tatchui hegai matp hedai hab e elid mat d wo ni‑pionagk. Kunt hab wo juh mat an wo ni‑wehmajk mant hebai wo i haꞌichugk. Ni‑ohg at ab wo si has i ha el hegam mo hab junihim g ni‑tatchui.”
D hab ep kaij g Jesus, “Ni‑ihbdag at ab si i e kudu. Ni hab chum ni‑tahtk mant hab wo chei, ‘Ni‑ohg, pi g hiwgid mas hab wo e juh ihda am ni‑tahgio.’ Nt eda heg hekaj ia jiwia mant am wo gahi wuhsh hegai s‑koꞌok haꞌichu.
Pegih, ni‑ohg, am g maskogid g e‑gewkdag am gahi ni‑wuhshanim.” D ab neo g Jiosh dahm kahchim t amjed k hab kaij, “Am ant heki hu i maskogid k am hab ep wo juh.”
Muꞌi o wa am gegok g hemajkam ch kah hegai mo ab neok. Haꞌijj o hab kaij, “Ab o kaidaghim g tataniki.” Kud haꞌijj hab kaij, “Anghil at ab wui neo.”
D Wabshaba hab kaij g Jesus ab ha wui, “Ahpim at em‑wehhejed ab s‑kaidam neo, ch pi ahni ni‑wehhejed.
E at ai mat geꞌe wo bei g chuꞌijig g hemajkam. Jijawul ha‑geꞌejig o chum e kownalchud id dahm jewed. Nt wabshaba oi wo gewito.
Ab amt wo ni‑naggia uhs t ab ahni Jiosh si Kehsha. Kunt ab haha wo i ha wanchshul g hemajkam ni‑wui.”
Neh, bo wa kaij g Jesus ch oki heg hab ahg mat has masma wo muh.
D hab kaij g hemajkam, “An o hab chuꞌig Jiosh oꞌohana ed mat g Jiosh si Kehsha pi hekid wo muh. P haschu ahgch hab kaij mapt ab wo e naggia uhs t ab maptp woho d Jiosh si Kehsha?”
D hab kaij g Jesus ab ha wui, “Ia ant heꞌes i tash wo haꞌichugk em‑shahgid ch heg wa wepo mani d tonlig em‑wehhejed. Am g s‑ap wo hihimad tonlig oidch. T hab pi wo em‑maꞌish g s‑chuhugam. Hegai matp hedai am wo himad s‑chuhugam k ed o pi mahch mas hebai him.
Ab g wo i s‑ni‑wohochud mani eda ia wabsh kia haꞌichug k hab masma tonlig ch ed wo hihimad.” Neh, bad kaij ch gam hu hahawa i e mehkod ab ha amjed.
Muꞌikko ad wa hab juh g s‑hasig haꞌichu g Jesus am ha‑nena ed idam hemajkam. Kud wabshaba muꞌijj pi ab hu wohochud mo d Jiosh si Kehsha.
Neh, d hab wa masma hab e juh hegai matki g kelibad Jiosh haꞌichu i tashogiddam Isaiah an oꞌoha. An o hab chuꞌig: Pi o muꞌi ab s‑wohochud g haꞌichu t‑ahga ab m‑amjed. K g m‑gewkdag pi tasho am ha‑wehhejed.
Tki an ep oꞌoha g Isaiabad: Jiosh at hab ha juh mo pi ap haꞌichu neid ch pi haꞌichu amichud mat pi ab hu wui wo i e nohnogid k pi wo e doꞌibia ab pi apꞌekam t amjed. Isaiabad o wa ab amjed neok g Jesus gewkdag natsh pi Jiosh am tashogi. Kut idam hemajkam wa woho pi e nako mas ab wo s‑wohoch g Jesus.
<range>
<range>
Kud muꞌi ab hi wa chum s‑wohoch g hahaꞌichu. Tsh wabshaba g Palasi gam hu wo i ha wuwhas matp wo s‑mai mat ab s‑wohoch. D heg hekaj pi am hu tasho e ahg
no pi s‑hohhoꞌid g ab has ha‑elida g hemajkam ch g Jiosh ab has elida wabsh pi ab hu haꞌichuchud.
Jesus ad am ep ha jehnigid ch si s‑kaidam hab kaij, “Matp hedai ab wo i s‑ni‑wohochud k hab waꞌap s‑wohochud g ni‑ohg Jiosh.
K hedai i ni‑neid ch hab waꞌap neid.
Ia ant jiwia id dahm jewed k hab sha masma mo g tonlig am em‑wehhejed nani pi am tashogid g wohokam himdag. Kumt s‑ap wo himad g e‑doakag hab masma mam am tonlig ch ed mamtp ab wo ni‑hiwgad.
Muꞌijj o pi ab hu ni‑kaiham ch pi ab hu ni‑hiwig. Nt wabshaba pi heg hekaj ia jiwia manis wo ha lodai. S‑ha ani doꞌibiamk.
T wo e lodai g ni‑neꞌokikaj mat hekid wo i huhug g jewed.
Ni‑ohg o ab ni‑chehani mant haschu hab wo chei. Ni pi g hejel ni‑neꞌoki hab kaij.
Kumt heg hekaj ab wo kaiham k hab wo bei g pi ha huhugedam doakag. Heg ani waꞌi hab kaij mo g Jiosh ab ni‑chehani.” Neh, bad kaij g Jesus.
D am him k am i e ai matt baꞌich tash wo mua g kahwal mad k wo wuhshad g t‑shohshon ha‑doꞌibiadag. Kuki s‑mahch g Jesus mat am wa e ai matki ia wo dagito ihda jewed k wo hih am e‑ohg wui. D eda si pihk e elid wehs e‑doakagkaj ab ha wui hegam mat ab i s‑wohoch.
D am e apꞌech matt am wo t‑gegos hema kih am gam hu i juhk. D wa eda heki hu ab i kaiha g Judas Iscariot g ge Jiawul k am i e shelch mat wo gagda g Jesus.
Ab atsh Jiosh amjed ia jiwia g Jesus k ab wui ep wo i e nodagi. Kush g Jiosh ab wehs mahkch g gewkdag. D id s‑mahch g Jesus
ch wabshaba am i kekiwua k am wuahawua g e‑lihwa k g tuayakaj ab e bahshodad
k am ge was wakonakud ch ed k ab i wapkonahi g t‑tahtad k heg hekaj ha dagio tuaya mat ab e bahshodad.
D ab i ai g Simon Peter. D heg si has e tahtk ch hab kaij, “Ih, napt wo wapko g ni‑tahtad k eda d ge ni‑kownalig!”
D hab kaij g Jesus ab wui, “Pi ap hi wa amichud hemuch mani haschu chum em‑tashogid id hekaj ch wabshaba wo wa amich imhab i baꞌich.”
Kud hab hahawa kaij g Peter, “Pi apt hekid wo shaꞌi wapko g ni‑tahtad.” D hab kaij g Jesus, “Pi apt d wo i ni‑wehmtdamk mant wo sha pi wapko g m‑tahtad.”
Kud hahawa si s‑hohtam hab kaij g Peter, “Ni‑kownalig, pi g heg waꞌi ni‑tahtad wapkon k wabshaba g ni‑nohnhoi ch ni‑wuhiosha ehp.”
D hab kaij g Jesus, “Heki apt hu e wako wehsko koi jiwiak. Heg at waꞌi e‑tahtad wo wapko hegai mat hedai heki hu wehsko e wako mat koi am hu wo jiwia kih t am. Id ani hab ahgch hab kaij mat g em‑dodakag wehs i e kegch, heg hi wa i hemako mat pi i e kegch.” Neh, bad kaij g Jesus no pi s‑mahch mat hedai wo gagda.
<range>
T am i ha wapko g ha‑tahtad k ab uhpam wah g e‑lihwa k ga hu hahawa ep dahiwua mihsa wui k ab ha kakke, “Nam s‑amichud mant haschu ahgk hab em‑juni ihda?
Neh, bam ni‑aꞌaga mani d em‑kownalig ch d em‑mashchamdam. K am wa s‑apꞌe no pi woho ihda.
Dani wa chum em‑kownalig ch d em‑mashchamdam ch eda am i ni‑jumalkad k heg ni‑wepogi mani d wabsh em‑pionag. Pegih, mt ahpim hab wa masma ab aꞌai wo e neidad
mant am em‑chehgi ch ab aꞌai wo i e wehmtad
nam pi d ni‑pionag. Kut pi hebai g pion hab wo chum e elidad mas baꞌich d i si haꞌichu mo hi g ahmoj.
M hahawa s‑mahch mamt has wo chum masmak. Kut d wo s‑ap tahhadkamk am em‑wehhejed mamtp woho hab wo masmak.
“Mt wabshaba pi wehsijj ab hu wo bei ihda no pi an hab chuꞌig Jiosh oꞌohana ed mamt hema ab ni‑wui wo kekiwua ahpim mam ni‑wehm e gegosid. Kuni s‑mahch mat hedai hab wo e juh nani pi wehs s‑em‑mahch ahpim mant ab i em‑gawulkai.
Kuni heki hu ab em‑ahgid mat koi hab e juh. Kut hekid hab wo i e juh, mt ab haha wo s‑wohoch mani woho d Jiosh si Kehsha.
Jiosh o ab ni‑mahkch g haꞌichu e‑ahga. Kuni ab epai em‑mahk. K heg hekaj ab s‑ap ni‑neid ch ab s‑ap neid g Jiosh hegam mat hedai ab wo s‑ap em‑neidad.”
D am hahawa si e kudu g Jesus k hab t‑ahg, “Pi ant ap ni‑taht k wo em‑ahgi mamt hema ahpim wo ni‑gagda.”
Kuchd si has i t‑taht k ab wabsh aꞌai si t‑neid pi shaꞌi amichudch mas hedai hab ahg.
Kunid eda an hugidaj an daha g Jesus ahni mo ni‑hekaj si pihk e elid.
D hekaj g Simon Peter wabsh s‑aꞌagi ab ni‑ahgid mant wo kakke mas hedai hab ahg.
Kunid wabsh s‑aꞌagi ab epai kakke g Jesus mas hedai hab ahg.
D hab kaij ab ni‑wui, “Hegai mant wehpeg ab wo bih o d hegai.” Kud wa woho am ge bia g hidod k ab mah g Judas Iscariot.
D am wabsh i chum huh g e‑bih. D g ge Jiawul am baꞌich i chikp eda. D hab kaij g Jesus ab wui, “S‑hohtam g am hab juhni hegai mapt hab wo juh.”
Kuchd pi shaꞌi amichud mas haschu hab ahg ch hab kaij ihda.
D eda nuhkud g t‑lialiga hegai Judas. Kuchd heg hekaj haꞌi hab t‑ahg mo hab ahg mat ep wo ha nolawt g haꞌichu hugi heg wehhejed geꞌe gegosig o haꞌichu wo ha mah g shoꞌigkam.
D ha hekaj i wuhsh g Judas gam hu jeg ed. Kuki eda ab wabsh i si s‑chuhugam.
D hab hahawa kaij g Jesus, “Neh, hemu at wehs wo e nahto hegai mat g Jiosh am i ni‑kei mant hab wo juh ia jewed dahm. Am ani wa chehgid g Jiosh gewkdag.
T g Jiosh heg hekaj am wo tashogi g ni‑gewkdag hemu s‑hohtam.
“Pegih neh, ahpim mani ab si em‑tatchua, pi ant shaꞌi tash ia hu wo e‑wehmajk nant pi gam hu wo hih. Kumt pi wo e nako mams wo ni‑cheh. Am ant hab ep wo chei em‑wui mani wa haschu ha ahgid g hemajkam mamt pi wo e nako mamt hejel am wo hihi mant hebai wo i hih.
“Hemu ant ab wo em‑mah g wechij chehanig. K d ihda mamt ab aꞌai wo si pihk e elidad hab masma mani ahni hab em‑juhkch.
Wehsijj at wo s‑mahchk mam ab i e dagitokch ni‑wui mamtp ab aꞌai wo si pihk e elidad.”
D hab kaij g Simon Peter, “A pt hebai wo hih, ni‑kownalig?” Kud g Jesus hab kaij, “Pi apt wo e nako mapt wo ni‑oi hemu amai mant am wo hih. K wabshaba ab him g tash mapt am haha wo i ni‑oi.”
D hab kaij g Peter, “Nt haschu ahgk pi wo ni‑nako mant wo m‑oi hemuch? Ni‑nahtokch ani mant wo m‑wehhejed muh.”
D hab kaij g Jesus, “Ab ant wo si shel m‑ahgi map pi woho e nahtokch mapt wo muh ni‑wehhejed. Neh, waikko apt hab wo waꞌi chei map pi shaꞌi ni‑mahch mat koi wo kuhu g keli chuchul.”
D hab ep kaij g Jesus, “Pi g wo shaꞌi e kudut. Ab g wabsh i s‑wohochud mo an haꞌichug g Jiosh k ahni ab ep wo i s‑ni‑wohoch mani d si Kehshaj.
Am o wiꞌis ni‑ohg kihdag ed am wehs ha wehhejed g ni‑wohochuddam. Nt wo wa chum em‑ahgi matp pi am hu wo wiꞌisk. Nt am wo him k am wo i apꞌech em‑wehhejed
k ia ep wo jiwia k ia wo em‑ui mamt an wo ni‑wehmajk.
S‑mahch am mamt has masma am wo hihi amai mant am wo hih.”
D hab kaij g Thomas ab wui, “Ih, ni‑kownalig, pi ach shaꞌi mahch maps hebai wo hih ch hab pi mahch machs has masma wo dada.”
D hab kaij g Jesus ab wui, “Ab amt wo ni‑hiwgad. Nt ahni an wo waꞌi em‑uꞌapa anai ni‑ohg kihdag ed. Id o heg wa wepo mani d am wui himdam wohg em‑wehhejed ch d Jiosh wohokam ch d m‑wechij doakag.
Matp hedai woho s‑ap wo s‑ni‑mahchk ch hab wa masma wo s‑mahchk g ni‑ohg. Neid am g ni‑ohg nam pi ni‑neid.”
D hab kaij g Philip ab wui, “Pegih, t‑kownalig, am g t‑chehgid g e‑ohg. Heg ach waꞌi tatchua.”
D hab kaij g Jesus ab wui, “Tash ani ia em‑wehmaj. Kupki eda pi woho ap ni‑mahch, ahpi Philip. Hegai mo hedai i ni‑neid ch hab masma ep neid g ni‑ohg. P haschu ahgch ab ni‑tahni mant wo em‑chehgi g ni‑ohg?
Ahni kch ni‑ohg ach d hemako. Kupki pi koi ab hu s‑wohochud ihda.” D hab ep kaij ab wehs t‑wui, “Ni‑ohg o ab ni‑ahgid mant has wo cheꞌe k has wo ni‑juh.
Ab g wo s‑wohochud mach d hemako g ni‑ohg wehm heg wabsh hekaj mani am em‑ahgid, o amtp pi wo e nako hab masma k wo s‑wohoch mach d hemako heg hekaj s‑hasig haꞌichu mani hab junihim.
Nt wo si shel em‑ahgi matp hedai ab wo s‑ni‑wohochud k wo e nako mat hab wo junihid g s‑hasig haꞌichu hab masma mani ahni, pej baꞌich i geꞌe hab wo juh g s‑hasig haꞌichu nant pi ahni hi wo hih am ni‑ohg wui.
Kunt am hab wo em‑juni mamtp haschu ab wo i tai g ni‑ohg am ni‑chehchegk. T heg hekaj g hemajkam ab wo si hehgchul g ni‑ohg Jiosh.
Pegih, mt haschu ab wo i tai g ni‑ohg am ni‑chehchegk, nt ahni hab wo juh.
“Am g hab wo junihid g ni‑chehanig mamtp woho ab wo si ni‑tatchuad.
Nt ab wo tai g ni‑ohg mat ab wo em‑mah g Hekia S‑apꞌekam Gewkdag. T heg chum hekid wo em‑wehmajk ch am wo i em‑tashogidad g wohokam.
Pi o ta neidagma g Hekia S‑apꞌekam Gewkdag. T heg hekaj pi wo shaꞌi e nako mas wo s‑mahchk hegam mo pi ni‑mahch. M wabshaba ahpim hi s‑mahch no pi em‑wehmaj hemu ch am wo e ul em‑doakag ed.
“Pi ant ia hu hejel wo em‑dagito k wabshaba ia wo wa em‑wehm haꞌichugk am i dahm mant im hu wo uhpam hih.
Kumt wo s‑mahchk mant ia wo em‑wehmajk. T wabshaba hegam mo pi ab hu ni‑wohochud pi wo mahchk mani ia haꞌichug nat pi pi wo ni‑neidad. Kumt d wo wechij dodakamk ab ni‑amjed heg waꞌi hekaj mant ab wo i wuhsh muhkig amjed k d ep wo doakamk.
Iaꞌi amjed amt wo s‑mahchk mach d hemako g ni‑ohg wehm k ch ep wo s‑mahchk mamt ahpim ab i e hemakoj ni‑wehm.
“Am o e chehgid mo ab si ni‑tatchua hegam matp hedai ab wo bei g ni‑chehanig k hab wo junihid. Kunt ab ha wui wo si pihk ni‑elidad g ni‑ohg wehm ch ab ha wui wo i ni‑tashogi.”
D hab kaij g Judas, hi wa pi hegai Judas Iscariot, “T‑kownalig, pt has masma ahchim waꞌi t‑wui wo i e tashogid k pi ab hu wehs hemajkam ha wui?”
D hab kaij g Jesus ab wui, “Hegai mo hedai ab si ni‑tatchua at wo wohog el g haꞌichu ni‑ahga. Kut hahawa ab wui wo si pihk e elidad g ni‑ohg. Kutt g ni‑ohg wehm am haha wo i t‑maskogi wui k am wo wehmajkad.
Pi at ab hu wo wohog el g haꞌichu ni‑ahga hegai mat pi ab hu wo ni‑tatchua. K eda g ni‑ohg d amjedkam ihda haꞌichu ni‑ahga.
“Id ani hi wa em‑ahgid hemuch mani ia em‑wehmaj.
T g ni‑ohg ab haha wo cheha g Hekia S‑apꞌekam Gewkdag mat heg am wo i em‑wehmajk am ni‑wehhejed ch wo em‑gewkemhunad ch wo em‑mashcha mani haschu i s‑em‑mashchamamk ch hab wo em‑juh mamt wehs haꞌichu wo s‑chegitok mani haschu i em‑ahgid.
“Am g wabsh wo i s‑ap e tahtkkad. Ab ant wo i em‑mah hegai hab mahs s‑ap tahhadkam mani ahni edgid. Pi at hedai wo e nako mat hab mahs s‑ap tahhadkam wo em‑mah. Pi g wo shaꞌi e kudutad ch pi haꞌichu wo ehbidad.
“Am am wa ni‑kah mani wa hab kaij mant gam hu wo hih ab em‑amjed k wabshaba ia wo wa ep em‑wehmajk. Ni‑ohg o baꞌich i s‑gewkdag mani ahni. Kumt heg hekaj wo chum si s‑hehgigkad mant im hu uhpam wo hih wui mamt hems g wehs e‑ihbdagkaj ab wo ni‑tatchuad.
Id ani em‑ahgid mat koi hab e juh. Mt hab ab wo i s‑wohoch g haꞌichu ni‑ahga mat hekid hab wo i e juh.
“Hemu at am geꞌe wo chehgi g e‑gewkdag g jijawul ha‑geꞌejig no pi chum e kownalchud ia jewed dahm. K heg hekaj pi am hu geꞌe s‑ni‑apꞌe mant tash am haꞌichukaj wo em‑wehm neo. K eda pi uꞌukch g gewkdag mas hab wo ni‑juh manis ab wecho wo i ni‑ul.
Wehs ani hab junihim mo haschu ab i ni‑chehani g ni‑ohg. K hab masma s‑mahch g hemajkam mani ab si tatchua g ni‑ohg. “Pegih neh, oi g wo, am att wo i t‑nakog k wo hihi.”
D hab ep kaij g Jesus, “Dach waꞌi hemako hab masma mo g uhdwis jeꞌe d hemako g e‑iꞌibhonig wehm. Ahni ani heg wepogidas mo g uhdwis shon waꞌug. M ahpim heg wepogidas iꞌibhonigaj. K g ni‑ohg t‑nuhkud.
Hegai iꞌibhonigaj at ab wo chum bahidagt. Mt ahpim hab waꞌap s‑kehg haꞌichu hab wo chum junidahid g Jiosh. Eꞌes nuhkuddam at an wo si hikkumia hegai iꞌibhonig mat pi ab hu wo bahidagt k wo i kegch hegai mat ab wo bahidagt. T hab baꞌich i muꞌi ab wo bahidagt.
“Heki am hu kegchudas ahpim mam ab kaiham ch ab s‑wohog elid g haꞌichu ni‑ahga.
Pi g gam hu hab wo shaꞌi i e juhni ab ni‑amjed. Nt ahni hab wa masma pi gam hu hab wo i ni‑juh ab em‑amjed. Mt hab s‑ap hab wo juh haꞌichu k s‑ap hab wo masmak hab masma mo hegai iꞌibhonig mat s‑ap ab wo bahidagt ab giꞌikch e‑waꞌug ab.
“Pi at ab hu wo bahidagt g iꞌibhonig pi ab hu giꞌikch e‑waꞌug ab. Mt ahpim hab waꞌap pi wo e nako mamt haꞌichu s‑kehg hab wo juh mamt gam hu hab wo i e juh ab ni‑amjed.
Hegai iꞌibhonig mat wo e hikkumia at am wo i e hemapad k wo e mei. Neh, id o hab mahs matp hedai gam hu hab wo i e juh ab ni‑amjed k ab wo e ahijidach mat hahawa pi haꞌichu wehhejed wo s‑kehgajk am Jiosh wehhejed.
Ab ant wo i em‑mah mamt haschu ab wo i ni‑tai mamtp ab wo s‑wohog elidad g haꞌichu ni‑ahga ch ab wo ni‑hiwgad.
Hegam matp hedai woho ab i e dagitokch ni‑wui at muꞌi haꞌichu hab wo junihid ni‑wehhejed. T heg hekaj ab wo hehgchul g hemajkam g ni‑ohg Jiosh.
“Bani masma si em‑tatchua ch si pihk em‑elid mo hab masma si ni‑tatchua g ni‑ohg. Ab ani si s‑wohog elid g ni‑ohg. Ch ab aꞌai si pihk t‑elid. Kumt ahpim hab waꞌap ab wo s‑ni‑wohog elidad. Tt ab aꞌai wo si pihk t‑elidad.
<range>
Id ani em‑ahgid mamt wo bei g s‑hehgig am hab junihidch g ni‑chehanig hab masma mani ahni s‑hehgig am hab junihidch g ni‑ohg chehanig.
Ab ani em‑chehani mamt ab aꞌai wo pihk e elidad hab masma mani ahni has i masma si pihk em‑elid.
Hegai matp hedai wo e muhkid ha wehhejed g e‑naipijju o d hegai mo woho si pihk e elid ha hekaj.
Ahpim am d ni‑naipijju mamtp hab wo junihid g ni‑chehanig.
Kuni hahawa pi hab em‑aꞌaga mam d wabsh ni‑pionag ch wabshaba hab em‑aꞌaga mam d ni‑naipijju nani pi ab em‑ahgid wehs haꞌichu mani ab kah ni‑ohg amjed. Neh, mo hema d wabsh pionag ch pi mahch mo haschu am hab i wua g ahmo.
Pi amt hejel e elid k am wo i gegokiwua ni‑wehhejed. Ahni ant am i em‑chuhcha mamt am wo hihim k hab wo juh g geꞌe chikpan. Kut pi hekid wo huhug hegai mamt hab wo juh. T g ni‑ohg am hab wo em‑juni mamtp haschu ab wo i tai am ni‑chehchegch.
Pegih, id ani ab em‑chehani mamt ab aꞌai wo pihk e elidad.”
D hab ep kaij g Jesus, “Mt wo s‑chegitok mo ahni wehpeg s‑ni‑kehꞌid hegam mo pi ab hu tatchua g Jiosh ch hab waꞌap wo s‑em‑kehꞌidad.
Ab at wo em‑tatchua mamtp hems pi ab hu wo tatchua g Jiosh. Nt wabshaba ab si em‑gawulkai ab ha amjed. Kum pi ha wepo chegito haꞌichu. K hekaj hab s‑em‑kehꞌid.
Mt wo s‑chegitok mani wa hab em‑ahgid mat pi hebai g pion hab wo chum e elidad mas baꞌich d i ge haꞌichu mo g e‑ahmo. T wo em‑shoꞌigch hegam mo ni‑shoꞌigchud. Kut ab wo s‑em‑wohog el hegam mo ab s‑ni‑wohog elid. Hegam mo pi mahch g ni‑ohg o ni‑shoꞌigchud ch hab waꞌap wo em‑shoꞌigchudad nam pi ab ni‑wui e dagitokch.
<range>
Ia ant jiwia ha wui k am ha ahgi ab amjed g ni‑ohg k am ha chehgi g s‑hasig chikpan mat pi hedai hekid hab juh. K wabshaba s‑ni‑kehꞌid. K heg hekaj tasho mo s‑kehꞌid g ni‑ohg. Kut hab masma mahsko wua g pi ap e‑chuꞌijig.
<range>
<range>
An o hab chuꞌig Jiosh oꞌohana ed mat wo s‑ni‑kehꞌidad pi haschu shaꞌi ahgk. Kut wa woho hab e juh.
“Ab ant wo cheha g Hekia S‑apꞌekam Gewkdag mat am wo em‑wehmajk. Heg o am wehmaj g Jiosh ch ab em‑wui wo him k wo em‑wehmajkad ch am wo i em‑gewkemhunad ch am wo haꞌichu em‑tashogidad ab ni‑amjed.
Kumt ahpim wo i ahgahi ab ni‑amjed nam pi ni‑wehmajkahim ga hu i amjed mant am i shonwuich g ni‑chikpan.”
D hab ep kaij g Jesus, “Am ani em‑ahgid ihda mamt heg hekaj pi wo ni‑dagito.
T wo i em‑wuwhas ab amjed g cheopi. K ab him g tash mamt wo em‑muꞌa k hab wo e ahgad mat wehhejed hab juh g Jiosh.
Id amt hab wo em‑juh heg hekaj mo pi ni‑mahch ch ep pi mahch g ni‑ohg.
Mt wabshaba wo s‑chegitok mani id am em‑ahgid mat hekid hab wo i e juh.” D hab ep kaij g Jesus, “Pi ani em‑ahgid ihda ga hu i wehpeg heg hekaj mani ia em‑wehmaj.
K wabshaba hemu e aihim mant uhpam wo hih am ni‑ohg wui. M eda pi ab hu shaꞌi s‑ni‑kakkeimk manis hebai wo hih
ch wabsh pi ap e tahtk s‑mahchok mant gam hu wo hih.
T eda pi ab hu wo i hih g Hekia S‑apꞌekam Gewkdag em‑wui nt hoꞌip gam hu hih. K heg hekaj baꞌich i s‑apꞌe mant gm hu wo hih.
T ab haha wo i hih g Hekia S‑apꞌekam Gewkdag k am wo i ha tashogi g hemajkam g s‑apꞌekam ch pi apꞌekam ch Jiosh lodaita.
Ni‑ohg at ab wo ni‑haꞌichuch mant am wui wo him k pi ia hu wo haꞌichugk. T g Hekia S‑apꞌekam Gewkdag heg hekaj wo wohokamch am ha wui g hemajkam mani d s‑apꞌekam am Jiosh nena ed k ep wo wohokamch mo hab junihim g pi apꞌekam mo eda pi ab hu ni‑wohochud
<range>
k ep wo wohokamch mat wo e lodai hegam mo hab junihim g pi apꞌekam nat pi am wa e ai mat g Jiosh wo lodai g ge Jiawul.
“Muꞌi ani haꞌichu ep s‑em‑ahgidamk. Mt wabshaba pi wo e nako mamt wo s‑amich mant wo chum em‑ahgi hemuch.
Hekia S‑apꞌekam Gewkdag at am wo i em‑tashogi g wohokam k am ep wo i em‑ahgi mat haschu has wo e juh imhab em‑baꞌich. Nt am wo ahgi mat has wo chei. Kut am wo em‑tashogid k hab ab wo si ni‑haꞌichuch.
<range>
Wehs g ni‑ohg gewkdag o d ep ni‑gewkdag. Ni hekaj hab kaij mat g Hekia S‑apꞌekam Gewkdag am wo i em‑tashogi mani haschu ab i ahgid.”
D hab ep kaij g Jesus, “Do shaꞌi haꞌas, mt pi an hu wo ni‑neidad, ch am ep wo shaꞌi haꞌas, mt hahawa ep wo ni‑neidad.”
Kuchd hab kaij ab aꞌai t‑wui, “Shahchu o hab ahg ch hab kaij mas wo shaꞌi haꞌas, tt pi an hu wo neidad, ch am ep wo shaꞌi haꞌas, tt ep wo neidad. K wa hab ep kaij mat wo hih am e‑ohg wui.
Pi ach shaꞌi amichud mo haschu hab ahg ch hab kaij.”
D s‑mahch g Jesus machd ab s‑kakkeimk ch hekaj hab kaij, “Pi am shaꞌi amichud mani haschu hab ahg ch hab kaij mat wo shaꞌi haꞌas, mt pi wo ni‑neidad, ch am ep wo shaꞌi haꞌas, mt ep wo ni‑neidad.
Pegih, nt wo haꞌichu em‑ahgi mat woho hab wo e juh. Mt wo si pi ap e taht k wo si shoanid. T g s‑ni‑kehꞌiddam wabsh wo si s‑hehgigk. T amjed haꞌichu hab wo e juh mat ab wo em‑mah g si geꞌe s‑hehgig.
Neh, s‑mahch am mat has wo e juh mat hekid wo e ai mat wo mahmadho g uwi. T wo pi ap e taht mat wo nako g s‑koꞌok. T wabshaba am wo i mahsi g ali. T am wabsh wo i pi chegito g s‑koꞌok heg hekaj mo si s‑hehgig mat an i e mahsid g ali.
Bo wa masma am em‑tahgio mam hemuch pi ap e taht. Nt wabshaba ab ep wo ni‑chehgi em‑wui. Kumt haha wo si s‑hehgigk. T pi hedai wo shaꞌi padch hegai hab mahs s‑hehgig em‑wehhejed.
“Mt hahawa pi ab hu wo ge ni‑kaiamad haꞌichu ch wabshaba ab wo e hoꞌigeꞌidahunad ch ab wo kakke g ni‑ohg am ni‑chehchegch. T wa woho wo em‑mah.
Pi am koi hekid ni‑chehcheg am e hoꞌigeꞌidahunch. Am g hab wo i e juhni. T g ni‑ohg am hab wo em‑juni. T ab wo si e shuhdad g em‑doakag g s‑hehgigkaj.”
D hab ep kaij g Jesus, “Am ani haꞌichu i chum em‑tashogid g haꞌichu wepogida ahgakaj. Ab o him g tash mant hahawa si tasho wo em‑ahgi ab amjed g ni‑ohg.
T ab haha wo em‑abk mamt ab wo i e hoꞌigeꞌidahunad ni‑ohg wui am ni‑chehchegch. Pi amt heg wo waꞌi hiwgad manis ahni am wo waꞌi ni‑hoꞌigeꞌidahunad em‑wehhejed.
Ni‑ohg o ab si em‑tatchua nam pi ab si ni‑tatchua ch ab s‑wohochud mant ia jiwia ab amjed g Jiosh.
Ia ant woho jiwia ab amjed g ni‑ohg id dahm jewed. T e ai mant uhpam ep wo hih am ni‑ohg wui.”
Kuchd ab wui hab kaij, “Nehꞌe, hemuch ap si tasho am ahg haꞌichu ch pi hekaj g wepogida haꞌichu ahga.
Ch hahawa s‑mahch map wehs haꞌichu s‑mahch. Pi o hab hahawa mahs machs hedai ab wo ge haꞌichu m‑kakke. Ch hekaj hahawa s‑wohochud map ab amjed g Jiosh.”
D hab kaij g Jesus, “Nam hig hab elid mam id woho s‑wohochud?
Ab o e aihim mamt gam hu aꞌai wo si e gantad k gam hu uhpam wo hihi e‑kihki wui ia hejel ni‑dagitok. Ni wabshaba pi hejelig. Ni‑ohg o chum hekid ni‑wehmaj.
“Wehs ani em‑ahgid ihda mamt heg hekaj wo si s‑ap e tahtkkad. T wo em‑shoꞌigch hegam mo pi ab hu tatchua g Jiosh. Mt wabshaba am wo si e gewpkai nant pi heki hu s‑ap wo em‑gewitojel g pi apꞌekam.”
D am i kuhgi g Jesus g haꞌichu e‑ahga k am i nea dahm kahchim wui k am e hoꞌigeꞌidahun k hab kaij, “Ni‑ohg, ia at i e ai g ni‑tashga. Ab g uhpam ni‑mahki hegai ni‑gewkdag mani wa an uꞌukch m‑hugid an. Nt ab haha wo si has m‑elid k wo mahsko wua g m‑gewkdag.
Ab apt i ni‑mah g gewkdag am wehs ha dahm g hemajkam. Kut haꞌi ab ni‑wui e dagito no pi d m‑hemajkamga. K hab d m‑elida mant wo ha mah g pi ha huhugedam doakag.
Dap wohokam Jiosh ch am i ni‑kei mant ia wo jiwia jewed dahm. Kut wehs wo bei g pi ha huhugedam doakag hegam mat wo s‑t‑mahchk.
Ia ant ha chehgi g hemajkam g m‑gewkdag k nahto hegai chikpan mapt ab i ni‑cheha mant hab wo juh.
Pegih, ni‑ohg, ab g uhpam ni‑be k ep wo ni‑mah hegai ni‑gewkdag mani wa edgid an m‑hugid an matt eda koi an hu nahto g jewed.
“Ab apt ni‑wui i ha gawulkai idam chechoj mo ia ni‑wehmaj. K d m‑hemajkamga. Am ani i m‑mahtchulid ha wui ch ha ahgid g haꞌichu m‑ahga. Kut ab s‑wohog elid
k hahawa s‑mahch mo wehs g ni‑mahchig ab d m‑amjedkam.
Ab ap ni‑mahkch g haꞌichu e‑ahga. Kuni am ha ahgid. T ab i s‑wohochud k heg hekaj s‑mahch mani ab d m‑amjedkam.
“Idam o d m‑hemajkamga. Kuni heg hekaj am ha wehhejed ni‑hoꞌigeꞌidahun ch pi ha wehhejed hegam mat pi ab hu wo m‑tatchua.
Hegam o d waꞌi m‑hemajkamga mat ab wo ni‑hiw mant wo ha doꞌibia. T g ni‑gewkdag ab wo e chehgi ha ab.
T hemuch e ai mant wo hih am m‑wui k pi ia hu haha wo haꞌichugk id dahm jewed. T wabshaba idam ia hu wo haꞌichugk. Kuni ab m‑tahni mapt wo ha nuhkudad, ni‑ohg. Dap hekia s‑apꞌekam. Kut ab wo m‑ihmad ch hab d wo hemakok hab masma mach ahchim d hemako.
Ia ani ha nuhkudahim mat ab wo m‑ihmad. Kut heg waꞌi pi e doꞌibia mo an oꞌohanas matki hab wo e juh.
“Id ani hab kaij mani ia wabsh kia ha wehmaj ch koi ab hu m‑wui hih mant hekaj ab wo si ha mah g s‑ap tahhadkam.
Ab ant ha ahgi g haꞌichu m‑ahga. T ab i s‑ni‑wohochud k ab ni‑hiwig ch ab i e gawulkai ha amjed hegam mo pi ab hu m‑tatchua. K hegam heg hekaj s‑ha kehꞌid.
Pi ani heg hab ahg maps ia wo i ha wuwhas ab amjed g jewed ch wabshaba hab ahg mapt wo ha nuhkudad. T hab pi gm hu wo i ha nuꞌichshul g ge Jiawul.
Ab o gawulkdas idam pi apꞌekam t amjed hab masma mani ahni.
Ab g i ha gawulkad e wehhejed heg hekaj haꞌichu e‑ahga. Haꞌichu m‑ahga o d wohokam.
Am apt i ni‑kei mant ia wo ahgad g haꞌichu m‑ahga jewed dahm. Kunt hab wa masma am i ha chuhcha.
Ab ant si i ni‑dagito m‑wui mat idam wo s‑mahchk g wohokam ch hekaj ab hab waꞌap wo i e dagito m‑wui.
“Pi ani idam waꞌi ha wehhejed ni‑hoꞌigeꞌidahun ch wabshaba hegam ehp mat ab wo i s‑wohoch g haꞌichu ha‑ahga k ab wo i e dagito ni‑wui.
Id o d haꞌichu ni‑tahnig mat wehs am wo i e hemakoch hab masma mach ahchim d hemako. Kut hab wo s‑mai g hemajkam map d ahpi ch am i ni‑kei mant ia wo jiwia.
M‑gewkdag o d ep ni‑gewkdag nach pi d hemako. Kuni ab ha mahkch g t‑gewkdag mat t‑wehm d wo hemakok.
Dani hemako ha wehm hab masma mach ahchim d hemako. T hab wehs s‑ap d wo hemakok idam. T heg hekaj wo s‑mai g hemajkam mapt am i ni‑kei mant ia wo jiwia jewed dahm k ep wo s‑mai map ab si ha tatchua idam hab masma map ahni.
“Ni‑ohg, ab apt i ni‑mah idam mo ab si ni‑tatchua. Kuni si tatchua mat am wo ni‑wehmajk anai mant anai wok. An apt ni‑mah g si s‑kehg apꞌedag nap pi si ni‑tatchua mat eda koi e nahto g jewed. Kuni ab m‑tahni mat idam am wo ni‑wehmajk ch heg wo neidad map haschu ab ni‑mahkch.
Dap hekia s‑apꞌekam, ni‑ohg. K pi hi wa chum m‑mahch hegam mo pi ab hu m‑tatchua. Ni wabshaba ahni s‑m‑mahch. K idam ep s‑mahch mapt am i ni‑kei.
Am ant m‑mahtchul ha wui k am baꞌich wo i m‑mahtchul ha wui. T hab wo si pihk e elidad ni‑hekaj hab masma map ahpi. Nt ahni am wo i ni‑hemakoch ha wehm.”
D am i haꞌasa e hoꞌigeꞌidahu g Jesus. Kuchd gam hu aigo i chehchsh hegai aki mo hab e aꞌaga Kidron k am dada mo am eshas g uꞌus.
D eda pi an hu t‑wehmaj g Judas nadki pi gam hu him k am si gagda g Jesus ha wui g uꞌugchu papal ch Palasi. Kudki idam ab muꞌi ha cheha g shondal ch cheopi nuhkuddam mat am wo oi g Judas. Dki heg ab i ha wanim no pi s‑mahch matt hebai wo haꞌichugk no pi muꞌikko am t‑wehm dahiwup amai. D idam haꞌijj ge iꞌis‑papayo ch haꞌijj ge lalamba ch haꞌijj wabsh kuhdch.
<range>
D eda wa chum wehs s‑mahch g Jesus mat haschu has wo e juh am tahgio ch wabshaba am i hih ha wui k hab kaij, “Dohm in gahg?”
D hab kaij idam, “Hegai Jesus mo ab Nazareth t ab d kihkam.” Kud hab kaij g Jesus, “Ahni ani wud.”
D haha wabsh e totods hegam k ab taꞌi si i gegokiwua k wabsh i shul.
D ab ep ha kakke g Jesus, “A m hedai in gahg?” D hab ep kaij, “Hegai Jesus mo ab Nazareth t ab d kihkam.”
D hab kaij g Jesus, “Am ani wa heki hu em‑ahgid mani d ahni. Mtp ahni in wo ni‑gahghid ch pi has wo ha juh idam.”
Neh, bo kaij no pi s‑t‑doꞌibiamk. Kud hab masma hab e juh g neꞌokij mo wa hab kaij matt wehsijj wo t‑doꞌibia.
D g Simon Peter ge is‑pahyo ch ab i huhpan k ab hu wabsh si i widut k higshp an si hikuch g s‑apkojed nahkaj hegai mo d uhgchu pahl neholiga ch hab chehgig Malcus.
D hab kaij g Jesus ab Peter wui, “Ga g hu uhpam hab juhni g e‑is‑pahyo. Pi apt wo e nako mapt wo ha shohbi nant pi hemho wa wo nako mo haschu g ni‑ohg apꞌechudch am ni‑wehhejed.”
D ab ha cheha g shondal g ha‑geꞌejig mat am wo i ha wehmt g cheopi nuhkuddam. D am bei g Jesus k gan hu si wulsh g nohnhoij k gam hu i wanim Jerusalem wui.
Am ad kih g uꞌugchu papal. Kud gan hu wehpeg i bei heg wui mo hab chehgig Annas. Ihda Annas o d baꞌamad ohgaj hegai mo d si uhgchu pahl ch hab chehgig Caiaphas.
K d ihda Caiaphas mad wa am ha shelinid g hahaꞌichu mat hemako wo muh g oꞌodham wehs ha wehhejed.
Kuchd gohkajj g Simon Peter wehm am i ha oi mo am bebhehim g Jesus. K eda g uhgchu pahl s‑ni‑mahch. Nid hekaj am i wah kolhai ch ed.
D g Peter ga hu waꞌi kehk jeg ed ab kihjeg t ab. Nid am hahawa him k ab ahgid hegai chehia mad ab nuhkud g kihjeg mat ab wo i wahki g Peter.
D hab kaij ihda chehia ab wui g Peter, “Nap hig pi ahpi an ep wehmaj hegai mamt an bei?” D hab kaij g Peter, “Pi ani an hu shaꞌi wehmaj.”
D eda s‑hehpid. D hekaj am ge nahdch g pion ch cheopi nuhkuddam ch am gegok ch e huhkalid. D g Peter am him k am ha wehm i kekiwua k e huhkal.
D g uhgchu pahl ab kakke g Jesus mas haschu ahgk ab haꞌi i ha gawulkad k haschu ha mashcham.
D hab kaij g Jesus, “P haschu ahgch ahni ab ni‑kakke? Pi ani hekid s‑aꞌagi haꞌichu ahg ch wabshaba wehs hemajkam wui hab kaij ch am ha mashcham ha‑cheopi ed ch geꞌe cheopi ch ed mach am wehs t‑hehemapad. Pegih, ab g hig ha kakke mani haschu i ha mashcham. S‑mahch o mani haschu ha ahgid.”
<range>
D hab wabsh chum chei. D ab si shonikka g cheopi nuhkuddam k hab ahg, “Pi apt hab shaꞌi kaidam wo neokad ab uhgchu pahl wui.”
D hab hahawa kaij g Jesus, “Am g hig wehs wo ha ahgi manis haꞌichu pi ap hab kaij. Wohokam ani em‑ahgid. Pt haschu ahgk ab ni‑shonikka?”
D g Annas am hahawa ha cheha mat am wo uꞌapa Caiaphas wui. Kud an wabsh kia wulshch g Jesus.
D eda g Peter am wabsh kia e huhkalid ha‑nahda wui. D hab kaij hegam mad am wehmaj, “Nap hig pi ahpi an ep wehmaj hegai mamt an bei?” D wabshaba g Peter pi mahch k e ah hab kaijch, “Pi ani an hu shaꞌi wehmaj.”
D am hema kehk g neholigaj g uhgchu pahl ch d hajunij hegai mat g Peter hikuch g nahkaj ch hab kaij ab wui g Peter, “Nani pi woho m‑neid amai matt am bei ihda?”
D hab kaij g Peter, “Ih, piaꞌa.” D edapk am i kuhu g keli chuchul.
Wabsh i siꞌalim mad koi i chesh g tash, md gam hu i bei g Jesus kownal kih wui. D hab chehgig hegai Pilate. D pi am hu i wahp g Tutuligo kownal kih ed no pi g t‑himdag hab chuꞌig matt wo t‑uamhu mattp am wo i wahp gawul hemajkam ha‑kih ed. Kut pi wo apꞌedagk mat wo huh g kahwal mad iagchulig gegosig imhab i juhk matp am wo i wahp.
D heg hekaj gam hu i wuhsh g Pilate k am ha nam k hab kaij, “Shahchu am ab abchud ihda oꞌodham?”
D hab kaij ab wui, “Pi att woho ia wo uꞌapa ahpi m‑wui hegai matt pi koi wo s‑mai mo am hab junihim g pi apꞌekam.”
D hab kaij g Pilate, “Pegih, mt ahpim wo be k ab wo mah g s‑koꞌok namkidadag mo has i mahs g em‑himdag chehanig.” D hab kaij g Tutuligo, “Pegih, bo mahs g t‑himdag chehanig mat wo e mua heg hekaj pi ap e‑chuꞌijig. K eda pi t‑hiwgid g geꞌe kownal ab Rome t ab machs hab wo juh. Tt heg hekaj ia uꞌapa mapt ahpi am hab wo juh.”
Id ad wa hab e juh mat hab masma wo e muhkid g Jesus mo wa hab kaij no pi g kownal hab masma ha muhkid.
D g Pilate gam hu uhpam wah e‑kih ed k ab i wai g Jesus k hab kaij ab wui, “Neh, nap hab e elid map d ha‑kownalig g Tutuligo?”
D hab kaij g Jesus, “Nap ab ni‑kakke ihda ab hejel e amjed, aha no haꞌijj ab haꞌichu i m‑ahgid ab ni‑amjed?”
Kud hab kaij g Pilate, “Pi ani d shaꞌi Tuhligo manis wo s‑mahchk ihda. M‑wehm hemajkam ha wehm g e‑papalig at ia m‑uꞌapa. Pt haschu has juh?”
D hab kaij g Jesus, “Ni‑kownaltalig o pi hab chuꞌig mo g id dahm jewed kokownaltalig, Tp hems hab wo chuꞌigk, t wo ha cheggia hegam mo ab si ni‑wecho e mashcham mamt pi am hu wo i ni‑dagito hahaꞌichu ha wui. Pi o hab mahs g ni‑kownaltalig.” Neh, bad kaij g Jesus.
D heg hekaj hab ep kaij g Pilate, “Kupki woho hab kaij map d kownal!” D hab kaij g Jesus ab wui, “Heuꞌu, dani kownal ch ia jiwia jewed dahm k ia mahsi mant wo ha ahgi g wohokam. Matp hedai ab wo tatchuad g wohokam at ab wo ni‑kaiha.”
D gam hu hab si e widu g Pilate k hab kaij, “Mas haschu d i wohokam.” D am hahawa uhpam i wuhsh ha wui g hemajkam k hab ha ahg, “Pi ant haꞌichu shaꞌi cheh manis ab wo abch ihda.
K eda wehs ahid ab am hema i e dadagitod g lihso em‑wehhejed iaꞌi idani mam wushshad g e‑shohshon ha‑doꞌibiadag. Pegih, nam tatchua mant id wo dagito mash d em‑kownalig ahpim Tutuligo?”
D si s‑kaidam hihnk ch hab kaij, “Pi hegai. Barabbas ach tatchua.” D eda d s‑chu ehskam ch d ha muꞌakam ihda Barabbas.
D am hahawa ha cheha g Pilate g shondal mat wo s‑koꞌokam gewitta g Jesus. Kud wa woho hab e juh
k am hahawa ge hoꞌi gihkot k ab wahki moꞌoj ab k ab wahki g kownal kahba
k wabsh has ahg ch hab kaij, “Wapt wo si tash d Tutuligo ha‑kownaligk,” ch ab hahawa si shonikkash.
D am ep i wuhsh g Pilate k hab kaij am ha wui g hemajkam, “Nehꞌe, ab ant ep wo i wuhshad k wo em‑chehgi mant pi haꞌichu shaꞌi cheh g pi ap chuꞌijig mas hekaj wo e muhkid.”
Md am hahawa i wuhshad k ab wabsh kia wahkch g hoꞌi gihko ch hegai kownal kahba. D hab kaij g Pilate ab ha wui, “Ab g wo i neid mo d wabsh si shoꞌig oꞌodham.”
D am i nei g uꞌugchu papal ch cheopi nuhkuddam k si s‑kaidam hab wabsh ge kaij muꞌikko, “Muꞌani! Muꞌani ab kots t ab!” D g Pilate hab kaij, “Pegih, k wo be k ahpim ab wo mua kots t ab. Ahni ant hi pi haꞌichu shaꞌi cheh mas melchkwua g kownal chehanig mat wo e muhkid.”
D hab kaij hegam Tutuligo, “Ahchim at hi melchkwua g t‑chehanig am hugkam mat hemho wa wo e muhkid no pi hab e aꞌaga mo d Jiosh alidag.”
Neh, d am i ha kah g Pilate mad hab kaij idam k baꞌich i e ebkiod
k gam hu uhpam i wah k hab kaij ab Jesus wui, “Bahp amjed him?” D wabshaba g Jesus pi ab hu has shaꞌi chei.
D hab ep kaij g Pilate ab wui, “Aha, napt pi has wo chei ab ni‑wui k eda s‑mahch mani gewkdag mant wo m‑dagito o ab wo m‑mua kots t ab!”
D hab kaij g Jesus ab wui, “Jiosh at ab m‑mah hegai gewkdag. K heg hekaj si pi ap hab e wua idam Caiaphas mo m‑piꞌichud mapt pi ap wo hekaj g e‑gewkdag.”
D am i kah g Pilate ihda k am ep i wuhsh ha wui k am chum si e nako mat wo dagito. D wabshaba si s‑babgam hihnk hegam hahaꞌichu ch hab kaij, “Nehꞌe, ihda hemajkam o hab e ahg mo d si geꞌe kownal ch heg hekaj ab wui kehk hegai mo d si geꞌe kownal ch ab Rome t ab. Kupki ahpi hab waꞌap ab wui kehk g si geꞌe kownal mapt wo sha dagito ihda.”
D am i kah g Pilate ihda k am hahawa i wuhshad g Jesus k heg ga hu i dahiwua usagakam daikud ed amai mach hab aꞌaga Gabbatha mo an sha uhgk i hodaitas.
D eda e aihim g dahm juhk. Kud wo e kokda g kahwal mahmad imhab i juhk mat wo e wuhshad g t‑shohshon ha‑doꞌibiadag. D hab kaij g Pilate ab ha wui g hahaꞌichu, “Ia g hu wo neid g e‑kownalig.”
D ab ep si s‑babgam hihnk ch hab kaij, “Muꞌani! Muꞌani ab kots t ab!” D hab kaij g Pilate, “Aha nam tatchua mant wo mua g si uhgk em‑kownalig ab kots t ab?” D hab kaij g uꞌugchu papal, “Heg o d waꞌi si uhgk t‑kownalig mo ab daha Rome t ab.”
D am hahawa i dagito g Pilate g Jesus mamt ab wo mua kots t ab. D am hab hahawa e juh g ha‑tatchui mamt ab ha mah g Jesus. D gam hu i wanim.
D g Jesus am kushwiot g hejel e‑kots. Kuchd am dada amai mo am e kokda. Bach aꞌaga amai Golgotha mo hab d ahga Koshwak.
Kumt gam si wuahawua g wehschugaj k ab sisish kots t ab k ab uhgk i bei. D eda gohk d ep lilso. Kumd idam hab waꞌap ab ha sisish kokots t ab k gan hu aꞌaijed ha chuhcha Jesus hugid an.
D an sisishp g tapial Jesus kots t ab. K an ab hab chuꞌig: “Id o d Jesus ch d ha‑kownalig g Tutuligo.”
K eda pi mehk ab kihhim t amjed amai mam am ha kokda. D heg hekaj muꞌijj g t‑wehm oꞌodham ab neꞌokchul hegai mo haschu an oꞌohanas. K an oꞌohanas g t‑neꞌokikaj ch g Rome neꞌokikaj ch g Greek neꞌokikaj.
D gam hu uhpam ep hihi g uꞌugchu papal Pilate wui am i neꞌokchulidk ihda k hab ahg, “Pi g hab masma an oꞌohan mo d t‑kownalig k wabshaba an oꞌohan mo heg hejel hab kaij mo d t‑kownalig.”
D hab kaij g Pilate ab ha wui, “Mant haschu an i oꞌoha, t heg an wo oꞌohadagk.”
D hegam shondal mad am naggia g Jesus d giꞌik ch hekaj am giꞌikpa e tahpad g Jesus wepschuga. K am hema d si s‑namkig haꞌichu eniga ch pi hebai ha shohmas.
D id hab ahg g shondal ch hab kaij ab aꞌai e wui, “Pi att am hu aꞌai wo t‑wanchid ihda k am wabsh wo t‑chichwi matt hedai wo t‑gehg k heg wo bei.” Neh, bad kaij ch woho am hab e juh. Kud hab masma am e wohokamch g Jiosh oꞌohana mo an oꞌohanas hab masma: T am aꞌai wo e tahpani g wehschugaj g Jiosh si Kehsha k am wabsh wo e chichwi k wo s‑mai mat hedai wo bei g s‑namkig haꞌichu enigaj.
D am gegok g jeꞌej ch jiskaj g Jesus miabidch amai mo am naggia. Kud gohk am ep ha wehmaj mo hema d hegai Mary mo g wehmaj kihkam d Clopas ch hema d ep Mary Magdalene.
Nid ahni am ha wehm kehk mo ni‑hekaj si pihk e elid g Jesus. Kud g Jesus an ni‑aꞌaga ch hab ahg g e‑jeꞌe, “Neh, id at d haha wo m‑madk m in kehk,”
ch hab ep ni‑ahg, “Id at d haha wo m‑jeꞌek.” Neh, nid am i amjed bei g jeꞌej. Kud heg am t‑wehm kih.
D hahawa s‑mahch g Jesus mat wehs hab juh mat haschu hab wo chum juh mat koi wo muh ch hab kaij, “Tonom ant.”
D an hema daha g haꞌa mad am shuhdagi g pad nawait. D am hema g shondal haꞌichu wakch pad nawait ch ed k an haꞌichu k an uskon k ab uhgk i be k ab kams hab masma mo an oꞌohadag Jiosh heki hu oꞌohana ed.
D ab i winiun k hab hahawa kaij, “Ia ant i wehs haꞌichu nahto.” Neh, bad kaij ch am hahawa jumal i moꞌowua k am i muh.
D am e nakog g hemajkam mat wo e mihshmad nat pi g baꞌich tash d wo shahwaik ch d wo geꞌe tashk. Kutsh g hahaꞌichu ab kakke g Pilate mat wo e ohmi g ha‑kakhio hegam mad am nahngia. T hab wo e oiwigi g ha‑muhkig mat gam hu wo i e uꞌu k pi ab wabsh wo kia nahngiak t‑mihshmda tash ed, wahm mat id d wo si geꞌe t‑tashgak.
D ab ha chehani g Pilate g shondal mat wo ha ohmi g ha‑kakhio. Kud hab ha juh hegam gohk mo ab hugidaj ab nahngia g Jesus.
D wabshaba g Jesus heki hu muh. Kud pi ohmi g kakhioj.
D hema g shondal g e‑is‑pahyokaj chuꞌakad g Jesus ab hudaj ab. Kud ab ha hekaj si e iawua g ehꞌed ch shuhdagi.
Id anid neid ch s‑mahch mat woho muh. Kuni hab masma am em‑ahgidahim mamt ahpim hab waꞌap wo s‑mahch mat woho muh.
Jiosh oꞌohana o hab chuꞌig: Pi at hema wo shaꞌi e mul g ohꞌoj. Kut wa woho hab masma hab e juh.
K an ep oꞌohanas ch hab chuꞌig: Hemajkam at ab wo neidad hegai mamt ab chuꞌakad.
K hema d Joseph ch ab Arimathea t amjed ch s‑wohochud mo g Jesus d Jiosh si Kehsha ch wabshaba s‑ha gihug hegam mo pi hohhoꞌid. D wabshaba hekid am i muh g Jesus, d id am hih Pilate wui k ab e shoꞌigchud k ab tahni g honshpadaj. D am i hiwigi. D ga hu ep jiwia k ab i huduni g muhki k gam hu i bei.
D heg am ep haꞌichug Nicodemus mat wa ged hu i wehpeg chehgim g Jesus chuhug ch ed. Idam atsh s‑ap wo juh g muhki. D g Nicodemus heg hekaj uꞌa g siant s‑wehch hegai mo d s‑ap uhw haꞌichu ch d myrrh ch aloes.
S‑e ad hohtkid nad pi hudunihim. D baꞌich tash d t‑mihshmda tash. K eda an mia cheotas hodai ch ed mamt am hab juh g hihaꞌini k wabshaba koi shaꞌi hekaj. K an wehgaj eshas g uꞌus. Kumd am i bei g honshpadag k am i hobino g s‑kehg ikuskaj heg wehnadk s‑ap uhw haꞌichu mach hab masma hab ha wua g koꞌi k am cheh heg eda hihaꞌini k gam hu hihi.
<range>
<range>
Domig wabsh i siꞌalim mad wabsh kia s‑chuhugam, tsh gm hu hihi hegam Mary Magdalene k am dada cheo t am. Kutsh heki hu gam hu i e nuꞌichkwua g hodai mad hekaj ab chum kuhpi.
Tsh am chum neid k am hahawa uhpam meh kihhim wui k ad gd hu t‑wui mel ahni John ch Simon Peter k am t‑ahgid ch hab kaij, “Am atki i e wuhshad g t‑kownaligbad hon heg amjed hihaꞌini mat am e cheh. Kuch pi shaꞌi mahch mas hebai has e juh.”
Kuchd g Peter wehm am ha hekaj wohp.
Nid ahni wehpeg ged hu mel nanid pi ahni baꞌich i s‑hohtam meh mad g Peter.
Nid am i koachsh k nei mo am wehch hegai s‑kehg ikus k wabshaba pi am hu i wah.
D am hahawa mel g Peter k am wabsh si i wah k cheh hegai ikus
ch heg ehp mat hekaj e hobino g Jesus moꞌo. D id ged hu hab wabsh hejelko holiwek ch kahch.
Kunid ahni am hahawa epai i wah k am i neidok ab hahawa i s‑wohoch mat woho i wuhsh ab muhkig amjed.
Kuchd eda pi koi s‑amichud hegai Jiosh oꞌohana mo hab chuꞌig mat hemho wa wo i wuhsh ab muhkig amjed.
Kuchd gam hu hahawa hihi uhpam.
Sh am ep oimmed g Mary cheo kihjego ch shoak ch atsh am i e jumalkad k am i koachsh hihaꞌini ch ed
ch ash gohk ha neid g anghil. Idam ash s‑tohtam e enigadadch ch ga hu aꞌai dadha, hema ab moꞌoshko ch hema ga hu aigo
ch hab kaij, “Uwi, shahchu ap ahgch shoak?” Sh hab kaij ab ha wui, “Heg hekaj matki gam hu i e bei g ni‑kownalig muhki. Kuni pi mahch mas hebai e cheh.”
Tsh hab cheꞌiok ab sikol i kekiwua k ash neid mash ab hema kehk ch ash wabshaba pi shaꞌi mahch mo hedai wud.
Sh eda d Jesus ch ab kakke ch hab kaij, “Uwi shahchu ap ahgch shoak? Dohp in gahg?” Kush hab e ahg mo d eꞌes nuhkuddam ch hab kaij ab wui, “Ab g si s‑ni‑hoꞌigeꞌid k am ni‑ahgid mapt hebai hab cheh. Nt am wo him k am wo bei.”
Sh hab kaij g Jesus ab wui, “Mary.” Tsh ab hahawa ep i neid k hab kaij e‑neꞌoki ed, “Raboni!” mo hab d ahga “Ni‑mashchamdam!”
Sh hab kaij g Jesus, “Pi g am hu ni‑shohbid. Koi ant am hu hih ni‑ohg wui. Pt wabshaba am wo him k am wo ha ahgi g ni‑naipijju mant wo uhpam i ni‑nodagi heg wui mo d ni‑ohg ch ahpim d ep em‑ohg. Heg o d ni‑Jioshga ch ahpim d ep em‑Jioshga.”
D wa woho am uhpam hih g Mary Magdalene k am t‑ahgi mo neid g t‑kownalig Jesus. K heg am ahgid ihda.
D gam hu si i juh domig hudunk. Kuchd am t‑nam hema kih am. D ga hu si yahwidag g kihkjeg nachd pi s‑ha ehbid g hahaꞌichu. D wabshaba am haha wabsh jiwia g Jesus t‑wui k hab kaij, “Am g wabsh wo s‑ap e tahtk,”
ch ab hahawa t‑chehgid g e‑nohnhoi ch e‑huda. Kuchd si s‑hehgig ab i neidok.
D hab ep kaij ab t‑wui, “Am g wabsh wo s‑ap e tahtk. Am ant i em‑chuhcha hab masma mat g ni‑ohg am i ni‑kei. Kumt hab waꞌap am wo ahgachugad g haꞌichu ahgaj.”
T hab chei ihda k ab t‑dahm ihbheiwua k hab kaij, “Ab g wo i behꞌi g Hekia S‑apꞌekam Gewkdag.
Kumt wo s‑mahch k ah mas hedai g pi ap chuꞌijigaj gm hu hab i juni g Jiosh ch hedai pi gam hu hab i juni.” Neh, bad kaij ch am hahawa i piꞌata.
D g Thomas pi am hu t‑wehmaj mad wa am jiwia g Jesus.
Kuchd am hahawa chum ahgid matt nei g t‑kownalig. D hab kaij g Thomas, “Bant waꞌi masma wo s‑wohoch mat uhpam i wuhsh mant wo nei g nohnhoij mat ab wo s‑babaliwanik mamt ab sisish k ab wo taht abai k ab ep wo taht hudaj ab.”
Hemako domig amjed, chd am ep i t‑hemapai kih ch ed. D am hahawa t‑wehmaj g Thomas. Chd ab ep si yahwidadch g kihkjeg. D wabshaba ab i wah g Jesus k am jiwia t‑wui k hab kaij, “Am g wabsh wo si s‑ap e tahtk.”
D hab hahawa kaij ab Thomas wui, “Ab g i ni‑neid k ab tahtam g ni‑nohnhoi ch ni‑huda k ab wo s‑ni‑wohochudad.”
D hab hahawa chei g Thomas, “Ni‑kownalig ch ni‑Jioshga!”
D hab ep kaij g Jesus ab wui, “Ab apt i s‑ni‑wohoch nap pi ni‑neid. Baꞌich at wo i s‑hehgigk hegam mat ab wo i s‑ni‑wohoch wa chum pi g e‑wuhpuikaj ni‑neidch.”
Muꞌi s‑hasig haꞌichu ad hab ep juh g Jesus am t‑nena ed mant pi oꞌoha id eda oꞌohana.
Nt id in hi wa ha oꞌoha mamt ab amjed wo s‑wohoch mo g Jesus d Jiosh si Kehsha ch d alidaj k hab masma ab wo bei g wechij doakag.
Am waꞌi hebai amjed, d am ep i e chehgi g Jesus t‑wui amai al kahchki am am Galilee jewed ch ed.
Am achd wa oiopo g ni‑nawoj James wehm. K g Simon Peter ch Thomas Kuadi ch Nathanael ch gohk ep g t‑wehm e mashchamdam am t‑wehmaj.
D hab kaij g Simon Peter ab t‑wui, “Ih, nt hi wo sha ha uꞌim g waptopi.” Kuchd hab kaij, “Pegih, tt wo m‑oi.” Chd am hahawa dadhaiwua wahlko ch ed k am i himch shuhdagi oidch k ge chuhug oidam am wuakch g t‑chuagia shuhdagi ch ed ch pi haꞌichu shaꞌi bei.
D ab i chesh g tash. D ab hema kehk shuhdagi hugidgo. Kuchd pi shaꞌi mahch mo hedai wud.
D hab kaij, “Wihpiop, namt pi haꞌichu shaꞌi bei?” Chd hab kaij, “Pi haꞌichu.”
D hab hahawa kaij, “An g wo daꞌichud g e‑chuagia inhab s‑apkojed g e‑wahlko k wo haꞌi ha ui.” Kuchd wa woho hab t‑juh k pi t‑nako machs ab uhpam wo i cheshaj nad pi shaꞌi si muꞌi am e baꞌiha g waptopi.
Nid hab hahawa kaij ab Peter wui, “Doki t‑kownalig Jesus!” D am i kah g Simon Peter moki d Jesus k ab wah g e‑eniga mat wuahawua k am i dah shuhdagi ch ed k am i e wachwihim k ga hu jiwia wui.
Chd ahchim haꞌi ab hahawa i himch g wahlko ab chewaimedch g chuagia waptopi shuhdch nachd pi am waꞌi waik siant keishpa ab amjed mo an i hug g shuhdagi.
Kuchd an i huhud shuhdagi koa an k nei mo g chuhdagi am wehch. D am dahm kahch g watopi. D g pahn am ep wehch.
D hab kaij g Jesus ab t‑wui, “Ab g wo haꞌi uꞌuk g waptopi em‑uꞌi.”
Ab ad wabsh i si shuhdags g chuagia g geꞌeged waptopikaj. Kud g Simon Peter gan hu i chesh wahlko ch ed k ab i chewaim. Kud d siant hetaspo wehst‑mahm gamai waik (153). D eda pi e wantsh g chuagia.
D hab t‑ahg g Jesus, “Oi g wo i hihim k e gegosid.” Kuchd pi hedai ab kakke mo hedai wud nach pi wa chum s‑mahch mo d Jesus.
D am hih g Jesus k am bei g pahn k an i t‑hainidahim k g watopi am ep be k an i ha t‑mahkhi.
Id o d waꞌi waikkokam mad am i e chehgi g Jesus t‑wui amjed mad ab i wuhsh muhkig amjed.
Kuchd am i t‑nahto t‑gegosidk. D hab kaij g Jesus ab Simon Peter wui, “Simon map d Jonas alidag, nap baꞌich i si pihk e elid ni‑hekaj mo hi idam?” D hab kaij g Peter, “Heuꞌu, ni‑kownalig, s‑mahch ap mani ab si m‑tatchua.” D hab kaij g Jesus ab wui, “Am g i ha nuhkud g wechij ni‑wohochuddam no pi hab waꞌi masma mo g kahwal mahmad.”
D hab ep kaij g Jesus ab wui, “Simon, nap woho si pihk e elid ni‑hekaj?” D hab kaij g Peter, “Heuꞌu, ni‑kownalig, s‑mahch ap mani ab si m‑tatchua.” D hab ep kaij g Jesus, “Am g i ha nuhkud g ni‑wohochuddam.”
D id d i waikko mad hab kaij g Jesus, “Simon, nap ab si ni‑tatchua?” D si pi ap e tahtk g Peter mat waikko ab waꞌi kakke ch hab kaij, “Ni‑kownalig, wehs ap haꞌichu s‑mahch ch s‑mahch mani ab si m‑tatchua.” D hab kaij g Jesus, “Am g i ha nuhkud g ni‑wohochuddam.
Neh, s‑mahch ap map hejel s‑ap an has i e wua ch am hab e junihim map has i tatchua. Nt wabshaba wo si shel m‑ahgi mapt am wo i si kelit k ab haha wo uhgk i uhꞌul g e‑nohnhoi. T wabsh hema ab wo m‑enigadad k am wo i m‑bei map hebai chum pi am hu himimk.”
Kudki heg hab ahg matki has masma wo e muhkid g Peter. T hab wo s‑mai g hemajkam g Jiosh gewkdag. Kud g Jesus hab hahawa ahg g Peter mat gam hu hasko wo oi.
D am wehmaj i hih g Peter. Nid ab i ha oi. Kud g Peter ab uhpam i nea k ni‑neid
k hab kaij ab Jesus wui, “Ni‑kownalig, kut haschu am hab wo e juh am tahgio ihda John.”
D hab kaij g Jesus ab wui, “Neh, mantp wo tatchuidad g John mat pi wo ha muh k ab wo ai mant ep wo jiwia, k pi ab hu haꞌichu m‑him heg amjed. Am apt wabsh wo ni‑oidad.”
Kudki an i e ahgidahi am ha shahgid g Jesus wohochuddam mantsh pi wo ha muh. D eda pi hab kaij g Jesus manis pi wo ha muh ch hab kaij, “Mantp wo tatchuidad mat pi wo ha muh k ab wo ai mant ep wo jiwia, k pi ab hu haꞌichu m‑him heg amjed.”
Ahni ani wud manid neid ch kah ch ia oꞌoha. Kuni si s‑mahch mo d wohokam.
Neh, muꞌi ad haꞌichu hab ep juh g Jesus. Tp hems am wo i e oꞌohanahi wehs k wabsh wo shuhd g jewed.
Ni-nawoj map ab si tatchua g Jiosh: Am ant ep wo i em-oꞌohani ahni Luke mant wa heki hu m-oꞌohani hegai mash wa haschu hab junihim ihda Jesus ch haschu ha mashcham eda mash am oimmelhim ha shahgid g Tutuligo hemajkam.
Hekia S-apꞌekam Gewkdag ash wa ab mahkch g Jesus g gewkdag. Kutsh heg am haꞌi i ha chuhcha k am ha mashcha g e-chehanig.
Mtsh am hahawa shoꞌigchud k mua. Tsh wabshaba uhpam ep e chegito k am e chehgid ha wui g e-chuhchai ch nahnko masma wohokamchud mo d doakam. Kush idam muꞌikko neid am oidam g giꞌikko wehst-mahm tash matsh eda koi im hu i e bei dahm kahchim wui. Sh g Jesus muꞌi haꞌichu ha mashcham ab amjed g Jiosh kownaltalig.
Sh wa am hu hebai am e hemapadch. Sh hab kaij g Jesus ab ha wui, “Mat ab i em-mah g John g pahl wakona. T wabshaba g Hekia S-apꞌekam Gewkdag g si geꞌe gewkdag ab wo i em-mah pi shaꞌi muꞌi tash iꞌajed. Ni am wa heki hu em-ahgid mo hab kaij g Jiosh matsh id am hab wo em-juni. Kumt ia wabsh wo haꞌichugk Jerusalem kihhim t am k ab wo ai mat hab wo e juh.”
<range>
Sh am hema ep d tash. Tsh am ep i e hemapai g chuhchaij wehmaj g Jesus k ab kakke, “T-kownalig, napt ab hahawa ep wo t-mah ahchim Tutuligo hemajkam g apꞌedag matt hejel am wo i himch g t-kownaltalig?”
Sh hab kaij g Jesus ab ha wui, “Heki at hu i apꞌech g Jiosh mat hekid am hab wo i e juh hegai mam haschu ab ni-kakke. K pi d em-wuikam mams wo s-ap s-mahchk iaꞌi idani mas hekid wo i k.
Kumt wabshaba am wo i ahgahid mam haschu i s-ap s-mahch ab ni-amjed. Hekia S-apꞌekam Gewkdag at ab wo i em-mah g si geꞌe gewkdag mamt hab wo junihid. Kumt wehpeg am wo i ahgahi Jerusalem kihhim ch ed k amjed wehsko am Judea chekshani ch ed k amjed gam hu Samaria chekshani ch ed. T amjed gam hu wehsko wo i e ahgahi aꞌai jewed dahm.”
Neh, bash kaij ch amjed im hu hahawa i e bei dahm kahchim wui k gam hu pi e mahsid chewagi ch ed.
Sh am wabsh kia gegok ch am uhgk si nenea idam. Tsh am haha wabsh gohk i e chehgi g anghil k si s-tohtam e enigadadch
ch hab kaij, “Pi g ia hu wabsh wo gegokk ch am uhgk nenead mat hebai hih g Jesus. Hema tash at wo wa uhpam jiwia hab masma mam hemuch am neid mat has i masma gam hu hih.”
Id atsh hab e juh Olive Uꞌus Kawulk t ab. Sh heg d al eda hugkam mihya ab amjed g Jerusalem. Tsh ab hahawa i huhud hegam Jesus chuhchai kawulk amjed k am hihim
k gan hu dada mo an dadha k d idam Peter, John, James, Andrew, Philip, Thomas, Bartholomew, Matthew, ch hegai James mash g ohgaj hab chehgig Alphias, ch hegai Simon mash d hema hegam mash tatchua mat g Tutuligo hejel wo himchudad g e-kownaltalig, ch hegai Judas mash g ohgaj hab chehgig James.
Sh g Jesus jeꞌe ch wepnag ch haꞌi ehp g uꞌuwi am ha wehm e hehemapad ch am e hoꞌigeꞌidahun Jiosh wui.
Sh am heꞌekia d i tash matsh am ep i e hemapad k d siant gokko wehst-mahm (120) hegam mash ab ihm g Jesus e doꞌibiakch. Kutsh am hahawa i kekiwua g Peter k ash hab kaij,
“Ni-wepnag, Hekia S-apꞌekam Gewkdag atsh am i tashogi g t-kownaligbad David matsh has wo e juh hegai Judasbad mo chum t-wehmaj. Kut hemho wa hab e juh mash has i kaij. Judas at am i ha wanim hegam mat am bei g Jesus,
chum as d ep chum kehshaj mat am wo ahgahid g s-kehg haꞌichu ahgaj.” Bash kaij g Peter.
Kumtsh wa chum namkid g Judasbad matsh gagda. Tsh wabshaba hema e nolawt g oidag heg hekaj namkidadaj. Kutsh g Judasbad am him k am e naggia heg eda k ab si wantsh g e-wohk. Tsh g hihij gam hu si e iawua.
Sh heg hekaj hab e aꞌaga Ehꞌed Oidag.
Kush g Peter heg hekaj hab ep kaij, “An o hab chuꞌig heg eda nenꞌei oꞌohana mo an hab chuꞌig Jiosh heki hu oꞌohana ed: Pi at am hu wo haꞌichugk e-kih ed nat pi wo muh. K an ep oꞌohanas: Am at kehkud ed hema ep wo i kekiwua.
“Kut id hekaj hemho wa am hema wo i kekiwua t‑wehm mat hab waꞌap wo wohokamch mat uhpam e chegito g t‑kownalig Jesus. T hemho wa d wo hema t‑ahchimk mach ga hujed i wehmajkahim g Jesus am i amjed mat g John pahl wako am hugkam mat im hu hih dahm kahchim ch ed.” Neh, bash kaij g Peter ch am i haꞌasa neo.
<range>
Tsh am hahawa gohk i ha wuwhas. K hema hab chehgig idam Matthias. K hema d ep Joseph Justus ch hab ep e chechcheg Barsabas.
Tsh am hahawa e hoꞌigeꞌidahun k hab kaij, “Ge t‑kownalig, t am i dagito g Judas ihda chikpan k atki am ai g s‑koꞌok e‑namkidadag. Kuch ahchim pi shaꞌi mahch mo has e tatatk g hemajkam. Pt heg hekaj am wo si i t‑tashogi mapt hedai am wo i ha kei idam gohk
mat d wo si m‑kehshak ch am wo i ahgahi g haꞌichu m‑ahga am kehkud ed g Judas.”
Tsh am hahawa i ha tashogi mat d wo Matthiask ch d wo si kehshajk.
Tsh am i e ai matsh g Tutuligo hemajkam wo e nam k am hab wo juh g hehgchulida Jiosh wui heg hekaj haꞌichu e‑bahijida. Kutsh am wehs i e hemapai hema kih ch ed hegam mash ab ihm g Jesus.
Tsh haha wabsh ab dahm kahchim t amjed haꞌichu hab kaida mo g s‑gewk hewel wabsh shashawuk heg eda kih.
Sh hahawa haꞌichu ep neid mash hab mahs mo g mei. Tsh id ab aꞌai i e gantad k ab i dahiwuhi wehsijj ha ab.
Kutsh g Hekia S‑apꞌekam Gewkdag ab i ha mah g si geꞌe gewkdag. Tsh hekaj haha wabsh nahnko mahs neꞌokikaj neneo matsh eda chum pi hebai mai.
Sh eda muꞌijj ab dadha Jerusalem t ab hegam mash d Tutuligo ch ab aꞌai i hihi muꞌikpa jejewed amjed matsh ab wo ihm g Jiosh.
Tsh an wehsko i kaida hegai mash hab kaidag mo g s‑gewk hewel. Kutsh idam am i kah k am e chehm mash hebai i kaidag. Sh idam Jesus ihmdam haha wabsh am neneok g ha‑neꞌokikaj mash hedai haschu i neꞌokikaj neok.
Kutsh si e totods idam k hab kaij, “Hab kaidam neneok ch eda d wabsh Galilee t am oꞌodham.
Kus has masma hab chuꞌig mach wehsijj s‑ha amichud g heheꞌejel t‑neꞌokikaj?
Kuch eda muꞌikpa jejewed amjed, haꞌi ab Parthia t amjed ch haꞌi ab Media t amjed ch ab amjed g Elam ch Mesopotamia ch Judea ch Cappadocia ch Pontus ch Asia
ch Phrygia ch Pamphylia ch Egypt ch Crete ch Arabia ch gam hu Cyrene kihhim wehgaj am Libya jewed ch ed ch ab Rome kihhim t amjed. K ia haꞌi t‑wehmaj g gawul mahs hemajkam mat ab i wahp t‑himdag ed. Kuch wehsijj kah g heheꞌejel t‑neꞌokikaj heg amjed mat haschu si s‑hasigam hab juh g Jiosh.
<range>
A t haschu ahgk hab haꞌichu e juh?” Bash kaij nash pi si has elid.
Sh wabshaba haꞌijj wabsh nahnko ha ahg ch hab kaij, “Tki wabsh nawkk idam.”
Tsh ab hahawa i gegokiwua g Jesus chuhchai. Sh g Peter am amog, “Ni‑hajuni ch ahpim mam ia wabsh sha kih Jerusalem t am, ab g wo si i ni‑kaiham k am wo i oidahi mant haschu wo i em‑ahgi.
Pi ach d nawkkoi.
Ihda mat haschu has i e juh o d hegai matsh g Joelbad an oꞌoha. Heg ash wa d Jiosh haꞌichu i tashogiddam ch an oꞌoha hab masma:
Bo kaij g Jiosh: T ab wo i e aihi g si oidchkam tash. Kunt wo cheha g Hekia S‑apꞌekam Gewkdag mat am wo ha wehmajk g hemajkam ch ab wo ha mahkad g si geꞌe i wehmtadag. Kut g em‑wihpiopga ch g em‑chetchaga wo ah g haꞌichu ni‑ahga. Nt wo i ha tashogi g kekel am ha‑chehchki ed mat haschu has wo e juh imhab i dahm. T id hab waꞌap am wo e chehgi ha‑nena ed g wechij oꞌodham.
Ab ant wehs wo ha mah g ni‑pionag g Hekia S‑apꞌekam Gewkdag, chum hems g uꞌuwi ni‑pionag, mat am wo i ahgahi g haꞌichu ni‑ahga.
Nt wo ha chehgi g s‑hasigam haꞌichu gan hu uhgk ha dahm ch an jewed dahm. Ehꞌed at wo e iawua. T g mei ch kuhbs wo i wuhsh.
T g tash pi wo ton k g mashad wo ge wegiumih hab masma mo g ehꞌed. K id wehs hab d ahga mo e aihim hegai si geꞌe tash mant heg eda wo ha lodai g hemajkam.
Kut hedai ab wo i gei ni‑wui k wo e doꞌibia ab amjed g pi ap e‑namkidadag. Neh, bash kaij g Jiosh.
“Kumt ab wo i ni‑kaiha, ni‑hajuni. Ihda Jesus mo ab d kihkam Nazareth t ab at hab juh g s‑hasigam haꞌichu mat pi hedai hejel wo shaꞌi e nako mat hab wo juh. T id hekaj am i t‑tashogi g Jiosh mo id am d si Kehshaj. Kum ihda am wa hejel s‑mahch heg hekaj mat wehs am hab e juh em‑shahgid.
Jiosh atsh heki hu i apꞌech matsh has masma wo e muhkid g alidaj k heg hekaj am i dagito em‑wui. Kumt an be k ha mah hegam mo pi mahch g Jiosh chehanig nam pi s‑muꞌamk. Kut idam mua ab kots t ab naggiak.
T wabshaba g Jiosh ab i wuhshad ab amjed g s‑koꞌok muhkig nat pi am hab waꞌap i apꞌech mat ep wo e chegito. Kut hemho wa am hab wo e juh.
“T an wa oꞌoha g t‑kownaligbad David mat hab wo chei g Jiosh si Kehsha: Chum ap hekid ni‑wehmaj, ni‑Jioshga! Ni heg hekaj pi shaꞌi haꞌichukaj ni‑kudut
ch wabsh si s‑ap ni‑tahtk ch s‑hehgigam haꞌichu ahg. Ab o e aihim mant wo muh. Nt wabshaba wabsh si s‑ap ni‑tahtk ch wo m‑nenida.
Pi apt am hu wo shaꞌi ni‑dagito amai mo hebai haꞌichug g koꞌi k pi wo shaꞌi hiwigi mas wo padt g ni‑chuhkug nani pi d hekia s‑apꞌekam m‑alidag.
Am apt i ni‑chehgi mant has masma uhpam ep wo i wuhsh ab muhkig t amjed. Chum apt hekid wo ni‑wehmajk. Nt heg hekaj wo si s‑hehgigkad.
“Neh, ni‑naipijju, batki masma an oꞌoha g Davidbad. K wabshaba si tasho mo pi hejel hab e ahg mat pi wo padt no pi g ohꞌoj am wabsh kia wehch hihaꞌinij ed id i tashkaj.
Davidbad ash d Jiosh haꞌichu i tashogiddam ch heg hab ahg Jiosh si Kehsha matsh pi wo padt k wo uhpam i wuhsh ab muhkig amjed. Jiosh ash wa heki hu ahgid g Davidbad mat am wo hema i kei g amjedkam am kehkud ed mat d wo geꞌe kownalk.
Davidbad oki s‑mahch ihda ch heg hab ahg ch hab kaij mat pi am hu wo shaꞌi dagito amai mo hebai haꞌichug g koꞌi k pi wo shaꞌi hiwigi mat wo padt g chuhkugaj.
Pegih, k d hegai Jesus mat g Jiosh ab i wamigi muhkig amjed. Kuch ahchim g t‑wuhpuikaj neid mach haschu ia em‑ahgid.
Jiosh at am i wahkid k an kei si e‑hugid an. Kut ab bei g apꞌedag k cheha g Hekia S‑apꞌekam Gewkdag mat ab t‑wui wo hih. Heki ash hu hab kaij g Jiosh mat hab wo e juh. K d ihda mam am neid ch kah hemuch mat hab t‑juni.
Pi o hejel hab e ahg g Davidbad ch wabshaba heg hab ahg Jiosh si Kehsha mat pi wo padt k wo uhpam hih am dahm kahchim wui nat pi an ep oꞌoha: Jiosh o hab kaij ab ge ni‑Kownalig wui: In g dahiwua si ni‑hugid an
k ab wo ai mant wo ha gewito g m‑obga.
“Pegih, ihda Jesus mamt ab naggia kots t ab o d Jiosh si Kehsha ch d wo t‑doꞌibiakam kownalk. Kutt id wo chum si s‑ap s‑mahchk wehsijj ahchim Tutuligo hemajkam.” Neh, bash kaij g Peter.
Kush si s‑koꞌokam pi ap e tahtk g hemajkam am i kaiok ch hab kaij ab ha wui hegam Peter, “Ih, tt has wo t‑juh, t‑naipijju?”
Sh hab kaij g Peter ab ha wui, “Heheꞌejel g gam hu wo s‑ohhod g pi ap e‑chegitoi k wo e pahl‑wapko ab chehchegch g Jesus Christ. Kut gam hu hab wo i juh g Jiosh g pi ap em‑chuꞌijig. T amjed wo si em‑wehmajkad g Hekia S‑apꞌekam Gewkdag
nash pi g Jiosh hab kaij mat ab wehsijj wo ha mah g Hekia S‑apꞌekam Gewkdag hegam mat ab wo i ha wai e wui.”
Sh tash am neok g Peter ch am chum ha ahgid ch hab kaij, “Am g wo e doꞌibia. Si s‑koꞌok namkidadag o ab ha aihim hegam t‑wehm hemajkam mat pi gam hu wo ohhod g pi ap e‑chuꞌijig.”
Kutsh waik mihl ab i s‑wohoch g haꞌichu ahgaj heg i tashkaj k e pahl‑wapkon k ab i e hemakoj ha wehm.
Sh g Jesus chuhchai am hahawa ha mashcham. Kush am ha wehm e mihshmad ch e hoꞌigeꞌidahun ch ha wehm huhuga g chemait.
Kush muꞌi haꞌichu s‑hasigam hab junihim idam Jesus chuhchai g Jiosh gewkdagkaj. Tsh heg hekaj muꞌijj ehp ab si has i el mat haschu hab juh g Jiosh.
Sh wehsijj g Jesus ihmdam ab si e hajunit ch wehs haꞌichu ab i aꞌai e mahk mash hedai haschu i pi edgid,
chum as hems wo gagda g haꞌichu e‑eniga mat heg hekaj lial am wo i ha wehmt hegam mo haꞌichu i pi edgid.
Sh wehs tashkaj am e nanmek geꞌe cheopi ch ed ch am ep e wehm e gegosid aꞌai e‑kihki ed si s‑ap e tatatk ch ab wabsh i e shoꞌigchudch Jiosh wui
ch ab si hehgchulid g Jiosh. Kush wehsijj g hemajkam si s‑ha hoꞌigeꞌelid. Sh g Jiosh ab i ha wahpkid ha shahgid wehs tash ab hegam mat hab waꞌap e doꞌibia.
Kush am waꞌi hebai amjed, tsh am dada g Peter g John wehm geꞌe cheopi t am. Kush d i waik ohla gam hu i juhk mo eda e aꞌahe mat wo e hoꞌigeꞌidahu.
Sh ab hema daha g shoꞌigkam hemajkam heg bahsho kolhai kihjeg mash hab e aꞌaga Si S‑kehg Kihjeg. Kush ihda oꞌodham ga hu e‑alijk amjed pi himdag. Kumsh wehs tashkaj am wabsh i bebhe ch ab dadsha ab kolhai kihjego. Kush wabsh haꞌichu ha tahni hegam mo am daiw.
Tsh eda am wo i wahp idam Peter ch John. Sh ab haꞌichu chum ha tahni.
Tsh ab si i nei idam Peter k hab kaij, “Ab g si i t‑neid.”
Kutsh wa woho ab si i ha nei hab e ahgch mat wo haꞌichu mah.
Sh oi wa hab wabsh kaij g Peter, “Neh, ni‑nawoj, pi ani ha lialiga ch wabshaba haꞌichu wo m‑mah mat heg baꞌich wo i m‑wehmt. K d ihda mant hab wo m‑ah mapt ab wo i hiw g Jesus Christ k wo kekiwua k wo hih.”
Bash kaij ch ab hahawa bei g nowij k ab i wuhshad. Kutsh am wa i hekaj ab gewpka g kakhioj.
Tsh am si uhgk daꞌa k kekiwua k am wa i hekaj s‑ap hih. Kutsh idam Peter im hu i wahp cheopi kolhai ch ed. Tsh heg ha wehm i wah k si chehk dadꞌehim ch ab si hehgchulid g Jiosh.
Kutsh si has i el g hemajkam am i neidok mo d hegai pi himidkam mo ab dahiwup kolhai kihjego.
<range>
Batsh e juh ihda anai mash hab e aꞌaga Solomonbad Watto. Kush ihda pi himidkam gan hu wabsh i si e uꞌukch ab ha ab g Peter ch John mat pi wo i e gawulkai ab ha amjed. Tsh ab hahawa aꞌaijed i wohp g hemajkam k gan hu ha biha si has i elidk mat e doaj.
Tsh am wabsh apꞌet g Peter mat am ha mihshmad k hab kaij: “Ni‑wehm oꞌodham, pi g am wo si e totodsid. Pi att g hejel t‑gewpkdagkaj doaj ihda oꞌodham,
Jiosh si Kehsha at hab t‑juni nach pi ab hiwig. K d hegai Jesus mam ahpim s‑muꞌamk ch ab mah g kownal Pilate. K eda g Jiosh d pionag g Jesus ch d hekia s‑apꞌekam ch pi ha chuꞌijig. T ha chum wo dagito g Pilate. M wabshaba ahpim hab ahg mat wo muꞌa k heg wo dagito mo d ha muꞌakam. K heg hekaj d em‑chuꞌijig mat e muhkid. K eda d hegai mo ab t‑makiog g pi ha huhugedam doakag. T wabshaba g Jiosh ab si haꞌichuchud k uhpam i wuhshad ab amjed g muhkig k am i bei dahm kahchim wui. Hegam t‑shohshonbad mash d Abraham ch Isaac ch Jacob ash ab si has i elid g Jiosh. Kum eda ab wui gegok g Jiosh si Kehsha.
<range>
<range>
<range>
“Pegih, ni‑wepnag, mtp hems heg hekaj s‑muꞌam g Jesus mam pi mahch mo heg am d si Kehshaj g Jiosh mat wo t‑doꞌibia.
T eda heki hu waꞌi amjed an oꞌoha g kelibad Jiosh haꞌichu i tashogiddam mat g si Kehshaj wo e shoꞌigch. T idani woho am hab e juh.
Pegih, oi g gam hu wo s‑ohhod g pi ap e‑chegitoi k ab wo i e nohnogi Jiosh wui. T heg wo s‑em‑hoꞌigeꞌid k gam hu hab wo i juh g pi ap em‑chuꞌijig k ab wo si i wechijid g em‑dodakag.
T ab em‑wui wo i hih g si Kehshaj Jesus.
K hab mahs mat an wo haꞌichugk ihda Jesus dahm kahchim ch ed am hugkam mat hab wo e juh hegai mo haschu i t‑tashogid g kekelibad Jiosh haꞌichu i tashogiddam.
“Neh, bash wa kaij g Mosesbad am t‑shohshon ha wui: Em‑kownalig Jiosh at ab wo hema i kei g haꞌichu i tashogiddam hab masma mat ahni am i ni‑kei. Kut ihda d wo em‑wepo oꞌodhamk. Wehs haꞌichu amt ab wo kaiha mat haschu ab wo i em‑ahgi.
Kut wo e koꞌij matp hedai pi ab hu wo kaihamad. Neh, bash kaij g Mosesbad.
K wehsijj ahgachug g kekelibad Jiosh haꞌichu i tashogiddam hegai mo haschu am hab i e junihim idani. Samuelbad ash d hema hegam.
Jiosh ash wa am ha ahgid g t‑shohshonbad matsh haschu hab wo t‑juni. K heg d ep t‑wuikam ahchim mach d ha amjedkam. “Bash kaij g Jiosh am wui g Abrahambad: Am ant wo hema i kei g m‑amjedkam mant heg hekaj ab wo i s‑ha hoꞌigeꞌel g wehs nahnko mahs hemajkam id dahm jewed.
“Neh, t wa woho hab e juh mat am i kei g e‑alidag Jesus. T heg wehpeg ab i s‑t‑hoꞌigeꞌel ahchim Tutuligo k ab t‑wui him k ab i t‑mah g apꞌedag matt ab wo i t‑nohnogi ab amjed g pi apꞌekam.”
Sh am wabsh kia ha mihshmad g Peter ch John. Kutsh am haha wabsh haꞌi dada g papal ch ha‑geꞌejig g geꞌe cheopi nuhkuddam ch haꞌi ehp mash am oid g Sajusi himdag.
Sh eda wa idam Peter ch John am ha mashcham g hemajkam mat ab i wuhsh g Jesus e‑muhkig amjed. Sh idam Sajusi pi hohhoꞌid nash pi pi wohochud mat ep wo e chegito g koꞌi.
Sh eda e aihim mat wo s‑chukk. T heg hekaj ged hu ha kuh mat wo ha lodai baꞌich tash.
Tsh wabshaba muꞌijj hegam matsh kah g Peter ch John ab i s‑wohoch g Jiosh haꞌichu ahga. Tsh am i muꞌida hegam mash ab ihm g Jesus. Kush hegam mash d chechoj d hahawa hetasp mihl.
Sh am baꞌich d i tash. Tsh am e hemapai g hemajkam ha wanimeddam ch geꞌeged ch chehanig ha mashchamdam.
Kush am ha wehmaj hegai uhgchu pahl mash hab chehgig Annas. Sh g hajunij am hab waꞌap haꞌichug mash haꞌi d Caiaphas ch John ch Alexander.
Tsh ab hahawa i ha wuwhas idam Peter kukpaikud amjed k ga hu i ha chuhcha k ab ha kakke, “Shahchu am e wepogid ch hab haꞌichu wua? Dohm hab elid mamt heg ab bei g e‑gewkdag k doaj ihda pi himidkam?”
Tsh ab baꞌich i gewkai g Peter g Hekia S‑apꞌekam Gewkdag. Sh hab kaij: “Bamki e elid ahpim t‑wanimeddam ch geꞌeged
matt hemho wo wa bei g apꞌedag matt hab wo juh g s‑apꞌekam.
Pegih, nt wo em‑ahgi mat g Jesus Christ ab i t‑mah hegai gewkdag matt hekaj doaj ihda oꞌodham. Ahpim amt hab juh hegai Jesus Christ mat ab e naggia kots t ab. T wabshaba g Jiosh ab uhpam i wuhshad muhkig amjed.
Id o hab ahg Jesus g kelibad Jiosh haꞌichu i tashogiddam ch an oꞌoha ihda haꞌichu wepogida mo hab chuꞌig: Kihtdam at wo hema chum s‑ohhodam g hodai. T wabshaba id d wo si s‑has haꞌichu hodaik am ha‑kihta wehhejed.
Hegai waꞌi Jesus at wo ha doꞌibia g hemajkam. Do Jiosh si Kehsha mat ab wo t‑mah g pi ha huhugedam doakag. Kut pi hedai ep hab wo shaꞌi juh g doꞌibiadag.”
Sh si s‑e mahch ch neneok idam Peter. Tsh hekaj si has i ha el idam hahaꞌichu, wahm mat am i s‑mai am i ha kahkch mo d wabsh si oꞌodham ch pi hasko shaꞌi uhgk e mashchamahim. Tsh am hahawa i amich moki an wehmajkahim g Jesus.
Kush am ha wehm kehk hegai mamt doaj. Sh pi e nakog hegam hahaꞌichu mas has wo chei nash pi g e‑wuhpuikaj neid mat woho e doaj hegai.
Kumtsh gam hu hahawa i ha wuwhas hegam Peter matsh g hahaꞌichu am wo i aꞌaga.
Kush hab kaij, “Shahtt wo ha juh. Wehsijj o s‑mahch g Jerusalem t am kihkam mat doaj g pi himidkam. K id d si s‑hasig haꞌichu. Kutt pi wo shaꞌi t‑nako machs hab wo chei mas pi woho hab juh.”
Sh hab hahawa ep kaij, “Matt wo keshwua ihda ha‑ahga mat pi hekid am hu ep wo shaꞌi aꞌagad ihda Jesus am hema i wui.”
Kumtsh ab hahawa ep i ha wahpki. Sh hab ha ahg, “Chum as has wo chuꞌigk haꞌichu, mt pi am hu wo shaꞌi aꞌagad ihda Jesus.”
Sh hab hahawa si kaij hegam Peter, “Am g wo i aꞌamichud machs ahpim ab wo em‑wohoch aha natt g Jiosh.
Tt ahchim hi hemho am wo wa ahgahid mat haschu i si s‑kehg hab juh k haschu i si s‑kehg hab kaij g Jesus mach si neid ch kah.”
Kush wa eda hegai pi himidkam i baꞌiwchkim g giꞌikko wehst‑mahm aꞌahidag. Sh g hemajkam wehs ab si i hehgchulid g Jiosh mat doaj. Kutsh heg hekaj pi shaꞌi e nako g ha wanimeddam mas has masma s‑koꞌokam wo ha namkid k am wabsh si ha ebkiod k chum ha keshwua k hahawa ha dagito.
<range>
Tsh am wa i hekaj ged hu uhpam dada e‑naipijju ha wui k am ha ahgid mo has i ha ahg g uꞌugchu papal ch geꞌeged.
Tsh am i kaiok am ha hekaj e hoꞌigeꞌidahun k hab kaij, “T‑kownalig Jiosh, wehs ap uꞌukch g gewkdag ch nahtokch g dahm kahchim ch jewed kahchim ch ge kahchki ch wehs haꞌichu mo haschu am i ha eda.
Ab aptki cheha g Hekia S‑apꞌekam Gewkdag mat wo amichudach g m‑pionagbad David. K hekaj hab kaij: Shoꞌo waꞌi si s‑babga g nahnko dakam hemajkam ch am chum e nakog mat am hab wo juh hegai mo g Jiosh pi ha hiwgid.
T am i e nako g kokownal k am i e wehmt mat ab wui wo gegokiwua g Jiosh si Kehsha.
“Neh, Jiosh t‑ohg, t wa woho am e hemapai g t‑wehm oꞌodham ha wehm g gawul mahs hemajkam ch hegam kokownal mo d Herod ch Pilate. Wehsijj at ab wui gegokiwua g hekia s‑apꞌekam m‑Kehsha, Jesus.
Heki apt hu am i apꞌech mapt wo ha hiwigi mat wo mua g si m‑Kehsha. Kut idam mat ab chum m‑wui gegokiwua hab wabsh juh mapt haschu heki hu i apꞌech.
Pegih, t‑ohg Jiosh, am g i ha neid mo ab si t‑ebkiod k ab wo i t‑mah g gewkdag matt s‑gewkam wo aꞌagad g haꞌichu m‑ahga ch wo ha dodaj g kokꞌodam ch si s‑hasigam haꞌichu hab wo juh g gewkdajkaj g hekia s‑apꞌekam m‑Kehsha, Jesus.”
<range>
Tsh am i haꞌasa e hoꞌigeꞌidahu. Tsh g Hekia S‑apꞌekam Gewkdag am si uꞌugij hegai kih mo am e hemapadch k ab si i ha mah g gewkdag. Tsh am hahawa baꞌich i si s‑gewkam ah g Jiosh haꞌichu ahga.
Wehsijj ash ab aꞌai si e tatchua g Jesus ihmdam ch ab si i hemakoch g e‑chegitoi k pi hedai shaꞌi s‑daꞌa g haꞌichu e‑eniga ab aꞌai e wui.
Sh idam Jesus chuhchai si s‑gewkam am ahgachug mat uhpam i wuhsh g Jesus muhkig t amjed k d wehs ha‑kownalig. Kush g Jiosh am si i ha wehmt.
Sh haꞌi am ha gagda g e‑oꞌoidag ch e‑kihki ch ab i uꞌu g lial
ch ab ha mamka g Jesus chuhchai mash hekid i e tatchua. Sh am hahawa aꞌai ha mamka hegam mash pi haꞌichu edgid. Sh hekaj pi hedai haꞌichu pi edgid.
Sh hema d Joseph ch ab Cyprus jewed t ab d kihkam ch d chum papal ha wehm chikpandam nash pi ab d Levibad amjedkam. Sh id hab ep chechcheg g Jesus chuhchai Barnabas mo hab d ahga I ha Gewkemhundam.
Id atsh gagda g e‑oidag k ab i ui g namkigaj k wehs ha mah g Jesus chuhchai.
Sh am hema d Jesus ihmdam ch hab chehgig Ananias. Kush g wehmaj kihkam hab chehgig Sapphira ch hab waꞌap d Jesus ihmdam. Kutsh ihda Ananias epai gagda g haꞌichu e‑eniga
k hab masma hab chum e juh mat wehs ha mah g namkigaj g Jesus chuhchai k wabshaba ged hu haꞌi si toa e‑wohshag ed.
Sh hab kaij g Peter ab wui, “Shahchu apt ahgk hiwigi g Jiawul mat am pad haꞌichu hab juh m‑ihbdag ed. Pt heg hekaj iattogi g Hekia S‑apꞌekam Gewkdag mapt heg wepogi mo id d wehs g haꞌichu m‑eniga namkig.
Hegai haꞌichu m‑eniga o d m‑eniga mapt koi gagda. Pt am i gagda. K hegai namkigaj d m‑lialiga. Pt eda hab juh ihda si geꞌe pi apꞌekam. Pi apt ahchim waꞌi chum t‑iattogi mach d wabsh oꞌodham. Jiosh apt ep chum iattogi.”
T am wabsh i chum kaiok ihda g Ananias k muhk k i gei.
Tsh ab hahawa i wahp g wechij oꞌodham k am i apꞌech g chuhkugaj k ged hu cheh.
Sh am ep s‑mahch g wehmaj kihkam g muhki matsh hab masma wo chum ha iattogi. Sh am d i waik ohla. Kutsh eda pi koi kah mat has e juh k hekaj am jiwia mo am daha g Peter.
Kush heg ab wui hab kaij, “Namt haꞌakia ui g lial mamt gagda g haꞌichu e‑eniga?” Sh hab kaij, “Heuꞌu, haꞌakia att ui.”
Sh hab kaij g Peter, “Ms haschu ahgk hig ahpi g e‑wehm kihkam wehm hab chum i e taht mamt wabsh wo piꞌich g Hekia S‑apꞌekam Gewkdag? Dada at hegam mat ged hu cheh g m‑wehm kihkam. Pegih, t hab waꞌap masma hab wo m‑juh.”
Tsh am ha hekaj muhk k i gei wecho. Tsh ab i wahp g wechij oꞌodham k am nei matki muh k gam hu i be k ged hu cheh hugidaj an g wehmaj kihkam.
Tsh wehsijj ab si s‑ehbeni g Jesus ihmdam ch hegam ehp mo hedai i kah ihda.
Kush s‑hasig haꞌichu s‑ta neidamam hab junihim g Jesus chuhchai am ha shahgid g hemajkam. Sh wehsijj si s‑ap e hehemapad hegam Jesus ihmdam heg wecho Solomonbad watto.
Sh g hemajkam ab si has ha elid ch wabshaba si s‑e gihug mat ab wo i ha wehmt.
Tsh oi wa muꞌi ab i s‑wohoch g haꞌichu ha‑ahga ab amjed g Jesus k ab i ha wehmt. Haꞌi d chechoj ch haꞌi d uꞌuwi.
Kumtsh am i ha wuwhas g kokꞌodam am i neidok mo haschu has junihim g Jesus chuhchai k an kahya oidk ha wahpakusch hab elidch mat chum hems g Peter ehkadag ab hab wo e juh ha ab mat wo e dodaj.
Muꞌijj atsh ab aꞌaijed i hihi Jerusalem wui ab i ha uꞌuk g e‑kokꞌodamga ch hegam mo g jijawul an ha uꞌukch. Kutsh wehs ha dodaj.
Tsh g uhgchu pahl ch hegam mash hab waꞌap am oid g Sajusi himdag si s‑koꞌokam s‑ha hehgam g Jesus chuhchai
k am i ha cheha g geꞌe cheopi nuhkuddam mat wo ha kuh. Tsh wa woho am ha kuh.
Tsh wabshaba heg i s‑chuhugam ab g anghil am si kuhpiꞌo g kukpaikud k ab i ha wuwhas g Jesus chuhchai k hab ha ahg,
“Am g wo uhpam hihim k am wo i gegokiwua geꞌe cheopi ch ed k wo ha ahgi g hemajkam mat has masma wo bei ihda pi ha huhugedam doakag.”
Kutsh ab wohog elid k am hihim k am i wahp geꞌe cheopi ch ed mat wabsh i chum mahsi k am ha hekaj i ha mashcha g hemajkam. Tsh eda heg waꞌi siꞌalim g uhgchu pahl ch hegam Sajusi am i ha hemapai g e jehnigiddam. Sh idam pi mahch mat haschu has e juh ch atsh am ha cheha g nuhkuddam mat ab wo i ha ui g ha‑lilsoga.
Kutsh am chum hihi g geꞌe cheopi nuhkuddam mat wo ha ui. Kush pi am hu haꞌichug. Tsh ab wabsh uhpam hihim k am ha ahgid ch hab kaij,
“M att dada kukpaikud am k am chum nei. K ab wabsh kia yahwidag. K g lilso ha nuhkuddam ab ep gegok kihjeg t ab. Tt wabshaba am i chum kuhpiꞌo g kihjeg. K pi am hu hedai haꞌichug.”
Tsh am i ha kaiok am wabsh i pi amich mas hebai has e juh g ha‑lilsoga.
Tsh am hahawa hema i wahk k hab kaij, “Nehꞌe! Idani o ged hu ha mashcham g hemajkam geꞌe cheopi ch ed hegam mamt wa ha kuh.”
Tsh am hahawa hihi g geꞌe cheopi nuhkuddam k ab uhpam wabsh s‑ap i ha ui nat pi am hu wo ha maꞌichshul g hemajkam
k am ha uꞌapa ha wui g e jehnigiddam. Sh hab ha ahg g uhgchu pahl,
“Chum ach s‑gewkam pi em‑hiwgid mams an hu wo aꞌagad hegai Jesusbad. T eda g em‑mashchamadag ab amjed heki hu wehsko chehmo g Jerusalem. Kum ahpim ab chum t‑abchud g muhkigaj.”
