Tsh am hu hebai chuhug ch ed am haꞌichu hab e juh Paul nena ed mash kah g Jesus. Kush ab wui hab kaij, “Pi g am shaꞌi haꞌichu ehbidad. Ia ani m‑wehmaj ch pi hedai wo shai hiwigi mas wo s‑koꞌokam m‑juh. Pi g shaꞌi haꞌasa ha mihshmad. Muꞌijj o ia kih id eda kihhim mat d wo ni‑hemajkamgak.”
<range>
Sh heg hekaj hemako ahidag ch eda hugkam ehp am haꞌichugkahim ch am ha mashcham g Jiosh haꞌichu ahga.
Tsh am hahawa hema i dahiwua g kownal am Greek hemajkam ha‑jewedga am k hab chehgig Gallio. Tsh g Tutuligo am i e hemapad k an bei g Paul k am uꞌapa geꞌe kih t am
k hab kaij, “Ihda oꞌodham o chum ha chehani g hemajkam mat hab masma ab wo i ihmad g Jiosh mam has masma pi t‑hiwgid.”
Kutsh am haha wabsh wo i chum neo g Paul. Sh wabshaba Gallio hab ha ahg, “Pi oki ab wui kehk g geꞌe kownal chehanig. T heg hekaj pi wo ni‑apꞌet mant ab wo em‑kaiha.
Doki wabsh haꞌichu ahga ab amjed g em‑himdag ch ab hema i amjed g em‑wehm oꞌodham. Mt heg hekaj am hejel wo i apꞌech. Pi ant am hu wo shaꞌi i hudaw hab mahs haꞌichu.”
Neh, bash kaij ch gam hu si i ha wuwhas geꞌe kih amjed.
Kutsh idam an wabsh si bei hegai mash d ha wanimeddam am cheopi ch ed ch hab chehgig Sosthenes k am si gewitta geꞌe kih bahsho. Tsh pi ab hu has shaꞌi e taht g Gallio.
Sh muꞌi tash am haꞌichugkahim g Paul Corinth kihhim t am ha wehm hegam mash ab s‑wohochud g Jiosh haꞌichu ahga. Tsh amjed hab i e ah matsh gam hu uhpam wo hih Syria jewed wui. Sh eda gam hu hihhim g geꞌeged wapalko Cenchrea kihhim t amjed. Kutsh gam hu hih g Paul. Tsh g Priscilla ch Aquila gm hu oi. Tsh koi am hu i chehchsh geꞌe wahlko ch ed, tsh g Paul hih g e‑moꞌo matsh wa am heꞌes i tash pi hih mo d ha‑himdag heg hekaj mat ab haꞌichu ahꞌad g Jiosh.
Tsh am hahawa gahi i shul g geꞌe wahlkokaj k ga hu dada Ephesus kihhim t am. Kutsh am i dadhaiwua g Priscilla ch Aquila. Tsh g Paul am hih mat am wo sha i wah Tutuligo ha‑cheopi ed k am ha wehm haꞌichu aꞌaga.
Sh idam ab ahgid mat am wabsh wo i wih ha wehm. Tsh wabshaba pi e nako
k ash hab wabsh ha ahg am wo i himk, “Matp g Jiosh d wo tatchuik, nt wo wa uhpam ep jiwia.” Neh, bash kaij ch amjed ab i chesh geꞌe wahlko t ab.
Tsh heg gam hu gahi i gei Cesaria kihhim t am. Tsh amjed gam hu hahawa hih g Paul Jerusalem wui k am i ha chehgim g e‑wehm wohochuddam. Am heꞌes i tash, tsh gam hu hahawa ep gahi i chesh Antiok t am.
Sh am heꞌes i haꞌichugkahim amai ch am hahawa ep ha dagito k atsh gam hu hahawa ep hih ha oidk g Galasia ch Phrygia jejewed k am i ha gewkemhunahim g e‑wehm wohochuddam.
Tsh am hema jiwia g Tuhligo Ephesus kihhim t am k hab chehgig Apollos ch ab d mahsikam Alexandria kihhim t ab ch si s‑e mahch ab s‑neokimakam t ab ch ash si geꞌe s‑mahch g Jiosh oꞌohana.
Kumtsh heki hu mashcha ab amjed g Jesus. Kush si s‑hohhoꞌid ch am ahgahim ch si s‑ap ha mashcham ch eda heg waꞌi s‑mahch John pahl wakona.
Tsh am i kah hegam Priscilla ch Aquila nash pi am si ha mihshmad Tutuligo ha‑cheopi ed. Tsh idam am i wai e‑kih wui k am s‑ap ahgid mo haschu i koi s‑mahch ab amjed g Jesus.
Kutsh hab hahawa i e ah g Apollos mat am wo hih Greece jewed wui. Tsh am i wehmt hegam mash ab s‑wohochud g s‑kehg haꞌich ahgaj g Jiosh ch am kih Ephesus t am k am ha oꞌohani g e‑wehm wohochuddam amai Greece ch ed k ab si ha ahgid mat s‑ap ab wo i nei g Apollos. Tsh gam hu jiwia k ab si geꞌe i ha wehmt.
Sh am haꞌi neꞌowin g Tutuligo. Tsh wabshaba am ha gewito am ha‑kaichudch g muꞌi hemajkam k am si i wohokamch heg hekaj Jiosh oꞌohana mo g Jesus d Jiosh si Kehsha mat wo ha doꞌibia g hemajkam.
Tsh gam hu baꞌich ep hih g Paul k ged hu jiwia Ephesus t am mo eda g Apollos am oimmed Corinth t am. Kush am haꞌi kih ch ab chum s‑wohochud g Jiosh haꞌichu ahga.
Sh g Paul ab ha kakke, “Namt am wa bei g gewkdag ab amjed g Hekia S‑apꞌekam Gewkdag mamt hekid ab i s‑wohoch g Jiosh haꞌichu ahga?” Sh hab kaij hegam, “Pi ach koi hebai shaꞌi kah mas am haꞌichu d Hekia S‑apꞌekam Gewkdag.”
Sh hab hahawa kaij g Paul, “A namt koi e pahl wapko g Jesus pahl wakonakaj?” Sh hab kaij, “Pi koi. Johnbad pahl wakonakaj att t‑wapko.”
Sh hab hahawa ep kaij g Paul, “M o wa woho mash heg am ha ahgid mat gam hu wo s‑ohhod g pi ap e‑chegitoi ch wabshaba am ep ha ahgid mat ab wo i s‑wohoch hegai mat am epai wo i e maskogi. K heg d Jesus.”
Tsh idam ab i s‑wohochud k e pahl wapko ab chehchegch g Jesus.
Tsh g Paul an i ha tahtamahim k ab ihmahim g Jiosh. Tsh ab si i bei g gewkdag ab amjed d Hekia S‑apꞌekam Gewkdag k am si gawul neꞌokikaj neneok mat pi hebai mai ch am ahg g Jiosh haꞌichu ahga.
Kush am hu d i gamai gohk idam chechoj.
Sh am wapke g Paul Tutuligo ha‑cheopi ed ch am ha wehm haꞌichu si i aꞌaga waik mashad ab chum s‑ap s‑ha mahtchudamk ab amjed g Jiosh kownaltalig.
Tsh wabshaba haꞌi pi wohochud k wabsh si pi ap neneok ab amjed g Jesus himdag am ha kaichudch g hemajkam. Tsh heg hekaj am ha dagito g Paul k gam hu hih ha uꞌuk hegam mat ab i s‑wohoch. Sh am hema d Tyrannus ch ge mashchamakud ch id ha hiwigi. Kush heg eda g Paul am ha wehm aꞌaga g Jiosh kownaltalig wehs tashkaj
gohk ahid ab. Tsh wehsko e kah g Jesus ahga heg eda Asia jewed.
Kush g Jiosh am si i wehmaj g Paul mash am hab junihim g s‑hasigam haꞌichu.
Sh g hemajkam chum hems ab uꞌu g Paul haꞌichu eniga ch hekaj ab tattam g kokꞌodam. Kush ha dodad. Tsh g jijawul im hu hab wo i e juh ab ha amjed hegam mo an ha uꞌukch.
Sh eda an haꞌi ep oiopo g Tutuligo ch hab chum e wua mo im hu hab i ha wua g jijawul ab ha amjed g hemajkam. Kush am hema g uhgchu pahl hab chehgig Sceva ch wewaꞌak aꞌalidag. Sh idam hab waꞌap chum im hu hab i ha wua g jijawul ab ha amjed g hemajkam. Am hu hebai, sh idam am hema neid g oꞌodham mash g jiawul an uꞌukch ch hab kaij, “Ab g i dagito ihda oꞌodham, ahpi jiawul. Bani si m‑ahgid heg gewkdagkaj Jesus mo g Paul ab amjed ha mihshmad.”
<range>
Sh wabshaba hab kaij g jiawul ab ha wui, “S‑mahch ani g Jesus ch ep s‑mahch mo hedai wud hegai Paul ch wabshaba ahpim pi shaꞌi em‑mahch mams hedai wud.”
Kutsh ihda cheoj mo g jiawul an si uꞌukch haha wabsh ha dadge k s‑koꞌokam ha juh. Tsh gam hu neꞌiopa ab amjed g kihj k d wabsh i ehꞌed. K g ha‑wehschuga wantshas.
Kutsh wehsijj kah ihda amai Ephesus t am k atsh si s‑ehbeni k ab si has i el g t‑kownalig Jesus.
Tsh muꞌijj hegam matsh ab i s‑wohoch s‑kehg haꞌichu ahga ab amjed g Jesus am i e hemapad k mahsko wua g pi ap e‑chuꞌijig am wehs ha tahgio g hemajkam.
Tsh muꞌijj hegam mash hab chum e elid mo d mamakai am uꞌapa hegam e‑oꞌohana mo an ahgas g hihoina k am ha chehgid k ha mei. Tsh eda am i kuint g ha‑namkig idam oꞌohana mash am mei. Kutsh ai g hetaspo wehst‑mahm mihl pihsh (50,000).
Kutsh hab masma hekaj si s‑gewkam am i hih g haꞌichu ahga ab amjed g Jesus k am i e gantad. Sh g hemajkam baꞌich i s‑gewkam ab uꞌukch.
Tsh amjed hab i e ah g Paul matsh gam hu wo hih Macedonia ch Greece jejewed oidk k amjed gam hu haha wo hih Jerusalem wui k amjed am Rome wui wo hih.
Kush eda g Timothy ch Erastus am wehmaj. Kush am ha ahgid g Paul matsh am wo hihi Macedonia wui. Tsh g Paul am wih Asia ch ed heꞌes i tash.
Kutsh iaꞌi idani am i e kudu g hemajkam ab Ephesus t ab heg hekaj Jesus himdag.
Amai ash am hema kehk g geꞌe cheopi. Kush am eda e kehshch g uwi ha‑jioshga ch hab chehgig Artemis. Kush am hema d plahda chikpandam ch hab chehgig Demetrius. Sh id pionag g plahdakaj ha nahto g al kihki mo heg wepogidas cheopi ch muꞌi nahto g lial ha gagdadch.
Kutsh g Demetrius am i ha hemapai hegam mash hab waꞌap mahs chikpan hab wua k am si s‑gewkam hab kaij ab ha wui, “Ni‑naipijju, s‑mahch am mo g s‑t‑kaistalig ab him id amjed chikpan.
Kum eda si neid ch ep kah ihda hab chehgi Paul mo hab kaij mo idam t‑jijoshga pi d shaꞌi jijosh. T hab am gawul juh g e‑chegitoi g muꞌi hemajkam ab i s‑wohochudk iia Ephesus t am ch chum alo wehsko am Asia jewed oidk.
Kut wo e padch g t‑chikpan nat pi pi ab hu hab masma wo e ihmad g Artemis mo hemuch wehsko ab si e ihm. T g cheopigaj pi ab hu wo e haꞌichuch.”
Tsh am i kah idam mat am e hemapai k atsh si babgat k si s‑kaidam hihnk ch hab kaij, “B ach si has elid g t‑jioshga Artemis.”
Sh wehsko kaidag g ha‑hihinki ch wehs ha babgach g kihkam. Tsh gohk ha ui hegam mash am wehmaj g Paul k am ha uꞌapa chichwikud ed. Hegam mamtsh ha ui ash d Gaius ch Aristarcas.
Tsh g Paul am chum s‑wahkim ha shahgid. Tsh wabshaba g wehmaj wohochuddam pi hiwigi.
Tsh haꞌi hegam mash d hahaꞌichu ch d naipijjuj g Paul hab waꞌap ahgid matsh pi am hu wo hih mamt am i ha ui idam gohk.
Tsh eda heg oidam am i si e gewkai g kudutadag. Sh haꞌijj si hihnk has i kaidam. Sh haꞌi am wa gawul haꞌichu ep hihnk heg hekaj mash muꞌijj pi shaꞌi mahch mas haschu ahgch ia e chehm.
Tsh g Tutuligo am hema i kei mat am wo him k ab wo i kekiwua ha wehhejed k am wo ha ahgi mo pi d ha‑chuꞌijig g Tutuligo. Id ash hab chehgig Alexander ch am wabsh i chum ha baꞌich i kekiwua mat am wo neo.
Tsh am i nei g hemajkam mo d Tuhligo k pi ab hu shaꞌi kaiham k wabsh si hihnk e wehm am hu i gohk ohla ab hab kaijch, “B ach si has elid g t‑jioshga Artemis.”
Tsh g s‑has haꞌichu oꞌohandam ha shohbi g hemajkam ash hab kaijch, “Ahpim kihkam! Wehsijj am s‑mahch mo ia Ephesus t am e nuhkud g cheopigaj g si s‑has haꞌichu t‑jioshga Artemis ch ia ep e nuhkud hegai hodaigaj mat ab dahm kahchim t amjed i gei.
T pi hedai hab wo shaꞌi chei mas pi woho ihda. Kumt ab wabsh wo i e bahbgi k pi am hu haꞌichu wabsh wo si has juh.
Neh, mamt i ha uꞌapa idam oꞌodham. T eda pi haꞌichu shaꞌi ha ehs ab cheopi t amjed, niꞌis am hu shaꞌi pi ap has ahg g t‑jioshga.
Neh, k am dadha g hahaꞌichu lodaita tash ch ed. Kut idam Demetrius am haꞌab wo ha uꞌapa matp ab haꞌichu wo s‑ha abchudam.
K am ep e nanmek g kihkam ch haꞌichu i aꞌaga ch am i apꞌechud. Kumt am wo uꞌapa mamtp haꞌichu ep tatchua.
T hahawa pi ab hu wo t‑abch g kownal machs wabsh t‑cheggia heg hekaj mat haschu has i e juh id tashkaj. Kutt pi wo shaꞌi t‑nako machs wo ah mat haschu ahgk hab e juh haꞌichu.” Neh, bash kaij ch ha dagito.
Tsh am i dodolimat haꞌichu. Tsh g Paul am i ha hemapai g e‑wehm wohochuddam k am si i ha gewkemhun k am hahawa ha dagito k gam hu aigo i chesh Macedonia t am
k am heg oidk i ha gewkemhunahi muꞌikpa ha mihshmadk. Am heꞌes d i tash, t ia jiwia Greece jewed t am
k ia haꞌichugkahim waik mashad. T am hebai i cheka, t am hahawa i chum e nako mat am aigo i chesh Syria jewed wui. Tsh wabshaba g Tutuligo am i e nako mat wo be k wo mua. T hekaj hab i e ah mat am uhpam ep wo hih Macedonia wui.
Tsh haꞌi oi g Paul mat gam hu hih. Hema o d Sopater ch ab Berea t amjed ch d alidaj g Pyrrus. K haꞌi ep d Aristarcas ch Secundus ch ab Thessalonica t amjed. Tki hegai Gaius mo ab Derbe t amjed ch Timothy am ha oi. Tki hegam ep ha oi Tychicus ch Trophimus mo ab amjed g Asia jewed.
T ia dada Philippi kihhim t am. Ni ahni Luke ia wabsh kia haꞌichug ch am hahawa oi g Paul. T wabshaba hegam haꞌi iꞌajed gam hu t‑baꞌich i chehchsh Troas kihhim wui matsh am wo t‑nenida.
T eda e ai mat g Tutuligo wuhshad g e‑shohshon ha‑doꞌibiadag k hab pi koꞌa hegai pahn mo jewajidas. Kutt am hahawa gahi i shul g geꞌe wahlkokaj k am ha nam Troas t am mo d hetasp tash amjed mat hegam am i t‑dagito. Kuch wehsijj am haꞌichugkahim hemako domig.
Am hu hebai d i shahwai hudunk. Tt am i t‑hemapai mo an hebai uhgk g kih k am t‑wehm t‑gegos matt am wo hehgigchul g Jiosh. K an muꞌi e mehmheidch g lalampa. T g Paul am neok k shaꞌi si tash am t‑mihshmad natsh pi wo hih baꞌich tash ed. Kut eda i huh g s‑chuhugam.
<range>
K an hema daha g wechij oꞌodham wintani t an ch hab chehgig Eutycus ch atsh am i s‑kohsim k kohsh k i gei ab wintani t amjed k ged hu gei jewedo. K eda waik e dahm kihki mat amjed ab i gei. T am hahawa haꞌi be k am s‑mai matki heki hu muh.
T wabshaba g Paul am i huduni k an si kohm k hab kaij, “Pi g am wo has e tahtkkad. Do doakam.”
T g hajunij gam hu hahawa i bei hegai wechij oꞌodham kihj wui si s‑ap e tahtkch mo d doakam. Kut gam hu hahawa uhpam ep i chehchsh mo an e mihshmad k am hab juh hegai chemait hugi mat hekaj wo s‑chegitok g Jesus muhkig. T g Paul am hahawa ep ha mihshmad k gam hu hahawa hih.
<range>
K am hahawa t‑ahgid g Paul mattsh gam hu wo nam mo am d Assos kihhim natsh pi wabsh wo i keish g wohg k am wo hih. Kutt heg hekaj gahi i shul g geꞌe wahlkokaj k gam hu dada.
T am hahawa t‑nam k an t‑wehm dahiwua. Tt am ep gahi i shulig k gam hu ai g Mitylene kihhim
k amjed gam hu ai g Chios kihhim. K am baꞌich d ep i tash, tt gam hu ai g Samos kihhim. K eda e aihim mat g Tutuligo gam hu wo hihi Jerusalem wui k am hab wo juh g hehgchulida Jiosh wui mat s‑ap i ha wehmt k am babhaijid g ha‑eꞌesha. K heg wui s‑himimk g Paul ch s‑e hohtkid ch hekaj hab kaij matt pi am hu wo i huhud Ephesus t am. Kutt hekaj am wabsh gahi wuwha. K am baꞌich d i tash, tt gam hu dada Miletus kihhim t am.
<range>
K oi wa s‑ha neidamk g Paul hegam mo d geꞌeged am ha shahgid g t‑wehm wohochuddam ab Ephesus t ab. Kut ab i ha wai Miletus wui.
T am i dada. K hab kaij ab ha wui: “Ni‑wepnag, s‑mahch am mani haschu am hab i junihim am em‑shahgid wabsh chum hekid ga hu i amjed mant hekid ia jiwia iia Asia jewed t am.
Ni ab wabsh i ni‑shoꞌigchud ch hebai ni‑ohꞌog iawua am hab junihidch g Jiosh chikpan nani pi si pihk ni‑elid em‑hekaj. Am o chum e nakog g ni‑wehm oꞌodham mat wo ni‑mua. Ni heg hekaj ab nakog g s‑wihnk haꞌichu.
Kum s‑mahch mani pi haꞌichu shaꞌi ehstohim ch wabshaba am wehs em‑ahgid mani haschu hab elid mat d wo i em‑wehmtadagk. Ni am em‑mashcham g Jiosh haꞌichu ahga mam am e hehemapad ch amai ep si heheꞌejel em‑kihki ed.
Kuni am si tasho ha ahgid g ni‑wehm oꞌodham ch gawul mahs hemajkam mat wo s‑ohhod g pi ap e‑chegitoi k ab wo i e dagito Jiosh wui k ab wo bei g t‑kownalig Jesus.
K hemuch hab si tahhadag g ni‑ihbdag mant am wo hih Jerusalem wui. Pi ani mahch mas haschu has wo mahsk am ni‑wehhejed amai.
Id ani hi wa s‑mahch mani heg wui am him mantp hems wo ni‑kuhpachud k wo ni‑shoꞌigch no pi heki hu am i ni‑tashogid g Hekia S‑apꞌekam Gewkdag mani hebai i jijiwhia.
Pi o d shaꞌi haꞌichu g ni‑doakag manis wo si s‑huwidad hejel ni‑wehhejed. Heg ani waꞌi hab s‑junimk mant wo nahto hegai mo g t‑kownalig Jesus ab ni‑chehani mant am hab wo juh. K d ihda mant am wo i ahgahi g Jiosh hemajimatalig.
“Neh, pi amtki hekid ep wo shaꞌi ni‑nei. Ni heg hekaj s‑em‑ahgidamk mani wa wehs haꞌichu em‑ahgid ab amjed g Jiosh kownaltalig.
K pi d ni‑chuꞌijig mamtp hema i pi wo e doꞌibia.
Wehs ant em‑ahgi hegai mo haschu g Jiosh am hab elid k pi haschu shaꞌi ehsto ab em‑amjed.
Ab g hejel wo e nuhkudad ch ep wo ha nuhkudad g e‑wehm wohochuddam. Hegam o g Hekia S‑apꞌekam Gewkdag em‑nuhkudachud hab masma mamt wo haꞌi ha nuhkudach g kahwal e‑shoshoiga. Kumt wo s‑chegitok mat g t‑kownalig Jesus ehꞌed e iawua mat am ha wehhejed e muhkid k ha doꞌibia.
Ab at haꞌi wo i wahp em‑shahgid mat hab masma wo s‑ta ehbidamak am em‑wehhejed mo g shehꞌe am ha wehhejed g kahwal k wo chum s‑em‑uꞌim.
Kut am haꞌi wo i e maskogi g chechoj em‑shahgid k wo haꞌichu chum em‑iattogi ahpim wohochuddam mat hab masma haꞌi im hu gawul wo i em‑wanim.
Neh, mt wo si e nuhkudad ch wo s‑chegitokad mani em‑mashcham wehsijj waik ahid ab ch g ni‑ohꞌog iawua s‑chuhugam oidam ch tash oidam nani pi pihk ni‑elid em‑hekaj.
“Pegih neh, ab ant wa em‑ahgi ab amjed g Jiosh hoꞌigeꞌidadag k am haha wo em‑dagito Jiosh nohnhoi ed. T g Jiosh wo wa em‑nuhkudad ch ab wo i gewkai g em‑wohochudadag k wo em‑mah hegai si s‑kehg haꞌichu mo ab ha makiog g e‑hemajkamga.
Pi ani hekid hedai ha‑lialigakaj o g wehschuga shaꞌi pihk ni‑elid.
Ni wabsh g hejel ni‑nohnhoikaj am hab junihim g chikpan ch hekaj ni‑dagioꞌid ch ep ha dagioꞌid g ni‑wehm chikpandam.
Ni hab wa masma am em‑chehgid mamt wo i ha wehmt hegam mo pi e amichud. T‑kownalig Jesus o hab kaij, ‘T wo s‑em‑hehgigch hegai mat ab wo haꞌichu em‑mah. Mt wabshaba baꞌich wo i s‑hehgigk mamt ab wo haꞌichu ha mah.’ Kumt id wo s‑chegitok mo has i kaij.”
I am i haꞌasa neo g Paul k am hahawa wehs ha wehm tohtonwua idam k am e hoꞌigeꞌidahu.
K wehsijj si shoani ch an si kokme no pi si pihk e elid hekaj ch hab ahg, “Jiosh at wo wa m‑wehmajk.”
K si pi ap e tahtk, wahm mat am i chegito mo hab kaij mat pi dahm ep wo nei. T am hahawa wehsijj hihi mo am daha g geꞌe wahlko.
Kutt am hahawa si wehs i ha hoꞌigeꞌel g t‑wepnag k am ha dagito k am wabsh si shel gahi i shul g geꞌe wahlkokaj k ga hu dada Cos kihhim t ab. Am baꞌich d i tash, tt ga hu ai g Rhodes kihhim k amjed ga hu aigo i dada Patara kihhim t ab.
Neh, k am hema daha g geꞌe wahlko matsh gam hu wo hih Phenicia jewed wui. Kutt heg ab an ha hekaj i chehchsh k gm hu oi.
Tsh ab wo i e huhuds g wahlko mohtoi Tyre kihhim t am. Kutt am bihbij hugidaj an g Cyprus jewed k am dada amai Tyre t am.
K am haꞌi kih g t‑wehm wohochuddam. Kutt ha chehg k am ha wehm dadha hemako domig ab. T am i ha tashogi g Hekia S‑apꞌekam Gewkdag matsh am haꞌichu has wo e juh tahgio g Paul. Kum hab chum ahg mat pi am hu wo hih Jerusalem wui.
T wabshaba am i e ai matt wo hihi. Tt gam hu hihi. T wehsijj gam hu t‑oi ha wehm g e‑wehm kihkam ch e‑aꞌaliga matt gm hu wo i wuwha ab kihhim t amjed. Tt wehsijj am i tohtonwua ge shuhdagi bahsho k am t‑hoꞌigeꞌidahun
k ab hahawa aꞌai t‑ahgid mat wo t‑wehmajk g Jiosh. Tt ahchim gan hu hahawa i chehchsh geꞌe wahlko ch ed. T hegam gm hu epai hihi uhpam.
Kutt gam hu hahawa ep gahi i shul g geꞌe wahlkokaj Ptolemais kihhim wui. K am haꞌi kih g t‑wehm wohochuddam. Ch am ha wehmajkahim hemako tash ab.
Am baꞌich d i tash, tt ga hu dada Cesaria kihhim t ab. Kuki am kih hegai Philip mo hema d hegam wewaꞌak chechoj matsh wa am e chuhcha matsh am wo i ha wehmt g Jesus chuhchai Jerusalem t ab. Kutt am hihi kihj wui. T am i t‑wahpki.
Kuch am wehmajkahim heꞌekia i tash. Ihda Philip o giꞌik uꞌuwi aꞌalidag. K idam pi ha kuhkun ch am ahgahim hegai mo haschu g Jiosh am ha tashogid.
Kut ab Judea t amjed heg ab jiwia Jiosh haꞌichu i tashogiddam mo hab chehgig Agabus.
Ch am t‑mihshmad. T heg an bei g Paul giwud k an hekaj wuh g e‑kakhio ch e‑nohnhoi ch hab kaij, “Bamtsh masma hab wo m‑juh maptp am wo hih Jerusalem wui. T‑wehm oꞌodham atsh an wo si m‑wud k ab wo m‑dagito gawul mahs hemajkam ha wui. Id o am ni‑tashogid g Hekia S‑apꞌekam Gewkdag.”
Kutt am i kah ihda k ab chum si i ahgid g Paul mat pi am hu wo hih Jerusalem wui.
K wabshaba hab wabsh kaij, “Pi g am wo shoanid. Pi am ap ni‑tahtchud. Ni‑nahtokch ani mamtp wo ni‑wulsh o chum hems wo ni‑mua g t‑kownalig Jesus wehhejed.”
Kutt pi shaꞌi t‑nako machs wo shohbi k am wabsh i dagito k hab kaij, “Pegih, id ach waꞌi tatchua mat g Jiosh haꞌichu apꞌechuda am hab wo e juh.”
Kuch am ep haꞌichug heꞌes i tash ch am hahawa i t‑nakog k gam hu hihi Jerusalem wui.
T am haꞌi t‑oi Jerusalem wui k am i t‑ui heg kih wui matt am wehmaj wo dadhaiwua. Id o hab chehgig Mason ch ab d si kihkam Cyprus jewed t ab ch ash heki hu waꞌi s‑wohochud mo g Jesus d Jiosh si Kehsha.
T si s‑ap i e taht g t‑wehm wohochuddam ab i t‑neidok.
Idam ha‑uhgchuga ash d James. Kutt heg chehgio am wehmaj g Paul. K am wehsijj dadha hegam mo d geꞌeged.
T g Paul ab wehs i ha hoꞌigeꞌid k am hahawa si s‑ap ha ahgid wehs haꞌichu mat g Jiosh s‑kehg am hab juh am gahi wuhshanim am ha shahgid g gawul mahs hemajkam.
T am i kaiok ab si ihm g Jiosh k wabshaba hab kaij ab Paul wui, “Neh, t‑wehnag, s‑mahch ap mat muꞌi mihl t‑wehm oꞌodham ab i s‑wohoch g Jiosh haꞌichu ahga k ab ihm g t‑kownalig Jesus k eda ab wabsh kia si has elid g heki hu t‑chehanig.
Idam o kah mapsh ahpi ha mashcham hegam t‑wehm oꞌodham mo an aꞌai kih nahnko mahs hemajkam ha shahgid mat wo s‑ohhod g t‑chehanig k pi an hu wo ha oꞌoha an ha pahl hikuchk g e‑aꞌaliga.
Do wabsh si shel mat wo kah mapt ia jiwia. Pegih, k hab chum mahs
mapt am hab wo e juh matt has wo i m‑ah. M o haꞌi d chechoj ch d giꞌik mat heꞌes pi hih g e‑moꞌo nat pi ab haꞌichu ahꞌad g Jiosh.
Pt am wo ha oid k am ha wehm wo e dagito Jiosh wui geꞌe cheopi t am. Am apt ha wehhejed wo namkid mat haschu wo i chum ha namkid heg hekaj. Kumt am haha wo hih g e‑moꞌo. Pt hab masma wo ha chehgi g t‑wehm oꞌodham map am hab junihim g t‑himdag. T heg amjed wo s‑mahchk mo pi woho hegai mam haschu ab m‑abchud.
P am wa s‑mahch matt haschu am ha oꞌohani hegam gawul mahs hemajkam mat ab i s‑wohoch g Jiosh haꞌichu ahga. Bo chuꞌig g t‑oꞌohana mat hegam pi wo koꞌad g ehꞌed ch hegai mo pi gam hu e iawua g ehꞌed e mumꞌajch kch hegai mo ab e toꞌid hegai mo haschu hab chum e elid mo d jiosh. Kut wo si e nuhkud hab masma mat hegai waꞌi si e‑hohnig o g si e‑kun wehm wo kihk.”
K wa woho am baꞌich d i tash. T g Paul am i ha ui hegam chechoj k am ha wehm i e dagito Jiosh wui k am hahawa i wah geꞌe cheopi ch ed k am ha ahgid mat d wo wewaꞌak tashk, t wo kuhgit hegai mat ab ahꞌad. T am hab wo e juh hegai mat am hahawa haꞌichu wo iagchul Jiosh wui.
K am i e aihim mat wo kuhgit hegai wewaꞌak tash. T am hih g Paul k am i wah geꞌe cheopi ch ed. Kutsh haꞌi am chehg k an bei hegam Tutuligo mo ab Asia jewed t amjed. K eda muꞌi an oiopo g hemajkam. Kutsh am si i ha kudut
k ash si hihnk ch hab kaij, “T‑hajuni, ia g wo i t‑wehmt. Ihda oꞌodham o an wehsko si has ahg g t‑himdag ch t‑chehanig ch ihda geꞌe cheopi. Pi o d ha‑apꞌedag g gawul mahs hemajkam mas ia hu wo i wahp. Kutki eda ihda haꞌi i ha wahpkid k hab uamhu g geꞌe cheopi.”
Bash kaij nash pi am hu hebai neid g Paul hema wehm g gawul mahs oꞌodham ch hab e ahg mat am i wahki. Hegai mo wa am wehmaj o hab chehgig Trophimus ch ab Ephesus t ab d kihkam.
T am wabsh wehsko chehmo g pi ha‑apꞌedag amai kihhim t am. T ab aꞌaijed i wohp g hemajkam k an wabsh si bei g Paul k gam hu i chewaim ab amjed g geꞌe cheopi. T ab ha hekaj si e kuhkp g geꞌe cheopi kihkijeg.
K idam s‑babgam hemajkam chum mumꞌa g Paul. Kumtsh am ahgi g shondal ha‑geꞌejig mash am ge e cheggia.
T ab ha hekaj daꞌiwush muꞌi ha wehm g e‑shondalig k haꞌi ehp g ha‑geꞌegeꞌejig k ged hu woꞌi mat am e hemapai g hemajkam. T hegam am ha hekaj wabsh si haꞌasa cheggia g Paul am i ha neidk.
T g shondal am him k an bei g Paul. T g ha‑geꞌejig hab ha ah mat an wo si wuh g gohk e hukshchim wainomikaj. Kut hab juh. T ab hahawa ha kakke g hemajkam, “Dohꞌo wud ihda oꞌodham ch haschu has juh?”
K haꞌi g hemajkam am hu has i ahg. K haꞌijj ehp am wa gawul ep ahg. T am wabsh i ge nahnko e juh g haꞌichu ha‑ahga. Kut pi shaꞌi amich ihda shondal ha‑geꞌejig mat haschu has e juh k heg hekaj am wabsh ha ahgid g e‑shondalig mat ged hu wo kuh g Paul.
T an i bei mo an cheshajkudag. T wabshaba wabsh e nondagch g hemajkam k an chum s‑behimk ch si hihnk ch hab kaij, “Muꞌawo! Muꞌawo!” T heg hekaj wabsh uhgk i ul g shondal mat pi wo e muhkid.
<range>
T am haha wabsh i chum wahki g Paul e‑kolhai ed. K hab kaij g Greek ha‑neꞌokikaj ab wui g shondal ha‑geꞌejig, “M ani haꞌichu chum s‑m‑ahgidamk.” K heg hab kaij, “A kupki neok g Greek ha‑neꞌokikaj.
Ps hemsi d hegai Egypt t am oꞌodham mat wa am hu hebai ia i chum shonwuich g cheggiadag. T wa am i wehmt g giꞌik mihl chechoj ch uꞌa g cheggiakud am tohono jewed oidk.”
K hab kaij g Paul, “Pi ani d hegai. Dani Tuhligo ch ab d mahsikam Tarsus kihhim t ab am Cilicia jewed ch ed ch ab uꞌukch g ni‑shel ab amjed g si s‑has haꞌichu kihhim. Pt ab wo si i s‑ni‑hoꞌigeꞌid k wo ni‑hiwigi mant am wo neo ha wui g hemajkam.”
T wa woho am hiwigi g shondal ha‑geꞌejig. T an i kekiwua mo an cheshajkudag ab ha baꞌich g hemajkam k am neo g hejel e‑neꞌokikaj k hab kaij:
“Ni‑hajuni ch ahpim geꞌeged hemajkam, ab g wo i ni‑kaiham mant am hejel ni‑wehhejed wo neo.”
T am i kah mo g ha‑neꞌokikaj neok k gam hu wabsh i pi shahmuni. K hab hahawa kaij g Paul:
“Ahni ani d Tuhligo ch ab d mahsikam Tarsus kihhim t am am Cilicia jewed ch ed ch wabshaba ia geꞌeda Jerusalem kihhim t am k ia ni‑mashcham. K wa g Gamaliel d ni‑mashchamdam ch ab si s‑gewkam ni‑mashcham g t‑chehanig. Ni hab wa masma am chum si s‑gewkam oid g Jiosh himdag mam ahpim hemuch id i tashkaj.
Kuni wa heg hekaj ha shoꞌigchud ch ha kokda hegam mo an uꞌukch ihda wechij haꞌichu ahga ch wa an ha uꞌu g chechoj ch uꞌuwi ch am ha shulig kukpaikud ch ed.
T g uhgchu pahl ch hegam e jehnigiddam am wo wohokamch ihda mani em‑ahgid. Bani wa ha ahg mant am wo hih Damascus kihhim wui. T hegam ab ni‑mah g oꞌohana am ha wui hegam mo d uꞌugchu am ha eda g t‑wehm oꞌodham amai Damascus ch ed. Nt wa am hi wa i hih mant wo ha wupulsh g e hukshchim wainomikaj hegam mo ab s‑wohochud ihda wechij haꞌichu ahga k wo uhpam i ha ui ab Jerusalem wui mat wo bei g s‑koꞌok e‑namkidadag.
“Neh, am att wa hihim k gam hu i aihim g Damascus kihhim. K wa am hu d i dahm juhk mat haha wabsh haꞌichu si ton ab amjed g dahm kahchim an wehsko ni‑wehgaj.
Nt wa am i gei jewedo. T wa ab hema si neo ni‑wui k hab kaij, ‘Saul, s‑wohom ap hig ni‑shoꞌigchud.’
“Kuni si has elid ch hab kaij, ‘Dohp wud ch ab neok?’ “K hab hahawa ep kaij, ‘Dani ahni Jesus map ha shoꞌigchud g ni‑ihmdam.’
K hegam mo am ni‑wehmaj hi wa neid hegai geꞌe tonlig ch wabshaba pi amichud g neꞌoki.
“Ni ab hahawa kakke, ‘Shahnt wo ni‑juh, ni‑kownalig?’ “K wa hab kaij, ‘Ab g i wamig k am him k am i wahki Damascus ch ed. T am hahawa hema wo m‑ahgi mapt haschu am hab wo chum wuad.’
“Tki eda pi ni‑nenich heg hekaj mat wa am si s‑masma ton. T wa am wabsh i ni‑wanim hegam mo am ni‑wehmaj k ged hu ni‑uꞌapa Damascus t am.
“Kuki wa am hema kih g oꞌodham ch hab chehgig Ananias ch ab si ihm g Jiosh ch ep am si oid g chehanig. K ab si has elid g t‑wehm oꞌodham amai Damascus t am.
Heg at wa am jiwia ni‑wui k ab kehk ch hab kaij, ‘Ni‑nawoj Saul, ab g behꞌi g e‑nentalig!’ Nt ha hekaj s‑ap haꞌichu neid k ab si i nei.
“K wa hab kaij ab ni‑wui, ‘Neh, am antsh wo m‑ahgi matsh ahpi am i m‑kei g Jiosh mapt wo s‑mahchk g tatchuij ch wo nei g si s‑apꞌekam Kehshaj k wo kah mat am hejel wo m‑ahgi g haꞌichu e‑ahga. K d waꞌi ihda Jiosh mo an uꞌukch g t‑shohshonbad.
K hab d elidaj mapt d wo hema hegamk mapt am wo si i wohokamch g Jesus k am wo i ha ahgi g hemajkam mapt haschu i neid k haschu i kah.
Pt ha hekaj wo i e nakog k wo e pahl wako ab ihmadch g Jesus. T heg gam hu hab wo i juh g pi ap m‑chuꞌijig.’ Neh, bo ni‑ahg.
“Nt wa am hab juniok ab i hih Jerusalem wui k am hu hebai am ni‑hoꞌigeꞌidahun geꞌe cheopi ch ed. T wa am haha wabsh ni‑nena ed haꞌichu hab e juh
mani neid g Jesus. K hab kaij ab ni‑wui, ‘Ia g ha hekaj dagito g Jerusalem k hihm ab amjed nat pi g m‑wehm oꞌodham iia pi ab hu wo kaiha g haꞌichu m‑ahga ab ni‑amjed.’
“Ni hab kaij, ‘Tp hems wo wa ni‑kaiha, ni‑kownalig, no pi s‑ap s‑mahch mani d ahni mani wa an wahkhim ha eda g ha‑chechopi ch an ha uꞌud ch ha gewittan hegam mo ab m‑ihm.
Kuni wa am ha wehmaj ch am nuhkud g ha‑wehschuga hegam mat mua hegai Steven mat am si s‑mahch k ah ab m‑amjed.’
“K wabshaba hab kaij g Jesus ab ni‑wui, ‘Am g wa hihm nant pi am i m‑kei mapt am mehk wo hih ha wui g nahnko mahs hemajkam.’ ” Neh, bo kaij g Paul.
K wa ab hi wa s‑ap kaiham idam hemajkam. T wabshaba am hab wabsh chum chei ihda matsh g Jesus am i kei matsh am wo hih ha wui g nahnko mahs hemajkam. T am ha hekaj i hihinkiad si s‑kaidam k hab kaij, “Muꞌawo! Muꞌawo! Pi o an hu hab chum chuꞌig mas in d wo doakamk.”
K si hihnk ch ab si shahmud g e‑wepschuga ch g jewed shashkum ch am uhgk si nenꞌeichud nat pi am i si babgat.
T g shondal ha‑geꞌejig am hahawa ha cheha g e‑shondalig mat gam hu wo i wahki g Paul shondal ha‑kih ed. T am i wahki. T am ha cheha mat wo gewitta am hugkam mat am wo ha ahgi mat has e juh mo hekaj si hihnkoid g Tutuligo.
T an wulsh mat wo chum gewitta. K am hema kehk g shondal ha geꞌejig. K ab wui hab kaij g Paul, “Ab ani uꞌukch g ni‑shel hab masma mo g Rome t am oꞌodham. K heg hekaj pi hab chum mahs mams wo ni‑gewitta pi koi ni‑lodaidk.”
T heg am i kah ihda k am wui hih g si uhgk shondal ha‑geꞌejig k ab kakke ch hab kaij, “Nap s‑mahch maptki has wo chum chuꞌi? Ihda oꞌodham oki ab uꞌukch g e‑shel hab masma mo g Rome t am oꞌodham.”
T am hahawa hih g si uhgchu shondal ha‑geꞌejig am Paul wui k ab kakke ch hab kaij, “Am g ni‑ahgid. Nap ab uꞌukch g e‑shel hab masma mo g Rome t am oꞌodham?” Sh hab kaij g Paul, “Heuꞌu.”
K hab hahawa kaij g ha‑geꞌejig, “A pt has hig masma ab bei g e‑shel. Ahni ant hi ab bei muꞌi lial ha namkid.” K hab kaij g Paul, “Ni wabshaba ahni ab uꞌukch g ni‑shel mani ab d ha amjedkam hegam mo uꞌukch g e‑shel.”
T ga hu taꞌi si i gegokiwua hegam mo an wulshch g Paul mat wo chum gewitta. T g shondal ha‑geꞌejig ep si e tods nat pi ha cheha mat hab wo juh.
Am baꞌich d i tash, tsh g shondal ha‑geꞌejig am i ha cheha g uꞌugchu papal mat am wo i ha hemapai g e jehnigiddam nash pi s‑mahchimk mo haschu ab abchud g Paul. T g shondaligaj gam wulꞌo g e hukshchim wainomi ab ab g Paul k am i be k am i kei ha wui.
K g Paul ab si ha neid g e jehnitiddam ch hab kaij, “Ni‑hajuni, chum ani hekid si ni‑nakog mant am hab wo waꞌi junihid g s‑apꞌekam ch hab pi wo shaꞌi haꞌichukaj si has ni‑elidad am tahgio g Jiosh ia i himdam tashkaj.”
Kut hegai uhgchu pahl mash hab chehgig Ananias am ha cheha hegam mo an miabidch gegok mat ab wo si shonihi g Paul chinij ab. T ab shonihi.
K hab kaij g Paul, “Jiosh at hemho ab wo wa uhpam i nodagi ihda am m‑wui ahpi map s‑chu iattomk. Ab ap dak ch ni‑lodait g t‑chehanigkaj ch eda ep melchkwuhim g t‑chehanig map ab ha chehani mat ab wo ni‑shonihi.”
K hab kaij hegam mo an miabidch gegok g Paul, “S‑koꞌokam ap has ahg g uhgchu pahl.”
K hab kaij g Paul, “Ni‑hajuni, mant hems wo s‑mahchk mokis d uhgchu pahl, nt pi hab wo shaꞌi chei, no pi hab chuꞌig g Jiosh oꞌohana: Pi g am wo shaꞌi pi ap has ahgad g e‑geꞌejig.”
K hegam e jehnigiddam haꞌi d Sajusi ch haꞌi ep d Palasi. T id am i s‑mai g Paul k am si s‑kaidam neok ha wui ch hab kaij, “Ni‑hajuni, ahni ani d Palasi ch d ha amjedkam g Palasi ch ha wepo s‑wohochud mat g koꞌi ep wo i wuwha ab hihaꞌini t amjed. Kum heg hekaj ni‑lodait.”
T id am i kah g e jehnigiddam k am ha hekaj aꞌai e neꞌowin k pi ab hu i e wehmt.
Hegam mo d Sajusi o pi ab hu wohochud mat g koꞌi wo i wuwha ab hihaꞌini t amjed ch ep pi wohochud mo an haꞌichug g anghil o g kokꞌoi. K wabshaba g Palasi wehs s‑wohochud ihda.
T am hahawa i si e gewkai g ha‑hihinki. T am haꞌi gegokiwua hegam mo d chehanig hudawogam ch d Palasi k am si s‑gewkam ha shohbid k hab kaij, “Pi att haꞌichu shaꞌi cheh mas pi ap hab juh ihda oꞌodham. Tp hems wa woho g anghil am wehmaj neo.”
T am baꞌich i si e gewkai g ha‑neꞌowina. Kum hab e ahg mat am hu wo wantsh g Paul. K g shondal ha‑geꞌejig am hahawa ha chehani g e‑shondalig mat am wo ha wohppoꞌi. Kut am hihim k be k ged i bei e‑kih wui.
Sh am baꞌich d i hudunk, tsh am i e chehgi g Jesus Paul wui k hab kaij, “Ia ap si s‑mahch ch am ahgahim haꞌichu ab ni‑amjed. Kuni am i m‑gewkemhun mapt hab wo wa masma hab e juh am Rome t am.”
K am baꞌich d i tash wabsh i siꞌalim, tsh am haꞌi e hemapai g Tutuligo k am chum Jiosh tahgio aꞌai si e ahgid mat pi haꞌichu wo hug k hoꞌip mua g Paul.
Kush i baꞌiwechkim giꞌikko wehst‑mahm idam matsh hab masma e apꞌech.
Tsh am hahawa hihi ha wui g uꞌugchu papal ch geꞌeged ch hab kaij, “Matt am Jiosh tahgio aꞌai si t‑ahgi matt pi haꞌichu wo hug k hoꞌip mua hegai Paul.
Kumt ahpim g e jehnigiddam ha wehm am wo ahgi g shondal ha‑geꞌejig mat ab wo i bek g Paul em‑wui. Kumt hab wo e wuad mam baꞌich haꞌichu s‑mahchimk ab amjed. Kutt ahchim wo t‑nahtokchid matt wo mua mat koi ia hu wo jiwia em‑wui.”
Tsh wabshaba g Paul cheoj maꞌi am i kah ihda k am him k am i wah shondal ha‑kih ed k am ahgid g Paul.
Tsh heg am hema wai g shondal ha‑geꞌejig k hab kaij ab wui, “Am g behꞌi ihda wechij oꞌodham am si uhgchu shondal ha‑geꞌejig wui, matsh wo haꞌichu ahgi.”
Tsh wa woho am i bei wui k hab kaij, “Ihda wechij oꞌodham at ia jiwia k am nei hegai Paul mo ia e kuhpch. T heg am ni‑waid k hab ni‑ahg mant ab wo i bei m‑wui matsh wo haꞌichu m‑ahgi.”
Tsh g si uhgchu ha‑geꞌejig ab bei nowij an k gam hu hekelko i wanimed k ab kakke, “Shahchu apt wo ni‑ahgi?”
K hab kaij, “Ni‑wehm oꞌodham at am i e apꞌech matsh siꞌalim ab wo m‑tai mamt am wo i bei g Paul e jehnigiddam ha wui hab wabsh s‑e junimk mat am baꞌich haꞌichu wo i s‑mai ab amjed.
Pt wabshaba pi ab hu wo ha kaiha. Giꞌikko wehst‑mahm i baꞌiwechkim chechoj atsh am wo e eꞌestok ch wo kihshad nat pi am chum Jiosh tahgio aꞌai si e ahgi matsh pi haꞌichu wo hug k hoꞌip mua g Paul. K hemuch e nahtokch mat am hab wo e juh ch wabsh nenida mapt has wo e juh.”
Sh hab kaij g si ha‑uhgchuga, “Pi g am hedai shaꞌi ahgid hegai mapt haschu ia ni‑ahgi.” Tsh gam hu hahawa hih g Paul maꞌi.
Tsh g si uhgchu shondal ha‑geꞌejig gohk am ha wai g ha‑geꞌegeꞌejig k hab kaij, “Am g wo haꞌi i ha gawulkad gohk siant shondal ch wewaꞌakko wehst‑mahm ehp mo g kakawyu ha chehchej ch gohk siant ehp mo s‑e mahch ab is‑pahyo t ab. Kut hegam wo e nahtok ch wo hihi mat d wo i humukt ohlak chuhug am Cesaria kihhim wui.
Kumt am haꞌi wo i ha apꞌech g kakawyu mat g Paul wo hekaj. Mt am s‑ap wo i be k am wo uꞌapa heg wui geꞌe kownal mo d Felix.”
Neh, bash kaij ch am hahawa oꞌohani hegai uhgchu kownal ihda:
“Ab g i s‑ni‑hoꞌigeꞌid ahpi uhgchu ni‑kownalig Felix. Am ant wo m‑oꞌohani ahni mani d Claudius Lysius
nat pi g geꞌe haꞌichu has e juh. Tutuligo at am wabsh hema si be k chum alo mua. Kunt s‑mai mo ihda ab uꞌukch g e‑shel hab masma mo g Rome t am kihkam. Kutt hekaj g ni‑shondalig ha wehm am doꞌibia.
Nt amjed am i bei Tutuligo e jehnigiddam ha wui s‑mahchimk hegai mam haschu ab abchud.
Kuki wabshaba pi am hu d shai hegai mas hekaj wo e muhkid o wo e kuhpach. Heg amki ab waꞌi abchud mat g hejel ha‑chehanig melchkwua.
Sh am hahawa haꞌi e nakog idam Tutuligo matsh wo mua. Kunt am ha hekaj ha cheha g ni‑shondalig mat ab m‑wui wo bei. Kuni hab ha ahg hegam mo ab haꞌichu abchud mat ahpi m‑wui wo gagda. Neh, id o wud waꞌi.”
Tsh am hab e juh g shondal hegai mam haschu ab i ha chehani k am i bei g Paul chuhug ch ed k am uꞌapa Antipatris kihhim t am.
Sh am baꞌich d i tash, tsh hegam shondal mo wabsh e‑tahtadkaj hihim gam hu uhpam hihi Jerusalem wui.
Tsh hegam mo shoshoigakch am i bei Cesaria wui k am dada k am i mah g kownal g oꞌohana k ab wui hahawa i dagito g Paul.
Tsh g kownal am neꞌokchul hegai oꞌohana k ab kakke g Paul mas haschu jewed amjed. Sh heg am ahgid mo ab Cilicia jewed amjed.
Sh hab kaij ab wui, “M ant wo wa m‑nei mat hekid wo dada hegam mo ab haꞌichu m‑abchud.” Sh g shondaligaj am hahawa nuhkud kownal kih ed.
K am d i hetasp tash, t am hih hegai si uhgchu pahl mo hab chehgig Ananias. T g Tutuligo ha‑geꞌegedga am haꞌi oi. T heg ep ha oi mo d chehanig ab s‑chu amichuddam ch hab chehgig Tertullus. T wehs idam am i dada kownal wui k am gagda g Paul.
T am wai g Paul. T ihda s‑chu amichuddam am hahawa i ahgahi hegai mam haschu ab abchud g Paul hab kaijch: “Uhgchu kownal Felix, si ap s‑e mahch ch t‑wanimed ch muꞌi haꞌichu am hab junihim mo d t‑apꞌedag iia t‑jewedga ed. Kuch heg hekaj s‑dodolim kihdag
ch si s‑ap t‑tahtk chum hekid ch wabsh chum hebai ch ab si s‑m‑hoꞌigeꞌelid.
Kuni hi wa chum pi hohhoꞌid mant tash an wo m‑uꞌukch ch hekaj ab si i m‑tahni mapt ab wo si s‑t‑hoꞌigeꞌelid k am heꞌes wo i kaiha ihda al shopol haꞌichu t‑ahga.
“Am att cheh ihda oꞌodham. Kuki wa wehsko shaꞌi si ha kudut g t‑wehm oꞌodham ch am i ha chuꞌamun mat wo cheggia g kownal ch pi apko ha wanimed mat ab wo i hema s‑wohoch mo pi d wohokam ch ab Nazareth t amjed.
Kutt am cheh mat ep chum uamhu g geꞌe cheopi ab Jerusalem t ab. Kutt hekaj an bei matt wo lodai g t‑chehanigkaj.
T wabshaba g shondal ha‑geꞌejig Lysias am i wahk k si s‑bagam am t‑wohppoꞌid
k ha cheha mat ia haꞌab wo i e bei m‑wui. Kutsh hegam mo ab haꞌichu abchud ab m‑wui wo gagda. Pt hems ab wo haꞌichu kakke ihda oꞌodham k wo s‑mai ab amjed wehs haꞌichu mach haschu ab i abchud.”
Neh, bo kaij. T wehsijj am wohokamch hegam Tutuligo mat am e nam.
T ab i ai g Paul. T g kownal ab ahgi mat am wo neo. K hab kaij: “Tash ap ia d kownal ch ha lodait g t‑wehm oꞌodham. Ni heg hekaj si s‑ap ni‑tahtk mant am wo hejel ni‑wehhejed neo m‑tahgio.
M apt wo i hoan k wo wohokamch mo pi woho g haꞌichu ha‑ahga idam. “Do wabsh i gamai gohk tash mant am hih Jerusalem wui hab ahgk mant ab wo ihm g Jiosh.
Kunt pi woho shaꞌi hedai kamꞌo am geꞌe cheopi ch ed k pi woho shaꞌi am ha kudu g hemajkam amai o hebai i am Jerusalem ch ed.
Pi at wo shaꞌi e nako mas wo wohokamch hegai mo haschu ab i ni‑abchud no pi pi woho.
“M o hi wa woho mani ab ihm g Jiosh am oidch ihda himdag mo idam hab elid mo pi d wohokam. K eda d waꞌi Jiosh mani ab ihm ch d ha‑Jioshga g t‑shohshon. Kuni wehs ab s‑wohog elid g t‑chehanig ch hegai mat g kekelibad Jiosh haꞌichu i tashogiddam an oꞌoha.
Ni‑wehm oꞌodham o s‑wohochud mat g Jiosh ab wo i ha wuwhas g koꞌi muhkig t amjed k ab wo i ha gawulkai g s‑apꞌekam k gam hu wo i ha gawulkai g pi apꞌekam. Ni ahni hab waꞌap s‑wohochud ihda
ch hekaj chum hekid am si ni‑nakog mant am hab wo waꞌi junihid g s‑apꞌekam ch hab pi wo shaꞌi haꞌichukaj si ni‑el am tahgio g Jiosh ch am ha tahgio g hemajkam.
“Tash ani gam hu oimmed am ha oidk g gawul mahs hemajkam ch pi ab hu haꞌichug Jerusalem t ab. T hegam gawul mahs hemajkam ab i toꞌahi g lial k am ni‑nuhkudach mant am wo i ha uꞌi g ni‑wehm oꞌodham ab Jerusalem t ab. Nt heg ab ha mah am jiwiak k am hahawa i ni‑dagito Jiosh wui k ab ihm ch am hab wua g iagchulida geꞌe cheopi ch ed.
K pi shaꞌi muꞌi ni‑wehmaj. Kuni pi d shaꞌi ahni manis am i shonwua g kudutadag.
K wabshaba d hegam mat am ni‑chehg k am i shonwua g kudutadag k d ni‑wehm oꞌodham ch ab dada Asia jewed t amjed. T ia wo chum uꞌapa m‑wui hegai mo haschu ab ni‑abchud k wabshaba pi ia hu dada.
T idam m ia gegok am wo chum ah matp woho cheh g pi ap chuꞌijig ab ni‑ab mant wa am i kekiwua ha wui g e jehnigiddam.
Ahni ant wo em‑ahgi mani wa hab kaij, ‘Ia am ni‑lodait id i tashkaj heg hekaj mani ab s‑wohochud mat g koꞌi uhpam wo i wuwha ab muhkig amjed.’ Naꞌas id pi hohhoꞌid.” Neh, bo kaij g Paul.
Felix o si s‑ap s‑mahch ihda Jesus himdag. Kut am i haꞌasa neo g Paul. T g Felix am i kuhgi g haꞌichu kaihama hab kaijch, “M ant wo wa i apch ihda mat hekid wo i jiwia g Lysias ab Jerusalem t amjed.”
Neh, bo kaij ch am hahawa cheha g shondal ha‑geꞌejig mat am wabsh wo i uꞌukchid g Paul ch wabshaba hi wo wa hiwgidad matp hems am wo neidad g naipijjuj ch am wo haꞌichukaj i wehmtad.
K g felix wehm kihkam d Tuhligo ch hab chehgig Drusilla. Sh idam ab s‑kaimk g Paul. Tsh g Felix am ha cheha mamt am wo i wahki g Paul. Sh heg am ha ahgid am jiwiak mamt ab wo i chum s‑wohoch g Jesus Christ. Sh am hugkam wabsh s‑ap kaiham idam.
Sh am hahawa i ha ahgidahim mat am wo i e dagito s‑apꞌekam wui k pi am hu hab wo junihid g pi apꞌekam no pi e aihim mat g Jiosh gam hu wo i ha gawulkai g pi apꞌekam hemajkam. Tsh g Felix si s‑ehbenid k hab kaij, “Oi g gam hu hihm. M ant wo wa ep i m‑wai mat hekid am wo s‑ni‑apꞌek.”
K eda hab chum em‑ahg mat g Paul wo haꞌi namkid g lial mat wo dagito ch heg hekaj muꞌikko ab i wappaid mat am wo wehmaj neo.
Kut am i e baꞌiwich g gohk ahidag. T am hema ep dahiwua g kownal Felix kehkud ed k hab chehgig Porcius Festus. T wa eda g Felix pi shaꞌi dagito g Paul no pi si tatchua mat si s‑ap ab wo i nei g Tutuligo.
Sh am d i waik tash amjed mat am i dahiwua g Festus Cesaria t am, tsh gam hu hih Jerusalem wui.
Tsh ab wui i hihi g uꞌugchu papal ch geꞌeged hemajkam k am ahgid hegai mo haschu ab i chum abchud g Paul ch ab si tahni mat ab wo i bei Jerusalem wui. Kush eda idam am heki hu e aꞌaga mat wo mua g Paul mat ab wo uꞌad.
<range>
Sh hab kaij g Festus, “Am o d wabsh kia lihso Cesaria t am. Nt eda hemuch am uhpam wo hih.
Kumt am haꞌi wo ni‑oid k am wo ah mam haschu ab abchud.”
K am dakahim g Festus am hu i hemako domig k gam hu hahawa hih Cesaria wui. T hegam geꞌeged hemajkam gam hu ep hihi. Baꞌich i tash at am i dahiwua g Festus lodaita kih ch ed k am ha chehani mat am wo i wahki g Paul.
T am i wahki. T an wehgaj gegokiwua k ab ha hekaj si pi ap haꞌichu abchud ch wabshaba pi e nako mas wo wohokamch ihda.
T g Paul am e wehhejed neok k hab kaij, “Pi ant haꞌichu shaꞌi pi ap hab juh manis melchkwua g t‑chehanig ahchim Tutuligo k pi shaꞌi uamhu g geꞌe cheopi k pi ab hu shaꞌi wui kehk g kownal.”
K hab kaij g Festus ab wui, “Pt hig am wo hih Jerusalem wui mant am haꞌab wo m‑lodai.” Bo kaij no pi hab elid mat wo s‑hohhoꞌi g Tutuligo.
K hab kaij g Paul, “Ia ani kehk kownal lodaita kih ed mant ia haꞌab wo chum ni‑lodaitach. Am ap wa si s‑mahch mant pi haꞌichu am hu hab shaꞌi juh mas pi apꞌe am ha wui g ni‑wehm oꞌodham.
Pi ant ab hu wo em‑tai mams wabsh wo ni‑dagito matp hab wo sha mahsk mant mul g chehanig. M o wa s‑apꞌe mamt wabsh wo ni‑muhkid mantp am hugkam mul. K wabshaba pi woho hegai mo ab ni‑abchud. T heg hekaj pi hedai wo e nako mas ab wo i ni‑dagito ha wui. Ab ant wui wo i gei g si uhgchu kownal.” Neh, bo kaij g Paul.
K eda am dadha hegam mo am haꞌichu i shelamid ch am aꞌaga ihda. K g Festus ab ha kahk ch hab hahawa kaij ab Paul wui, “Neh, pt hemho wa am wo e uꞌapa si uhgchu kownal wui napt pi ab wui i gei.”
K am hu hebai hema d kownal ch hab chehgig Agrippa. Sh g uwi wehngaj hab chehgig Bernice. Tsh idam am chehgio g Festus noki pi s‑ap ab i neid.
Sh am heꞌekia i tash amjed, sh am ha ahgid g Festus ab amjed g Paul ch hab kaij, “Ia o hema kuhpi g oꞌodham ch hab chehgig Paul. T g Felix pi i wuhshad.
Kunt wa am hih Jerusalem wui k am ha nei g Tutuligo uꞌugchu papal ch geꞌeged. K hegam ab haꞌichu abchud ihda lihso ch ab ni‑chehani mant wo mua.
Ni wabshaba am ha ahgid mo pi hab mahs g t‑kownalig chehanig. T hemho wa wehpeg am wo i e hudaw g lihso ha wehm hegam mo ab haꞌichu abchud k am wo neo e wehhejed. T g kownal ab haha wo mah g namkidadgaj.
“T wa woho i dada hegam Tutuligo ha wanimeddam. Nt am ha hekaj dahiwua kownal daikud ed mant wo ha kaiha. Kumt ab i wahki g lihso.
T am gegokiwua hegam mo ab haꞌichu chum abchud. Kuni hab ni‑ahg matp hems geꞌe haꞌichu ab wo abch ab t‑chehanig amjed.
K wabshaba ab wabsh e‑himdag amjed ab haꞌichu neꞌowin ch heg amjed ehp oꞌodham mash hab chehgig Jesus ch atsh heki hu muh. K eda g Paul hab kaij mat uhpam e chegito.
“Nt am wabsh i pi ni‑amich mant has masma si tasho haꞌichu wo s‑mai ab amjed k heg hekaj ab kakke g Paul mas wo s‑hohhoꞌi mat am uhpam wo hih Jerusalem wui k ab haꞌab wo e lodaitach.
K wabshaba ab t‑ahgid g Paul mat ab wo i gei si geꞌe kownal wui mat heg am wo mamche hegai mo haschu ab i abchud. Nt wa woho am ha cheha g shondal mat wo si nuhkud k ab wo ai mat am wo e uꞌapa si geꞌe kownal wui.”
Kush hab kaij g Agrippa am Festus wui, “Ahni ani hab waꞌap chum s‑kaimk ihda oꞌodham.” Sh hab kaij g Festus, “Pt wo wa kah siꞌalim.”
K am baꞌich d i tash, t hab masma i ha wahpki g Festus mo d si s‑has hahaꞌichu idam Agrippa ch Bernice. K hegam ep ha wehmaj mo d si uꞌugchu shondal ha‑geꞌegeꞌejig ch hegam mo d si s‑has hahaꞌichu heg eda kihhim. Kumt am i wahki g Paul.
K g Festus hab hahawa kaij: “Ahpi Agrippa map d kownal ch ahpim s‑has hahaꞌichu oꞌodham, m ia kehk em‑wui ihda oꞌodham. K g Tutuligo iia kch ab Jerusalem t ab ab haꞌichu abchud ab ni‑wui ch am si e gewpkad mat hemho wa wo e mua.
Nt wabshaba pi shaꞌi cheh g chuꞌijigaj mas heg hekaj wo e muhkid. “K heg wa hejel hab kaij mat ab wo i gei si geꞌe kownal wui. T hekaj hemho wa am hab wo e juh.
Ni wabshaba pi ni‑amichud mant haschu am wo oꞌohani g si geꞌe kownal ab amjed. K pi hab chum mahs mas am wo e uꞌapa g lihso pi am hu tasho ahgk mas haschu d chuꞌijigaj. Nt heg hekaj ia uꞌapa em‑wui mamt am wo i kaiha, wahm ahpi Agrippa map d kownal. Ntp hems haha wo s‑mai ab em‑amjed mant haschu am wo oꞌoha.”
<range>
K hab kaij g Agrippa ab wui g Paul, “B ant m‑mah g apꞌedag mapt am hejel e wehhejed wo neo.” T ab ha baꞌich i kekiwua g Paul k am e wehhejed neok
k hab kaij: “Agrippa map d kownal, ahpi ap s‑mahch g t‑himdag ch haꞌichu pi t‑apꞌedag ahchim Tutuligo. Ni heg hekaj si s‑ap ni‑tahtk mant ab m‑wui wo neo id i tashkaj ab amjed hegai mo haschu ab chum ni‑abchud g ni‑wehm oꞌodham. Kuni ab i m‑kakke mapt ab wo si i ni‑kaiham k ab wabsh wo i ni‑bahbgi.
<range>
“S‑mahch o g ni‑wehm oꞌodham mani has i masma ga hu i amjed mani d wabsh kia si ali nani pi wa eda am wabsh i kih ni‑jewedga ed ab Jerusalem t ab.
Dani Palasi wohochuddam. K g ni‑wehm oꞌodham s‑mahch mani am si s‑gewkam oid g t‑himdag.
Ia ani kehk ch wo ni‑lodai nani pi ab s‑wohochud mat g Jiosh woho hab wo juh hegai mat haschu am ha ahgi g t‑shohshonbad.
Bo ha ahg mat uhpam wo i ha wuwhas g koꞌi ab muhkig t amjed. Id o chum s‑wohochud g ni‑wehm oꞌodham ch eda s‑ni‑lodaitamk nani pi s‑wohochud mat hab i juh.
<range>
“Bani wa wa elid mant am wo si i ni‑nakog k wo shohbi g himdaj hegai Jesus mo ab Nazareth t amjed.
Ni wa wa woho am hab chum ni‑junihim amai Jerusalem t am. T wa g uꞌugchu papal ab i ni‑mah g ni‑apꞌedag. Kunid muꞌi ha kuh hegam mo ab s‑wohochud hegai himdag k ha wehm apꞌech g e jehnigiddam mamt wo ha kokda.
Kunt wa muꞌikko am apꞌech mamt wo ha shoꞌigch an i aꞌai ha‑chechopi ed k am chum ha chehani mat hab wo chei mo pi apꞌe hegai Jesus. Kunid wa shaꞌi si s‑ha kehꞌid ch am i ni‑nako mant am i wah gawul jewed kihhim ch ed mant wo ha shoꞌigch amai.
“Kunid wa ab si ha tai g uꞌugchu papal g ni‑apꞌedag k am hih Damascus wui heg wa si hekaj mant wo ha kuh hegam mo s‑wohochud mo hegai Jesus d Jiosh si Kehsha.
“Pegih neh, ahpi si s‑has haꞌichu, am achd hihim wohg ch ed am hu i dahm juhk. Kud am hab e juh mat am baꞌich i s‑mahs ton mo g tash tonlig an t‑wehgaj.
Kutt wehsijj i shul am jewedo. “Kunid ahni kah mad ab hema neok ni‑wui g ni‑neꞌokikaj ch hab kaij, ‘Saul, s‑wohom ap hig chum ni‑shoꞌigchud ch wabshaba hejel s‑koꞌokam has e wua.’
“Kunid si has elid ch hab kaij, ‘Dohp wud ch ab neok?’ “Kud hab hahawa ep kaij, ‘Dani ahni Jesus map ha shoꞌigchud hegam mo ab si ni‑ihm.
Ab g i wamig k kekiwua. Ia ant i ni‑chehgi m‑wui mant am wo i m‑kei mapt d wo ni‑pionagk. Kupt am wo ha ahgi g hemajkam ihda map neid ch kah. Kunt am haꞌichu ep wo m‑chehgi imhab i baꞌich. Pt heg am ep wo ha ahgi.
Nt wo m‑doꞌibia ab ha amjed g m‑wehm oꞌodham. Kupt am wo ahgahid g haꞌichu ni‑ahga am ha wui g gawul mahs hemajkam. Nt am ep wo m‑nuhkud k wo m‑doꞌibia ab ha amjed.
Kupt am wo i ha tashogi mo pi am hu ni‑tatchui oidch hab e junihim ch am wabsh jiawul tatchui oidch hab e junihim. T ab wo m‑kaiham k ab wo i e dagito ni‑wui. Nt hekaj gam hu hab wo i juh g pi ap ha‑chuꞌijig k hab wo ha juh mat d wo ni‑hemajkamgak.’ Neh, bo kaij g Jesus ab ni‑wui.
“Pegih neh, Agrippa map d kownal, bad wa masma am i e chehgi ni‑wui hegai mo d si geꞌe kownal am wehs haꞌichu dahm k hab wa masma ni‑cheha. Kunt ahni ab wohog elid
k am ha hekaj i ahgahi Damascus t am g haꞌichu ahgaj k amjed am ahgahi Jerusalem t am ch wehsko Judea chekshani ch ed. K am hahawa ni‑tashogid g Jiosh mant am ha wui wo hih g nahnko mahs hemajkam. Ni am muꞌikpa ha ahgidahim mat gam hu wo s‑ohhod g pi ap e‑chegitoi k ab wo i e nohnogi Jiosh wui k amjed hab wo junihid g s‑apꞌekam.
Neh, k d ihda mad heg hekaj an ni‑bei g ni‑wehm oꞌodham am geꞌe cheopi ch ed k chum alo ni‑mua.
K wabshaba iaꞌi himdam g Jiosh am ni‑wehmaj ch ni‑nuhkud. Ni heg hekaj ia kehk ch am si tasho em‑ahgid ahpim mam d s‑has hahaꞌichu mani haschu am ep ha ahgid g shoꞌig hemajkam. K ihda haꞌichu ni‑ahga d waꞌi hegai mo haschu g Mosesbad ch hegam kekelibad Jiosh haꞌichu i tashogiddam am heki hu ahgahim mat am hab wo e juh.
Sh idam am ahg matsh wa g Jiosh si Kehsha wo e shoꞌigchud k wo e muhkid k uhpam wo i wuhsh ab muhkig t amjed k id hekaj wo kuhpiꞌo g doꞌibiadag am ha wehhejed g Tutuligo ch nahnko mahs hemajkam.”
Neh, bo wa masma hejel e wehhejed neok g Paul. K g Festus ab si s‑kaidam hab kaij, “Ahpi aptki wabsh e lohgoch, Paul. Haꞌichu m‑mahchig atki wabsh m‑lohgoch.”
K hab kaij g Paul, “Pi ant shaꞌi ni‑lohgoch, si s‑has haꞌichu Festus. Hegai mani haschu hab ahg d si wohokam
ch am wabsh si tasho hab e junihim t‑shahgid. K g Agrippa wehs s‑mahch.
Agrippa map d kownal, m ap wa s‑ha wohochud g Jiosh haꞌichu i tashogiddam.”
K hab kaij g Agrippa ab wui g Paul, “Nap hab elid mapt ha hekaj wabsh s‑pehegi wo i ni‑nodagi id wui Jesus himdag?”
K g Paul hab kaij, “Chum anis ha hekaj o gam hu baꞌich. K wabshaba g ni‑hoꞌigeꞌidahuna am Jiosh wui d ihda mamt wehsijj ahpim mam am ni‑kaiham id tashkaj hems ab wo s‑wohochud k hab wo chuꞌigk mani ahni ch wabsh hi wo wa pi e wupulshch g e hukshchim wainomikaj.”
T am hahawa wehs i gegokiwua
k ab aꞌai e wui hab kaij am hihimadch, “Pi atki haꞌichu has shaꞌi juh ihda oꞌodham mat hekaj wo e muhkid o mas wo e kuhpach.”
K hab kaij g Agrippa ab wui g Festus, “T wo wa chum e dagito ihda mat hems pi ab hu wo e ah mat ab wo i gei si geꞌe kownal wui.”
Mt am hahawa dagito g Paul ch haꞌi ep lilso shondal ha‑geꞌejig wui mat am wo i ha ui geꞌechu kownal wui. Id o hab chehgig Julius ch d ha‑geꞌejig hegam mo hab e aꞌaga Geꞌechu Kownal Shondalig.
K am hema daha g geꞌe wahlko ch atsh am gahi wo i wua Asia jewed wui. T g Julius g e‑shondalig ha wehm am ha ui g lilso k am i chehchsh heg ab wahlko. Nt ahni Luke ep ha oi. T heg ha oi Aristarcas mo ab d kihkam Thessalonica t ab am Macedonia jewed ch ed. Kutt am gahi i shul g ge shuhdagi.
Am baꞌich i tash, tt am dada Sidon kihhim t am. K eda g Julius s‑hoꞌigeꞌid g Paul ch hiwigi mat am wo him k wo ha nei g e‑naipijju mat hegam wo dagioꞌi.
Tt amjed am hahawa gahi ep i shul. K wabshaba g hewel ab si s‑gewkam med huduni tahgio t amjed ab t‑wui. Tt hekaj an bihbij Cyprus jewed wehgaj mat pi wo heb hu t‑wiꞌichkwua.
T am hebai i cheka. Tt am gahi i shul hegai ge shuhdagi mo an miabidch g Cilicia jewed ch Pamphylia jewed k ga hu dada mash ab d Myra kihhim am Lycia jewed ch ed.
T amai g shondal ha‑geꞌejig am hema ep cheh g geꞌe wahlko. Id ash ab Alexandria t amjed am Egypt jewed ch ed ch atsh gam hu wo gahi i gei Italy jewed wui. Kutt heg ab i chehchsh
k am gahi i shul. K wabshaba ab t‑wui hewed heꞌekia i tash. K hekaj wabsh s‑bahbagi him g wahlko ch am hu wa has masma ga hu jiwia Nidas kihhim t ab. T ab i t‑shohbi g hewel. Kutt hekaj inhab shaꞌal i t‑nohnogi wakolim tahgio ab wui hegai al jewed mo hab chehgig Crete. K an s‑muꞌukam i koa g jewed. K hab e aꞌaga Salmon Koa.
Kutt heg hugid an bihbij k am hu wa has masma ga hu dada mash hebai s‑ap dadhaiwup g wapalko. K ia amjed pi shaꞌi mehk hegai kihhim mo d Lasia.
Kuttki pi oi baꞌich hihim k ab wabsh ai mat wo si hewedad s‑hehpichꞌed. T hekaj wo s‑ta ehbidamak matt am gahi wo i shul. K g Paul am haꞌichu chum ha ahgid
ch hab kaij, “Nehꞌe! Bani masma neid matki wo s‑ta ehbidamak matt am gahi wo i shul iaꞌi amjed. T am hu wo e padch g wahlko ch hegai mo mohto. Kuttp hems ep wo haꞌi t‑koꞌij.”
T wabshaba g shondal ha‑geꞌejig ab si s‑ha wohoch g wahlko nuhkuddam ch enigakam k pi ab hu kaiha g Paul mo ab chum ha ahgid.
Pi o apkodag amai ha wehhejed g wapalko s‑hehpichꞌed. K heg hekaj muꞌijj hab kaij matt am gahi wo i shulig k wo chum si s‑ahim g Phoenix kihhim am Crete t am. Am o e shohbidch g shuhdagi toꞌotonk. K g wapalko am wabsh s‑ap dadhaiwup.
Kut ab s‑bahbagi i meh g hewel wakolim tahgio amjed. K hab e ahg hegam mo himchud g wahlko mat am hab wo e juh mat has masma am e aꞌaga ch heg hekaj am wupulshpiꞌo g wahlko k am himch si miabidch g jewed hugidag.
T wabshaba ab haha wabsh s‑gewkam i meh g juhpin hewel ab jewed dahm amjed
k ab si s‑ta ehbidam wiꞌichkwua g t‑wahlko. Kut am i pi e nako mas wo moꞌoshk himch g wahlko ihda hewel. Kutt am wabsh i dagito k wabsh hiwigi g hewel mat am i t‑wiꞌichkwuhi.
K am hema al jewedag ch hab chehgig Cauda. K hi wa sha e shohbid matt an wecho bihbij. K eda am wabsh kia e chewaimed g al chum wahlko shuhdagi ch ed. Kutt am hahawa s‑hasigam i cheshaj.
T g chikpandam an hahawa si s‑wihnam wupulsh g geꞌe wahlko mat pi wo e padch. Am attp hems wo t‑wiꞌichkwua jewed wui. T g wahlko am hu wo e hiash hia ch ed. T heg hekaj g chikpandam ab i huhuds hegai lohna mo hekaj himchud g wahlko k wabsh hiwigi mat g hewel am i t‑wiꞌichkwuhi.
T ihda shaꞌi si s‑gewk hewel pi shaꞌi haꞌasa. K am baꞌich d i tash. T gam hu i shul hegai mo mohto g geꞌe wahlko.
K am baꞌich d ep i tash. K am wabsh kia si hewed. T gm hu i nehnch g hejel e‑nohnhoikaj hegai mo haschukaj chum himchud g geꞌe wahlko mat wo si i haukai.
Kutt muꞌi tashkaj pi shaꞌi nei g tash tonlig o g huhuꞌu. K am wabsh i med g s‑gewk hewel. Tt am hu hebai hab haha wabsh i t‑ah mattki pi wo shaꞌi t‑doꞌibia.
Kuch tash pi haꞌichu shaꞌi koꞌa. T g Paul ab i ha waid k hab kaij, “Mamt hems ab wo ni‑kaiha, kutt pi ab hu wo chum gahi i shul ab amjed matt wa ab dadhaiwua. Neh, t idani chum pi wo e padch g wahlko. T g haꞌichu mohtoi pi wo heb hu e shul.
Mt wabshaba pi has wo shaꞌi e tahtkkad. Pi amt hedai wo shaꞌi e muhkid. Heg at waꞌi wahlko wo e padch.
Id ani s‑mahch nat pi hema am i e chehgi g anghil ni‑wui
k hab kaij, ‘Pi g shaꞌi haꞌichu ehbidad, Paul. Hemho wa apt am wo kekiwua si geꞌe kownal wui. T g Jiosh ab i m‑kaiham k wehs wo ha doꞌibia hegam mo m‑wehmaj.’ Neh, bo kaij g anghil ab ni‑wui.
“Kumt am wo si i e gewpkai. Jiosh at woho hab wo juh hegai mo haschu am ni‑ahgid g anghil
k ab wo t‑uꞌapa g hewelkaj mo ab hebai al jewedag shuhdagi ch ed.”
Am d i gohk domig amjed mat am t‑ai g s‑gewk hewel, t eda i e huh g s‑chuhugam. K am wabsh kia t‑wiꞌichkwuhim. K hegam wahlko nuhkuddam hab elid mach aihim mash ab hebai jewedag
ch heg hekaj am haꞌichu s‑wehch i huduni g wijinakaj an wudk mat heg hekaj wo s‑mai mas heꞌes i s‑juhk. T ged hu si taht g jewed mat siant gokko wehst‑mahm (120) tad wijina hekaj. Kut ab i wanchkwua ihda s‑wehch haꞌichu. K am shaꞌi heꞌes, t am ep i huduni. T ged hu ep si taht g jewed mat humukto wehst‑mahm (90) tad wijina hekaj.
T am i s‑mai moki ab aihim mo ab hema jewedag k s‑ehbid mat am hu ab wo gei hohodai ch ed g wahlko. T hekaj giꞌik am shul g s‑wehch wapainomi mo hekaj wulshshap g geꞌe wahlko k am hahawa si e hoꞌigeꞌidahu mat wo mahsij.
K haꞌi hejel s‑e doꞌibiamk g wahlko nuhkuddam ch am i huduni g al chum wahlko shuhdagi ch ed hab wabsh s‑e junimk mat am haꞌi ep wo i huhuds g wupulshpadaj g wahlko.
K wabshaba g Paul hab kaij ab wui g shondal ha‑geꞌejig ch hegam shondal, “Pi amt wo shaꞌi e doꞌibia matp wo sha t‑dagito idam wahlko nuhkuddam.”
T hekaj g shondal an si hikkumia g wipijina mo an hekaj wulshch g al chum wahlko. T ged hu gei shuhdagi ch ed.
Kuki eda mahsihim. K g Paul am ha chehani mat wo haꞌichu huh hab kaijch, “Do waꞌi gohk domig mamt amjed pi haꞌichu huh nam pi e kudut id hekaj pi t‑apꞌedag.
Mt ab hig wo haꞌichu hug k ab wo i e gewpkai. Hemho wa amt wehsijj wo e doꞌibia.”
Neh, bat cheꞌiok am ha hekaj bei g pahn k ab si ihm g Jiosh wehs ha wehhejed k am hahawa i hahain k huh.
T wehsijj am i neidok ab si i e gewkemhun k am hahawa haꞌichu huh.
Kuch eda d gohk siant wewaꞌakko gamai chuhdp (276).
Tt am i wehsijj kokwod. Kut am hahawa ep i chikpan k gm hu shul g pilkani ge shuhdagi ch ed mat wo si i haukai g geꞌe wahlko.
T am i mahsi, t g wahlko nuhkuddam pi shaꞌi amich hegai jewed mattki ab wui i wuwha. K eda am s‑tadaniko i wahks g shuhdagi ch pi hohodaig an hugidaj an. T hab i e ah mat am wo himch g wahlko. Tp hems ab s‑ap wo dahiwua heg eda.
T hekaj am si hikkumia g wupulshpadaj. T im hu shul shuhdagi ch ed. K eda an wupulshch hegai mo hekaj s‑apko e himchud g wahlko. Kumt gam si wuhpulꞌo k am hahawa wabsh i cheshaj hegai lohna mo gam hu baꞌich hab chuꞌig. T g hewel am t‑wiꞌichkwua am wui mo am i wahks g shuhdagi.
T wabshaba ged hu si e hiash g wahlko moꞌo oꞌod ch ed mat koi am hu i wah. K eda shaꞌi si s‑gewkam ab i hihhim g shuhdagi toꞌotonk. Kut hegai mo gam hu oidch hab chuꞌig gam si e ohmi.
T g shondal am i e apꞌech mat wehs wo ha kokda g lilso mat pi wo i e watchwihim k wo heb hu wohp.
T wabshaba pi ha hiwigi g ha‑geꞌejig nat pi s‑doꞌibiam g Paul k am wehsijj ha chehani mat wo i e watchwihi am jewed koa wui. Tsh hegam mo s‑mahch g watchwi am wo i nehni k heheꞌejel wo i e watchwihi.
T heg haꞌi am wo i ha oi an e uꞌukch uꞌus t an mat ab e ohmi g wahlko. Kutt hab masma wehsijj t‑doꞌibia ga hu ak mo ab i koa g jewed.
Kuki am haꞌi d oꞌodham ch si s‑ap i e taht k ab i t‑neid k si s‑t‑nawojima. Kutt s‑mai mash ihda al jewed d Malta. K eda juhk ch s‑hehpid. Kutki am ge t‑nahj.
<range>
T g Paul am haꞌi kuꞌa mat am wo si i mehmed g nahda k am toa mei ch ed. T g koꞌoi ab hema si i daꞌiwush tonidk k an kiꞌish nowij an.
T g kihkam am i nei ihda koꞌoi mo an kiꞌishch g Paul k hab kaij ab aꞌai e wui, “Id oki d ha muꞌakam ch hi wa chum pi e muhkid am shuhdagi ch ed. Kuki am hab wa mahs matki hemho wa wo e muhkid k ab wo bei g s‑koꞌok e‑namkidadag.”
K wabshaba g Paul am si e nowigid ch gam hu wua g koꞌoi mei ch ed k pi shaꞌi koꞌokam e juh.
K idam kihkam am chum neid mat wo i tosko o wabsh chum hekid wo muhk k i gei. T wabshaba gam hu wabsh i mehko. T oi wa pi haꞌichu has shaꞌi juh g Paul. T am hahawa gawul ep i e ah k hab kaij moki d jiosh.
Ha‑geꞌejig idam hemajkam o hab chehgig Publius ch am waꞌi mia oidag. Kuch am wehmaj dadkkahim waik tash nat pi si s‑ap ab i t‑nei.
Kuki g ohgaj woꞌok ch mumku g s‑tonjigkaj ch wakuidagkaj. T g Paul am i wah mo am woꞌo k an tahtam k am i tai g Jiosh mat wo doaj. T wa woho hab e juh mat doaj.
T am i nei ihda g hemajkam. T am hahawa muꞌi ep dada g kokꞌodam k e dodaj.
T hekaj ab si has i t‑elid k shaꞌi muꞌi haꞌichu t‑mah. Am hu i hebai mat am i e ai matt wo hihi, t ab ep i t‑mah hegai matt haschu wo i tatchuad am gahi ep i shuligk.
T eda hema wuhshad g s‑hehpichꞌed g geꞌe wahlko ch hab e aꞌaga Kukadi Jijosh ch ab Alexandria t amjed. Am d i waik mashad, tt heg ab gam hu gahi i shul juhpin tahgio wui
k ga hu dada mo am d Syracuse kihhim. Am d i waik tash,
tt gam hu gahi ep i shul juhpin tahgio wui k ga hu dada mo am d Regium kihhim. Am baꞌich d i tash, t ab i meh g hewel wakolim tahgio amjed. Tt hekaj s‑hohtam gam hu dada mo d i gohk tash mash am d Putoli kihhim am gahi i shuligk.
Kuki am haꞌi kih g t‑wehm wohochuddam ch ab si t‑ahgid mattsh am wo ha wehmajkahim hemako domig ab. Kutt wa woho hab t‑juh k gam hu hahawa hihi Rome wui.
Kutsh wa heki hu am kah hegam t‑wehm wohochuddam ab Rome t ab mattsh am wo dada k atki mehk ab i hihi mat wo t‑hoꞌigeꞌel. Kut haꞌi idam am t‑nam mo am d Waik Gegosidakud. T haꞌi am ep t‑nam mo am d Appius Nolawtakud. Kut ab i ha nei g Paul k ab ihm g Jiosh k ab si e gewkai.
Kutt am dada Rome t am. Kumt wabsh hiwigi g Paul mat wabsh hejelko wo i chiwia. K g shondal am hi wa nuhkud.
Muꞌi o am kih g Tutuligo. K am d i waik tash. T g Paul am i ha wai g ha‑geꞌegedga e‑kih wui. T am i e nam. K hab kaij ab ha wui: “Ni‑hajuni, am amt ni‑lihsoch Jerusalem t am k ab i ni‑dagito Rome chehanig wui. K eda hab wa chum mahs mant pi has chuꞌi ab ha wui t‑hajuni o g t‑himdag.
T hegam Rome t ab hahaꞌichu ab haꞌichu ni‑kakke k chum s‑ni‑dagitoimk nat pi pi haꞌichu shaꞌi cheh manis heg hekaj wo ni‑muhkid.
T wabshaba g t‑wehm oꞌodham ab wui gegokiwua ihda. Kunt hekaj hab i ni‑ah mantki hemho wa ab wo i gei si geꞌe kownal wui mo hi wa chum pi am hu haꞌichu d hegai manis ab wo ha abch g t‑wehm oꞌodham.
Ab ani hiwig hegai Jiosh si Kehsha mach wehsijj nenida ahchim Tutuligo. Ni hab elid mo hema d hegai ch heki hu am i wuhsh. K eda muꞌijj g t‑wehm oꞌodham pi wohochud mo d hegai ch hab s‑ni‑kehꞌid. Nt heg hekaj ab i em‑wai mant em‑wehm wo aꞌagad.”
K hab kaij ab wui, “Pi at ab hu hedai shaꞌi t‑oꞌohani hegam geꞌeged oꞌodham ab Judea t ab ab m‑amjed. T pi hedai ia hu shaꞌi jiwia g t‑hajuni ab amjed mas am hu i pi ap has m‑ahg.
K eda wehsko g hemajkam muꞌi pi ap has ahg ihda himdag mapsh ahpi s‑wohochud. Kuch s‑kaimk maps has wo chei ab amjed.”
Neh, bo kaij. T am hahawa aꞌaga k kei g tash mat wo e jehnigi. T am him k am i e ai g tash. T muꞌi am dada amai mo am daha g Paul k am i e jehnigi ge tash oidam k gam hu si huduni. K g Paul am i ha tashogid g Jiosh kownaltalig ch am si s‑gewkam ha jehnigid mo g Jesus d hegai si Kehshaj g Jiosh mat wa ab amjed an oꞌoha g Mosesbad ch hegam kekelibad Jiosh haꞌichu i tashogiddam.
T haꞌi ab i s‑wohoch ab kaiok. T wabshaba haꞌijj pi shaꞌi wohoch.
T am i pi shaꞌi e apꞌet k hab e juh mat wo aꞌai hihi. T hekaj id hab ep chei g Paul, “Do si wohokam mash wa has i kaij g Jiosh ab em‑amjed ab Isaiabad wui. K an hab chuꞌig Isaiabad oꞌohana ed:
Am g hihm k am hab chehꞌi ha wui idam hemajkam: Mt wo kah g haꞌichu ni‑ahga ch wo neidad mani haschu s‑kehg hab em‑junid ch wabshaba pi wo amich mani d ahni ch hab wua haꞌichu.
Em‑chegitoidag at i e mehkod ab ni‑amjed. Kum pi chechkaidag ch pi ab hu ni‑wui i e nohnogidamk mant wo i kegch g pi ap em‑chegitoidag ch pi ap haꞌichu hab em‑juni. Neh, bo masma an oꞌohadag mo id hab kaij g Jiosh.
“Pegih, mtki pi ab hu wo kaiha g Jiosh haꞌichu ahga mat wo em‑doꞌibia. T g Jiosh heg hekaj ab wo ha mah g gawul mahs hemajkam ihda doꞌibiadag ahga mo ab chum s‑em‑mahkimk. T hegam ab hi wo kaiha.” [
T am i haꞌasa hab chei ihda g Paul. T gam hu aꞌai hihi hegam mo ab kah si e neꞌowinahimch.]
K am kihkahim g Paul gohk ahid ab hema kih ed mo namkid ch am kih. K g hemajkam am chechga.
K g Paul si s‑ap e tahtk ch ab ha neid ch am wabsh si s‑mahchim haꞌichu ha ahgid ab amjed g Jiosh kownaltalig ch ha mashcham ab amjed g t‑kownalig Jesus Christ. K pi hedai shaꞌi shohbid.
Ni-wepnag mam am Rome t am d kihkam: Am ant wo i em-oꞌohani g s-kehg haꞌichu ahgaj g Jiosh ahni Paul mani d piongaj g Jesus Christ. Jiosh at ab i ni-waid k am i ni-kei mant id wo ahgachugad.
K d ihda haꞌichu ahgaj matki g kekelibad Jiosh haꞌichu i tashogiddam an oꞌoha matsh wa g Jiosh ab wo i wuhshad.
K ihda haꞌichu ahgaj am t-tashogid hegai mo d alidaj ch d geꞌe t-kownalig Jesus Christ. Id atsh ia mahsi jewed dahm k ab d amjedkamaj g kownalibad David. K heg hekaj tasho mo woho d hemajkam.
Kutsh g Jiosh ab i wuhshad g Jesus Christ muhkig amjed am i dahm matsh e muhkid k hab masma ab t-chehgidch mo d alidaj ch d hekia s-apꞌekam
Kut wa ab si i s-ni-hoꞌigeꞌel g Jesus Christ k am i ni-kei am wehhejed g Jiosh mantsh am wo i ha ahgidahi g nahnko mahs hemajkam g s-kehg haꞌichu ahgaj. Kutsh muꞌijj ab wo s-wohochud k ab wo s-wohog elidad.
Ni am wa kah mamtsh haꞌi ahpim Rome t am hemajkam ab i s-wohoch. Jiosh o ab si em-tatchua ch ab i em-waid k am hab em-juh mamt ab i s-wohoch g Jesus Christ k d Jiosh hemajkamga. Kunt heg hekaj am wo haꞌichu i em-oꞌohani. Ab o wa si s-em-hoꞌigeꞌid g t-ohg Jiosh g t-kownalig Jesus Christ wehm ch ab wo wa baꞌich i em-mahkad g i wehmtadag ch s-ap tahhadkam.
<range>
Wehsko o am e aꞌaga mamtsh ab i s-wohoch g Jesus Christ. Ni heg hekaj ab si hoꞌigeꞌid g Jiosh.
Wehs ni-ihbdag amjed ani chikpanid g Jiosh am ahgachugch g s-kehg haꞌichu ahgaj ab amjed g alidaj. K g Jiosh s-mahch mani chum hekid ab wui ni-hoꞌigeꞌidahun am em-wehhejed.
<range>
S-em-neidamk ani ch ab tahni g Jiosh matp hems am wo apꞌech mant am wo i em-chehgim k wo i em-wehmt em-wohochudadag ed mamt hekaj am wo i e gewpkai.
Ab att aꞌai wo i t-wehmt ab aꞌai kahk g t-wohochudadag.
Am g wo s-mahchk mani muꞌikko am aꞌapꞌechud mant am wo i em-chehgim. K wabshaba am haꞌichu has e wua mani heg hekaj pi ni-nankog. Si ani tatchua mant am wo i em-wehmt am em-ahgidch g Jiosh haꞌichu ahga hab masma mani i ha wehmaj hegam mo hahasko kihdag ch hab waꞌap pi d Tutuligo.
Ab o ni-chehani g Jiosh mant wo ha ahgi g wehs nahnko mahs hemajkam ihda s-kehg haꞌichu ahgaj, chum wa hems hegam mo pi chu aꞌamichud ch hegam mo d mischini.
Ni heg hekaj ni-nahtokch mant am epai wo i em-ahgidahi ahpim mam am kih Rome t am.
Wehs at wo ha doꞌibia g Jiosh hegam mat ab wo i s-wohoch ihda s-kehg haꞌichu ahga ab amjed g Jesus Christ. Kuni heg hekaj wabsh si s-ap ni-tahtk ch am ahgachug. Tutuligo at wehpeg ab bei e-apꞌedag mat wo e doꞌibia k g gawul mahs hemajkam ab hahawa bei.
Jiosh haꞌichu ahga o am t-tashogidch mat hedai g Jiosh am wo i apꞌech e wehhejed. An o oꞌohadag: Am at wo i ha apꞌech g Jiosh e wehhejed hegam mat ab wo i s-wohoch g haꞌichu ahgaj. Kut hegam wo waꞌi bei g pi ha huhugedam doakag.
Ab o t‑wui i e tashogid g Jiosh. K wabshaba muꞌi hemajkam gam hu hab i juhkch ch hab junihim g pi apꞌekam. K ihda pi apꞌekam an kuhpahim mat wo s‑e mai g wohokam. T g Jiosh heg hekaj s‑koꞌokam wo ha namkid.
<range>
Tt wo chum s‑mahchk mo has chuꞌig g Jiosh am neidch g nahtoij no pi id am chum t‑tashogid mo g Jiosh wehs haꞌichu dahm hab chuꞌig ch wehs edgid g gewkdag chum hekid. Kut hemho wa ab wo moht g e‑chuꞌijig matp hedai pi wo mahchim.
Neh, wehs hemajkam o wa chum s‑mahch mo an hema d Jiosh ch wabsh pi ab hu mahkch g has elidadag. Ab o s‑ha hoꞌigeꞌid. K wabshaba pi ab hu i hoꞌigeꞌelid ch wabsh pehegi haꞌichu chegito. K am wabsh i s‑chuhugam g ha‑chegitoidag.
Bo e ahg mo s‑chu aꞌamichud ch eda pi haꞌichu mahch.
Jiosh o d pi ha huhugedam ch d si haꞌichu. Kutt heg ab wo waꞌi chum ihmad mo d t‑Jioshga. K wabshaba idam im hu hab wabsh juhkch ch wabsh haꞌichu jijoshchud ch ab ha ihm. K eda d wabsh hemajkam ha‑nahtoi mo ha oꞌodhamt o atp hems ha haꞌichu doakamt. T hekaj g Jiosh am wabsh i ha dagito mat hab wo juh hegai mo haschu hab s‑junimk. Kuki hab wua g s‑uam haꞌichu ch s‑ta edam haꞌichu. Uꞌuwi o haꞌi chum hems pi ha kuhkunt ch e wehm hab wua g s‑ta edam haꞌichu.
<range>
<range>
<range>
K g chechoj pi ha hohont ch e wehm hab waꞌap wua g s‑ta edam haꞌichu. Kut heg hekaj wo si s‑koꞌokam ha namkid g Jiosh.
Pi o tatchua idam mas wo s‑mahchk g Jiosh. T g Jiosh heg hekaj am wabsh i ha dagito pi kehg ha‑chegitoidag ed. K am hab wua hegai mat haschu pi am hu hab wo chum wuad.
Ab at wabsh i si ha shuhd g nahnko mahs pi apꞌekam mo haꞌi si pihk e elid g s‑kaisdagkaj ch haꞌi s‑ta kekꞌeidama o s‑chu hehgamk o s‑ha muꞌamk o s‑chu cheggiamk o s‑chu iꞌattomk o s‑chu padhog ehꞌelidamk o s‑chu ahgamk.
Haꞌi o s‑koꞌokam has e ahg o s‑ta koꞌokdama o chum si e hahaschud o si i e nakog mat am baꞌich hab wo i juh g pi apꞌekam o pi ab hu wohog ha elid g e‑geꞌegedga
o s‑uꞌama. Haꞌi o pi hab wua hegai mo haschu hab kaij mat hab wo juh o pi hedai pihk elid o pi ab hu ha hoꞌigeꞌid no pi s‑kehꞌid g Jiosh.
Jiosh chehanig o hab chuꞌig mat hema hab wo masmak ch ab wo nako g s‑koꞌok e‑namkidadag. K idam am wa chum s‑mahch ihda ch eda am hab wa masma hab e junihim ch wabsh s‑hohhoꞌid mo haꞌijj am hab waꞌap e junihim.
Naꞌams haꞌijj ahpim hab kaij “Hah, shoꞌo waꞌi si pi ap d hehemajkam hegam map am ha aꞌaga k ch hemho wa wo bei g s‑koꞌok e‑namkidadag,” ch amtp eda hems hab waꞌap junihim ihda. Neh, m wabsh hejel e‑neꞌokikaj ab e mohtoꞌid g s‑koꞌok e‑namkidadag.
S‑mahch ach mo d wabsh i si shel mat wo ha lodai g Jiosh hegam mo hab wua hegai mani am em‑ahgid.
Kumt ahpim hemho wa hab waꞌap wo bei g s‑koꞌok e‑namkidadag mamtp am hab wo junihid ihda.
Idani o wabsh ab si s‑t‑bahbgi g Jiosh ch s‑hemajim ab t‑nenida no pi tatchua matt gam hu wo s‑ohhod g pi ap t‑chegitoi.
K wabshaba muꞌijj pi ab hu kaimk g Jiosh ch pi shaꞌi pihk e elid hekaj. Idam o baꞌich i geꞌe ab e mohtoꞌidahim hegai s‑koꞌok namkidadag mat wo nam geꞌe lodaita tash ch ed.
Heg at i tash ed wo t‑namkid g Jiosh heg hekaj mach haschu hab i junihim.
Heg att wo cheh mach haschu i gahg. Am g hab wo junihid g s‑apꞌekam ch wo e gahgidad g Jiosh apꞌechuda. T g Jiosh am wo i em‑wahpki e‑kihdag ed mamt chum hekid an wo wehmajk.
Muꞌi hemajkam o wabsh hejel e tatchua ch hab junihim g pi apꞌekam. T idam g Jiosh ab wo ha mah g s‑koꞌok ha‑namkidadag.
Kut ab wo tahtkkad g shoꞌigdag ch s‑koꞌok, wahm g Tutuligo matp pi hab hu wo kaiha hegai mo haschu t‑nuhkudachud g Jiosh.
T g Jiosh ab wo si t‑haꞌichuch ahchim mach hab junihim g s‑apꞌekam k ab wo t‑mah g has elidadag ch s‑ap tahhadkam. Ahchim Tutuligo att wehpeg bei ihda s‑apꞌekam. Mt wabshaba ahpim gawul mahs hemajkam ab hahawa bei.
Jiosh o wehs t‑wepo ab t‑neid ch wehs t‑wepo s‑t‑doꞌibiamk.
Gawul mahs hemajkam o pi hekaj g Moses chehanig ch wabshaba s‑mahch mo haschu d s‑apꞌekam ch wo e lodai heg hekaj mo pi hab junihim g s‑apꞌekam. K g Tutuligo s‑mahch heg hekaj chehanig mo haschu d s‑apꞌekam ch heg hekaj hab waꞌap wo e lodai mo pi am hu hab junihim.
Pi at hedai wo i ha apꞌech g Jiosh heg wabsh hekaj mo kah g chehanig k washaba heg hekaj mat heg am hab wo junihid.
Heki o hu pi edgid g Jiosh chehanig g gawul mahs hemajkam ch eda s‑mahch mo haschu d s‑apꞌekam. K g ha‑mahchig d ha‑chehanig. K g ha‑mahchig d ha‑chehanig.
K am wa tasho mo wa hab chuꞌig no pi e kudut mo hekid hab wua g pi apꞌekam ch s‑ap e tahtk mo hekid hab wua g s‑apꞌekam.
Kut hab waꞌap wo e juh heg eda tash mat kei g Jiosh mat g Jesus Christ wo ha lodai g ha‑chuꞌijigkaj, chum hems g pi ap ha‑chegitoidag. Neh, bo chuꞌig ihda s‑kehg haꞌichu ahgaj g Jiosh mani ahgachug.
Muꞌijj g ni‑wehm Tutuligo o hab e elid mo s‑ap s‑mahch g Jiosh tatchui ch am hab junihim g s‑apꞌekam no pi edgid g chehanigaj.
<range>
Bo e elid mo d ha wanimeddam ch ab ha mahkch g tonlig hegam mo pi edgid g Jiosh chehanig.
Bo e elid mo wehs ab uꞌukch g amichudadag ch wohokam no pi ab uꞌukch hegai chehanig. Chum o wa ha mashcham g pi haꞌichu mahchim ch aꞌal
k ch eda pi hejel am hu hab wua g e‑mashchama. Haꞌijj o ha mihshmad mat pi hedai haꞌichu wo ha ehsidad
ch pi wo ha wehm woꞌiwua hegai mo pi d ha‑wehm kihhim ch eda hejel hab masma hab e wua. Si o pi hohhoꞌid mat ab wo ihmad g hemajkam nahtoi k ch eda wo ha ehs mo haschu an hab chuꞌig ha‑cheopi ed.
Ab o chum si e hahaꞌichuchud mo edgid g Jiosh chehanig ch eda muꞌikko pi am hu hab junihim ch ab mamka g Jiosh g si edadag.
An o hab chuꞌig Jiosh oꞌohana ed: Gawul mahs hemajkam o s‑koꞌokam has ahg g Jiosh ha hekaj g Tutuligo.
Do si haꞌichu g pahl hikuchka em‑wehhejed mamtp ab wo wohog elidad g chehanig. Mtp wabshaba pi ab hu wo wohog elidad, k pi has d shaꞌi ahga g pahl hikuchka.
Matp hema ab wo sha wohog elidad g Jiosh chehanig, t g Jiosh hab masma ab wo neidad mo pahl hikuchkas, chum as pi d Tuhligo ch pi woho hikuchkas.
Gawul mahs hemajkam o pi pahl hikuchkas ch eda haꞌi hab e junihim mo hab masma hab chuꞌig g chehanig. Kut heg hekaj ab wo e chuꞌijigch g Tutuligo no pi edgid g chehanig ch eda melichkwuhim.
Pi o d Jiosh hemajkamga hegam mat wabsh gawul juh g e‑chuhkug g pahl hikuchkakaj.
Hegam o hi d Jiosh hemajkamga mat gawul juh g e‑ihbdag. Kut pi wo e nako mas g chehanigkaj hab wo juh ihda. Hekia S‑apꞌekam Gewkdag at hemho wo wa gawul juh g t‑ihbdag. Tp hems ab wo em‑hehgchul g hemajkam mamt gawul wo juh g e‑chuhkug. T wabshaba g Jiosh ab wo em‑hehgchul mat gawul wo e juh g em‑ihbdag.
Pegih, mtp hems a haꞌijj hab wo chei, “Pi oki haꞌichu d shaꞌi ha‑apꞌedag g Tutuligo ha dahm g gawul mahs hemajkam.”
Nt wabshaba wo em‑ahgi mo muꞌi haꞌichu d t‑apꞌedag. Hema o d ihda mat g Jiosh ab t‑hiwigi g haꞌichu e‑ahga matt wo ha ahgi g nahnko mahs hemajkam.
K hi wa chum woho mo haꞌijj g ni‑wehm oꞌodham pi ab hu wohog elid g haꞌichu ahgaj. T wabshaba g Jiosh woho am hab wo juh hegai mo has i kaij.
Chum o hekid ahg g wohokam, chum as wehs hemajkam g iattogi hab wua. Neh, bo chuꞌig an Jiosh oꞌohana ed: Jiosh haꞌichu ahga o d hekia wohokam, chum as haꞌijj hab kaij mo pi woho.
Haꞌijj o hab kaij, M o wa s‑apꞌe matt hab wo junihid g pi apꞌekam no pi heg hekaj tasho am chehgid mo g Jiosh hab wua g s‑apꞌekam. T heg hekaj pi ap hab wo e juh g Jiosh matp s‑koꞌokam wo t‑namkid heg hekaj. Neh, bo kaij.
Nt wabshaba wo em‑ahgi mo ahg g iattogi. Jiosh o chum hekid hab wua g s‑apꞌekam. Pi at has masma wo e nako mat wo t‑lodai matp d wo pi apꞌekamk.
K hab kaij idam, T‑iattogi o am tashogid mo g Jiosh chum hekid ahg wohokam. Kuch heg hekaj am chehgid mo heꞌes i geꞌej g Jiosh haꞌichu k ed. Pegih, k haschu ahgch hab kaij g Jiosh machs d pi ap chuꞌijkam ch wo bei g s‑koꞌok namkidadag.
Haꞌijj o an ha iattogid manish hab kaij matt am hab wo junihid g pi apꞌekam ch hab masma wo tashogi g s‑apꞌekam. T wabshaba g Jiosh wo s‑koꞌokam ha namkid heg hekaj.
Neh, pi o shaꞌi baꞌich i s‑apꞌe g Tutuligo mo g gawul mahs hemajkam. Wehsijj ach wa ab mohtois g pi apꞌekam. K id an t‑uꞌukch. Kutt pi hedai wo shaꞌi t‑nako machs pi hab wo junihid g pi apꞌekam.
An o hab chuꞌig Jiosh oꞌohana ed: Pi o hedai oꞌodham d shaꞌi s‑apꞌekam
ch pi hedai amichud mo haschu d s‑apꞌekam ch pi hedai mahchimk g Jiosh.
Wehsijj at i e mehkod ab amjed g Jiosh k am hab junihim g pi apꞌekam. Pi o hedai hab shaꞌi wua g s‑apꞌekam. Pi hedai.
S‑koꞌokam o neneok hab masma mo s‑em‑muꞌamk ch g iattogi hab kaij. Pi kehg ha‑neꞌoki o hab masma i wuhshani mo g hialwui ab koꞌoi amjed.
<range>
E o nahtokch mat s‑koꞌokam wo em‑juh k wo em‑mua.
Chum o hebai gantan g shoꞌigdag ch padchud g s‑ha‑hehgig.
Pi o hekid shaꞌi s‑ap e tahtk.
ch pi hekid ab has elid g Jiosh.
Jiosh at ab baꞌich wo i ha chuꞌijigch hegam mo edgid g chehanigaj ch pi am hu heg oidch hab e junihim. K hekaj hab mahs mo g Jiosh wehs ab ha abchud g hemajkam.
Pi at hedai wo e nako mas wehs am hab wo junihid g Jiosh chehanig ch hekaj wo i e apꞌech am Jiosh tahgio. Chehanigaj at am wo i t‑tashogi mach haschu pi apꞌekam hab wua.
Iaꞌi idani at am i tashogi g Jiosh mat has masma wo i ha apꞌech g hemajkam am e tahgio. Chehanig at pi wo shaꞌi t‑apꞌechud k wabshaba heg wohokamchud mat has masma g Jiosh wo i t‑apꞌech. K g kekelibad Jiosh haꞌichu i tashogiddam id hab waꞌap wohokamchud.
Jiosh at am wo i ha apꞌech hegam matp hedai ab wo i s‑wohoch g haꞌichu ahgaj k ab wo hiwgad g Jesus Christ, chum as has mahs d wo hemajkamk.
Wehs hemajkam at hab juh g pi apꞌekam k pi am hu ais g Jiosh hab elida.
K wabshaba g Jiosh ab i s‑t‑hoꞌigeꞌid. T g alidaj Jesus Christ ab moht g s‑koꞌok t‑namkidadag am t‑wehhejed. T hekaj ab i t‑apꞌech g Jiosh e wui.
Jiosh at am i apꞌech mat g alidaj wo e muhkid am t‑wehhejed k hekaj gam hu hab wo i juh g pi ap t‑chuꞌijig mattp hedai ab wo i s‑wohoch. Ab o wabsh s‑ha hoꞌigeꞌid hegam heki hu hemajkam mo ab s‑wohochud ch pi chegima g ha‑chuꞌijig
nat pi g alidaj wo e muhkid am wehs t‑wehhejed. Bo wa masma am t‑chehgidch g Jiosh mo chum hekid hab wua g s‑apꞌekam ch wo e nako mat am wo i ha apꞌech g pi ap chuꞌijkam mat hekid ab wo bei g Jesus nat pi heg ab moht g s‑koꞌok t‑namkidadag.
Neh, k pi haꞌichu d shaꞌi hegai machs hekaj wo chum si t‑haschudad. Pi att wo shaꞌi t‑nako machs wo i t‑apꞌech am Jiosh tahgio am hab junihidch g s‑apꞌekam. Jiosh at am wo i t‑apꞌech e wui matt hekid ab wo i s‑wohoch g haꞌichu ahgaj.
<range>
Pi o hegam d waꞌi ha‑Jioshga mat ab ha mah g chehanig ch wabshaba wehs hemajkam d ha‑Jioshga.
Ab o ha wehnad ch wepo masma ab ha neid g Tutuligo ch hegam mo pi d Tutuligo. Wehsijj at hab waꞌi masma wo i e apꞌech am Jiosh tahgio mat ab wo i s‑wohoch g haꞌichu ahgaj ab amjed g Jesus.
Id o pi hab d ahga machs im hu hab i juh g Jiosh chehanig matt hekid ab i s‑wohoch. T‑wohochudadag o am i t‑gewpkad matt am hab wo junihid g tatchuij mo hab wa chum d ahga g chehanigaj.
Am ant wo i wuhshad g Abrahambad mant am wo i em‑tashogi ihda mani wa em‑ahgid. Ihda Abrahambad ash d t‑shohshon ahchim Tutuligo
ch ab i s‑wohoch g Jiosh. Tsh g Jiosh heg hekaj am i apꞌech e tahgio. Pi atsh wa hejel am i e apꞌech heg hekaj mas hab junihim g s‑apꞌekam. K heg hekaj wa pi am hu haꞌichu d shaꞌi hegai matsh wa heg hekaj wo chum si e haschudad g Abrahambad.
An o hab chuꞌig Jiosh oꞌohana ed: Abrahambad at ab i s‑wohoch g Jiosh. T g Jiosh heg hekaj am i apꞌech e tahgio.
Neh, do em‑namkidadag hegai mamt wo ha gehg chikpank.
K wabshaba d em‑mahkigdag hegai mamtp ab wo bei ab s‑wohochudk hegai mo ab em‑makiog. K g Jiosh hab kaij mat am wo i ha apꞌech e tahgio k gam hu hab wo i juh g pi ap ha‑chuꞌijig hegam mat ab wo i s‑wohoch. Id o d Jiosh mahkigdag.
K id hab ahg g Davidbad ch hab kaij mo s‑ap e tahtk hegam mat ab wo i s‑wohoch g Jiosh nat pi am wo i ha apꞌech e tahgio. K hab masma an oꞌohadag:
Shoꞌo waꞌi s‑ap e tahtk hegam mat hedam g Jiosh gam hu hab i juh g pi ap ha‑chuꞌijig k pi ab hu wo ha mohtoꞌi.
<range>
David o pi hegam hab waꞌi ha ahg mo pahl hikuchkas ch wabshaba hegam hab ep ha ahg mo pi pahl hikuchkas. Heki ani hu ahg matsh g Abrahambad ab i s‑wohoch g Jiosh. Sh g Jiosh heg hekaj hab kaij mo d s‑apꞌekam.
Id at hab e juh mat koi e pahl hikuch g Abrahambad.
Ab ash wa s‑wohochud g Jiosh. Sh g Jiosh heg hekaj hab kaij mo d s‑apꞌekam. T heg i dahm am hahawa e pahl hikuch mat hab masma am wo wohokamch g e‑wohochudadag mat heg hekaj am i apꞌech g Jiosh. T g Jiosh hab masma wehs am wo i ha apꞌech hegam mat hab waꞌap ab wo i s‑wohoch, chum hems hegam mo pi pahl hikuchkas. Heg o wa wepo mach ahchim Jiosh wohochuddam woho d Abrahambad amjedkam nach pi hab masma apꞌedag. Hemho wa att ab wo s‑wohochudad ch ab wo hiwgad hab masma mash wa g Abrahambad.
<range>
Jiosh ah am ha ahgid g Abrahambad ch amjedkamaj matsh am wo i ha apꞌech e tahgio k wehs ab wo ha mah g jewed kahchki matp ab wo i s‑wohoch.
Kut pi haꞌichu wehhejed wo s‑kehgajk g ha‑wohochudadag matp id hab wo sha ha juni g Jiosh hegam mo pi ab hu wohochud ch am hab wabsh junihim hegai mo an oꞌohanas chehanig ed. T g Jiosh d wo s‑iattomkamk matp am hab wo sha ha juni.
Pi att ab hu wo shaꞌi i t‑apꞌech g chehanigkaj k wabshaba heg hekaj ab wo t‑abch g t‑chuꞌijig matt ab wo bei g s‑koꞌok t‑namkidadag. T hegam mo pi edgid pi heg hekaj ab hu wo e abch.
Pi at ahchim am waꞌi i t‑apꞌech g Jiosh mach wa an uꞌukch g heki hu chehanigaj. Ahpim at am ep i em‑apꞌech mamt hab waꞌap ab i s‑wohoch g haꞌichu ahgaj. Batt masma am oidk hab t‑juh g Abrahambad k ab hiwig g Jiosh hemajimatalig. Id o heg wa wepo mo g Abrahambad d t‑ohg. K g Jiosh heg hekaj am t‑chehgidch mat has wo chum masmak.
Bo masma an oꞌohadag mash g Jiosh am ahgid g Abrahambad: Bant m‑juh mapt d wo ha‑shohshonk g muꞌi nahnko mahs hemajkam. Id at woho hab e juh. K d wohokam hegai Jiosh neꞌoki mat g Abrahambad ab i s‑wohoch. Jiosh oki e nakog mat ab wo i wuhshad g muhki ab muhkig amjed k am wo nahto haꞌichu hab wabsh cheꞌek mat am hab wo e juh.
Abrahambad ash wa ab s‑wohochud mat g Jiosh ab wo ha mah g ali mat eda kekelit chum as pi mahch mas has masma hab wo juh. Tsh heg hekaj hab juh g Jiosh mo d ha‑shohshon g muꞌi nahnko mahs hemajkam. Bo masma an hab chuꞌig Jiosh oꞌohana ed mo g Jiosh hab kaij: G i ha neid g huhuꞌu. Haꞌakia at d wo k g m‑amjedkam. Neh, boki kaij.
Tsh pi shaꞌi gawul juh g e‑wohochudadag g Abrahambad, chum as hems aihim g siant ahidag. Kush g Sarabad pi ha mamdat.
Abrahambad ash ab si ihm g Jiosh nash pi ab si s‑wohochud mat wo e nakog k woho am hab wo juh hegai mo haschu am ahgid.
<range>
Heg atsh hekaj am i apꞌech g Jiosh e tahgio k gam hu hab i juh g chuꞌijigaj.
K pi heg waꞌi wehhejed an oꞌohanas hegai
ch wabshaba ahchim ep t‑wehhejed. Jiosh atsh gam hu hab ep wo i juh g t‑chuꞌijig ahchim matt hab waꞌap ab i s‑wohoch.
Heg atsh hekaj am i kei g t‑kownalig Jesus mat wo e muhkid g t‑chuꞌijig wehhejed k ab ep wo i wuhsh muhkig amjed. Kutt am i t‑apꞌech Jiosh tahgio ab i s‑wohochudk ihda.
Am at i t‑apꞌech g Jiosh e tahgio ahchim matt ab i s‑wohoch g haꞌichu ahgaj ab amjed g t‑kownalig Jesus Christ. Kuch heg hekaj ab wui si s‑ap t‑tahtk.
Shoꞌo waꞌi si s‑hemajima a t‑wui. Kuch si s‑hehgig ch ab nenida mat ab wo i t‑wahpki e‑kihdag ed k ab wo si t‑haꞌichuch.
Chum as haꞌichu t‑kudut, ch eda si s‑hehgig nach pi s‑mahch mo g t‑kudutadag hab t‑wua matt wo s‑chu nakogad.
T g Jiosh s‑ap wo i t‑el mach s‑chu nakog. Kutt id hekaj am wo i t‑gewpkai heg wui mach ab nenida.
Ab at i t‑mah g Jiosh g Hekia S‑apꞌekam Gewkdag. K heg ab t‑mahtchulid mo si pihk e elid g Jiosh ab t‑wui. Ch hekaj s‑mahch mat woho am wo i t‑wahpki g Jiosh e‑kihdag ed.
Dach wa pi ap chuꞌijkam ch pi ha gewkdag machs hab wo juh haꞌichu matt hekaj am wo i t‑apꞌech. T wabshaba g Jiosh am i apꞌech mat g alidaj e muhkid am t‑wehhejed.
Pi o hedai e muhkidamk hema wehhejed. Tp hems hema hi wo wa e muhkid hema wehhejed mo d si oꞌodham.
Kuch eda d wa chum pi ap chuꞌijkam. T g Jiosh am t‑chehgi mo heꞌes ab si i t‑tatchua am i apꞌechudk mat g alidaj am t‑wehhejed muh k gam hu hab i juh g pi ap t‑chuꞌijig.
Kuch hab s‑mahch mat hahawa pi heg hekaj ab hu wo t‑namkid.
Heki ach hu pi ab hu hajunima g Jiosh. T g alidaj muh am t‑wehhejed mat hab wo t‑juh matt ab haha wo hajunit g Jiosh. Pegih, ch baꞌich ab i apꞌedag am Christ doꞌibiatalig ed no pi d doakam ab muhkig amjed ch wo e nako mat wo i t‑wehmtad.
Kuch si s‑hehgig mat g t‑kownalig Jesus Christ gam hu hab i juh g pi ap t‑chuꞌijig k am i t‑apꞌech mach ab hahawa si s‑hajunima g Jiosh.
Ab atsh haꞌichu cheha g Jiosh hegai mo d wehpeg oꞌodham ch hab chehgig Adam. Tsh heg mulin k hab i shonwuich g pi apꞌekam jewed dahm. Tsh hekaj am i shonwua muhkig. Tsh g Jiosh pi hab ep juh g chehanig am hugkam matsh an i wuhsh g Mosesbad. Sh eda wehsijj hab wua g pi apꞌekam. Kush heg hekaj g muhkig wehsijj ab ha aꞌahe, chum as pi mulin g chehanig hab masma matsh wa g Adambad. Jiosh oki am haꞌichu t‑chehgidch ab amjed g Christ id hekaj Adambad.
<range>
<range>
Wehsijj atsh ab haꞌichu i wahpki am wehs ha wehhejed g hemajkam. K wabshaba gawul mams hegai mat ab i wahpki. Do muhkig hegai matsh g Adambad ab i wahki wehs ha wehhejed g hemajkam. K wabshaba d Jiosh hemajimatalig hegai matsh g Jesus Christ ab i wahki wehs t‑wehhejed.
K d al hemako hegai chuꞌijig mat hekaj am i wah g s‑koꞌok namkidadag. K wabshaba muꞌij g pi ap t‑chuꞌijig. K eda g Jiosh wehs gam hu hab i junihog am t‑wehhejed.
