Si ach em-tatchuid mamt wo s-mahchk g wohokam ab ha amjed hegam mat heki hu koi. T hahawa pi wo i em-bijim g pi ap tahhadkam hab masma mat hab wo ha juh g pi wohochuddam.
Neh, ab at i wuhsh g Jesus muhkig amjed. Kuch s-wohochud ihda ch hekaj ab wui nenea mat g Jiosh ab ep wo i ha wuwhas hegam mat koi ab s-wohochudch g haꞌichu ahgaj ab amjed g Jesus.
Hegam atsh wo i wuwha ab amjed g muhkig matt koi an hu wo nam g t-kownalig Jesus.
Wehpeg at ab wo si s-kaidam t-wai g anghil ha-geꞌejig. T g Jiosh kuikud ab haha wo kaida. T ab haha wo i hud g t-kownalig Jesus ab dahm kahchim t amjed. T hegam mat heki hu koi ab s-wohochudch g Jesus ab wo i wuwha.
T hegam mat hedai in d wo kia dodakamk heg i tash ed ab haha wo i e hemapai ha wehm chewagi ch ed k an wo nam g t-kownalig. Kutt am i amjed chum hekid wo wehmajk g t-kownalig.
Ab g wo si e gewkemhunad id hekaj haꞌichu ahga.
Pi o hab mahs manis am hu wo em-oꞌohani ab amjed mas hekid hab wo i e juh ihda haꞌichu mani am ahg.
Am am wa s-ap s-mahch mat chum s-aꞌagi wo e ai mat ep wo jiwia g t-kownalig Jesus. Neh, pi o ta machima mas hekid wo i jiwia g s-chu ehskam chuhug ch ed, o mas hekid wo i e ai mat g uwi ab wo taht g s-koꞌok k wo bei g ali. K hab waꞌap pi ta machima am ha wehhejed g pi e doꞌibiakam mas hekid ep wo jiwia g t-kownalig.
Idam at hab wo kaijjid mo wehs haꞌichu am wabsh i si s-apꞌe ch s-dodolima. T am wabsh wo si e ai mat wo e koꞌijid k pi wo e doꞌibia.
Kum eda ahpim e doꞌibiakam s-mahch ihda. K pi hab chum mahs mat s-aꞌagi wo jiwia hegai tash em-wui hab sha masma mo g s-chu ehskam.
Jiosh o haꞌichu t-tashogid. Kuch an uꞌukch g tonlig hab masma mo hegam mo am tash ed hihim.
Pegih, tt wo chum s-nenenashanik ch pi hab wo masmak mo g nawkkoi.
Hegam mo pi nenenashanik ch nawkkoꞌo o am eda g s-chuhugam.
Kutt wabshaba ahchim s-ap wo t-nahtokchid hab masma mo g shondal. T-wohochudadag ch pihk t-elidadag o d wainomi lihwa t-wehhejed. Kuch ab wui t-gewpkadch mat g t-doꞌibiadag s-ap wo e nahto. K id hab sha masma mo g wainomi wonami t-wehhejed.
Pi at hab ahgk ab i t-gawulkai g Jiosh mas wo t-namkid heg hekaj pi ap t-chuꞌijig k wabshaba hab ahgk mat g t-kownalig Jesus Christ wo t-doꞌibia.
Heg at muh t-wehhejed k i wuhsh matt d wo dodakamk wehmaj. K wabsh chum has masma s-apꞌe chum achs wo heki hu koi o in d wabsh wo kia dodakamk mat wo jiwia.
Mt heg hekaj ab wabsh wo si aꞌai e gewkemhunad ch ab aꞌai haꞌichukaj wo i e wehmajk mam am hab wa e junihim.
Ab ach si em-tahni mamt s-ap ab wo ha neidad g e-wanimeddam ch hegam mo am em-mashcham ch ab shohbidch g pi apꞌekam em-shahgid. Do Jiosh hab elida mo hab wua.
Ab g wo si has ha elidad ch s-ha hoꞌigeꞌidad no pi hab wua a Jiosh chikpan. Am g wabsh wo s-dodolim kihk e wehm.
Ab ach si em-tahni mamt wo ha ahgidad hegam mo s-papadma mat wo chikpanad. Ab g wo i ha gewkemhunad hegam mo pi wihnam gegok am e-wohochudadag ed. I g wo ha wehmtad hegam mo pi ha gewpdag ch ab wehsijj wo si ha bahbgi.
Pi g am uhpam wo agwua mat hema s-koꞌokam wo em-juh k wabshaba chum hekid am wo i e nakogad mamt s-ap haꞌichu hab wo wuad ab aꞌai e wui ch ab wehs ha wui g hemajkam.
Chum g hekid wo s-ap e tahtkkad.
Chum g hekid wo e hoꞌigeꞌidahunad.
Ab g wo s-hoꞌigeꞌidad g Jiosh, chum atp haschu has wo i chuꞌigk. Id o d Jiosh tatchui em-wehhejed ahpim mamt ab i e hemakoj g Jesus Christ wehm.
Pi g am hu wo shohbid g Hekia S-apꞌekam Gewkdag.
Pi g am wo s-kaihogi hegam mo g Jiosh ab ha mahkch g haꞌichu ahga
k wabshaba wehs haꞌichu wo i aꞌappemad ch g s-apꞌekam ab wo uꞌukchid.
Im g hu wehs hab wo i juhni g pi apꞌekam.
Jiosh o ab t-mahkch g s-ap tahhadkam. Kuni ab tahni mat wehs gam hu hab wo i juh g pi apꞌekam ab em-amjed k wo si nuhkudad g em-doakag ch em-ihbdag ch em-hon mat d wo hekia s-apꞌekamk. Mt am hahawa pi wo ha chuꞌijigk mat ep wo jiwia g t-kownalig Jesus Christ.
Jiosh at ab i em-wai e wui k chum hekid hab junihim mo has i kaij.
Am g wo t-wehhejed e hoꞌigeꞌidahunad.
Am g wo ha ahgid g t-wehm wohochuddam mat ab wo i s-t-hoꞌigeꞌel.
Ni ab si em-chehani g t-kownalig Jesus gewkdagkaj mamt am wo neꞌokchul ihda oꞌohana am wehs ha wui g t-wehm wohochuddam amai.
Neh, ab at wo wa baꞌich i s-em-hoꞌigeꞌel g t-kownalig Jesus Christ.
T-wepnag mam am kih Thessalonica t am: Am ant ep wo i em-oꞌohani ahni Paul. K ia ni-wehmaj g Silas ch Timothy k ch am i ni-wehmaj. Dam woho hemajkamgaj g t-ohg Jiosh ab i e dagitok t-kownalig Jesus Christ wui.
Ab o wa si s-em-hoꞌigeꞌid g t-ohg Jiosh g t-kownalig Jesus Christ wehm ch ab wo wa baꞌich i em-mahkad g i wehmtadag ch s-ap tahhadkam.
Chum ach hekid ab si hoꞌigeꞌid g Jiosh em-hekaj, t-wepnag. Am amsh si i gewkahim e-wohochudadag ed ch baꞌich i si pihk e elid ab aꞌai e wui.
Kuch heg hekaj si s-ap t-tahtk ch wehsko ha ahgidahim g t-wehm wohochuddam ab em-amjed. Msh am em-shoꞌigchud nam pi ab s-wohochud g Jiosh. Kumsh eda s-ap ab nakog g e-shoꞌigdag am wehhejed g Jiosh.
Id o am wohokamchud mat am i em-apꞌech g Jiosh e wehhejed k pi ab hu haꞌichu wo em-abch am lodaita ch ed. Am am e shoꞌigchud wehhejed g Jiosh kownaltalig. K g Jiosh hab em-elid mam d s-apꞌekam ch am wo i em-wahpki e-kihdag ed.
Jiosh at s-ap hab wo juh g lodaita. Hegam mo em-shoꞌigchud at wo e shoꞌigch heg hekaj.
Kumt ahpim wo e doꞌibia ab amjed g e-shoꞌigchudadag. Jiosh at hab wo juh ihda mat hekid ep wo jiwia g t-kownalig Jesus ab dahm kahchim t amjed. T ia wehmaj wo dada g anghiligaj k wo si s-gewkdagk.
T ia wehmaj ep wo e chehgi g si geꞌe mei. T wo s-koꞌokam ha namkid g Jesus hegam mo pi mahch g Jiosh ch pi ab hu wohog elid g s-kehg haꞌichu ahgaj ab amjed g t-kownalig Jesus.
Hegam at gam hu wo si i e gawulkai ab amjed g Jiosh k pi hekid wo bei g geꞌe gewkdaj k chum hekid ab wo beihid g s-koꞌok e-namkidadag.
Id at hab wo e juh mat hekid ia ep wo jiwia g t-kownalig Jesus. Kut g gewkdaj am haha wo i chehgi mat t-doꞌibia k ab i t-gawulkai e wehhejed.
Pegih, heg ach hekaj chum hekid ab t-hoꞌigeꞌidahun Jiosh wui am em-wehhejed. Ab at i em-wai mamt wo e doꞌibia k d wo aꞌaligajk. M hab hahawa s-junimk g s-apꞌekam ab s-wohochudch. Kuch ab tahni g Jiosh mat am e-tatchui oidk hab wo em-juh k hab s-ap hab wo em-elidad. Jiosh o gewkdag mat hab wo juh ihda mach ab tahni.
Kumt ab wo si haꞌichuchudad g t-kownalig Jesus. T heg hab waꞌap ab wo si em-haꞌichuchudad. Jiosh at si s-hemajim am i apꞌech g e-alidag wehm mat id hab wo em-juni.
Bach wa em-ahgid mat ep wo jiwia g t-kownalig Jesus Christ k ab e wui wo i t-ui.
Kush am hema em-ahgid mat heki hu hab e juh. Pi g am wo shaꞌi e kudut k pi shaꞌi ha wohochud, chum as hems hab wabsh e wua mo heg am ha tashogid g Jiosh o atp hems em-ahgid matt ahchim hab masma haꞌichu oꞌoha.
Koi at e ai. Hemho wa at wehpeg am hab wo e juh mat muꞌi ab wui wo gegokiwua g Jiosh hegam mo hab chum kaij mo ab s-wohochud. T am hahawa hema wo i wuhsh g oꞌodham k wehs ha baꞌiwechkim d wo pi apꞌekamk ch d wo si obgajk g Jiosh ch am wo i wah geꞌe cheopi ch ed am Jerusalem t am k am wo dahiwua mat g hemajkam ab wo jiosht. Kut pi wo ha hiwigi mas haꞌichu ep wo jioshgak. T g Jiosh s-koꞌokam wo namkidad chum hekid.
<range>
Am am wa s-chegito mani wa am wa heki hu em-ahgid ihda mani eda am em-wehmaj.
S-mahch am mo g pi apꞌekam an e shohbidch hemu. T wabshaba has tash in hu hab wo i e juh hegai mo an shohbidch.
<range>
T am haha wo i wuhsh hegai si pi apꞌekam oꞌodham. T g jijawul ha-geꞌejig Satan ab wo mah g gewkdag. Kut hab wo juh g nahnko mahs s-hasig haꞌichu ch s-ta neidamam haꞌichu mat wo ha iattogi g hemajkam. Kut hegam ab wo i s-wohoch mo hedai d pi e doꞌibiakam. Jiosh at hab wo ha juh mat wabsh g haꞌichu iattogi ab wo s-wohoch no pi idam s-hohhoꞌid g pi apꞌekam ch pi ab hu wo bei g wohokam mat hekaj wo chum e doꞌibia. T am haha wo jiwia g t-kownalig Jesus k si s-masma ab wo e chehgid k ab ab wo ihbhe hegai si pi ap oꞌodham k hekaj wo muꞌa k gam hu wo si i daꞌich mamt hebai wo ha nehnich g jijawul.
<range>
<range>
<range>
T hegam mo e iattogid ch ab s-wohochud hab waꞌap ab wo bei g s-koꞌok e-namkidadag.
Mt wabshaba ahpim wo e doꞌibia ab amjed g s-koꞌok e-namkidadag. Si o pihk e elid g t-kownalig Jesus Christ em-hekaj. Kumt am wehmaj ab wo e haꞌichuchudad. Gd hu i si wehpeg at am i apꞌech g Jiosh mat g Hekia S-apꞌekam Gewkdag ab wo i em-gawulkai wehhejed. Kumt ab i s-wohoch ihda s-kehg haꞌichu ahgaj mach wa am em-ahgid. Id ach hekaj ab i hoꞌigeꞌid g Jiosh.
<range>
Pegih, am ach wa em-mashcham ihda wohokam ch am ep em-oꞌohanid ab amjed. Kumt s-wihnam wo gegokkad ch an wo uꞌukchid.
Ab o t-wui si pihk e elid g t-kownalig Jesus Christ g Jiosh t-ohg wehm ch ab si s-t-hoꞌigeꞌel. Kuch heg hekaj ab wui t-gewpkadch.
Ahchim ach ab tahni mat ab wo i em-gewpkadch mamt g s-apꞌekam am hab wo junihid ch hab wo kaijjid.
Ab g wo e hoꞌigeꞌidahun, t-wepnag, k ab wo tai g Jiosh mat pi ab hu wo e shohbi g haꞌichu t-ahga ab amjed t-kownalig Jesus. T muꞌijj ab wo si has i elid k ab wo s-wohog el hab masma mo am hab e wua em-shahgid.
Pi ap hehemajkam o pi ab hu wohochud g Jiosh haꞌichu ahga ch ab t-wui gegok. Kumt am wo si e hoꞌigeꞌidahunad mat wo t-doꞌibia g Jiosh ab ha amjed.
Jiosh at hemho wa am hab wo juh mo haschu i t-ahgid. S-mahch ach mat ab wo i em-mah g gewkdag k wo em-nuhkud mat pi wo em-gehg g Jiawul.
Dam t-wehm wohochuddam. Kuch heg hekaj hab em-elid mam am hab junihim hegai mach ab i em-mashcham ch am hab wabsh wo i junihid.
Ch ab i tahni g t-kownalig Jesus mat hab wo em-juh mamt baꞌich wo i mai g Jiosh pihk elidadag k wo s-chu nakogad hab masma mo hab masma g Jesus Christ.
Heki ach hu em-mashcham mamt wo s-wapagimak. K eda haꞌi hegam mo d wohochuddam s-papadma ch pi am hu oidch hab e junihim g t-mashchama. Ch ab em-chehani g t-kownalig Jesus Christ gewkdagkaj mamt pi am hu wo ha wehmajk.
Am am wa t-neid mach wa pi shaꞌi papadma mach wa am em-wehmajkahim. Kum am wa s-mahch mamt am chum t-oidk hab wo wa masmak.
Si ach wa chikpan chum hems s-chuhugam k ed matt am wo wa haꞌichu ha namkidad hegam mach hedai i kih am dadha mamt pi haꞌichu wo heki gei t-wehhejed.
Bo hi wa chum mahs mach apꞌedag mamt ab haꞌichu wo i t-namkid nach pi d Jiosh pionag em-wehhejed. Ch wa wabshaba hejel t-dagioꞌid matt am wo em-chehgi mamt has wo chum masmak.
Bach wa em-ahgid mach eda am em-wehmaj mamt pi wo ha gegos hegam mo pi tatchua mat wo chikpanad.
Kah ach mo am em-shahgid haꞌi s-papadma ch pi chikpan ch wabsh himchud g has ahgadag.
Ch ab si ha chehani g t-kownalig Jesus Christ gewkdagkaj ch ab ha gewkemhun mat am wabsh wo i e bahbgi k wo chikpanad ch hekaj wo e dagioꞌidad.
Kumt ahpim mam wabsh s-ap am hab e junihim am hab wabsh wo i junihid g s-apꞌekam ch pi wo dagito
ch wabshaba wabsh wo dagito hegai matp hedai pi ab hu wo wohog elidad ihda mani ia em-chehani. Tp hems ab wo wa bei g si edadag k am wo i e apꞌech.
Am g wo s-chegitok mo pi d em-obga ch wabshaba d em-wepnag mamt ab wo shohbidad haꞌichukaj.
Chum at hekid am wo em-wehmajk g t-kownalig Jesus. Kuch ab tahni mat chum hekid baꞌich ab wo i em-mahkad g s-ap tahhadkam.
Ahni Paul ant ia hahawa si hejel haꞌichu wo oꞌoha hab masma mani hab wa wua an wehs ni-oꞌohana ed. Mt hab masma wo s-mahchk mani d ahni.
Neh, ab at wo baꞌich i s-em-hoꞌigeꞌel g t-kownalig Jesus Christ.
Ni-wehnag Timothy: Ia ant haꞌichu wo i m-oꞌohani ahni Paul mani d kehshaj g Jesus Christ. Jiosh at ni-cheha mant wo i ahgahi ab amjed g alidaj Jesus Christ. T hab ab wo hiwgad g hemajkam mat heg am wo ha uꞌapa Jiosh kihdag wui.
Ab g ni-kaiham ahpi Timothy map d ni-alidag ab i s-wohochudk g haꞌichu ni-ahga ab amjed g Jesus Christ. Ab o wa si s-m-hoꞌigeꞌid g t-ohg Jiosh g t-kownalig Jesus Christ wehm ch ab wo wa baꞌich i m-mahkad g i wehmtadag ch s-ap tahhadkam.
Ab ani wa si s-ap m-ahgid mapt am wo wih Ephesus t am mani wa am him gam hu wo himk Macedonia wui. Am g wabsh i dakad ch am wo si ha keshwua hegam mo g iattogi chum ha mashcham.
Idam o chum ha mashcham mo g hohoꞌoki aꞌagida ab wehnags g Jiosh haꞌichu ahga ch ep chum ha mashcham mat hemho wa wo s-chegitok g e-shohshonbad ha-chechgig. T wabshaba ihda ha-mashchama hab wo ha juh mat wo dagito g Jiosh hab elida k ab wabsh aꞌai wo e neꞌowinad. Bat waꞌi masma wo s-mahchk g Jiosh hab elida mat ab wo i s-wohoch g haꞌichu ahgaj.
Pt wo ha ahgi mat woho ab wo s-wohochudad g Jiosh haꞌichu ahga ch heg hab wo waꞌi junihid mo haschu s-mahch mo d s-apꞌekam ch hab pi wo e kudutad. Id at hab wo ha juh mat wo i geꞌeda g ha-tatchuidag.
Haꞌi at dagito g e-wohochudadag k hekaj wabsh ha wehm e neꞌowin.
Idam o hab chum e elid mo d chehanig ha mashchamdam ch wabshaba pi amichud g Jiosh haꞌichu ahga chum as hab e elid mo s-e mahchk ch neneok.
S-apꞌe o g chehanig. K wabshaba idam pi ap hekaj am chum ha shohbidch hegam mo hab wua g s-apꞌekam. K eda g chehanig chum e hekaj mat wo ha shohbi hegam mo g pi apꞌekam hab wua. Idam o pi ab hu has elid g Jiosh ch pi ab hu wohog elid. Haꞌijj o s-ha muꞌamk chum hems g e-ohg o g e-jeꞌe.
<range>
Haꞌijj o g s-totontom haꞌichu chegitok ch chum hems chum e uꞌuwichud o e chechojchud ch e wehm hab junihim g s-uam haꞌichu. Haꞌijj o ha lilsochud wabsh hejel e wehhejed ch ha iattogid ch ab haꞌichu ha abchud g s-apꞌekam oꞌodham. Nahnko masma o ab wui gegok g mashchamaj g Jiosh hegam mo chum ha mashcham g iattogi.
Jiosh o ni-nuhkudachud ihda s-kehg haꞌichu e-ahga. K heg am t-tashogid ihda mant em-ahgi.
T-kownalig Jesus oki hab ni-elid mant s-ap am hab wo junihid ihda chickpan nat pi am i ni-kehsh k ab ni-mahkch g gewdag wehhejed. Kuni heg hekaj ab si hoꞌigeꞌid.
Heki anid hu wa ha shoꞌigchud hegam mo ab s-wohochud g Jesus ch ab ha wui pi ap has ahg g Jesus. Kut eda heg ab si i s-ni-hoꞌigeꞌel nani pi pi ni-mahch ch hab junihim pi ab hu wohochudch.
Si at s-hemajim ab ni-wui i e tashogi. Nt hab ab i s-wohochud k ab i ni-hemakoj wehmaj k ab wui a pihk ni-elid.
Neh, hema hab cheꞌidag o hab chuꞌig, “Ia at jiwia g t-kownalig Jesus jewed dahm mat wo ha doꞌibia g pi ap chuꞌijkam.” K id d si wohokam nat pi ab si s-ni-hoꞌigeꞌel. Ni eda shahag wepo mani wa wehs ha baꞌiwechkim d si pi ap chuꞌijkam mani wa cheggia g t-doꞌibiakam Jesus ha shoꞌigchudch hegam mo ab s-wohochud. T heg ab wabsh ni-bahbgi mat wehs am wo ha chehgi g hemajkam mat ab wabsh wo ha bahbgi. Tp hems hab waꞌap ab wo i s-wohochud k ab wo bei g pi ha huhugedam doakag.
<range>
Neh, wehs haꞌichu dahm o d kownal g Jiosh ch pi ta neidagma ch pi hekid im hu hab wo i e juh. Kutt ab wo si uhgk i ulin k ab wo hehgchulidad chum hekid. Neh, woho o wa ihda.
Pegih, ni wehnag, Timothy, heki o hu am i t-tashogid g Jiosh maptki am hab wo junihid ihda chikpan. Kuni ab ep i m-gewkemhun mapt hab wo wa junihid. Hegai Jiosh haꞌichu ahga ab m-wui at hab wo masmak mo g s-kehg cheggiakud. Pt hekaj ab wui kehkkad g ge Jiawul.
An g si uꞌukchid g e-wohochudadag ch heg hab wo waꞌi junihid map haschu s-mahch mo d s-apꞌekam. Haꞌijj oki pi hab masma ch hekaj padch g e-wohochudadag.
Hymanaeus ch Alexander oki haꞌi hegam ch pi ap has ahg g Jiosh. Nt gam hu i ha dagito ge Jiawul wui mat wo e shoꞌigchud k atp hems wo dagito g pi ap e-chuꞌijig.
Si ani s-m-ahgidamk mapt wo haꞌichu ha ahgi g t-wehm wohochuddam. Do si haꞌichu mat ab wo e hoꞌigeꞌidahunad Jiosh wui. Pt wo ha ahgi mat ab wo tahnid g i wehmtadag ch wo e hoꞌigeꞌidahunad am ha wehhejed g wehs nahnko mahs hemajkam.
K hab ep mahs mat wo e hoꞌigeꞌidahunad am ha wehhejed g kokownal ch uꞌusagakam mat idam s-ap hab wo junihid g e-chikpan. Kutt hab s-dodolim wo kihdagk ch wo s-ap t-tahtkkad.
Neh, id at wo hohhoꞌidach g Jiosh no pi d t-doꞌibiakam
ch tatchua mat wehs nahnko mahs hemajkam wo e doꞌibia k wo s-mai g wohokam ab amjed.
Do waꞌi hemako g t-ohg Jiosh. K hab waꞌap d waꞌi hemako g si Kehshaj ch d Jesus Christ ch d waꞌi hegai mat i t-hemakoch g Jiosh wehm. Jesus Christ at t-wepo e juh mat d wo oꞌodhamk
ch ab wo bei g s-koꞌok t-namkidadag k hab wo t-doꞌibia. Id o am t-chehgidch mo wehs hemajkam s-ha doꞌibiamk g Jiosh.
Kut heg hekaj am i ni-kei mant wo i ahgahi ab amjed g alidaj k wo ha mashcha g gawul mahs hemajkam g wohokam. S-mahch ap wehs ihda.
Bant wo chei mat wahm g chechoj ab wo e hoꞌigeꞌidahunad Jiosh wui ch atp hems am wo uhgk uhꞌul e-nohnhoi. S-ap at haꞌichu hab wo elidad ch pi wo shaꞌi s-bagak ab hedai i wui.
Kunt hab ep wo chei mat g uꞌuwi wabsh s-ap ab wo e enigadadch ch ep s-ap hab wo juhkchid g e-moꞌo mat pi heg hekaj wo chum si e hahaschudad.
Ab o ha ab mat chum hekid am hab wo junihid g s-apꞌekam ch heg amjed wo e chehgidch mo d wohochuddam.
Ab o d ep ha-wuikam mat wabsh s-bahbagi ch s-dodolim ab wo kaiham k wo mahchid g Jiosh himdag.
Ahni ani pi shaꞌi ha hiwgid g uꞌuwi mas wo ha mashcha g chechoj o am ha dahm wo e uhꞌulinchid.
Ab o ha ab g chechoj mat am wo i ha wanim g hemajkam id eda himdag. Jiosh at wehpeg nahto g cheoj k am haha wabsh oidk nahto g uwi. Idam ash wa hab chechgig Adam ch Eve.
Kush pi d Adambad mat e iattogi. Hegai uwi atsh e iattogid k melchkwua g Jiosh chehanig.
T g Jiosh heg hekaj ab ha mah g uꞌuwi mat wo e shoꞌigch hekid am i ha mamsijid g aꞌal. T wabshaba ab ha amjed wo mahsi g t-doꞌibiakam. Kut wo e doꞌibia matp ab wo s-wohochudad g Jiosh ch wo si pihk e elidad wehs ha hekaj ch wo s-apꞌek ch wo s-e neimakad.
Tatchua o g si s-kehg chickpan hegam matp hedai s-ha wanimelimk g wohochuddam. Neh, id o d hab ha cheꞌidag ch d wohokam.
Kunt am wo i em-chegitoch mat has wo chum masmak hegam mo hab s-e junimk. S-ap at d wo oꞌodhamk. T hab pi hedai wo e nako mas ab wo haꞌichu ha abch. Hemako at wo waꞌi hohnigk ch wo si s-e tahtkk wehs haꞌichu k ed ch wo si s-ap hejel e nuhkudad ch s-ap haꞌichu am hab wo junihid ch wo s-chechojimak hegam ha wui matp hedai am wo ha chehgio ha-kihki am. Ab o ha ab mat wo s-mahchk mat has masma wo ha mashcha.
Pi o hab chuꞌig mas wo nawkkoꞌod o s-hohtam wo babgatad o wo ha kawnid o heg waꞌi lial ab wo si tatchuad.
S-hemajim at am wo ha dahmk g e-wehm kihkam. T g aꞌaligaj ab wo wechok ch ab wo si has elidad.
Pi at has masma wo s-ap i ha wanim g e-wehm wohochuddam matp pi ap wo ha wanim g e-wehm kihkam.
Pi at d wo hema hegamk mat hemuch ab i s-wohoch g Jiosh haꞌichu ahga nat pi am hu wo chum si e haschudad ch wo i gei hab masma matsh wa g ge Jiawul hab e juh.
Heg amt am wo i kei mo chum hems g pi wohochuddam ab si has elid. T hab pi hedai ab hu haꞌichu wo chuꞌijigch mas heg hekaj wo i wua g ge Jiawul.
T hab waꞌap s-ap d wo oꞌOdhamk hegam mo am i ha wehmaj g ha wanimeddam. Pt wo ha ahgi mat pi wo chu iattomk ch pi wo nawkkoꞌod ch pi heg waꞌi lial ab wo tatchuad.
Do si haꞌichu mat am wo si wehs s-ap oidad g Jiosh haꞌichu ahga ch heg hab wo waꞌi junihid mo haschu s-mahch mo d s-apꞌekam.
Wehpeg amt am wo i ha mamche k am haha wo i ha chuhcha matp s-ap am hab wo masmak.
Uꞌuwi chikpandam at hab waꞌap s-ap d wo uꞌuwik ch pi wo chu ahgamk ch pi wo nawkkoꞌod ch pi wo chu iattomk.
Idam i ha-wehmtdam at hehemako wo wehm kihkamk ch hab waꞌap s-ap wo ha dahmk g e-aꞌaliga ch s-ap wo himad g e-kihdag.
Hegam mat s-ap hab wo juh g e-chikpan at pi wo has e elid k si s-gewkam am hab wo junihid. Kumt ab wo si has ha elidad.
Bani chum ni-tahtk mant s-hohtam am wo i m-chehgim. Tp wabshaba hems pi wo ni-apꞌet. Kunt heg hekaj am wo haꞌichu i m-oꞌohani. Kumt id ab wo s-mahchk mamt has masma hab wo e junihid mamt s-ap wo himchudad g Jiosh himdag. Dam Jiosh hemajkamga ch d nuhkuddam g wohokam.
<range>
Pi o wa ta machima matt has masma wo s-apꞌekamk am Jiosh tahgio. T wabshaba id am i t-tashogi g Jiosh. K d wohokam ihda mo an hab chuꞌig neꞌi ed: T-wepo at hab e juh g Jiosh alidag k an e mahsid. T g Hekia S-apꞌekam Gewkdag am wohokamch mo d s-apꞌekam. S-ta neidamam at hab e juh, chum hems g anghil ha wehhejed. S-kehg haꞌichu ahga ab amjed o an e ahgahim nahnko mahs hemajkam ha wui. T muꞌi hemajkam ab s-wohoch. Kut am uhpam ep i bei g Jiosh dahm kahchim wui. Neh, pi at hedai wo shaꞌi e nako mas wo pi wohokamch ihda wohokam.
Si o tasho am i ni-tashogid g Hekia S-apꞌekam Gewkdag mat ab wo i e ai g tash mat muꞌi wo dagito g e-wohochudadag. Haꞌi at wo ha mashcha g iattogi nat pi g jijawul wo i ha wahmud. T muꞌi hemajkam ab wo ha wohog el.
Hegam mat chum hekid wo ha iattogidad at pi wo shaꞌi e kudutad heg hekaj nat pi ged hu wabsh wo i ha apꞌet.
Idam o ha mashcham mo d pi apꞌekam mat wo e hohont ch ep pi ha hiwgid mas wo koꞌad g has mahs haꞌichu hugi. K eda wehs ihda d Jiosh nahtoi ch am wa s-apꞌe am t-wehhejed. Ahchim mach s-mahch g wohokam att hekaj ab wo hoꞌigeꞌel g Jiosh k ab wo ui g nahtoij.
Jiosh at wehs haꞌichu nahto. K wehs s-kehgaj. Tt hekaj ab wo i hoꞌigeꞌid k ab wo ui.
Bo kaij g Jiosh mat g hoꞌigeꞌidahuna am wo i apꞌech nenaj ed.
Dapt wo s-apꞌekam piongajk g Jesus Christ maptp am wo i ha ahgi g t-wehm wohochuddam ihda haꞌichu mashchama. Kupt an wabsh s-ap wo uꞌukchid g e-wohochudadag ch wehs haꞌichu mashchama ab amjed map hab hi wa masma hab e wua.
Pi g am hab masma hekaj g hohoꞌoki aꞌagida mas d Jiosh haꞌichu ahga. Pi at hab wo em-juh mamt wo s-aꞌapꞌek am Jiosh nena ed. Am apt wo si e mashchamad mapt am hab wo junihid s-apꞌekam himdag.
S-apꞌe mapt wo e momoisha k wo s-gewkk. K wabshaba ab him g tash mat wo huhug ihda. K heg hekai baꞌich i s-apꞌe mapt wo i e gewkai am e-wohochudadag ed. Id o ab m-mahkch g s-apꞌekam doakag idani ch imhab i baꞌich.
Do si wohokam ihda haꞌichu ahga. K hab chuꞌig mat wehs ab wo i chum s-e wohoch.
Jiosh at wehs wo ha doꞌibia hegam mat ab wo i s-wohoch g haꞌichu ahgaj k am wo i e gewpkai wui. Kuch ab s-wohochud ch heg hekaj am si t-nakog ch muꞌi haꞌichu ab nakog matt wo ha ahgi hemajkam ab amjed ihda.
Am g i ha mashcham ihda mani m-ahgid k ab i ha chehani mat am hab wo junihid.
Bapt masma s-ap hab wo e junihid ch s-ap wo neokad. T pi hedai pad has wo m-elidad map d wabsh wechij hemajkam. Ab g si pihk e elidad wehs ha wui ch wo si e nuhkudad ch pi hab wo junihid g pi apꞌekam. T hab wo e chehgidahid g em-wohochudadag.
Am g i e nakog mapt am wo wa neꞌokchulidad g Jiosh haꞌichu ahga am ha-namki ed ch wo ha mashchamad ch am wo i ha gewkemhunad.
Neh, ha wanimeddam at was e hoꞌigeꞌidahu m-wehhejed k ab m-taht. T wa hegam mo d Jiosh haꞌichu i tashogiddam am ah mat has mahs chikpan ab m-mah g Jiosh. Pegih, am g i e nakogad ch heg am hab wo junihid.
T hab ab wo i e gewkemhunad g wohochuddam an m-neidch.
Si g s-e nenꞌoid map has e junihim ch haschu ha mashcham k hekaj pi wabsh wo heki wua g e-doakag. T hegam mat ab wo m-kaiha hab waꞌap pi wo heki wua g e-dodakag.
Pi g ab wabsh si chehmod g keli oꞌodham k wabshaba ab wabsh wo s-ap haꞌichu kakke hab masma mapt g hejel e-ohg hab chum masma hab wo juhkchid. Wechij oꞌodham apt hab masma ab wo ha neidad mo d m-wepnag.
ch g oꞌoki hab masma map g e-jeꞌe ch g wechij uꞌuwi hab masma mo d m-uꞌuwiga. Pt wabsh si s-ap wo ha chegitokad.
Am g ha ahgid hegam mo am hemiap e mihshmad mat wo ha nuhkud hegam mo d si heheꞌejel wiꞌikam uꞌuwi.
K wabshaba pi ab hu ha ab mas wo ha nuhkud hegam mo ge aꞌaliga. Idam ha-aꞌaliga at wo chum ha nuhkud nat pi ha geꞌegel. K d Jiosh tatchui mat aigo epai wo i ha wehmtad,
Hegam mo woho d si heheꞌejel wihpkam o heg ab waꞌi hiwig Jiosh ch chum hekid ab tahni g i wehmtadag. Idam amt wo ha nuhkudad
ch wabshaba wabsh wo ha dagito hegam mo wabsh e gahgid g s-tahhadkam.
Neh, pt wo ha ahgi hegam mo e wehm mihshmad mat hab wo juh ihda mani m-ahgid. T hab pi hedai has wo ha ahgad.
Hegam mat pi wo ha nuhkud g e-hajuni o baꞌich d i pi apꞌekam mo g mischini.
Pi at an hu wo ha ui g wechij uꞌuwi mat wo ha nuhkud. Hegam mat wo i ha wehmtad at wo aisk g chuhdpo wehst-mahm aꞌahidag ch d wo hegamk mo s-ap e nuhkudahim g e-kunbad wehhejed
ch s-ap ha geꞌegel g aꞌal ch s-ap ha nuhkud g Jiosh wohochuddam ch wehsko s-e mahch mo haꞌichukaj i ha wehmt hegam mo tatchua g i wehmtadag, chum as hems pi d wo ha-machigak.
Wechij uꞌuwi atp hems ep wo s-kuhkuntam mo eda hab chum kaij mat pi hab wo e juh k wabsh wo chikpani g Jiosh, neh, k hab masma wo e chuꞌijigchud k gam hu hab wo i e juh ab amjed g Christ.
<range>
Haꞌi atp hems wabsh wo s-e papadmakamch an oiopodch ha-kihki oidch, wahm baꞌich i pi apꞌe mat wo mai g has ahgadag k an wo gantanad g pi kehg haꞌichu ahga.
Haꞌi at heki hu hab masma hab e juh k am i oi g Jiawul. Id o hekaj baꞌich i a-apꞌe mat g wechij uꞌuwi ep wo kuhkunt k wo mahmadt k wo s-ap dagioꞌi g e-kihdag. T heg hekaj g t-obga pi wo e nako mas wo pi ap has t-ahgad.
<range>
Am g ha ahgid g uꞌuwi mat wo i ha dagioꞌi g heheꞌejel wihpkam e-hajuni k pi ab hu hedai wo mohtoꞌi. Hegam mo am hemiap e mihshmad at hegam wo waꞌi ha dagioꞌi mo d si heheꞌejel wihpkam
Am g wehs ha ahgid mat ab wo si has i ha elidad hegam mo d kekel em-wanimeddam ch s-ap am hab junihim g e-chikpan, wahm hegam mo si chikpan ch hab junihim g mashchama ch mihshmda.
An o oꞌohanas Jiosh heki hu oꞌohana ed: Pi g an hu wo bishdad g woiwis chini mat wo kehimunad g haꞌichu em-bahidag. T am wo wa ha kamshshapad g haꞌichu em-bahidag. K hab d ahga ihda mamt hab waꞌap wo ha namkidad hegam mo hab junihim g chickpan, chum hems g Jiosh pionag.
Pi g ab hu kaiham g haꞌichu abchuda ab hema i ha ab idam kekel, heg hi wa mat gohk o waik hab wo chei mo si s‑ap s‑mahch haꞌichu ab ha amjed, mt am haha wo i mamche.
Am apt hemajkam ha kailid k wo si s‑ha kehꞌel hegam mat hedam pi gam hu wo dagito g pi apꞌekam. T hab masma wo s‑e gihugad haꞌi ehp.
Am g wehs wepo masma hab ha juhni idam mani m‑shelinid k pi hedai shaꞌi gam hu wo i gawulkai. Id ani si s‑bahbagi ab m‑chehani am ha tahgio g Jiosh ch Jesus ch am ha tahgio g hekia s‑apꞌekam anghil.
Pi g am wabsh si s‑e hohtkid mapt am wo hema i kei mat wo chikpani g Jiosh. Tp hems d pi ap chuꞌijkam. Kut d wo m‑chuꞌijig mapt s‑hohtam am i kei.
Haꞌi o g pi ap ha‑chuꞌijig am tasho e neid. Kum s‑ap s‑mahch ch pi woho am hu wo i ha chuhcha idam. K wabshaba haꞌijj pi am hu tasho e neid g ha‑chuꞌijig. Mt heg hekaj am wo si i ha mamche mamt hedai am wo i ha chuhcha. (25) K hab wa masma g s‑kehg ha‑chikpan am tasho e neid. Chum as hi wa pi am hu i si tasho ch wabshaba pi wo ehsto g s‑kehg ha‑chikpan imhab i baꞌich. (23) Neh, s‑e g nenꞌoidk, Timothy. Pi o kehgaj g shuhdagi amai. Kupt am wo shaꞌal wehnad g nawait. T hab pi wo m‑mumkichudad hegai shuhdagi.
<range>
<range>
Hegam wohochuddam mo d nenehol at ab wo si has ha elidad g e‑aꞌamo. T heg hekaj pi hedai wo has ahgad g Jiosh ch pi wo has ahgad g t‑mashchama.
Hegam mo g ha‑aꞌamo hab waꞌap d wohochuddam at baꞌich ab wo i si has ha elidad ch baꞌich i s‑ap wo ha chikpani nat pi g ha‑chikpan d wo ha‑apꞌedagk g ha‑wehm wohochuddam. Id apt hemho wa wo i ha mashcham k hekaj wo ha mihshmad mani wa m‑ahgid.
Ho o wabsh chum si e hahaschud ch d wabsh pi haꞌichu mahchim hegam mat hedai i pi heg hekaj wo ha mashcha t‑kownalig Jesus Christ mashchama. Heg o d wohokam t‑mashchama ch am t‑tashogid g s‑apꞌekam himdag. K idam wabsh tatchua mat wo ha neꞌowinad ch wo ha kawnid. Id o wabsh i wahmud g hehgamdag ch bagatalig ch pi ap has ahgadag.
<range>
Kut hegam wo ha kawhainad matp hedam pi ap haꞌichu chegito ch pi mahch g wohokam ch hab chum elid mat g oꞌodham wo s‑e kaisch id hekaj t‑himdag.
K wabshaba id d s‑wohokam s‑t‑kaisdag matt wo himad g s‑apꞌekam ch wo si s‑ap t‑tahtkkad, chum achs pi haꞌichu wo edgidad.
Pi ach haꞌichu shaꞌi uꞌad ch in mahsi id dahm jewed ch pi haꞌichu shaꞌi be k wo hih.
Heg o am wa chum s‑apꞌe am t‑wehhejed matt ab wo wa al heꞌes haꞌichu koꞌad ch ab s‑ap wo t‑enigadadch.
Hegam mo s‑e kaischudamk at heg hekaj hab wo s‑junim g pi apꞌekam. T g ha‑tatchui gam hu hab wo i ha juh ab amjed g Jiosh. Kut haꞌi ep wo ha padch.
Nahnko mahs pi apꞌekam o ab shohshon heg amjed mat hema heg waꞌi lialkaj wo si pihk e elidad. Haꞌi at heg hekaj im hu hab i e juh ab amjed g e‑wohochudadag k oi wa muꞌi haꞌichu pi ap tahhadkam ab nako.
Pi g hab masma hab e juhni mo hegam mani am ha ahg nap pi d Jiosh chikpandamga. Id apt eda am wo i e nako s‑apꞌekam ch e‑wohochudadag ch pihk elidadag ch haꞌichu nakogadag ch hemajimatalig mapt wo wepo chuꞌigk mo g Jiosh.
Am g si e gewkad wehhejed g Jiosh k wo s‑wihnam uꞌukchid g e‑wohochudadag mapt hekaj am wo i wah Jiosh kihdag ed hab masma mat g s‑melidkam hab wo e juh mat wo ha gehg. Id at hekaj ab i m‑bei g Jiosh mapt wa am si s‑kehg ah g e‑wohochudadag am muꞌi hemajkam ha kaichudk.
Bapt wabsh masma hab wo e juh matsh wa g t‑kownalig Jesus natsh pi heg s‑ap ah g wohokam am tahgio hegai geꞌe kownal mo hab chehgig Pontius Pilate. Kupt wehs am hab wo juh ihda mani m‑ahgid k ab wo ai mat ab ep wo i hih g Jesus. T hab pi hedai ab hu haꞌichu wo m‑chuꞌijigch. Id ani ab si m‑chehani am tahgio g Jesus ch am tahgio g Jiosh. Jiosh o ab ha mahkch g doakag wehs haꞌichu dodakam ch ab ep wo i m‑wehmt mapt hab wo juh g ni‑chehanig.
<range>
Jesus at ia ep wo i e chehgi heg i tash ed mo kehshch g Jiosh. Jiosh o si s‑hemajima ch wehs haꞌichu nuhkud ch d kownal wehs ha dahm g kokownal.
ch pi hekid ha mumkku. Pi o hedai neid ch pi hedai wo e nako mas wo nei. An o haꞌichug hab mahs tonlig ch ed mat pi hedai wo e nako mas ab wo miabi. Pi at hekid wo huhug g gewkdaj. Kutt ab wo si has elidad chum hekid. Neh, bo masma.
Ab g i ha chehani hegam mo d s‑kakais mat pi wo si e hahaschudad heg hekaj haꞌichu e‑eniga ch pi ab hu wo hiwgad ch wabshaba ab wo hiwgad g Jiosh. Heg o wud mo s‑baꞌama ab t‑mahk wehs haꞌichu mach haschu i hekaj s‑ap t‑tahtk.
Ab g i ha chehani mat am hab wo i junihi g s‑kehg chikpan ha wehhejed hegam mo tatchua g i wehmta k pi wo chu daꞌad ch wo haꞌichu ha hoꞌidad g shoꞌigkam. Id o d woho s‑kaisdag.
Bo masma heg wa wepo mo e toꞌidahim g s‑namkig haꞌichu an dahm kahchim ch ed hekaj wo si s‑ap tahtkkad chum hekid.
Si g s‑ap nuhkud hegai mamt ab m‑nuhkudach. Pi g am hu ha wehmajk hegam mo wabsh pehegi e neꞌowin heg hekaj mo hab chum elid mo d haꞌichu mahchig. Id at pi wo shaꞌi i t‑wehmajk matt baꞌich i s‑ap wo s‑mai g Jiosh.
Haꞌi o hab chum e ahg mo edgid ihda mahchig ch oi wa wabsh heb hu wua g e‑wohochudadag. Neh, Jiosh at wo wa s‑m‑hoꞌigeꞌel.
Ni-wehnag Timothy: Ia ant ep wo haꞌichu i m-oꞌohani ahni Paul mani d kehshaj g Jesus Christ. Do Jiosh tatchui mant wo i ahgahi ab amjed g alidaj. T hab wo bei g wechij doakag hegam mat ab wo i s-wohoch ab amjed g alidaj hab masma mash wa heki hu hab kaij matsh hab wo e juh.
Ab g ni-kaiham ahpi map d ni-alidag t-wohochudadag ed. Ab o wa si s-m-hoꞌigeꞌid g t-ohg Jiosh g t-kownalig Jesus Christ wehm ch ab wo wa baꞌich i m-mahkad g i wehmtadag ch s-ap tahhadkam.
Chum ani hekid ab si hoꞌigeꞌid g Jiosh mani hekid i ni-hoꞌigeꞌidahun m-wehhejed. Jiosh ash wa am ha tashogid g t-shohshon matt has masma wo himad g t-doakag ch ab wo si has elidad. Kuni hab masma hab ni-wua ch hab pi shaꞌi ni-kudut.
P ahpi hab waꞌap ab s-wohochud g s-kehg haꞌichu ahgaj g Jiosh. Kuni s-chegito mapt si pi ap e taht mant hekid am i m-dagito. Kuni s-m-neidamk mapt ep wo si s-hehgigk.
Am apt ha oidk hab e juh g e-huꞌul Lois ch e-jeꞌe Eunice mapt ab i s-wohoch g Jiosh haꞌichu ahga.
Pt wo s-chegito matt ab toa g t-nohnhoi m-ab k am m-wehhejed t-hoꞌigeꞌidahu. T g Jiosh ab m-mah g gewkdag k am m-chehgi mapt has i mahs chikpan hab wo junihid wehhejed. Pegih, pt wo i e gewkad k am hab wo junihid.
Jiosh at ab t-mah g Hekia S-apꞌekam Gewkdag mat an wo t-uꞌukchid ch ab wo t-mahkchid g gewkdag ch pihk elidadag ch dodolimadag ahchim mach d hemajkamgaj. Kutt heg hekaj pi haꞌichu wo shaꞌi ehbidad.
Pegih, pt pi has wo e elidad am wehhejed neokch g t-kownalig Jesus ch hab wa masma pi has wo e elidad ab ni-amjed mani wehhejed d lihso. Ab o t-mahkch g Jiosh g gewkdag matt am wehhejed wo t-shoꞌigch. Kupt wo si nako g e-shoꞌigdag am ahgachugch g s-kehg haꞌichu ahgaj.
Do Jiosh mat t-doꞌibia ab pi apꞌekam t amjed. Pi att has masma has wo t-juh k wo t-doꞌibia. Gd hu i si wehpeg at am i apꞌech mat wo s-t-hoꞌigeꞌel am gahi wuhshanim g e-alidag Jesus Christ matt d wo Jiosh hemajkamgak.
Ia at jiwia g t-doꞌibiakam Jesus Christ k am i t-tashogi g Jiosh hoꞌigeꞌidadag. Kah att g s-kehg haꞌichu ahgaj k s-mai matt has masma s-ap am wo gahi wuwha g muhkig edgidch g pi ha huhugedam doakag.
Jiosh at am i ni-kei mant wo ahgachugad g s-kehg haꞌichu ahgaj ch wo ha mashchamad.
Kuni heg hekaj hab muꞌi ni-shoꞌigchud ch pi shaꞌi has ni-elid id amjed nani pi s-mahch hegai mani ab s-wohochud. T heg wo e nako mat s-ap wo ni-nuhkudad mant wehs am hab wo juh mat haschu wehhejed ab i ni-gawulkai k ab wo ai mat ep wo jiwia.
Ab ani m-mashcham mo has chuꞌig g Jiosh haꞌichu ahga. Kupt heg wo waꞌi ahgahid nap pi heg s-wohochud ch ab si tatchua g Christ ch d hemako heg wehm.
Am o t-eda g Hekia S-apꞌekam Gewkdag ch ab t-mahkch g gewkdag. Kutt hekaj am wo si s-ap nuhkud g s-kehg haꞌichu ahgaj g Jiosh.
Am ap wa s-mahch mat ia wabsh i ni-dagito hegam mo ab Asia t amjed ia ni-wehmajkahim, chum wa g Phygelus ch Hermogenes.
K wabshaba g Onesiphorus pi has e elid mani d lihso ch an i ni-gahghi ia jiwiak Rome kihhim t am am hugkam mat ni-cheh k muꞌikko ia i ni-chehgimed k ab ni-mamka g s-ap tahhadkam. Kuni ab tahni g Jiosh mat baꞌich ab wo i s-ha hoꞌigeꞌel hegam Onesiphorus.
<range>
Jiosh at wo wa s-hoꞌigeꞌel g Onesiphorus heg i tash ed matt ab wo nam g Jiosh. S-mahch ap mat heꞌes haꞌichu s-ap am hab ni-juni g Onesiphorus amai Ephesus kihhim t am.
Jiosh o si s-hemajim ab t-mahkch g gewkdag ahchim matt ab i t-hemakoch g Jesus Christ wehm. Kuni heg hekaj m-ahgid mapt s-gegokim wo himad g e-chikpan wehhejed.
Muꞌi hemajkam ani ha mihshmad m-kaichudch. Kupt ahpi epai wo ha mashcha hegam mat am wo i e nakog k haꞌijj epai wo ha mashcha ihda.
Neh, bapt masma wo e shoꞌigch mat g shondal am hab junihidch g e-chikpan am wehhejed g Jesus Christ.
S-mahch ap mat g shondal wehs hab wo junihid hegai mat g uhgchugaj ab wo cheha ch pi haꞌichu wo hiwigi mas wo shohbi. Kupt ahpi hab waꞌap wo masmak am wehhejed g Jiosh.
S-mahch ap mat g s-melidkam pi ab hu wo bei g e-gehgewi heg hi wa mat am hab wo junihid g ha-chehanig. Kupt ahpi hab waꞌi masma wo bei g e-gehgewi mapt am Jiosh tatchui oidk hab wo e junihid.
Hegai mo si chikpan g e-esha at wehpeg ab wo ui g e-oda mat wo bai. Kupt ahpi hab waꞌap ab haꞌichu wo i nei am chikpank g Jiosh wehhejed.
Am g i oidahim ihda mani m-ahgid. T g Jiosh am wo i m-wehmt mapt wo s-amich.
Jesus Christ o hab waꞌap d oꞌodham ch ab s-ap nakog g shoꞌigdag. T g Jiosh ab uhpam i wuhshad heg i dahm mat muh. Do ihda s-kehg haꞌichu ahga mani am ahgachug. Kupt am wo oidahid mat haschu ab nako g Christ ch s-ap ab wo nako g e-shoꞌigdag.
Ni ahni hab waꞌap ni-shoꞌigchud am ahgachugch ihda s-kehg haꞌichu ahga hask mam ep ge ni-wulshch g e hukshchim wapainomikaj hab masma mantp d si pi ap hemajkam. K wabshaba g Jiosh neꞌoki pi e wulshch.
Am ani wabsh i ni-dagitokch mantp haschu ab wo i nako ha wehhejed hegam mat g Jiosh am i apꞌech mat wo e doꞌibia. Idam at ab wo i s-wohoch g haꞌichu t-ahga ab amjed g Jesus Christ. T g Jiosh chum hekid ab wo si has ha elidad.
Do si wohokam ihda hab ha-cheꞌi: Chum att hekid d wo dodakamk g Christ wehm mach hedai ab i t-dagitokch wui nat pi t-wehhejed muh.
T heg ab wo t-hiwigi matt wo i wehmt am eda g kownaltaligaj ahchim matt an wo uꞌukchid g t-wohochudadag am t-shoꞌigdag ed. T wabshaba im hu hab wo i e juh ab ha amjed hegam mat wo dagito g e-wohochudadag.
Hemho wa at am hab wo juh mo has i kaij. Kut pi gam hu hab wo i e juh ab t-amjed, heg hi wa mattp wo dagito g t-wohochudadag.
Am g i ha chegitochud ihda mani wa m-ahgid k ab ha shohbid g Jiosh gewkdagkaj mat pi wabsh pehegi wo neneokad ch pi wo e cheggiad. Id at wo ha padch hegam mat wo kaiha.
Am g si i e nakog mapt d wo si s-ap piongajk g Jiosh ch si s-ap am wo ha mashchamad g Jiosh wohokam mapt pi wo shaꞌi si e elidad.
Haꞌi at dagito g wohokam k ha mashcham mat heki hu ab i wuwha g koꞌi muhkig amjed. Gohkajj idam mo id hekaj ha iattogid o d Hymanaeus ch Phyletus. K g ha-mashchama padchud g ha-wohochudadag hab masma mat g pi kehg hihwdag wo em-cheawuagi. Pi g ha wehm aꞌagad g ha-mashchama. Gm at hu hab wo i m-juh ab amjed g Jiosh.
<range>
<range>
T wabshaba g Jiosh s-wihnam shondad g e-neꞌoki mat pi hedai wo shaꞌi gawul juh. K an oꞌohanas: Jiosh o s-ha mahch mo hedai woho ab s-wohochud. K an ep oꞌohanas: Matp hedai hab wo chei mo d Jiosh hemajkamga k hemho wa gam hu hab wo i e juh ab amjed g pi apꞌekam.
Neh, matp hems am wo haꞌichugk g nahnko mahs hohashahaꞌa am s‑kais kih ed. Tp hems haꞌi d wo ohlak ch haꞌi d wo plahtak ch haꞌi d wo uhsk ch haꞌi d wo bidk. Kut wo e hekaj hegam mo s‑namkig ha wehhejed g s‑has hahaꞌichu. T g pi namkigchu wabsh chum has masma wo e hekaj.
Pegih, t g Jiosh hab wa masma si s‑has haꞌichukaj wo t‑hekaj mattp hedai wo t‑kegchudch ab amjed g pi apꞌekam natt pi wo t‑nahtokch ch wo i t‑gawulkadch wehhejed.
Pegih, pi g am i e dagito pi apꞌekam ch ed k am s‑ap wo i e gewkadch s‑apꞌekam k ed ch am hab wo junihid mapt haschu wo ha ahgi ch wo si pihk e elidad wehs ha hekaj ch wo si s‑ap e tahtkkad ab ha wui g e‑wehm wohochuddam. T hegam mo ab ihm g Jiosh ch s‑ap haꞌichu chegito m‑wehm hab wo masmak.
Bant ep wo chei mapt pi wo ha neꞌowi hegam mat wabsh wo has hu kaijjid ch pi e mahch ch e neꞌowin. S‑mahch ap mat id am wabsh wo ha uꞌapa kawhaina ch ed.
Jiosh pionag at pi wo chum ha kawhainad ch wabsh wo si s‑hemajimak ab wehs ha wui ch wo si s‑ap ha mashchamad
ch si s‑hemajim wo ha shohbidad hegam mat ab wui wo gegokiwua ch wo ha mashchamad. Tp hems ab wo ha mah g Jiosh g apꞌedag mat wo s‑ohhod g pi ap e‑chegitoi k ab wo s‑mai g wohokam.
T hab masma uhpam wo bei g s‑ap e‑chegitoidag k wo e doꞌibia ab amjed g Jiawul.
Si g s‑chegitok mat wehs haꞌichu wo s‑hasigk mat d wo i ha oidch tatshk.
Hemajkam at wo s‑chu daꞌad ch wo si pihk e elidad g lialkaj ch wo chum si e hahaschudad. Muꞌi hemajkam at wo aꞌai s‑koꞌokam has e ahgad ch pi ab hu uhpam wo i nodgidad g s‑apꞌekam. Muꞌi at wo has ahgad g Jiosh. T g aꞌal pi ab hu wo wohog ha elidad g e‑geꞌegedga.
Muꞌi hemajkam at wo pi aꞌamdagk ch pi hedai ha hekaj wo pihk e elidad ch haꞌichu wo e iattogidad ab aꞌai e amjed ch wo s‑ta ehbidamak ch wo s‑ta kekeꞌidamak. Muꞌi at wo s‑ohhodad g s‑apꞌekam.
Muꞌi at pi ab hu wo ha tatchuad hegam mo d chum ha‑naipijju ch has am wabsh wo si e wuad ch pi ab hu wo tatchuad g Jiosh ch wabshaba g pi kehg s‑tahhadkam ab wo tatchuad.
Hemajkam at hi wo wa e mihshmdad ch wabsh pi wo wohochudad hegai mo haschu ab chum kah ch im hu hab wabsh wo i juh g Jiosh gewkdag. Pi g am hu ha wehmajk idam hab mahs hemajkam.
Haꞌi at am wabsh ep wo si i wahpkad ha‑kihki ed ch wo s‑ap ha iattogi g uꞌuwi. T hegam mo pi gewkpdag am e‑wohochudadag ed ab wo ha kaihamad no pi tatchua g pi apꞌekam ch e kudut g e‑chuꞌijigkaj
ch pi mahch g wohokam, chum as hems hi wa chum s‑mahchimk.
Hegam mo ha iattogid o ab wui gegok g wohokam hab masma mo wa Jannesbad ch Jambresbad ab wui gegok g Mosesbad. Ho o wabsh pi ap haꞌichu chegito ch d ep hegam mat pi e nako am Jesus wohochudadag ed.
T wabshaba wehsijj wo s‑mai mo pi haꞌichu aꞌamichud hab masma mat wa am hab e juh ha tahgio g Jannesbad ch Jambresbad. Kut heg hekaj pi wo e nako mat geꞌe haꞌichu wo padch.
P wabshaba ahpi hig am oid g haꞌichu ni‑mashchama ch haꞌichu hab ni‑juni ch haꞌichu hab ni‑elida. S‑mahch ap mani haschu ab s‑wohochud ch has masma ab i s‑ha bahbgi g hemajkam ch pihk ni‑elid ha hekaj ch nakog haꞌichu.
S‑mahch ap mam ni‑shoꞌigchud. Kuni muꞌi haꞌichu s‑koꞌok nakog. S‑mahch ap mant muꞌi haꞌichu nako am Antiok t am ch Iconium t am ch Lystra t am. T wabshaba g Jiosh ni‑doꞌibia wehs amjed ihda.
Kupt ahpi hab waꞌap wo e shoꞌigch natt pi wehs wo t‑shoꞌigch ahchim mach tatchua matt am wo oidad g s‑apꞌekam doakag ab si i t‑dagitok Jesus wui.
T wo i e gewpkai g pi apꞌekam ch s‑chu iꞌattomkam k baꞌich wo i ha iattogidad g hemajkam ch hejel wo e iattogidad.
Tt wabshaba ab i m‑mashcha g wohokam. Kupt ab si s‑gewkam i s‑wohochud k wo s‑wihnam uꞌukchid s‑mahchch matt hedai m‑mashcha.
S‑mahch ap map ga hu i e‑alijk amjed ab kaiham g Jiosh oꞌohana. K id d hegai map amjed ab bekch g e‑amichudadag. Kupt hekaj ab i s‑wohoch g Jesus Christ k e doꞌibia.
Ab o tashogid g Hekia S‑apꞌekam Gewkdag hegai mo g Jiosh tatchua mat an wo e oꞌohan k d wo t‑mashchamak. K heg wehs d i t‑wehmtadag matt hekaj aꞌai wo t‑mashcham k wo s‑mahchk g wohokam ch wo shohbidad g pi t‑apꞌekam ch am wo i t‑shelinid matt has masma s‑ap wo himchudad g t‑doakag.
Kutt heg hekaj wo s‑ap t‑nahtokch ahchim mach ab ihm g Jiosh matt am hab wo juh wabsh chum has mahs s‑kehg chikpan wehhejed.
Jesus at am s‑ap wo i nahto g e‑kownaltalig ia ep jiwiak k wo ha lodai wehs hemajkam, chum hems hegam mat eda d wabsh wo kia dodakamk. Heg ani hekaj si m‑chehani am tahgio g Jiosh
mapt am wo si ahgahi g Jiosh haꞌichu ahga k am wo si e gewkadch mapt am wo ahgad wabsh chum hekid ch pi am hu wo chum ge nenidad mat hekid am wo s‑apkot mapt am wo ahgad. Ab g i ha shohbid pi apꞌekam amjed k am i ha gewkemhun mat hab wo junihid g s‑apꞌekam wabsh s‑bahbgim ha mashchamch.
Ab o him g tash mat wo i muꞌida hegam mat gawul haꞌichu wo ha mashcha. Kut muꞌi hemajkam ab wo s‑ha kaim
k g wohokam mashchama wo dagito k ab wo hiwgad g hohoꞌoki aꞌagida.
Pt wabshaba ahpi wo si s‑e nenꞌoidk ch wo s‑e chegitok wehs haꞌichu k ed ch ab wo nako g shoꞌigdag. Am g wehs hab juhni g e‑chikpan am ahgachugch g Jiosh haꞌichu ahga nap pi d piongaj g Jiosh.
Ahni at hi e ai g ni‑tashga mant wo ni‑muhkid.
S‑ap ant nahto g ni‑chikpan am s‑gewkam i oidk hab masma mo g s‑melidkam am si i e nakog mat wo bei g s‑apꞌekam e‑gehgewi.
K heg am waꞌi wiꞌis mant wo bei g s‑apꞌekam ni‑gehgewi nani pi g s‑apꞌekam am hab junihim. Jiosh alidag o d s‑apꞌekam usagakam ch ab wo i ni‑mah ihda mat hekid ep wo jiwia k ab wo i t‑gawulkai geꞌe lodaita ch ed. Kut wehsijj hab waꞌap ab wo bei g e‑gehgewi hegam mo hedai ab si pihk e elid hekaj g Jiosh alidag ch nenida mat ep wo jiwia.
Am g i e nakog k s‑hohtam ab i ni‑chehgimed
nant pi hejel ia wih. Crescens at gam hu hih Galasia jewed wui. T g Titus gam hu hih Dalmasia jewed wui. Demas at ab si tatchua g jewed t ab haꞌichu k ia wabsh i ni‑dagito k gm hu hih Thessalonica wui.
Heg o waꞌi Luke ia ni‑chechga. Ab apt wo i bek g Mark. T am wo i ni‑wehmt id eda chikpan.
Ab ant cheha g Tychicus mat am wo hih Ephesus kihhim wui.
Ab g i ni‑behid g ni‑lihwa ch ni‑oꞌohana, wahm hegam mant hejel oꞌoha. Ab ant nuhkudach g Carpus amai Troas kihhim t am.
S‑koꞌokam at wa has ni‑dohdda hegai Alexander mo d hihliyo. T g Jiosh wo wa mah g s‑koꞌok namkidadag.
Neh, pt wo si s‑e nenꞌoidad ab amjed no pi shaꞌi si wui kehk g haꞌichu t‑ahga.
Hegam mat wo chum i ni‑wehmt at ia wabsh i ni‑dagito mamt wa wehpeg ni‑lodai. Ab ani tahni g Jiosh mat pi ab hu wo ha abch ihda.
Jiosh at wa i ni‑wehmt k ab i ni‑mah g gewkdag. Nt hekaj hab ni‑nako mant am s‑ap ah g Jiosh haꞌichu ahga am ha wui hegam mo am haꞌichug nahnko mahs hemajkam. T ab i ni‑doꞌibia mamt pi am hu ni‑wua maipid ha wui
k hab waꞌap wo ni‑doꞌibia ab wehs amjed g pi apꞌekam haꞌichu k an wo ni‑uꞌapa dahm kahchim ch ed. Ab att wo si has elidad g Jiosh chum hekid. Neh, id o waꞌi si.
Am apt wo ha ahgi g Priscilla ch Aquila ch hegam Onesiphorus wehm kihkam mat ab wo i s‑ni‑hoꞌigeꞌel.
Ga at hu wih g Erastus Corinth kihhim t am. Nt g Trophimus ga hu wuiok Miletus kihhim t am nat pi mumku.
Am g i e nakog k ab wo i hih mat koi wo e ai g s‑hehpichꞌedkam. Idam wehsijj o ab s‑em‑hoꞌigeꞌid Eubulus ch Pudens ch Linus ch Claudia ch wehsijj g t‑wehm wohochuddam iia.
Neh, am at wo wa em‑wehmajk g t‑kownalig Jesus. T g Jiosh wo wa s‑em‑hoꞌigeꞌel.
Ni-wehnag Titus: Am ant wo haꞌichu i m-oꞌohani ahni Paul mani d Jiosh pionag ch m-ahgi g s-kehg haꞌichu ahgaj. S-mahch ap mat g Jesus Christ am i ni-kei mant id wo ahgachugad. K hab d elidaj mant am wo i ha gewkemhunad hegam mat g Jiosh ab i ha gawulkai mat d wo hemajkamgajk. T hab wo i gewka g ha-wohochudadag. T baꞌich wo i mai ihda wohokam ab amjed g Jiosh.
Bo kaij g Jiosh mat eda pi koi haꞌichu shaꞌi nahto matsh ab wo ha mah g pi ha huhugedam doakag hegam mat ab wo i s-wohoch.
T hemu am i e ai mat s-ap maskogi g haꞌichu e-ahga.
Kupt ab i s-wohoch ab ni-ab k hahawa wepogidas map d ni-alidag. Ab o wa si s-m-hoꞌigeꞌid g t-ohg Jiosh g t-doꞌibiakam Jesus Christ wehm ch ab wo wa baꞌich i m-mahkad g i wehmtadag ch s-ap tahhadkam.
Am ant i m-dagito Crete jewed t am mapt am wo i apꞌech mo haschu koi apꞌechudas am ha shaꞌashagid hegam mo hemiap e mihshmad. Am apt wo i ha chuhcha wehs kihhim ed hegam mat wo ha wanimedad mani wa id heki hu m-chehani. Kunt am wo i m-chegitoch mat has wo chum masmak.
Dat wo si s-ap oꞌodhamk ch hemako wo hohnigk ch pi wo ha chuꞌijigk. T g ha-aꞌaliga hemho wa d wo wohochuddamk ch ab wo ha kaihamad g e-geꞌegedga. T hab pi hedai wo e nako mas ab wo haꞌichu ha abch.
Pi o hab chuꞌig mas g ha wanimeddam wo ge e haschudad o s-hohtam wo babgatad o wo nawkkoꞌod o wo ha cheggiad o muꞌi haꞌichu wo si s-behimkkad.
K wabshaba hab chuꞌig mat wo s-dodolimak ch hab wo junihid g s-apꞌekam ch chum hekid wo i ha wehmajk hegam mo tatchua g i wehmtadag.
Am ap ha mashcham g Jiosh haꞌichu ahga. Kut id an wo si uꞌukchid mat heg hekaj wo i ha gewkemhunad g hemajkam ch wo i ha shohbidad hegam mo ab wui gegok g Jiosh haꞌichu ahga.
Heki at hu muꞌi i wuwha hegam mo chum s-keshwuimk g Jiosh haꞌichu ahga ch ha iattogid g hemajkam ch heg hekaj ab ha wanchkwup mat wo ui g lial, wahm hegam mo d ni-wepo Tutuligo oꞌodham. Kumt heg hekaj wehs e wehm am wo i ha shohbi.
<range>
Hema ash hab kaij g s-chu amichuddam am Crete t am, “Ahchim Crete t am oꞌodham ach s-chu iꞌattomk ch s-ta kekeꞌidama ch s-papadma ch wehs haꞌichu si s-behimk.”
Woho o wa mo has i kaij. Kupt heg hekaj si s-gewkam wo i ha shohbi. T hab ab wo m-kaiham k ab wo s-wohochudad g wohokam.
Pt wo ha ahgi mat pi wo wohochudad g Tutuligo ha-hohoꞌoki aꞌagida ch hegai mo d wabsh ha-chehanig hegam mo pi tatchua g wohokam.
Wehs o s-kehgaj g Jiosh haꞌichu nahtoi am ha wehhejed hegam mo s-kehg haꞌichu chegitoidag. K wabshaba pi haꞌichu s-kehgaj am ha wehhejed hegam mo pi kehg haꞌichu chegitoidag ch pi wohochud g wohokam no pi g pi kehg haꞌichu ha-chegitoidag wehs haꞌichu padchud ha wehhejed. K pi has ab hu shaꞌi tahhadag g ha-iꞌibdag mo am hab junihim g pi apꞌekam.
Idam o hab kaij mo s-mahch g Jiosh ch wabshaba hab e wua mo pi mahch no pi s-ta kekeꞌidama ch pi chechkaidag. K g ha-doakag pi kehg hab mahs. K pi ab hu shaꞌi ha ab ulini mas hab wo juh g s-apꞌekam.
Kupt wabshaba ahpi am wo ha mashcha g wohochuddam mat has wo e junihid ch hekaj wo e chehgidad mo s-kehgaj g Jiosh mashchamadag.
Pt wo ha ahgi g kekel oꞌodham mat d wo si oꞌodhamk ch pi wabsh wo i e wahmud k wabshaba wabsh wo i e bahbgi wehs haꞌichu k ed. T wabsh shelinim wo oidad g e-wohochudadag ch wo pihk e elidad ab wehs ha wui ch s-e tahtk ch ab wo nakogad haꞌichu.
Kupt hab waꞌap wo ha ahgi g oꞌoki mat wo s-dodolimak ch wo e chehgidch mo am oidch hab e junihim g s-apꞌekam ch pi wo nawkkoꞌod ch pi wo pi kehg neneokad ab hedai k amjed.
T g wechij uꞌuwi ab ha amjed wo mai mat has wo chum masmak ch ab wo i ha tatchuad g e-wehm kihkam ch e-aꞌaliga
ch wo e nuhkudad mat pi hab wo wuad g pi apꞌekam ch wo si s-wapagimak am e-kihdag ed ch ab wo ha wohog elidad g e-wehm kihkam. T hab pi hedai has wo ahgad g Jiosh haꞌichu ahga.
Kupt hab waꞌap wo ha ahgi g wihpiop mat d wo si oꞌodhamk.
Chum apt hekid hab wo wuad g s-apꞌekam ch hab masma wo ha chehgi mat has wo chum e junihid.
Kupt ab wo si has elidad g wohokam ab amjed g Jiosh ch heg wo waꞌi ha mashchamad. T hab wo si e elidad hegam mo ab wui gegok g Jiosh haꞌichu ahga ch pi wo e nako mas has wo m-ahgad.
Ab g ha ahgid wabsh chum hedai ha-pionag mat ab wo kaihamad g e-ahmo ch pi ab hu wo neꞌowinad
ch pi haꞌichu wo ehsidad ch wabshaba wo e chehgidahid mo s-ap d pion. Kut heg amjed am wo i e tashogi mo s-apꞌe g haꞌichu ahgaj g Jiosh matt heg hekaj t-doꞌibia.
Jiosh o wehs s-ha hoꞌigeꞌid g hemajkam ch hab juh g doꞌibiadag chum wehs ha wehhejed. T id am wabsh s-ap i e chehgi.
Kutt heg hekaj wo s-ohhod g pi apꞌekam k wo t-nuhkud matt hab wo wuad g s-apꞌekam ch ab wo si haꞌichuch g Jiosh id eda jewed.
Batt wo masmak nach pi nenida mach haschu s-wohochud mat ia ep wo jiwia k si s-tondam wo e chehgi hegai mo d t-Jioshga ch d t-doꞌibiakam Jesus Christ.
Heg at am i e dagito mat s-koꞌokam e muhkid k hekaj t-doꞌibia ab amjed g pi apꞌekam k i t-kegch mach d hahawa si hemajkamgaj k si tatchua matt hab wo junihid g s-apꞌekam.
Pegih, am g si ha ahgid wehs ihda k i ha gewkemhun mat hab wo junihid g s-apꞌekam k ep i ha shohbid mat hedai hab wo i wuad g pi apꞌekam. Pi at hedai wo chum pi m-haꞌichuchudad nap pi gewkdag mapt id am hab wo junihid.
Pt am wo ha ahgidad g wohochuddam mat has wo chum masmak. T wo s-ha wohog elidad g e-kokownalig ch am oidk hab wo e junihid g chehanig ch chum hekid wo e nahtokchid mat wo s-ap chikpanad ch hab wo junihid g s-apꞌekam.
Am g ha ahgid mat pi wo pi kehg neneokad ab hedai i amjed ch wabshaba wo si s-ap e tahtkkad ch wo si s-hemajimak ab wehs ha wui.
Neh, heki ach hu wa hab masmakahim mo hegam mo pi ab hu wohochud g Jiosh. Pi ach wa ab hu kaiham g Jiosh ch pi haꞌichu amichud ch hab s-junimk g pi apꞌekam ch pi aꞌamdag ch s-chu hehgamk. Haꞌi o s-t-kehꞌid. Kuch ab epai s-ha kehꞌid.
K wabshaba g t-doꞌibiakam Jiosh si pihk e elid t-hekaj ch ia i e chehgi jewed dahm
mat wo t-doꞌibia ab amjed g s-koꞌok t-namkidadag. Pi at hedai wo e nako mas wo e doꞌibia g hejel haꞌichu hab e-junikaj. T wabshaba g Jiosh ab i s-t-hoꞌigeꞌid k gam hu wako g pi ap t-chuꞌijig matt wo edagi g wechij doakag. Heg at hekaj ia jiwia g t-doꞌibiakam Jesus Christ jewed dahm k heg hekaj ab t-mah g Hekia S-apꞌekam Gewkdag. Heg o am t-eda ch ab t-mahkch hegai wechij doakag.
<range>
Jesus Christ o ab s-t-hoꞌigeꞌid ch am i t-apꞌech matt wo s-apꞌek am Jiosh tahgio. Kuch heg hekaj edgid ihda wechij doakag ch hab am wehmaj wo kihkad chum hekid am i dahm matt wo koi.
Do wohokam ihda mani haschu m-ahgid. Kupt chum hekid am wo ha ahgidad g wohochuddam. T hekaj wo e nuhkud mat wo s-wapagimak ch hab wo junihid g s-apꞌekam. Id at d wo i ha-wehmtadagk g hemajkam.
Kupt pi wo ha neꞌowinad hegam mo wabsh pehegi haꞌichu m-kaiam ch am chum m-pipꞌichud ab amjed g Tutuligo ha-chehanig ch chum ge e haschud ch hab kaij mo ab d ha amjedkam g si s-has hahaꞌichu.
Gokko apt wo s-ha daꞌi hegam mat hedai wo chum aꞌai ha gaꞌagwulkai g wohochuddam. Hegam mat pi ab hu wo m-kaiha o pi apꞌe. T g pi ap ha-chuꞌijig am wo ha chehgi. Kumt wabsh wo ha dagito.
<range>
Ia o ni-wehm dadha g Artemas ch Tychicus. Kunt idam am hema wo i kei mat am m-wui wo jiwia. Kupt am haha wo hih Nicopolis kihhim wui mapt am wo ni-wehmajk nant pi am wo dakad s-hehpichꞌed.
Kah ani mash am m-wehm da hegai Zenas mo d chehanig hudawogdam ch atsh am hebai wo ha mihshmdam g Apollos wehm. Kupt heꞌes wo i e nakog k am wo i ha wehmt mat pi haꞌichu wo pi edagi.
Bat wo wa chum masmak g wohochuddam mat hab waꞌap wo i ha wehmajk hegam mo hab masma tatchua g i wehmtadag.
Wehsijj o am i m-hoꞌigeꞌid idam t-wehm wohochuddam mo ia kih. Am g wehsijj i ha hoꞌigeꞌid g t-wehm wohochuddam amai. Jiosh at wo wa s-em-hoꞌigeꞌel.
Ni-wehnag, Philemon: Ia ani kuhpi ahni Paul nani pi ahgachug g Jiosh haꞌichu ahga ab amjed g Jesus Christ. K ia ni-wehmaj g Timothy ch ab s-em-hoꞌigeꞌid. Am ant haꞌichu wo m-oꞌohani, Philemon, s-chegitokch map wa s-ap i t-wehmaj id eda chikpan.
Kupt id am wo neꞌokchul Aphia wui ch heg wui Archipus mo wa t-wehm ahgahim g Jiosh haꞌichu ahga, pej wehs ha wui hegam mo am em-wehm e mihshmad em-kih am.
Ab o si s-em-hoꞌigeꞌid g t-ohg Jiosh ch t-kownalig Jesus Christ ch ab wo wa baꞌich i em-mahkad g i wehmtadag ch g s-ap tahhadkam.
Ab apsh wabsh kia si hiwig g t-kownalig Jesus ch si pihk e elid ha hekaj g e-wehm wohochuddam. (7) Sh hegam ab si i e gewkemhun ab neidch map s-ap haꞌichu hab ha junid. Ni heg hekaj si s-ap ni-tahtk (4) ch ab hoꞌigeꞌid g Jiosh ch ab tahni mat baꞌich wo i m-wehmt hemu. (6) Pt hab baꞌich ab wo i chehgi map geꞌe edgid g s-apꞌekam ab ihmch g Jesus Christ.
<range>
<range>
<range>
Ab o ni-mahkch g Christ g gewkdag mant ab wo haꞌichu em-cheha ahpim mam ab ihm.
Nt wabshaba ab wabsh wo i m-gewkemhu mapt haꞌichu hab wo ni-juni heg wabsh hekaj map si pihk e elid t-hekaj. Dani keli hemu ch ia kuhpi Jesus Christ wehhejed. Kupt ab wo si pihk e el ni-wui k hekaj hab wo juh g ni-tatchui.
Ia o ni-wehmaj ihda m-neholiga mo hab chehgig Onesimus. Ni am ahgid ab amjed g t-kownalig Jesus. T ab i s-wohoch. K heg wa wepo mo d ni-alidag am t-wohochudadag ed.
Heki ash hu s-padmam chikpan m-wehhejed ch wabshaba hemu s-wagimam chikpan mo hab masma hab d ahga g chehgigaj ch hab haꞌichu ni-junid am m-wehhejed.
Ab ani chehani mat am uhpam ep wo hih m-wui. Kupt hab masma ab wo neidad mo d ni-alidag.
Chum ani hi wa tatchua mat ia wo i ni-wehmt m-wehhejed mani ia kuhpi ch ahg g s-kehg haꞌichu ahgaj g Jiosh. K wabshaba pi hab chum chuꞌig manis wo m-wohppoꞌi g m-pionag. Baꞌich o i s-apꞌe mat hejel hab wo i e ah mapt has masma wo i ni-wehmt.
<range>
Do heb hu himkam ihda m-pionag al heꞌes i tash. Kuki wabshaba hab d elidaj g Jiosh mat hab masma wo e chehg k d haha wo m-wehm wohochuddamk chum hekid.
Do si t-wehnag, wahm ahpi, no pi d m-pionag ch am i dahm d hahawa m-wehm wohochuddam.
Bap masma hab ni-elid mani d si m-wehnag, pegih, k ch hab wa masma hab wo elidad g Onesimus mat d wo si m-wehnagk.
Ab atsh m-wui pi ap chuꞌi. Kupt wabshaba ahni ab wo ni-mohtoꞌi.
Ahni ant wo m-namkid heg hekaj, chum aps ahpi ab ni-ab e wulshch nant pi am m-wui uꞌapa g Jiosh haꞌichu ahga mapt hekaj e doꞌibia.
Pegih, pt hab masma hab wo elidad g Onesimus mat d wo m-wehnagk. Id at ab wo si i ni-gewkemhu am wehhejed g Jiosh alidag.
Id ant am i m-oꞌohani s-mahchch mapt baꞌich i dahm haꞌichu hab wo ni-juni mani m-tahni.
Jiosh at ab wo kaiha g em-hoꞌigeꞌidahuna k ab wo i ni-wuhshad ab amjed g kukpaikud. Nt am ep wo i em-chehgim. Kumt heg hekaj am wo i apꞌech g kih ni-wehhejed.
Ia o ep ni-wehm kuhpi g Epaphras ch s-m-hoꞌigeꞌid.
K ia ep dadha g Mark ch Aristarcas ch Demas ch Luke ch hab waꞌap s-m-hoꞌigeꞌid.
T-kownalig Jesus Christ at wo wa s-em-hoꞌigeꞌel.
Heki atsh hu am haꞌi i ha chuhcha g Jiosh g t-shohshonbad matsh am wo amogad g haꞌichu ahgaj. Kush idam Jiosh haꞌichu i tashogiddam heꞌes am al i ha tashogid g Jiosh aꞌahidag oidam.
Kutsh g Jiosh am hahawa i kei g e-alidag. Tsh id ia i wuhsh jewed dahm k si s-ap t-tashogid g Jiosh. Id o wud matsh g Jiosh ged hu i si wehpeg am i kei matsh wehs haꞌichu wo nahto. K heg hekaj wehs haꞌichu d enigaj.
Kutsh eda ia jiwia k e shoꞌigchud k e muhkid matsh gam hu hab wo i juh g s-koꞌok t-namkidadag mach d pi ap chuꞌijkam. Tsh g Jiosh ab hahawa uhpam ep i be k an dai si e-hugid an. Kush si s-kehg s-masma am e chehgidch g s-has haꞌichudaj mash woho si wepo chuꞌig g e-ohg ch wehs an uꞌukch g e-nahtoi matsh an s-ap hab wo chuꞌigk.
Neh, bo wa masma am e chehgidch mo id d alidaj g Jiosh. K heg hekaj tasho mo baꞌich d i si s-has haꞌichu mo hi g anghil.
Jiosh ash pi hekid hema g anghil hab ahg mo d alidaj ch wabshaba hab kaij id wui: Ni-alidag, hemu ant am wo ha chehgi g hemajkam map ahpi d waꞌi ni-alidag. Kush hab ep kaij: Dat wo ni‑alidagk ch am wo i wuhsh jewed dahm.
K an ep oꞌohanas mash hab kaij: Wehs g anghil at hemho wa ab wo hehgchulidad.
K an ep oꞌohanas: Anghil o haꞌichu wehhejed s‑kehgaj hab sha masma mo g hewel ch mei.
Kush wabshaba g Jiosh alidag am wehmaj wehs haꞌichu dahm. Kush g Jiosh ab wui hab kaij: Dap Jiosh. Kut pi hebai wo ha hugk g m‑kownaltalig mani ab m‑hiwgid. K g m‑chehanig chum hekid s‑apꞌe.
S‑hohhoꞌid ap g s‑apꞌekam ch g pi apꞌekam pi hohhoꞌid Nt heg hekaj am i m‑kehsh k ab m‑mah g si geꞌe s‑hehgig wehs ha baꞌiwechkim.
Neh, bash kaij g Jiosh ch hab ep kaij ab wui: Ni‑Kehsha, am apt nahto g jewed kahchim ch dahm kahchim.
T heg wehs wo hekit k gam hu hab wo i e juh hab masma mat g iꞌikus. Kupt eda ahpi hi wabsh chum hekid d wo doakamk ch pi hekid am gawul wo e juh.
<range>
Neh, bash kaij g Jiosh ab e‑alidag wui ch hab ep kaij: In g hu dahiwua si ni‑hugid an k ab wo ai mant wo ha gewito g m‑obga. Neh, id ash wehs hab kaij g Jiosh ab e‑alidag wui ch pi hekid ab hu anghil ha wui hab shaꞌi kaij.
Anghil ash pi wepo masma g Jiosh alidag ch d wabsh gewpkdag mash am chikpan Jiosh wehhejed. Kuch ahchim d hahawa Jiosh aꞌaliga t‑doꞌibiak ch am wo i wahp kihdaj ed. Kush g anghil d Jiosh pionag ch atsh am wo i t‑wehmajk.
Neh, wehs ihda o ab t‑chehgidch mo g Jiosh alidag wehs dahm g e‑nahtoi. Kutt heg hekaj ab wo si t‑uꞌukchid id ab s‑kehg haꞌichu ahgaj matt kah ch pi gam hu hab wo i t‑juh ab amjed.
Pi ash d Jiosh alidag ch d wabsh anghil matsh wa ia uꞌapa g Jiosh haꞌichu ahga heki hu. Tsh wabshaba s‑koꞌokam bei g e‑namkidadag hegam mash pi ab hu ha kaiham.
Sh eda d si alidaj g Jiosh hegai matsh hemu ia uꞌapa g haꞌichu ahgaj. Kutt hemho wa ab wo kaihamad. Am o t‑tashogid g doꞌibiadag. Kutt pi has masma wo t‑doꞌibia ab amjed g s‑koꞌok t‑namkidadag matt pi ab hu wo kaihamad. Hegam matsh ab kah g Jiosh alidag o s‑ap am t‑ahgid ihda haꞌichu ahgaj matsh ia uꞌapa.
K g Jiosh hab ha junidahim g s‑hasig haꞌichu ch hekaj am wohokamchud g haꞌichu ha ahga. K g Hekia S‑apꞌekam Gewkdag ab t‑mahkch g gewkdag mach hekaj hab wua g nahnko mahs i wehmtadag ch i gewkemhunadag ab aꞌai t‑wui.
Pi ash d anghil mas g Jiosh am i ha chuhcha mat am wo himchudad g kownaltaligaj. Dach ahchim hemajkam.
Neh, an o hebai hab chuꞌig Jiosh oꞌohana ed mash hema hab kaij ab Jiosh wui: Ni‑Jioshga, dach wabsh al hemajkam maptsh ia wabsh t‑shul mattsh am wo ha wechokad g anghil heꞌes i tash. Pi oki hab chum chuꞌig maps ab wo has t‑elidad ch wo t‑dagioꞌidad. Ptsh eda ab wo si t‑hahaꞌichuchud k ab wo t‑mah g si s‑kehg s‑has haꞌichudag
<range>
k am wo i t‑chuhcha wehs haꞌichu dahm. Neh, bo chuꞌig g Jiosh oꞌohana ch hab d ahga mat wehs g Jiosh nahtoi am wo ha wechokad g hemajkam. Pi o hab chuꞌig idani.
Kuch wabshaba s‑mahch matsh heki hu i shonwua ab Jesus amjed matsh hab wo e juh. Heg atsh wa i e jumalkad k t‑wepo e juh k heꞌes i tash ha wecho g anghil ch chum hems e dagito muhkig wui am wehs t‑wehhejed. Id o d Jiosh hab elida no pi si s‑t‑hoꞌigeꞌid. T g Jiosh heg hekaj ab si haꞌichuchud k an dai mat d wo t‑kownaligk.
Wehs haꞌichu o d Jiosh nahtoi ch wehhejed an hab chuꞌig. T heg si s‑hemajim am i apꞌech mat g Jesus wo e shoꞌigchud k hekaj wo t‑doꞌibia matt d wo aꞌaligajk ch am hahawa chum hekid wo wehmajk si s‑kehg kihdaj ed. Jiosh hab elida o wehs s‑apꞌe.
Pegih, tsh hab wa masma ab i t‑gawulkai g Jiosh alidag matt hab waꞌap d wo Jiosh aꞌaligak ch pi wo ha chuꞌijigk. Kush heg hekaj pi shaꞌi e elid mat hab wo t‑aꞌagad ‘ni‑wepnag.’
An o hab chuꞌig Jiosh oꞌohana ed mash g alidaj s‑t‑nawojimk ch hab ahg g Jiosh: Bant wo ha aꞌagad mo d ni‑wepnag hegam mat ab wo s‑m‑wohoch am i kahk g haꞌichu ni‑ahga. Amt ant ha shahgid ab wo m‑hehgchulidad.
Kush hab ep kaij: Ab ant hab wabsh masma wo s‑m‑wohochudad mo g m‑hemajkamga. K an ep oꞌohadag matsh ia wo jiwia k wo ha wehmajk ch hab wo ah: Idam o d Jiosh aꞌaliga. Kut am ni‑nuhkudach. Neh, bash kaij ch hab t‑aꞌaga ‘Jiosh aꞌaliga.’
Kush eda g Jiawul edgid g gewkdag mat ab wo t‑abch g t‑chuꞌijig matt hekaj gam hu hab wo i t‑juh ab amjed g Jiosh. Tsh wabshaba g Jiosh alidag t‑wepo e juh mat hekaj s‑ap ab wo bei g s‑koꞌok t‑namkidadag k wo hugio g Jiawul gewkdag mat hahawa pi wo e nako mas gam hu hab wo i t‑juh ab amjed g Jiosh.
Jiosh alidag atsh gewito g Jiawul am t‑wehhejed. Kutt heg hekaj pi wo ehbidad g muhkig.
Pi ash d anghil mas g Jiosh wo ha doꞌibia. Dach ahchim hemajkam mach ab s‑wohochud.
Tsh heg wa hekaj am t‑wepo e juh k t‑wepo masma ia oimmelhim ch haꞌichu nakog. Bat waꞌi masma s‑ap d wo t‑uhgchu pahligk ch ab wo s‑t‑hoꞌigeꞌidad ch gam hu hab wo i juh g t‑chuꞌijig am wehhejed g Jiosh.
Jiawul o chum t‑chehani matt hab wo juh g pi apꞌekam. K wabshaba g Jesus s‑ap e nakog mat am wo i t‑gewkemhunad nash pi hab waꞌap nakog mash wa g Jiawul chum chehani g pi apꞌekam.
Pegih, ni‑wehm wohochuddam, ab at i em‑gawulkai g Jiosh gahi wuhshanim g e‑alidag Jesus. Heg o d Jiosh si Kehsha ch d uhgchu t‑pahlig. Kumt wo oidahid mo has chuꞌig.
Jiosh atsh heki hu am i kei g Mosesbad ha dahm g e‑hemajkamga. Kush heg s‑ap am hab junihim g e‑chikpan. Pegih, sh g Jesus hab waꞌap s‑ap am hab junihim g e‑chikpan am Jiosh wehhejed.
Kutt wabshaba baꞌich ab wo i si has elidad g Jesus mach g Mosesbad no pi d Jiosh ch wehs haꞌichu nahto.
<range>
Mosesbad ash s‑ap am hab junihim g e‑chikpan am ha shahgid g Jiosh hemajkamga ch wabshaba d wabsh Jiosh pionag. Tsh g Jiosh am i kei matsh wo haꞌichu aꞌaga wehhejed matsh gam hu baꞌich hahawa s‑ap wo i e tashogit.
Kush eda g Jesus d Jiosh alidag ch d si kehshaj matsh wehs am wo ha dahmkad g hemajkamgaj. Kuch ahchim d hemajkamgaj mattp pi wo dagito g t‑wohochudadag k wabsh s‑ap t‑tahtkk ch wo nenida mat hab wo t‑juni mo has i kaij.
Neh, bash masma hab chuꞌig am t‑wehhejed mash wa hab chuꞌig am ha wehhejed g t‑shohshonbad ahchim Tutuligo. Hegam ha wui ash hab kaij g Hekia S‑apꞌekam Gewkdag: Ab o em‑waid g Jiosh hab masma mo wa ab ha waid g em‑geꞌegedga.
Hegam o pi chechkaidag Kumt pi hab wo chum masmak. Jiosh o wa am ha wehhejed apꞌechudch g jewed ch ab ha waid mat s‑ap am wo dadhaiwua heg eda. T wabshaba wa pi am hu i wahp
k wabsh pipꞌichud ch am dadha gam hu jegko am wa chum neidch mo haschu am hab ha junid giꞌikko wehst‑mahm (40) aꞌahid ab.
T g Jiosh pi am hu i ha wahpki heg oidam k s‑ha kehꞌid k hab kaij: Chum o hekid pi ap chegito idam hemajkam ch pi mai g ni‑himdag.
Kunt hab si i ni‑ah mat pi hekid am hu wo i wahp k pi hekid wo s‑ap dadhaiwua idam geꞌeged mo hab masma k wabshaba ab wo bei g s‑koꞌok namkidadag.
Neh, tsh wa woho hab e juh g Jiosh neꞌoki am ha wehhejed. Kumt heg hekaj wo s‑e nenꞌeidad mamt pi hab masma wo pi chechkaidagk. Jiosh o d doakam ch woho gam hu hab wo i em‑juh mamtp pi ab hu wo kaihamad.
Ab o t‑waid g Jiosh hemu ch wabshaba pi chum hekid ab wo t‑waidad. Mt wo e iattogi g pi apꞌekamkaj mamtp pi ab hu wo kaihamad g Jiosh. Ab g aꞌai wo i e gewkemhunad mamt ab wo kaihamad.
Dach s‑wohom Christ hemajkamga mattp an wo si uꞌukchid g t‑wohochudadag wehs t‑doakag oidam.
Mt heg hekaj wo s‑chegitok ihda mani am em‑ahgid ch pi wo pi chechkaidagk hab masma mash wa hegam mash pi ab hu wohog elid g Jiosh.
Jiosh atsh wa am ha doꞌibia ab ha amjed g Egypt t am hemajkam am gahi wuhshanim g Mosesbad. Kush eda hahawa pi chechkaidag.
Sh g Jiosh s‑ha kehꞌid ch hab kaij matsh pi wo ha hiwigi mas am wo i wahp amai mash hebai am chum apꞌechudch ha wehhejed k hoꞌip wehs koi hegam geꞌeged mash pi ab hu wohog elid. Kush heg hekaj am oiopo tohono jewed ch ed giꞌikko wehst‑mahm (40) aꞌahid ab.
<range>
Neh, id o am t‑chehgidch matki heg hekaj pi am hu ha wahpki g Jiosh heg eda jewed mash pi ab hu wohochud.
Kutki heg hekaj pi am hu ha apꞌet g Jiosh waida. Kutt ahchim wo s‑t‑gihugad matt pi hab wo masmak mash wa hegam. Jiosh ash am t‑wehhejed apꞌechudch e‑kihdag ed hab sha masma mash wa am ha wehhejed chum apꞌechudch hegai jewed.
<range>
Id ash am apꞌechudas ged hu i amjed matsh am e nahto g jewed. Sh wabshaba hab masma hab chuꞌig am t‑wehhejed mash wa hab chuꞌig am ha wehhejed. Jiosh ash hab kaij matsh pi hedai am hu wo i wah pi ab hu wohochudch k wabshaba ab wo bei g s‑koꞌok e‑namkidadag. Kutt heg hekaj ab wo s‑wohochudad ch hab s‑ap am wo i wahp kihdaj ed am i t‑pihhunk ia jewed dahm.
An o hab chuꞌig Jiosh heki hu oꞌohana ed matsh nahto g jewed ch dahm kahchim chuhdp tashkaj k am hahawa i e pihhu heg eda wewaꞌak tash.
Pegih, sh am t‑wehhejed an hab chuꞌig g s‑ap heubagida wehmaj g Jiosh. Sh wabshaba muꞌijj pi ab hu wohochud g Jiosh. Kush hab kaij matsh pi hekid am hu wo i wahp.
Hegam mat ab wo s‑wohoch g s‑kehg haꞌichu ahgaj g Jiosh atsh am wo i wahp Jiosh kihdag ed. Neh, pi atsh am hu i wahp heg eda jewed mash g Jiosh am wui ha waid hegam matsh wehpeg kah g waidaj natsh pi pi ab hu wohoch.
Tsh wabshaba g ha‑aꞌaliga am i wahp. Tsh g Joshuabad am i ha wanim. Kush ab ha wui hab hahawa kaij g Hekia S‑apꞌekam Gewkdag ihda mani wa am em‑ahgid: Ab o em‑waid g Jiosh hab masma mo wa ab ha waid g em‑geꞌegedga. Kumt pi wo pi chechkaidagk hab masma mo wa hegam. Heki atsh hu am i wahp heg eda jewed. K heg hekaj tasho mo pi ab hu heg wui ha waid g Jiosh
<range>
ch wabshaba ha waid matsh d wo hemajkamgajk. Kut hab wo e nahtokch mat am wo i wahp heg eda si s‑kehg s‑hehgig mash ha wehhejed apꞌechudch. Jiosh atsh am i nahto g e‑chikpan k hahawa si s‑hehgig. Kutt ahchim hab waꞌap wo nahto g t‑chikpan k wo si s‑hehgigk mattp wo t‑nahtokch.
<range>
Pegih, oi g am wo e nakog mamt am wo i wahp k wo si s‑hehgigk am wehmaj g Jiosh. Pi atsh am hu i wahp hegam matsh pi ab hu wohog el g Jiosh. Kutt wo s‑t‑nenꞌoid k pi hab wo masmak.
Shoꞌo waꞌi si s‑gewkdag g Jiosh neꞌoki. K g Jiosh heg hekaj am chehgidch mo has chuꞌig g t‑doakag ch t‑chegitoidag. Bo masma g neꞌokij mo g s‑muꞌuk wainomi mamtp hems heg hekaj ged hu wo si hikuch g chuhkug ch ohꞌo k wo cheh mo haschu ged hu si eda.
Pi att wo shaꞌi t‑nako machs haschu gam hu wo ehsto ab amjed g Jiosh. Wehs o haꞌichu s‑mahch. Kutt hemho wa hema tash am wo gegokiwua baꞌich k wehs wo ah g t‑chuꞌijig.
Do si uhgchu t‑pahlig ch d Jiosh alidag g Jesus ch an i wah Jiosh kihdag ed am t‑wehhejed. Kutt heg hekaj ab wo s‑wohochudad chum hekid.
Ihda uhgchu t‑pahlig o si pihk e elid t‑hekaj natsh pi ab nakog k s‑mahch hegai mach ahchim ab nakog. Jiawul ash hab waꞌap chum chehani mat hab wo juh hegai mo haschu pi d Jiosh tatchui hab masma mo hemu ab t‑chehani. Kush wabshaba s‑ap ab wui kehk ch pi hekid hab juh g pi apꞌekam.
Pegih, ab o t‑kaiham g Jiosh no pi g alidaj d uhgchu t‑pahlig ch si pihk e elid t‑hekaj. Kutt heg hekaj s‑ap wo t‑nako matt ab wo tahnid g i wehmtadag ch pi wo ehbidad. T heg ab wo i s‑t‑hoꞌigeꞌid k ab wo i t‑wehmt.
Jiosh atsh am i apꞌech matsh hema g t‑wehm oꞌodham d wo uhgchu t‑pahligk ch ab wui hab wo junihid g iagchulida ch hoꞌigeꞌidahuna am t‑wehhejed ch hejel e wehhejed. Kut id hemho wo wa chum s‑hemajimak ab t‑wui no pi hab waꞌap d oꞌodham ch hebai hab wua g pi apꞌekam.
<range>
<range>
Pi atsh hedai am wabsh wo hejel i e kei mat d wo uhgchu pahlk. Jiosh atsh am wo i kei hab masma matsh wa hab juh g Aaronbad ged hu i heki hu matsh g amjedkamaj d wo papalk.
Tsh hab wa masma pi am hu wabsh hejel i e kei g Christ. Jiosh atsh wa am i kehsh k ab wui hab kaij: Ni‑alidag, hemu ant am wo ha chehgi g hemajkam map ahpi d waꞌi ni‑alidag.
An o hebai hab ep chuꞌig mash hab ep kaij ab wui: Dapt wo pahlk heg hekaj mant am i m‑kei hab masma mant g Melkisedekbad ch pi heg hekaj maps d Aaronbad amjedkam. Kupt chum hekid d wo pahlk. Neh, bash kaij g Jiosh ab wui.
Kush g Jesus ab wui e hoꞌigeꞌidahun ch shoak ch iawua g e‑ohꞌog mash eda ia oimmed ch ab aihim g muhkig. Kush g Jiosh ab kaiham nash pi heg si s‑hemajima ch ab si has elid.
Dash Jiosh hab elida matsh wo e shoꞌigchud k wo e muhkid am t‑wehhejed. Kutsh wa woho hab e juh k hab masma s‑mai g wohog elidadag, chum as d Jiosh alidag.
Bat wa masma am i apꞌech g Jiosh mat hab wo juh g pi ha huhugedam doꞌibiadag wehsijj t‑wehhejed mattp hedai ab wo s‑wohog el.
Kush hab kaij g Jiosh mat am i kei mat d wo uhgchu pahlk hab masma mat am i kei g Melkisedek.
Muꞌi ani haꞌichu chum s‑em‑mashchamimk ab amjed g Christ id hekaj Melkisedek. Mt wabshaba pi wo amich.
Idani amki tash d Jiosh wohochuddam ch hab wo chum chuꞌigk mamt haꞌi ep wo ha mashcha. Kumtki eda koi si s‑ap s‑mai g wehpeg mashchama. Bam sha masma mam d wabsh kia al hahaꞌas aꞌal ch hegai waꞌi wihbi ihꞌe
nam pi pi amichud g Jiosh neꞌoki ab amjed g s‑apꞌekam.
Hegam mat wo geꞌegeꞌehogat e‑wohochudadag ed at wo s‑amich g Jiosh neꞌoki k wo s‑mahchk mo haschu d s‑apꞌekam ch haschu d pi apꞌekam.
Gd hu i si wehpeg att am em‑mashcha mamt gam hu wo s‑ohhod g pi ap e‑chegitoi k ab wo i s‑wohoch g Jiosh
k wo e pahl wapko. T g Jiosh ab wo i em‑wuwhas muhkig t amjed k pi wo em‑lodai. Kutt heki hu em‑mashcha mamt ab wo ha taht hegam mat hab waꞌap ab wo i s‑wohoch g Jiosh k wo e hoꞌigeꞌidahu am ha wehhejed. Kut ab wo bei g gewkdaj g Hekia S‑apꞌekam Gewkdag hab masma mamt ahpim.
Id o d hema hegam wehpeg mashchama am t‑wohochudadag ed. K wabshaba haꞌichu d ep hegai mamt ep wo s‑mai. Mt heg hekaj pi heg wo waꞌi aꞌagad mo d si shondaj g t‑wohochudadag.
Pi at wo e nako hegam mat wo s‑mahchk g Jiosh ch wo dagito mas gam hu ep wo s‑ohhod g pi ap e‑chegito k ep wo bei g wechij doakag. Heki o hu ha tonlid g Jiosh g ha‑amichudadag. K g Hekia S‑apꞌekam Gewkdag am ha eda chikpan. Kut chum bei ihda wechij doakag
k chum s‑mahch mo g Jiosh haꞌichu ahga s‑apꞌe ch neid g Jiosh gewkdag
ch wabshaba wehs dagito ihda heg hekaj pi apꞌekam. Heg o wa wepo mat ab ep sisish g Jiosh alidag kots t ab k si edawua am ep i e nohnogidk pi apꞌekam wui. Kut pi wo shaꞌi e nako mas gam hu ep wo s‑ohhod g pi ap e‑chegitoi.
Neh, no hig pi woho mam hab elid g e‑eꞌes mat chum s‑kehg wo bahidagt mat hekid wo juh. Kumt wo dagito hegai oidag mat wabsh g hoꞌi wo i wuhshad. Pegih, t hab wa masma wo em‑dagito g Jiosh mamtp pi haꞌichu wehhejed wo s‑kehgajk.
<range>
Ni wabshaba hab em‑elid mamt woho e doꞌibia k hab masma ab baꞌich wo i bei g Jiosh hoꞌigeꞌidadag.
S‑ap am haꞌichu hab junihim ha wehhejed g e‑wehm wohochuddam ch hab wabsh kia junihim nam pi si pihk e elid ha hekaj. T g Jiosh wo s‑chegito hegai mam haschu hab junihim.
Tatchua ani mamt hab wa masma am hab wo junihid wehs e‑doakag oidam ch ab wo ai hegai mo g Jiosh ab t‑makiog hahawa.
Hegam mash wa heki hu ab s‑wohochud g Jiosh ash s‑bahbagi ab nenida mat hab wo ha juni mash haschu hab kaij mat hab wo juh. Kumt ahpim hab wo wa masmak.
Jiosh ash wa am si ahg g t‑shohshonbad Abraham mash haschu ab t‑makiog
ab wui hab kaijch: Hejel ni‑wehhejed ani si m‑ahgid mant ab wo si s‑m‑hoꞌigeꞌid k ab muꞌi wo i ha wuwhas g m‑amjedkam.
Kutsh heg am wabsh s‑bahbagi nenida k am nei matsh wa g Jiosh am i shonwuich mat haschu am ahgi mat hab wo juni.
Neh, s‑mahch ach mat am Jiosh tahgio aꞌai wo i apꞌech g hemajkam mat woho hab wo juh g haꞌichu e‑ahga.
Pegih, t g Jiosh am hejel e tahgio i apꞌech g haꞌichu e‑ahga Abrahambad wui no pi pi hedai baꞌich i geꞌej mas am tahgio wo i apꞌech. Bo masma am t‑chehgidch ahchim mach ab s‑wohochud mat pi hekid am gawul wo juh g hab e‑elida.
Kutt heg hekaj ab wo t‑gewkemhunad mat s‑ap wo nahto g t‑doꞌibiadag.
Jesus atsh am heki hu i wah dahm kahchim ch ed. Kuch heg hekaj s‑mahch mat am wo i t‑wahpki ahchim mach ab s‑wohochud. Jiosh atsh am i kei matsh d wo uhgchu t‑pahligk chum hekid. Pi ash heg hekaj d pahl mas d papal ha amjedkam. Jiosh atsh am i kei hab masma matsh wa heki hu am i kei hegai mash hab chehgig Melkisedek.
<range>
Nt wo haꞌichu em‑ahgi ab amjed hegai Melkisedekbad mant wo em‑tashogi g Jesus chikpan. Jiosh atsh am i kei g Melkisedekbad. Kush d kownal am Salem kihhim ch ed ch d ep pahl. Kutsh idam Abrahambad gam hu hebai gidahiop k am haꞌi ha kokda g pi apꞌekam kokownal k ab uhpam hihim. Kutsh g Melkisedekbad ab ha nam k ab i s‑hoꞌigeꞌel g Abrahambad am wehhejed g Jiosh.
Tsh g Abrahambad ab mah mo haschu ab d wuikamaj g Jiosh mash d hemako tahpna mo wehst‑mahm e tahpanch g gehgewadaj. Melkisedekbad chehgig o hab d ahga ‘S‑apꞌekam Kownal.’ K g Salem hab d ahga ‘Dodolimadag.’ K heg hekaj d ep dodolimkam kownal.
Pi o an hu hebai oꞌohanas mas hedai d ha‑amjedkam g Melkisedekbad ch has masma mahsi k has masma heb hu hih. K id am t‑chehgidch mat has masma in wo i wuhsh g Jiosh alidag ab dahm kahchim t amjed k am uhpam ep wo him k d wo uhgchu pahlk chum hekid.
Melkisedekbad oki baꞌich d i si s‑has haꞌichu mo g Abrahambad. Tsh heg ab mah g hemako tahpna mo wehst‑mahm e tahpanch g gehgewadaj matsh am ui cheggiadag ed
K hab chuꞌig g t‑chehanig matsh hegam t‑wehm oꞌodham mo d Levibad amjedkam ch d papal ab t‑amjed wo ui hegai hemako tahpna matsh wehst‑mahm wo e tahpanch g t‑gehgewadag.
Kush ihda Melkisedekbad pi d Levibad amjedkam. Tsh eda g Abrahambad ab namkid hegai mo d Jiosh wuikam. Tsh g Melkisedekbad ab i s‑hoꞌigeꞌel.
Kuch s‑mahch mat g geꞌechu ab wo s‑hoꞌigeꞌel g chumchu. K heg hekaj baꞌich i geꞌej g Melkisedekbad mo g Abrahambad.
Melkisedekbad o baꞌich d i si s‑has haꞌichu mo g t‑papalig. Hegam o wabsh koꞌihim. K wabshaba pi an hu hebai oꞌohanas mat muh g Melkisedekbad.
K heg wa wepo mat g t‑papalig ha‑shohshonbad Levi am namkid g Melkisedekbad
nash pi ab d Abrahambad amjedkam mash heg am namkid.
Jiosh atsh am i ha chuhcha g Levibad amjedkam matsh d wo t‑papaligk ch ab wo t‑mah g chehanigaj. T wabshaba pi wo shaꞌi e nako g t‑papalig mas am wo i t‑apꞌech g Jiosh wehhejed. Tsh heg hekaj ab hema ep i wuhsh mash gawul masma mo hegam ch wepo masma g Melkisedekbad.
Kut hemho wa am gawul juh g Jiosh g e‑chehanig mat am wo i kei g Jesus mat d wo t‑pahligk.
Heg ash pi ab hu d Levibad amjedkam ch wabshaba ab d Judabad amjedkam matsh idam pi d wo chum papalk am t‑chehanig ed. K heg hekaj tasho mat g Jiosh am gawul juh g e‑chehanig am t‑wehhejed.
<range>
Neh, baꞌich ant am wo i em‑tashogi mo g Jesus pi ha wepo masma g t‑papalig ch wabshaba wepo masma g Melkisedekbad.
Pi atsh e pahlch g t‑chehanigkaj k wabshaba e pahlch g gewkdajkaj g e‑doakag. K g doakaj d pi ha huhugedam.
Heg o hekaj ab amjed oꞌohanas mash ab wui hab kaij g Jiosh: Am ant i m‑kei hab masma mant wa am i kei g Melkisedekbad. Kupt chum hekid d wo uhgchu pahlk. Neh, bo kaij g Jiosh am e‑alidag wui.
Kut heg am i t‑apꞌech Jiosh tahgio mach ab hahawa s‑ap miabid. Heki hu t‑chehanig o pi ab hu shaꞌi t‑mahkch g gewkdag machs hekaj am wo i t‑apꞌech Jiosh wehhejed. Kut hekaj g Jiosh gam hu hab i juh.
<range>
Jiosh ash hab wabsh kaij matsh g Levibad amjedkam d wo papalk
ch wabshaba g e‑gewkdagkaj hab kaij ab wui g Jesus: Ahni ani g ni‑gewkdagkaj hab si kaij mapt d wo uhgchu pahlk chum hekid. Kunt pi hekid am gawul wo juh g hab ni‑elida. Neh, bash kaij g Jiosh.
K id am t‑chehgidch mat g Jiosh am i apꞌech g baꞌich i s‑kehg apꞌechuda mat hi heki hu nat pi am i kei g hejel e‑alidag mat d wo uhgchu pahlk chum hekid.
Hegam Levibad amjedkam at pi wo e nako mas d wo papalk chum hekid no pi koꞌihim.
T wabshaba g Jesus chum hekid d wo doakamk. T hab pi hedai ep am kehkud ed wo i kekiwua.
Kut wo e nako mat wehs wo ha doꞌibia hegam mat am gahi wuhshanim ab wo i e nohnogi Jiosh wui nat pi chum hekid d wo doakamk ch am ha wehhejed ab wo tahnid g Jiosh mat am wo i ha wehmt.
Tatchua ach g si s‑ap uhgchu pahl. K g Jesus woho hab masma ch d hekia s‑apꞌekam ch i e gawulkadch ab ha amjed g pi apꞌekam. Idani o an daha Jiosh wehm an dahm kahchim ch ed.
Pi o wepo masma hegam mo d uꞌugchu papal am heki hu t‑chehanig ed. (a) Hegam o d pi ap chuꞌijkam ch wehpeg ab wo haꞌichu iagchul hejel e‑chuꞌijig wehhejed k ab haha wo iagchul g hemajkam ha‑chuꞌijig wehhejed. K wabshaba g Jesus pi ha chuꞌijig. (b) Hegam o chum hekid ab haꞌichu iagchulid Jiosh wui. T wabshaba g Jesus hemho hab juh. T heg wehs am i apꞌech g pi ap ha‑chuꞌijig. (c) Hegam o ab haꞌichu chum namkid g Jiosh. T wabshaba g Jesus hejel am i e dagito mat hekaj ab wo iagchul.
Hegam mo d papal ab heki hu t‑chehanig wecho o pi d shaꞌi hekiakam ch pi ap wo nahto g e‑chikpan. T wabshaba g Jiosh am hahawa i kei g e‑alidag g hejel e‑gewkdagkaj. K heg d uhgchu t‑pahlig ch d si hekiakam. Pi at hekid wo huhug g gewkdaj. T hab s‑ap wo nahto g e‑chikpan.
Neh, bo wa masma d uhgchu pahl g Jesus mant am i em‑tashogi. Kush g Jiosh ab si has elid ch am e wehm dahshch e‑kownal daikud ed.
Jiosh kihdag o si s‑wohom d geꞌe cheopi ch pi d wabsh hemajkam ha‑nahtoi. K heg eda am chikpan ihda si s‑wohom uhgchu t‑pahlig.
Uꞌugchu papal at ab haꞌichu wo chum iagchul Jiosh wui am wehhejed g pi ap ha‑chuꞌijig g hemajkam. T id hab waꞌap wo wa juh g Jesus.
K eda pi hiwgidas mas hab wo juh ia jewed dahm no ge d Levibad amjedkam. Do waꞌi idam mo am t‑himdag chehanig ed hab wua g chuꞌijig iagchulida.
K eda g ha‑chikpan wabsh t‑chehgidch g Jiosh kihdag ch hegai si s‑wohom chuꞌijig iagchulida. Jiosh atsh wa am chehgi g Mosesbad mo has masma g kihdaj an dahm kahchim ch ed. Kush wa neid g Mosesbad an kehkch doꞌag dahm. Kush wa hab kaij g Jiosh ab wui: Am ani m‑chehgid mo has masma g ni‑kihdag. Kupt am wo ha ahgi g hemajkam mat hab masma am hema hab wo juh g ikus kih mat d wo ni‑cheopigak.
Neh, hegam uꞌugchu papal o am i chum ha wehmt g hemajkam heg hekaj heki hu hab elidaj g Jiosh. K wabshaba ihda wechij haꞌichu hab elidaj baꞌich i s‑kehgaj no pi g Jiosh baꞌich i s‑kehg haꞌichu ab t‑makiog. K g Jesus baꞌich i s‑ap i t‑wehmt heg hekaj.
Pi at am hu hab wo juh g wechij apchuda g Jiosh matp g hekiukam s‑ap am wo i t‑apꞌech wehhejed.
Neh, bash kaij g Jiosh: Ab o him g tash mant am wo nahto g wechij hab ni‑elida am ha wehhejed g ni‑hemajkamga.
Kut pi hab wo masmak mo hegai mant am chum nahto am ha wehhejed g ha‑geꞌegedga mant eda ab i ha wuwhas Egypt jewed t amjed. Hegam o pi ap am hu hab junihim g haꞌichu ni‑apchuda. Kuni heg hekaj pi ha chegima.
Nt wabshaba am hab wo juh g wechij haꞌichu hab ni‑elida am ha wehhejed. K d ihda mant am wo oꞌoha g ni‑chehanig ha‑chegitoi ed ch am ha‑iꞌibdag ed. Kut woho d wo ni‑hemajkamgak. Nt ahni d wo ha‑Jioshgak.
Kut pi hedai wo shaꞌi ha mashcha g e‑wehm oꞌodham mat wo s‑ni‑mahchk. Wehs at wo s‑ni‑mahchk, chum as hedai wud wo k.
Gm ant hu hab wo i juh g pi ap ha‑chuꞌijig k pi hekid ep wo chegitok.
Neh, bash kaij g Jiosh. K heg hekaj tasho mat hekit hegai heki hu t‑himdag chehanig k oi gam hu hab wo i e juh.
Am o apchudas heg eda heki hu chehanig mat has masma g hemajkam ab has wo elidad g Jiosh ch am ep apchudas mat g hemajkam am wo i kei g ikus kih mat hab d wo ahgak.
Id ash wa an e eda kuhpi. K hegai wehpeg kih hab e aꞌaga ‘Hekia S‑apꞌekam Kih.’ Sh id eda am haꞌichug g lalampa chuhchakud ch mihsa. Sh heg ab mihsa g papal am doꞌaw g pahn ch hekaj ab si has elid g Jiosh.
Kush hegai hema ep kih hab e aꞌaga ‘Si Hekia S‑apꞌekam Kih.’
Id ash eda am haꞌichug g ohla iagchulidakud. Kush id ab g papal an memheid g s‑ap uhw haꞌichu. Kush am ep haꞌichug hegai uhs washa mash d chehgida mach d chum Jiosh hemajkamga ahchim Tutuligo. Id ash wehsko e maꞌishch g ohlakaj. Am ash id eda e dahshch g ohla haꞌa. Sh id eda haꞌi nuhkud hegai haꞌichu hugi mash hab e aꞌaga ‘manna.’ Kush am e chekch hegai Aaronbad usaga mash wa ab i iꞌiwgi. Kush wa am ep e toꞌakch hegai gohk koꞌokmalk hohodai mo an ab oꞌohanas g Jiosh chehanig.
An dahm ihda uhs washa ash an nahtois g gohk anghil ch ab e wui gegok ch g e‑aꞌankaj am ehkchulidch matsh hebai wo e iawua g ehꞌedaj g ha‑iagchulida. Id ash am e iawua matsh hekaj g Jiosh wo s‑ha hoꞌigeꞌid k gam hu hab wo i juh g ha‑chuꞌijig. Pi ant am hu wo kia wehs haꞌichu t tashogi ab amjed ihda.
Neh, bash wa masma wehs apchudas idam haꞌichu. Sh g papal am i wahpk wehpeg kih ch ed wehs tashkaj ch am hab wua g e‑chikpan.
Kush wabshaba heg waꞌi si uhgchu pahl ged hu i wapke heg eda baꞌich kih hemho ahid ab. Kush g haꞌichu doakam ehꞌed am iagchulid Jiosh wui am wehhejed g e‑chuꞌijig ch ha‑chuꞌijig g hemajkam matp hems am hab juh pi mahchch mo d pi ap chuꞌijig.
Hegai Si Hekia S‑apꞌekam Kih o wepogidas g Jiosh kihdag. K g Hekia S‑apꞌekam Gewkdag am t‑chehgidch mo pi koi ab hu kuhpiꞌoks g Jiosh kihdag am t‑wehhejed mo eda wabsh kia an kuhpi hegai kih.
K d wabsh chehgida mo g haꞌichu doakam ab iagchulid Jiosh wui. Pi at woho am wo i ha apꞌech Jiosh tahgio. K heg hekaj am wabsh kia e kudut heg hekaj pi ap e‑chuꞌijig.
Ihda heki hu chehanig o wa am ha chehgidch mat haschu wo koꞌad ch has masma wo i e apꞌechudad e lihmhunch am Jiosh wehhejed am hugkam mat hekid g Jiosh am wo i wechijid wehs haꞌichu am t‑wehhejed.
Tsh wa id am woho hab e juh g Christ k d si uhgchu pahl am dahm hegai s‑kehg haꞌichu mash g Jiosh hab kaij matsh hab wo t‑juni. Hegai apchuda mo am eda chikpan g Christ o baꞌich i geꞌej ch baꞌich i s‑apꞌe mo hegai geꞌe cheopi mani am heki hu ahg. Pi at g oꞌodham am nahto. K pi d ihda jewed dahm haꞌichu.
Hemho at am i wah g Christ heg eda apchuda s‑ap nahtok g t‑doꞌibiadag. Hegam mo d jewed dahm papal o wabsh g haꞌichu doakam ha‑ehꞌed am iagchulid. T wabshaba g Jiosh alidag g hejel e‑ehꞌedkaj ab t‑behi g pi ha huhugedam doakag.
Neh, mash wa g ha‑ehꞌed g siswat ch totolo ab e sihbanid ch g matai ab amjed g wisilo mehidag ab e nehnichud ha dahm g hemajkam mat wo ha chehgi mat wo i ha kegch g Jiosh heg amjed matp hems pi ap am hu hab junihim g e‑himdag chehanig.
Pegih, t baꞌich i geꞌe haꞌichu hab t‑juni g Christ mat am i e dagito Jiosh wui k am t‑wehhejed e muhkid. Hekia S‑apꞌekam Gewkdag o wa ab mahkch g gewkdag mat hab juh. K d hekia s‑apꞌekam iagchulida. Heki achd hu t‑kudut heg hekaj pi ap t‑chuꞌijig. T wabshaba g Christ am iagchul g e‑ehꞌed Jiosh wui mat am wo i t‑apꞌech. Kuch am hahawa g Jiosh wehhejed chikpan.
Bash kaij g Jiosh matsh ab wo t‑mah g pi ha huhugedam doakag k ab wo i t‑wahpki e‑kihdag ed. T g alidaj am i apꞌech ihda wechij haꞌichu ahgaj t‑wehhejed ahchim mo g Jiosh ab t‑waid. Muhkigaj at am i t‑wuwhas matt pi wo ai g t‑namkidadag heg hekaj pi ap t‑chuꞌijig ab wecho hegai heki hu apchuda.
